40014001	Ká ɓil sewke ku na, Mbay Eroɗ ká ɓa nzoɓ réke tul puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na laa soro ɓay Zezu,
40014002	a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri mii: «Leɗban key na ɓa Za̰a Batis ká tḭi saa luɔ huɗ! Sa̰wke mini ze, ka ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ká ɓay ɗáa fe saŋri.»
40014003	-
40014004	Tusuɛke lɛ, zaɗka Za̰a Batis kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓáy na, Mbay Eroɗ mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri mgba ni í siŋ ni ɓáy sal lari í ɗaa ni ɓo hul sal, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Mbay Eroɗ ká ya̰a Eroɗiade ká ɓa má̰y yṵ-ɛ Filiɓ na, Za̰a ɓaa ha̰ ni ɓaŋguɔ mii, ka ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay kɔ́rɔ Eroɗiade na ɓa má̰y ɓe ya.
40014005	Mbay Eroɗ na hii ɓay ika Za̰a, roo lɛ, ka hḭɛ nun ruɔ nzoɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele kɔ Za̰a ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
40014006	Báyḭi lɛ, nam ká i ɗo ɗáa suoriya ɓay tul nam mboŋa Mbay Eroɗ na, vu Eroɗiade ká ɓa leɗ má̰y tikɗi na nda-nday ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗi ri ha ri ví kaw zaɗ suoriyake ku na. Lɛɛ, nday ɓe na rii law Eroɗ ɓamba tasiri
40014007	ha̰ ni waa fe a háake huɗ mii: «Fe ḭi ḭi hɔy mù vbi mì kara, mì haŋa mù.»
40014008	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ má̰y tikɗi na, ɓáy faa nzaa ɓoko mi-ɛ káʼa ya̰a na, ka ɓǎake ha̰ Eroɗ mii: «Mu ɗaa tul Za̰a Batis ka ɓo ɓil patinza, a mú ha̰ mì ká zaɗ ni key!»
40014009	Zaɗka Mbay Eroɗ laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, sùo-ɛ rii ni ya. Roo lɛ, ɓay tul huɗ káʼa haa ka nun ruɔ nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri na, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri víke ɓáy tul Za̰a Batis ha̰ leɗ má̰y tikɗi na.
40014010	Ka pie nzoɓ mbḭw se a vǎa kuŋ tul Za̰a ká ɓil hul sal na a ɗaa
40014011	ɓo ɓil patinza, a víke ha̰ leɗ má̰y tikɗi na ya̰a a séke ha̰ mi-ɛ na.
40014012	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal Za̰ari laa soro ɓay huɗ ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, i ví mbi huɗ ɓe na í vǎa voro. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, i se í vǎa lo soro feri ká kal na ha̰ Zezu laa.
40014013	Zaɗka Zezu laa soro ɓay huɗ Za̰a na báyḭi lɛ, ka hil a kaw ɓil tuo a zɔl huo-ɛ ká zaɗɛ ku ɓay séke ɓa zaɗ ká ɗo kɔlɔk. Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ká ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i kɔ ni tḭi na, i uru ká ɓil puori ɓáy ɓal-ri í dii fal-ɛ wuu wuu ká nzaa kporombii.
40014014	Zaɗka Zezu tḭi saa ɓil tuo a kɔ ruɔ nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ nun síe ɓari a vaa nzoɓ sɛm ɓari.
40014015	Zaɗka zaɗ ɓa láw pira pira na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Síe ti mbǎa, zaɗ ni key kara ɓa ɓil law kɔr ze ɗo key. Munu zu lɛ, mu ála ruɔ nzoɓri key na ha ri zɔ́l, í se ɓil puɔri í vǎa hie fe sṵmri í sṵ.»
40014016	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì se síe séke ɗi ya. Ɓaarì kḭ ze, ì ha ri fe sṵm ha ri sṵ.»
40014017	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru ɗo ɓáy maapa ɓa ndeɓe ɓáy sḭiri ɓa siɗi hɔy ze ɗo key.»
40014018	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì víke ɓa key ha̰ mì.»
40014019	Zaɗka Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele kaw tul suy barak barak báyḭi lɛ, ka ya̰a maapa ká ndeɓe ɓáy sḭiri ká siɗi na, a ura nun-ɛ ɓa siya a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a haw maapa na a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ha ri leke ruɔ nzoɓri na ha ri sṵ.
40014020	Ɓari riw bele na, i sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri maa ɓáy zaɗ kɔn ɓari, a ɓieri ká tɔ̀ŋ ká i fa̰a na mbaa buɗu dɔrɔrɔ dɔrɔrɔ ɓa duɔ falɛ siɗi!
40014021	Ɓari ká i sṵ na, wa̰rari maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe (5.000) taŋ kḭiŋa má̰yri ɓáy leɗri.
40014022	Falɛ ku ndḭi hɔy lɛ, Zezu ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri hil í kaw ɓil tuo í zɔl pola ha̰ ni ɓay séke ɓa nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu. Zaɗka i zɔl na, Zezu tɔ̀ŋ fal kɔɓ ɓay ɓáa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri zɔl faa puɔ.
40014023	Falɛ káʼa ha ri zɔl na báyḭi lɛ, ka vǎa hil tul kuo ɓay ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɗi. Zaɗka zaɗ guɓa kḭ na, ka kaw zaɗɛ ku huo-ɛ hɔy.
40014024	A tuo ká leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kaw ɗi í zɔl na ɗo law mbii ro. Zuu kuu a suɔ nun-ri ha̰ mbii nda tuo paw pǎw ha̰ ni laŋ beŋna beŋna.
40014025	Nzaa fa̰a nzaaruo na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu uru a se tul mbii takam takam ɓa luo leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na ro vǎw.
40014026	Zaɗka i kɔ ni, káʼa se tul mbii na munu báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki ha ri ɓaa mii: «Ɓa wṵru ze se vuku!» Ro, í guu fe ɓáy hḭɛ gǔrum gǔrum.
40014027	Roo lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa ɓi kḭ zu, ì siŋ law-rì, ì ha̰ hḭɛ ka ɗáa rì ya!»
40014028	Ro, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, zaɗka ɓa ɓo kḭ zu lɛ, mu mbi nzaa-a ha̰ mì se tul mbii na mí se luo-ɔ.»
40014029	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mu vi na maa!» Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tḭi saa ɓil tuo na, a se tul mbii ɓa luo Zezu.
40014030	Roo lɛ, zaɗkaʼa kɔ zuu ká kuu ɓa hḭɛ ɓamba na báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ví ɗaa ni ha̰ ni tii sa̰w ríŋ mbii, lɛ, ka guu fe ɓeleŋ mii: «Mbay, mu ya̰a mì!»
40014031	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, Zezu zuɗa nduo-ɛ a mgba ni a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo ká mbika law-a ndḭi hɔy na; ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù ma̰y ɓay ká tul-i rìi fe ká mì maa ɓay kɔ́rɔ mù ká tul mbii na ya lɛ?»
40014032	Zaɗka i hil tul-ri siɗi bele í kaw ɓil tuo na báyḭi lɛ, nzaa zuu na ví kuŋ nzɛɗ.
40014033	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri ká i kaw ɓil tuo na, i ví huku pol Zezu í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɓo na, mù ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
40014034	Zaɗka i tuo maambii na báyḭi lɛ, i tḭi fi kɛlu ká zaɗri ká kiri Zenezarɛɗ kɔr.
40014035	Nzoɓri ká tusirike ká i kɔ ɓa Zezu na, i ɗaa ɓayke nda zaɗ kpol kpol riw bele ha ri vi ɓáy nzoɓ sɛmri riw bele ha̰ ni.
40014036	I koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ faa ha ri záa nzaa gari ɓe fi siri hɔy ɓo í váa. Ɓari riw bele ká i zaa na, i vaa ɓáy kere.
40015001	Báyḭi lɛ, Farizi ha̰nɛri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol ha̰nɛri ká i uru saa Zuruzalɛm na, i vi luo Zezu í vbi ni ɓay mii:
40015002	«Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, leɗ nduoɓal-ari ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul fe sa̰w puo ká bulu naari kiɛ na ya lɛ? Ɓari na, i sḭɛ nduo-ri ɓáy zaɗɛ munu ká ɓa fe sa̰w puo na ya hɔy, í sṵ fe.»
40015003	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «A ɓaarì na wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì waɗ bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay ɗáa fe sa̰w puo ɓaarì ká ì fere na lɛ woo?
40015004	Ì kɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii: “Mu ɗaa vu mbom ka ɓo tul bǎa-ka ɓáy máa-ŋa.” Rɔɓay, ka ɓaa mii: “Nzoɓ ká faɗ mi-ɛ ɓáy bi-ɛ lɛ, ɗo nun ika ni.”
40015005	-
40015006	Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì kiɛ fe sa̰w puo ɓaarì mii, zaɗka nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy fe ɓay sɔ́kɔke bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ, rɔɔ a ɓaa mii, ɓeri ti haŋa ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa fe ká ɓeri kɔrɔ ɗo ɓoɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, nzoɓke ku na se síe ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul nzoɓ mbóŋ niri ya. Ɓáy faa ɗáa fe sa̰w puo ɓaarì ká mini key na, ì pɔ̌ŋke Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo fi mbḭw.
40015007	Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Ɓay ká Ezay ya̰a saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-rì na ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ kḭ. Ɓayke ɓaa mii:
40015008	“Nzoɓri key na, i ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-i ɓáy nzaa-ri hɔy, roo lɛ, ɓil law-ri ɗo ɗi ɗi ziŋ mì.
40015009	Rúo ká nzoɓri key ruo mì na ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, feri ká i fere nzoɓri na ɓa fe sa̰w puo nzoɓri kḭ hɔy ɓo, ɓa Ɓay ɓi ya.”»
40015010	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi ruɔ nzoɓri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì te suku-rì í láake ɓay key na ɓáy kere í tuu sa̰wke ta-taŋ:
40015011	Fe ká nzoɓ sṵ ɓáy nzi-ɛ se ɓil-e na ti ɗáa ha̰ ni síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya. Roo lɛ, fe ká tḭi saa nzaa nzoɓ, ze ɗaa ha̰ ni síike ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
40015012	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɓay ɓo ká mù ɓaa key na ɓiɛ law Fariziri kpukɗu kpukɗu. Wa̰a mù kɔ munu ya lɛ?»
40015013	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Puuri riw bele ká Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue maa ya na, i mún ri nzar nzar zuɔ ɓisuy. Farizikeri ku na, i ɗo munu ɓa puukeri na.
40015014	Ì pɔ́ŋ ri, ɓa ɓari ra̰wri ze i ɗaa puu nduo nduo kṵ-i ɓari. A zaɗka ra̰w ɗaa puu nduo nduo ra̰w kṵ-ɛ lɛ, i líe siɗi bele wuruk zuɔ luɔ.»
40015015	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mu tína sa̰w má̰ra law ɓay ká mù ɓaa ha̰ Fariziri na ha̰ ɓuru laa!»
40015016	Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa mii: «Ɓaarì rɔɓay! Ɓaarì ká ì ɓa leɗ nduoɓal-iri kḭ hɔy kara, ì ta̰a láa ɓay key na kpṵy lɛ woo?
40015017	Fe ká se ɓil nzaa nzoɓ na, kal a se ɓil-e a tḭi ɓa mḭ́iri zuɔ ɓisuy.
40015018	Roo lɛ, fe ká tḭi saa nzaa nzoɓ na uru saa ɓil wa̰ra law-ɛ, ɓe ze ha̰ nzoɓ síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ?
40015019	Kér ɓay ka̰ayari nda̰w, ika nzoɓ nda̰w, ɗáa nun pie nda̰w, taka mgbá̰y bapiɓi nda̰w, riiɓa nda̰w, kúɗ ɓay gbaɗ gbaɗ zuɔ nzaa nzoɓ nda̰w, rɔɔ ra̰ŋa kḭ nda̰w na, ɓa feri ká uru saa ɓil wa̰ra law nzoɓ.
40015020	Ɓe ze, ɓa feri ká ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓo sṵŋa fe taŋ sḭ́ɛ nduo ɓáy zaɗɛ munu ká ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari na, ɓe ze ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun-ɛ ya.»
40015021	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu uru saa zaɗɛ na ku, a se tusiri ká ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo Tir ɓáy Sido̰n.
40015022	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y mbḭw munu ká sa̰w ɓe ɗo tusiri Kanaa se luo Zezu a ɗaa fe ɓeleŋ mii: «Mbay! Vu bulu Daviɗ, kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy, mu kɔ nun síe ɓi! Vu-i ká ɓa leɗ má̰y tikɗi na, temndaya ɗo tul-e a ɗaa nun-ɛ tuɔ síe ɓamba tasiri.»
40015023	Roo lɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ nzaa má̰y na mgbuɗ ya. Ro, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í vbi ni mii: «Zezu, mu nii ni ha̰ ni zɔ́l ɓa lew, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka guu fe a séke fal naari ɓaŋguɔ.»
40015024	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru píe mì ɓa luo baɗuri ká i ze-zee ká í ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri na huo-ri kḭ hɔy, a má̰y key na sa̰w ɓe ɓoɗ.»
40015025	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, má̰y na ví huku pol Zezu gburuk a ɓaa mii: «Mbay, mu sɔ mì!»
40015026	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay mbika fe sṵm ká ɗo ɓay tul leɗri a vbu ha̰ vu váyri ya.»
40015027	Lɛɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗɛ kḭ na zu, Mbay. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara vu váyri na, bum fe sṵm bǎa káw ɓari ká ga̰y saa tutakra zuɔ siri na i dam í sṵ.»
40015028	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Áa, má̰y, mbika law ɓo na ŋgḭi ɓamba. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa feke ka ɗaa munu ká mù hii.» Lɛɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na hɔy, sùo vi-e na nduɔ kiyaw kiyaw.
40015029	Zezu zɔl ká zaɗɛ ku a se nzaa maambii ká Galele. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka vǎa hil tul mbɔrɔ mbḭw munu a kaw ɗi.
40015030	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba vi luo-ɛ. I fa̰a nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri nda̰w, nzoɓ ra̰wri nda̰w, nzoɓri ká sùo-ri hu wǔɔ nda̰w, nzoɓri ká kusol-ri mbii gbǎŋ nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy sɛm ha̰wri ŋgḭi ɓamba nda̰w na, i víke ri zuɔ pol Zezu, lɛ, ka vaa ri.
40015031	Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri kɔ nzoɓri ká kusol-ri mbii gbǎŋ ká í ɓaa ɓay nda̰w, nzoɓri ká sùo-ri hu wǔɔ ká i vaa nda̰w, nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri ká i se-seɗ ɓáy kere nda̰w, rɔɔ ra̰wri ká i kɔ-kɔ́m nda̰w na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri ha ri písi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leɗ Izarayɛlri.
40015032	Zezu ɗi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì kɔ nun síe nzoɓri key, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa nam say ro i ɗo ziŋ mì a í ti ɓáy fe sṵm ya. Mì hii ɓay haŋa ri zɔl taŋ sṵŋa fe ya, ká yḭ́i ɓari lɛ, i líe kɔn ká faa.»
40015033	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni mii: «Zaɗ ni key na ɓa ɓil law kɔr dǎr hɔy. Wa̰a, zaɗ ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ ɓuru séke ɗi ɓay nzáa fe sṵm ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri ká mini key na, i sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri lɛ?»
40015034	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ri mii: «Maapa ɓa mina ze ì ɗǒke lɛ?» I yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tɔnɔ say ɓáy vu sḭ̀i ha̰nɛri.»
40015035	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri kaw siri.
40015036	Falɛ ku nda̰w rɔɔ, a ya̰a maapa ká tɔnɔ say ɓáy sḭiri na a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a haw a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri leke ruɔ nzoɓri na.
40015037	Nzoɓri riw bele sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri siɓ siɓ maa ɓáy zaɗ kɔn ɓari. A ɓie maapakeri ɓáy sḭiri ká saɗ na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri fa̰a mbaa buɗu dɔrɔrɔ dɔrɔrɔ tɔnɔ say.
40015038	Wa̰rari ká i sṵ maapa na, tul-ri ɓa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ niŋ (4.000), taŋ kḭiŋa má̰yri ɓáy leɗri.
40015039	Zaɗka Zezu ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri zɔl na, ka hil a kaw ɓil tuo a se ɓa tusiri Magadan.
40016001	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri ɓáy Sadusiri vi luo Zezu ɓay nzáa nzi-ɛ, ze í vbi ni ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa fe saŋ mbḭw ha̰ ɓari kɔ mii, hṵrusuo-ɛ na uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
40016002	[Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na, láw lɛ ì ɓaa mii, “Ruo na zaɗ a ɗoko ndaɗ ɓamba, ɓay ḭi lɛ, tumbam ɓa sḭ́ɛ.”
40016003	A tiɓie piɛɗ laa lɛ, ì ɓaa mii, “Vuri key na mbam a tɔ́kɔ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, tumbam sḭ̀i ɗo wuo a ɗo guu.” Ɓaarì na, ì kɔ faa ndáy sa̰w ɓay ká se tul feri ká ɗo tumbam, roo lɛ, sa̰w ɓay ká se tul feri ká ɗo ɓil sewri key na, ì maa ɓay ndáy sa̰wke ya.]
40016004	Nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ ká i ɓa nzoɓ law ndayari ká í ɗo tul Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya na, i vbi fe saŋ ze ɓay kɔ́kɔ! Roo lɛ, fe saŋ kḭ ɓoɗ ká ɓay ɗáa nde tul-e taa ha̰y ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ká tul Zonas na, tiya.» Falɛ ku lɛ, ka pɔŋ ri a zɔl.
40016005	Leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri tuo mbii í se fi kɛlu. Zaɗka i ɗo séke ɓa nzaa kporo ká fi kɛlu na báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ í ɓaa mii, ɓari yḭiŋra fá̰a maapa na sɛl.
40016006	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu baka ri mii: «Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì! Ì kɔ́rɔ sùo-ri ká tul fe hew fe Fariziri ɓáy Sadusiri.»
40016007	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Ka ɓaa ɓay munu ɓay tul maapa ká náa yḭiŋrari fá̰ake.»
40016008	Ro, Zezu kɔ kér ɓay ɓari na a vbi ri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká mbika law ɓaarì ndḭi hɔy! Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì ma̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ se tul maapa ká ì yḭiŋra fá̰ake na lɛ?
40016009	Wa̰a, ì kɔ ya ɓáy lɛ woo? Ì ker se tul maapa ká ndeɓe ká mì haw mí ha̰ wa̰rari ɓa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe na ya lɛ woo? Mase ɓie ká tɔ̀ŋ na wa̰a, i fa̰a mbaa buɗu ɓa mina lɛ?
40016010	Rɔɓay, maapa ká tɔnɔ say ká mì haw, mí ha̰ wa̰rari ɓa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ niŋ ká ɓie tɔ̀ŋ ká i fa̰a mbaa buɗu wuruk wuruk na wa̰a, ì ker se ɗi ya hɔy lɛ?
40016011	Wa̰a ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ì ker í ɓaa mii, ɓay tul maapa ze mì ɓáake ɓay ziŋ rì lɛ? Mì ɓaa mii: “Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay tul fe hew fe Fariziri ɓáy Sadusiri.”»
40016012	Ɓe nu ku rɔɔ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa ɓay ɓe na taŋ ɓáy. Ka ɓaa ha ri ɓay haŋa ri nzɛ ɓáy sùo-ri ɓay tul fe fére Fariziri ɓáy Sadusiri ká ɗo munu ɓa fe hew fe.
40016013	Zezu tḭi tusiri ká ɗo lakun ŋgɛrɛpuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sezare-Filiɓ. Báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Wa̰a, nzoɓri ɓaa ɓay mina ze se tul-i ɓi Vu Nzoɓ lɛ?»
40016014	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii, mù ɓa Za̰a Batis; nzoɓ kḭri ɓoɗ ɓaa mii, mù ɓa Eli, a nzoɓ kḭri rɔɓay ɓaa mii, mù ɓa Zeremi, mase ɓa nzoɓ kḭ ká ya̰a ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
40016015	Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a vbi ri mii: «A ɓaarì kḭ na wa̰a, ì ɓaa mii, mì ɓa nzoɓ ve lɛ?»
40016016	Lɛɛ, Simo̰n Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mù ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi; mù ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, Nzoɓ Káw Ɓáy Kumnun.»
40016017	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Simo̰n, vu Zonas, suoriya ɓa taa ɓo. Ɓa nzoɓ ze ha̰ nun-a taŋ ká tul tusuɛ ɓay na key ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Bǎa ká kaw nulue ze mgbuɗa nun-a ká ɗi.
40016018	Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ: ɓo na mù ɓa Piyɛr, má̰ra riŋke ɓa tisaw. Ɓáy faa hṵrusuo-i na, mù ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba í ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul-i. Nzoɓ mbika lawkeri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ riw bele na, ɗo ɓa hul ɓi ká mì mbuo ɗo tul tisawke na. Ze ɓa na huɗ hɔy kara, ti ɗoko ɓáy hṵrusuo háw yṵm ká tul-e ya.
40016019	Nzoɓri ká mì re mbay ká tul-ri na, mì ha̰ mù hṵrusuo ndáka faa pol-ri munu ɓa nzoɓ ká kɔrɔ lakerere mbay ɗo nduo-ɛ. Fe ká mù haa faake ká tusiri key na, a ɓá fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru haa faake ká nulue ro, a fe ká mù pɔŋ faake ká tusiri key laa lɛ, a ɓá fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pɔŋ faake ká nulue nda̰w pi.»
40016020	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu baka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓay haŋa ri ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw mii, ɓeri ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi na ya.
40016021	Úru saa síeke ku na, Zezu tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ta-taŋ ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɗo nun haŋa mì se Zuruzalɛm, a mí kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba ká nduo ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri nda̰w, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri nda̰w pi. I ika mì, a ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ mí kaw ɓáy kumnun.»
40016022	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mgba ni a tḭ́ike ŋgereŋ ɓa nzaa zaɗ, a tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ziŋ ni mii: «Mbay, fe key na ka tḭi tul-a ya! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka kɔ́rɔ mù!»
40016023	Roo lɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ kɔ́m ɓa luo-ɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Satan, mu zɔ́l ká lakun-i ɗi ɗi ɓa lew! Ɓo na, mù ɗaa puu ɓo faa ha̰ mì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, kér ɓay ɓo na ɗo ɓa kér ɓay nzoɓri hɔy ɓo, ɗo ɓa kér ɓay taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.»
40016024	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Nzoɓ ká hii ɓay séke fal-i lɛ, ka pɔ́ŋ sùo-ɛ yaklak ha̰ mì a mbi puu say huɗ ɓe a soɓ a séke fal-i.
40016025	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ ká hii kɔ́rɔ kumnun ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ na, kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ka ti zíŋ ya. A roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká pɔŋ sùo-ɛ yɔɗ ɓay tul-i lɛ, a zíŋ kumnun taa tusuɛke na.
40016026	A zaɗka nzoɓ ziŋ feri ká tusiri key riw bele, rɔɔ a ziŋ kumnun taa tusuɛke ya na wa̰a, ɓa feziŋa ḭi kḭ zu lɛ woo! Mase fe ḭi ɗo ɗi ku ká nzoɓ a máa ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a súoke kumnun taa tusuɛke na lɛ?
40016027	Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì vika ɓáy riŋ ɗika Bǎa ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓeri ká nulue mbḭw hɔy. Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, mì púo ni maa ɓáy peɗ ɗáa ɓeri.
40016028	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ká i ɗo zaɗ ni key na, i ti huka ya kpṵru ɓay kɔ́kɔ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ká mì ví réke mbay na ɓáy nun-ri nda̰w rɔɔ í hu ɓáy.»
40017001	Falɛ ká ɗaa nam yie na, Zezu ha̰ Piyɛr, Zak ɓáy Za̰a ká i ɓa yṵ kḭ na se ziŋ ni tul kuo ká gaŋ zeŋleŋ ká ɗo nzaa zaɗ, a í kaw ɗi huo-ri.
40017002	Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na, sùo Zezu fɛrɛ gbǎ̰y ká nun-ri: nun-ɛ ndṵy munu ká síe, a gari ɓeri laa lɛ, puu ka̰rara munu ɓa zaɗ taŋa.
40017003	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say na, i kɔ Moyze ɓáy Eli ká i tḭi í ɗo loko soro ziŋ Zezu.
40017004	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay haŋa náa káwri zaɗ ni key. Zaɗka mù hii lɛ, mì ɗáa hul puɗi ɓa say ɗo zaɗ ni key. Mbḭw ɓa taa ɓo, mbḭw ɓa taa Moyze, a mbḭwke laa lɛ, ɓa taa Eli.»
40017005	Zaɗkaʼa ɗo ɓáa ɓay munu kɔɓ rɔɓay báyḭi lɛ, síi mbam ká taŋ a ɗo gbereŋ vi puma a guɓa tul-ri gbukru, lɛ, ká ɓil síi mbamke ku na kusol mgba ɓeleŋ ká ɗi mii: «Ɓe key na, ka ɓa Vu-i; mì kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ nun-i. Ɓa ɓe na ze sùo-i ríi mì ɓamba ká tul-e. Ì laa ɓay ɓe.»
40017006	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa kusol ká mgba munu na báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki ha ri lie raɗ zuɔ siri í ɗaa nzaa pol-ri tuŋ siri.
40017007	Roo lɛ, Zezu soro ɓa lakun-ri a zaa ri a ɓaa mii: «Ì úru siya, ì ɗaa hḭɛ ya.»
40017008	Zaɗka i ura nun-ri báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ya, ɓa Zezu huo-ɛ hɔy ze ɗo.
40017009	Zaɗka i ɗo ɗíra saa tul kuo na, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say na mii: «Fe ká tḭi nun-rì ká ì kɔ key na, ì ha̰ ɓayke ka tḭi ká nzáa-rì ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ka laa ya kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì tḭ́ike saa luɔ huɗ na.»
40017010	Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓaa mii: “Ɗo nun haŋa Eli ka vi pola nda̰w rɔɔ, Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi na ka vi ɓáy” lɛ?»
40017011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɗo nun haŋa Eli na ka vi a leke feri riw bele ha̰ ni ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ zeɓ zeɓ.
40017012	A roo lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu ká Eli na vi ɗɔɗ ro, lɛ, nzoɓri tuu ni ɓa ɓe ya, í ɗara ni munu ká law-ri hii. Ɓe ze ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na i ɗára mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe.»
40017013	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kɔ í ɓaa mii, ɓayke key na ka ɓaa se tul Za̰a Batis.
40017014	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal ká say na i ɗi saa tul kuo í ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, wa̰ra nzoɓ mbḭw soro ɓa luo Zezu a huku pol-e a ɓaa mii:
40017015	«Mbay, kóɗ hɔy, mu kɔ nun síe vu-i ká ɓa leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ ká kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba key. Suosɛrɛm kuku ɗara ni ɓaŋguɔ, a mbi ni ɓo huu nda̰w, ɓo mbii nda̰w pi.
40017016	Ze mì mgba ni mí séke luo leɗ nduoɓal-ari, roo lɛ, faa váa ni mba ri.»
40017017	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ nzoɓri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓ law ŋgɔ-ŋgɔri ká law-rì ndaya! Wa̰a, nam tɔ̀ŋ ɓa mina ɓáy rɔɔ, ɓay haŋa mì kaw ziŋ rì rɔɓay lɛ? Nam tɔ̀ŋ ɓa mina ɓáy rɔɔ, mì íki law-i ká tul-rì lɛ? Ì mgba leɗ na í víke ɓa key ha̰ mì.»
40017018	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭw temndaya na, lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy temndaya na tḭi ká tul leɗ kuku na a pɔŋ ni vaa kiyaw kiyaw.
40017019	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kḭ laa ro i soro í vi lakun-ɛ í mgba ni ɗo fi mbḭw í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ɓuru maa ɓay níi temndaya ni key na ya lɛ?»
40017020	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɗo munu ɓay tul mbika law ɓaarì ká ndḭi hɔy. Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka mbika law ɓaarì ŋgɔɓ ya maa pa̰ra túŋ ká ndḭi hɔy lɛ, ì ɓáa ha̰ kuo key na mii: “Mu sóro ká zaɗ ni key, a mú se mú vǎa ɗo lew,” lɛ, a sóro na kḭ. Fe mbḭw káʼa mbaka ri mba na, tiya.
40017021	[Roo lɛ, kḭri temndaya ká mini key na, ɓáy faa ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ɓáy sáŋ sùo hɔy ze, nzoɓ a máa ɓay níike ni ha̰ ni tḭi saa tul nzoɓ.»]
40017022	Nam mbḭw munu ká Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i ziŋ kḭ riw bele ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓiri i pɔ́ŋ mì ɓo nduo nzoɓri ha ri í mì,
40017023	a ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ mí kaw ɓáy kumnun.» Ɓayke ku na ɗaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗáake síe ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri.
40017024	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi ká Kapɛrnayum. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ká ɓay tul hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru soro í vǎa ziŋ Piyɛr í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, larimbuo ká ɓay tul hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ŋgɛrɛ tul-rì puo ya lɛ?»
40017025	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ka pu-puo puo.» Zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo ndúo ɓa hula báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa pola se tul larimbuo na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Simo̰n, wa̰a, mù ker mina ro ká ɓil law-a lɛ? Wa̰a, mbayri ká tusiri key na, i ya̰a larimbuo saa nduo nzoɓ veri, mase i puo tul fe ɓari ha̰ nzoɓ veri lɛ? I ya̰a saa nduo vu ɓari mase, nzoɓ tul puori lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «I ya̰a saa nduo nzoɓ tul puori.»
40017026	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Munu zu báyḭi lɛ, vu mbayri ze puo larimbuo ya.
40017027	Ze munu hɔy kara, ɓay haŋa náa ɗo ɓa ŋguɗ puu ɓay tul nzoɓ mbṵ́ larimbuori key ya lɛ, mu se maambii mú vǎa ɓo-ɓoy, lɛ, titire sḭ̀i ká mù mgbaka ɗɛkrɛ ku na, mu mgbúɗa nzi-ɛ, lɛ, mù zíŋ lari ká ɗi ká maa naa. Lɛɛ, mù púoke tul-a nda̰w, tul-i nda̰w siɗi bele.»
40018001	Ká ɓil sa̰w síeke ku na leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ká sakra nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ lɛ?»
40018002	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi leɗ mbḭw ká ndḭi munu ha̰ ni ví ɗo sikɗa ɓari
40018003	a ɓaa mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì a í ɗiŋ tul-rì ɓay ɗoko munu ká leɗri ká ndḭi key na ya lɛ, ì ti ɗoko sakra nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na ya.
40018004	Nzoɓ ká ɗiŋ tul-e munu ká leɗ ká ndḭi key na lɛ, nzoɓke na ku ze, i kɔ́kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ ká mba tul kṵ-ɛri ká puoruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
40018005	A nzoɓ ká mgba leɗ mbḭw, munu ká leɗ key na ɓa sùo-ɛ ɓay tul-i lɛ, ka mgba mì ɓi kḭ sùo-i zu.»
40018006	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ula leɗ mbḭw ká ndḭi mini ká sakra leɗri ká ɗo key ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-i na ha̰ ni ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, síŋ bawda tisaw ɗo sol nzoɓke a vbu ni ha̰ ni riŋ a ɓo tigba̰a maambii na, ndaɗ mba haŋa ni kaw ɓáy kumnun a ula leɗ na.
40018007	Kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe minake ze ɗo ɓay tusiri key, ɓay tul feri ká ɗo ɗi a ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ɗaa feya̰a na lɛ! Ɓa tusuɛ, fekeri na a ɗoko ɓaŋguɔ. Roo lɛ, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓa ŋguɗ puu ká ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ɗáake feya̰a.
40018008	Zaɗka ɓa nduo-ɔ mase ɓal-a ze ɗaa ha̰ mù ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, mu kuŋ ni gbaɗ mú vbu biŋ ɓo ɓisuy. Séke ɓáy nduo-ɔ mbḭw, mase ɓáy ɓal-a mbḭw se zaɗ kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ndaɗ mba séke ɓáy nduo siɗi bele, mase ɓal-a siɗi bele ha ri vbu mù ɓo ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya ɓaŋguɔ.
40018009	A ze ɓo, ɓa nun-a ze ɗaa ha̰ mù ɗaa feya̰a laa lɛ, mu ŋgókɗo ni mú naa ni a mú vbu ni biŋ ɓo ɓisuy. Séke ɓáy nun-a mbḭw da̰ru se zaɗ kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ndaɗ mba séke ɓáy nun-ari siɗi bele ha ri vbu mù ɓo zaɗ kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya.
40018010	Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì nda̰w rɔ! Ì ḭ́m leɗ mbḭw mini ká sakra kṵ-ɛri key na ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue ká i kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa tul-ri na, i ɗo pol Bǎa ká nulue ɓáy namri riw bele ɓay tul-ri.
40018011	[Ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì vi tusiri key ɓay ya̰aŋa nzoɓri ká i ze-zee.]
40018012	Wa̰a, ì ker mina ká ɓil law-rì lɛ? Zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw ɗo ɓáy baɗu ɓa isɔɗ mbḭw, rɔɔ mbḭw ví zee ká sakra kṵ-ɛri lɛ, ka ti pɔ́ŋ ha̰yri ká síŋ tɔnɔ mbḭw pa̰rɛ tɔnɔ mbḭw ku ɗo tul kuo, ɓay vǎa nzáa taa ha̰y ká zee na ku ya lɛ woo?
40018013	Mì ɓaa ha rì ɓa tusuɛ: zaɗkaʼa ziŋ baɗu ɓe ká zee mbḭw na lɛ, ɓa fe suoriya ɓe ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri mba tul nzoɓ ha̰wri ká síŋ tɔnɔ mbḭw pa̰rɛ tɔnɔ mbḭw ká i zee ya na.
40018014	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, Bǎa ɓaarì ká kaw nulue na, ka hii ɓay haŋa leɗ mbḭw ká ndḭi ká sakra kṵ-ɛri key na ka zee ya.
40018015	«Zaɗka yṵ-ɔ ɗaa ka̰aya ziŋ mù lɛ, mu se mú vǎa ziŋ ni, ɓo ɓáy kḭ siɗi kḭ hɔy, lɛ, mu kíɛ ni ka̰aya káʼa ɗaa ziŋ mù na. A ze ɓo, zaɗka yṵ-ɔ na laa ɓay ɓo lɛ, mu ya̰a ni ɓa yṵ-ɔ ro zu.
40018016	Ze ɓo, zaɗkaʼa hii ɓay láa ɓay ɓo na ya lɛ, mu yḭ̀i mú vǎa nzaa nzoɓ kḭ mbḭw mase siɗi munu ha ri se ziŋ mù, ɓay haŋa ɓo, ɓayri riw bele ká i léke na, i léke ká nun nzoɓ ɓay nasikeri siɗi mase sayri munu.
40018017	Zaɗkaʼa hii ɓay láa ɓay ɓari ya lɛ, mu vǎa ɓaa ɓayke ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ nzoɓ mbika lawri. A ze ɓo, zaɗkaʼa hii ɓay láa ɓay ɓari na ya rɔɓay laa lɛ, mù kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ ká tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya, mase ɓa nzoɓ ndaya munu ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuo.
40018018	«Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: feri riw bele ká ì haa faake ká tusiri key na, a ɓá fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a háa faake ká nulue nda̰w, a feri riw bele ká i pɔŋ faake ká tusiri key laa lɛ, a ɓá fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pɔŋ faake ká nulue nda̰w pi.
40018019	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ na rɔɓay mii: zaɗka nzoɓri siɗi ká sakra ɓaarì zuɔ ziŋ kḭ ɓay tul fe ḭi ḭi ká tusiri key ɓay ɗáake nzaa ɓay kere lɛ, Bǎa ká kaw nulue na, a haŋa rì feke.
40018020	Tusuɛke lɛ, zaɗ ká nzoɓri siɗi, mase say i zuɔ ziŋ kḭ ká ɗi ɓáy riŋ-i lɛ, ɓi na mì ɗo ziŋ ri mbḭw hɔy.»
40018021	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr soro ɓa lakun Zezu a vbi ni ɓay mii: «Mbay, wa̰a, zaɗka yṵ-i ɗaa ka̰aya ziŋ mì lɛ, mì ndáka buma ziŋ ni faa ɓal ba mina lɛ? Wa̰a, a séke kpṵru faa ɓal ba tɔnɔ say lɛ?»
40018022	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ṵ́-uu munu ya. Mì ɓaa ha̰ mu: Kpṵru faa ɓal ba tɔnɔ say hɔy ya, roo lɛ, kpṵru faa ɓal ba síŋ tɔnɔ say ba tɔnɔ say.
40018023	«Síe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul nzoɓri na, kaʼa ɗáa fe munu ɓa mbay ká hii kḭiŋa bol feri ká nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri kpaa.
40018024	Zaɗkaʼa tii sa̰w kḭiŋa bol feri na báyḭi lɛ, i mgba nzoɓ peɗ ɓe mbḭw munu ká mbɔl ɓe ɗo tul-e ɓa sak isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ duɔ ká mba kḭiŋa.
40018025	Munu káʼa maa púo mbɔl ɓe na ya báyḭi lɛ, mbay tul-e na mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay haŋa ri mgba ni í hie ni, má̰y ɓe nda̰w, vi-eri nda̰w, feziŋa ɓeri riw bele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓay pɔ́ŋ larike í púoke mbɔl na ɓáy.
40018026	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ peɗ na ví huku pol-e gburuk a koɗ ni mii: “Mu ha̰ law-a ká huo mù lɔm ká tul-i, lɛ, mbɔl ɓori ká ɗo tul-i na, mì púo mù ŋgiɗ ŋgiɗ bele ɓáy.”
40018027	Lɛɛ, mbay tul-e na kɔ nun síe ɓe a naa mbɔl ká tul-e a pɔŋ ni se zaɗ seɗ ɓe.
40018028	«Falɛ ká nzoɓ peɗ na tḭi ká zaɗɛ na ku báyḭi lɛ, ka vǎa dar bǎw peɗ ɓe mbḭw munu gbukru ká mbɔl ɓe ɗo tul-e ɓa nun lari ká ndḭi hɔy. Lɛɛ, ka ví mgba sol-e a fṵu veɗe a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mu púo mì mbɔl ɓi ká ɗo tul-a na!”
40018029	Báyḭi lɛ, bǎw peɗ ɓe na huku siri gburuk ká pol-e a koɗ ni mii: “Mu ha̰ law-a ka huo mù lɔm ká tul-i, lɛ, mì púo mù mbɔl ɓo na ɓáy.”
40018030	Lɛɛ, ka hii puu ɓayke ya, a mgba ni ɓo hul sal kpṵru maa ɓáy haŋa ni puo mbɔl ká ɗo tul-e na.
40018031	«Zaɗka bǎw peɗ ɓe ha̰wri kɔ fe ká kal na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa síe ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ha ri se í vǎa kḭi fal feri riw bele ká kal na ha̰ mbay tul-ri.
40018032	Báyḭi lɛ, mbay tul-ri na ɗi nzoɓ peɗ ɓe na ha̰ ni vi a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ɓo nzoɓ peɗ ká mù mgbɔr ɓamba! Ɓi na, mì naa ɓay mbɔl ɓi na ká tul-a riw bele ɓa fal, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù koɗ mì ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa munu ziŋ mù.
40018033	A ɓo na wa̰a, mù maa ɓay kɔ́kɔ nun síe bǎw peɗ ɓo na munu ká mì ɗaa ziŋ mù na ku ya lɛ woo?”
40018034	Lɛɛ, law mbay tul-e na fa̰a ni gbururu gbururu ha ri mgba ni í vbu ni ɓo hul sal ká nduo nzoɓ píri nzoɓri kpṵru maa ɓáy haŋa ni puo mbɔl ká tul-e na ŋgiɗ bele nda̰w rɔ!
40018035	«Ɓe ze, ɓaarì hɔy kara, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká sakra ɓaarì ká nda buma ɓáy ɓil wa̰ra law-ɛ riw bele ziŋ yṵ-ɛ ya lɛ, Bǎa ká kaw nulue na, a ɗáa faa mbḭw munu ká mbay ɗaa ziŋ nzoɓ peɗ ɓe na nda̰w pi.»
40019001	Zaɗka Zezu fere nzoɓri ɓay ɓeri key na ɔ munu báyḭi lɛ, ka zɔl ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele a se zaɗ ká ɗo nzaa mbii Zurdɛ̰ ká fi kɛlu ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude.
40019002	Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i se fal-ɛ, lɛ, ka vaa sɛm ɓari.
40019003	Báyḭi lɛ, Farizi ha̰nɛri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ ɓay nzáa nzi-ɛ ze í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ká ɓil bol kusol naari na wa̰a, wa̰ra nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay níi má̰y ɓe ɓay tul ɓay ḭi ḭi hɔy kara mgbum lɛ?»
40019004	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Wa̰a, ɓay ká i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ì kḭi í kɔ ya hɔy lɛ woo? Ɓáy tiikake lew hɔy na, Nzoɓ Ɗáa Feri Riw Bele na ɗaa wa̰ra nzoɓ ɓáy má̰y nzoɓ zeɓ.
40019005	Sa̰wke mini ze, “wa̰ra nzoɓ a pɔ́ŋ bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ, ɓay káw ziŋ má̰y ɓe; lɛ, ɓari siɗi bele reɓ na, i ví ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw.”
40019006	Ɓe mini ze, i ɓa nzoɓ ká siɗi mbǎa, roo lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw. Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru siŋ ri zuɔ kḭ na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ka wál sakra ɓari ya.»
40019007	Lɛɛ, Fariziri vbi ni ɓay mii: «A munu ku wa̰a ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, Moyze mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ wa̰ra nzoɓ ɗaa mbeɗe níi má̰y ɓe na ha̰ ni nda̰w rɔɔ, a nii ni zɔl lɛ?»
40019008	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ɓay tul law ŋgɔŋɔ ɓaarì ze, Moyze ha̰ faa ha rì níike má̰y ɓaarì. Roo lɛ, ɓáy tiikake na ɗo munu ya.
40019009	Mì ɓaa ha rì: zaɗka nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy má̰y ká má̰yke nzaa wa̰ra kḭ ya, rɔɔ wa̰ra na nii ni a ya̰a má̰y kḭ lɛ, wa̰rake ku na ɗaa nun pie.»
40019010	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka simseɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ ɗo munu ɓay tul má̰y ɓe lɛ, ya̰aŋa má̰y ya na ndaɗ mba ɗi.»
40019011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Wa̰rari riw bele na i maa ɓay ya̰aŋa kér ɓay ni key ya, roo lɛ, ɓa ɓari ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri hṵrusuoke hɔy ze, i máa ya̰aŋa ɓayke.
40019012	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ya̰a má̰y ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ndḭw ri hu-hu ɓáy máa ɓari ká mboŋke ri hɔy; a nzoɓ ha̰wri lɛ, i ya̰a má̰y ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓri ká i lo gum-ri lo; a nzoɓ kḭri laa lɛ, i ya̰a má̰y ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔrɔ sùo-ri í ɗaa peɗ ha̰ réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓri na se ɓa pola. Nzoɓ ká maa ɓay ya̰aŋa ɓay key lɛ, ka ya̰a.»
40019013	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri vi ɓáy leɗri ha̰ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-ri a ɗáake nzaa ɓay kere. Roo lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri haa ri.
40019014	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ála leɗri ha ri vi luo-i ɓo, ì haa ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul ɓari ká i ɗo munu ká leɗri key.»
40019015	Falɛ káʼa ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-ri na, ka pɔŋ ri a zɔl ká zaɗɛ ku.
40019016	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ kuban mbḭw munu soro ɓa lakun Zezu a vbi ni ɓay mii: «Mbay, fe kere ḭi kḭ nda̰w rɔɔ, mì ɗáa ɓay zíŋke kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na lɛ?»
40019017	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, mù vbi mì ɓay ká se tul fe kere lɛ?» Nzoɓ mbḭw keklek hɔy ze ɓa nzoɓ kere. Zaɗka mù hii ɓay zíŋ kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na lɛ, mu ɗaa vu mbom ka ɓo tul bol kusol ká Moyze ha rì na nda̰w rɔ! Lɛɛ, leɗ kuban na yḭ̀i a vbi ni mii: «Wa̰a, bol kusol taa ha̰akeri lɛ?»
40019018	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Mù ti ika nzoɓ ya, mù ti ɗáa nun pie ya, mù ti ri-riiɓa ya, mù ti kúɗ ɓay zuɔ nzaa nzoɓ ya,
40019019	mù ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul bǎa-ka ɓáy máa-ŋa, rɔɔ mú hii kṵ-ɔ munu ká sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ.»
40019020	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ kuban na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Bol kusolkeri ku riw bele na, mì ɗo tul-e ɓáy zaɗɛ. Wa̰a, ha̰a ḭi rɔɓay ze puo mì ɓáy lɛ?»
40019021	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka mù hii ɓay ví ɓa nzoɓ kere munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa nzoɓ kere na lɛ, mu se mú vǎa hie fe ɓori riw bele ká mù ɗǒke na, a mú pɔ́ŋ larike ha̰ nzoɓ kṵkuri, lɛ, mù ɗoko ɓáy feziŋa taa tusuɛkeri ká nulue. Falɛ ro lɛ, mu yḭ̀i mú se fal-i ɓáy.»
40019022	Zaɗka leɗ kuban na laa ɓayri na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka zɔl mgbiriŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy feziŋari ŋgḭi ɓamba.
40019023	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓay haŋa nzoɓ feziŋa ɗiŋ tul-e ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-e na, zaɗɛ ŋgɔŋ ɓamba.
40019024	Mì ɓaa ha rì na rɔɓay: ɓay haŋa zambal ka nduo luɔ zɔy a tḭi ká nun-ɛ na, ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri. Roo lɛ, haŋa nzoɓ feziŋa ɗiŋ tul-e ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-e na, ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri kal ɗi rɔɓay.»
40019025	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri ha ri ɓaa mii: «A munu ku waa, nzoɓ ve ze a máa ɓay zíŋ pam na ɓáy lɛ?»
40019026	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu geɗe kɔ́m ɓa luo-ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Fe key na, nzoɓri ze faake mba ri, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na fe ká mba ni mba na mbḭw tiya.»
40019027	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu kɔ, ɓuru na ɓuru pɔŋ feri riw bele, a ɓúru se fal-a. A key wa̰a, fe ḭi ze a ɗoko ɓay tul ɓuru na lɛ?»
40019028	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì káw tul kariŋgaw riŋ ɗika ɓáy sew ká feri riw bele a ví ɓa fie na, ɓaarì ká tul-rì duɔ fal-ɛ siɗi ká ì tɔŋ fal-i na, ì káw tul kariŋgaw mbayri nda̰w ɓay réke tul sa̰w ka̰ni leɗ Izarayɛlri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na.
40019029	Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká pɔŋ hul ɓeri, mase yṵ-ɛri ɓáy tini-ɛri, mase bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ, mase vi-eri mase wáa ɓeri ɓay tul-i lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ni kḭri faa ɓal ba isɔɗ sɔɗ, a ɗo ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ.
40019030	Roo lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i ɗo pola timbɛɗɛ key na, i ɗoko fal. A nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i ɗo fal timbɛɗɛ key na, i ɗoko pola.»
40020001	Síe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key na, ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ wáa mbḭw munu ká tḭi tiɓie piɛɗ a fá̰a nzoɓri ha ri vǎa ɗaa peɗ ká wáa ɓe.
40020002	Báyḭi lɛ, ka siŋ tul ɓay ziŋ nzoɓ peɗri na, ɓay haŋa peɗ nam mbḭw lɛ, ka púo ri larike maa ɗi. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a pɔŋ ri ha ri se wáa na ɓáy.
40020003	Zaɗka síe so ndḭi báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi a vaa ziŋ nzoɓ kḭri ká i kaw káa taŋ ɗáa peɗ.
40020004	Ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se wáa ɓi na, ɓo í vǎa ɗaa peɗ ká ɗi, lɛ, mì púo rì lari peɗ ɓaarì na ɓáy zaɗɛ.»
40020005	Lɛɛ, nzoɓkeri na i zɔl í se wáa na. Zaɗka síe ví ɗo law tul báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na tḭi a ɗaa munu na rɔɓay, rɔɔ síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na kara, ka ɗaa munu nda̰w.
40020006	A zaɗka síe ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul vay puu dɛr báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi na rɔɓay a vǎa ziŋ nzoɓ kḭri ká i ɗo káa gɔr a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɗaa mina rɔɔ ì ɗo zaɗ ni key ɓaŋguɔ ha̰ sa̰w síe kal rì gɔr hɔy taŋ ɗáa peɗ lɛ?»
40020007	I yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru kaw taŋ ɗáa peɗ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ha̰ ɓuru peɗ ya.» Ka yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Munu zu lɛ, ì se wáa ɓi í vǎa ɗaa peɗ ká ɗi.»
40020008	Zaɗka, zaɗ ɓa láw na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ fe ɓeri mii: «Mu ɗi nzoɓ peɗri na mú puɔ ri lari ɓari. Mu tii sa̰wke saa tul ɓari ká i ɗaa peɗ ká fal key, rɔɔ, mú tḭ́ike tul nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɗaa peɗ ká pola na ɓáy.»
40020009	Lɛɛ, ɓari ká i tii peɗ ɓáy síe ká ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul vay puu dɛr na i vi. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ziŋ lari peɗ nam mbḭw.
40020010	Falɛ ku lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗaa peɗ ɓáy titire ɗɛkrɛ na laa ro i vi. Lɛɛ, i ker ká ɓil law-ri í ɓaa mii, ɓari zíŋ lari ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi wuruk wuruk kal tul-e taa kṵ-i ɓari na ku. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ha̰ ni lari peɗ nam mbḭw na nda̰w.
40020011	Zaɗka i ziŋ lari na báyḭi lɛ, i ŋgṵri sùo-ri í ɓaa ɓay ziŋ nzoɓ wáa na
40020012	í ɓaa mii: «Ɓari ká i ɗaa peɗ ká fal ɓuru key sa̰w síe mbḭw hɔy mǎa, mù puo ri maa kḭ ɓáy ɓuru ká ɓuru ɗaa peɗ ɓáy tiɓie piɛɗ hɔy, ɓúru ta̰a ká ɗi pɔɗɔ pɔɗɔ ká ɓisie biribiŋ lɛ?»
40020013	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku mii: «Nzoɓ buɔ-i, mì ɗaa ɓa bukru ze ziŋ mù ya. Wa̰a, náa siŋ tul ɓay ká ɓay haŋa mì púo mù lari peɗ nam mbḭw ya lɛ woo?
40020014	Munu zu lɛ, mu ya̰a lari peɗ ɓo, mú se zaɗ seɗ ɓo. Ɓe káʼa ɗaa peɗ ká fal key mgbaɗa na, mì hii ɓay púo ni maa kḭ ɓáy taa ɓo ku.
40020015	Wa̰a, mì ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay ɗáa fe ká law-i hii ɓáy lari ɓi na ya lɛ woo? Mase, mù ɗaa kpere ɓay ɓá ká mì ɓa nzoɓ law kere na lɛ?»
40020016	Falɛ lɛ, Zezu siŋ tul law ɓay na a ɓaa mii: «Nzoɓri ká i kɔ ri ɓa nzoɓ ká i ɗo fal na, síeke lɛ, i ɗoko pola, a nzoɓri ká i kɔ ri ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗo pola laa lɛ, i yḭ́i í ɗo fal.»
40020017	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na i se faa í tḭi zaɗ ká hil ɓa Zuruzalɛm. Báyḭi lɛ, seɗ ɓari ká faa ku na, ka fa̰a ri ɗo fi mbḭw a ɓaa ɓay ziŋ ri mii:
40020018	«Ì laa key, náa séri ɓa Zuruzalɛm na ro vǎy. Ɓa zaɗ ká i pɔ́ŋ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ɓo nduo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká ɗi. Ɓari na, i ɗáa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-i,
40020019	a í pɔŋ mì ɓo nduo nzoɓri ká i tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya ha ri siɛ mì, í ndaka mì ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ, a í ɓer mì ɗo tul puu say huɗ. Ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.»
40020020	Báyḭi lɛ, máa vu Zebederi na soro ɓáy vi-eri ɓa lakun Zezu, a ɗiŋ tul-e ká sa̰w ɓal-ɛ ɓay vbika ni fe.
40020021	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ni ɓay mii: «Fe ḭi ze mù hii lɛ?» Lɛɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Vu-iri ká tul-ri siɗi ká mù kɔ ri key na, síeke ká mù réke mbay na, mu ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ka káw tunduo hoɗo ɓo, a nzoɓ mbini ka káw tunduo gel ɓo laa.»
40020022	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ vi-eri na mii: «Fe ká ì vbi key na, ì kɔ ya hɔy. Sɛkɛ fe ká ɗo ɓil koɓo ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa mì nzɔ na wa̰a, ì maa ká ɓay nzɔkɔ nda̰w lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ṵ̀u! Ɓuru ma-maa.»
40020023	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, sɛkɛ fe ɓi ká ɗo ɓil koɓo na ì kɔ́kɔ na kḭ. Roo lɛ, káw tunduo hoɗo ɓi, ɓáy káw tunduo gel ɓi na, ɓa ɓay ɓi ya. Zaɗkeri ku na ɗo ɓay tul nzoɓri ká Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leke ɓay tul-ri.»
40020024	Zaɗka ɓie leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká tɔ̀ŋ duɔ na, i laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri sɛ ri ɓay tul yṵ kḭri ká tul-ri siɗi na.
40020025	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi ri riw bele a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì kɔ nda̰w mii, mbayri ká i re mbay ká tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key na, i re tul puori ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ha̰ nzoɓri hḭɛ bol nzaa-ri. A ɓari ká i ɓa nzoɓ rewpuori na kara, i ha̰ nzoɓri ɗaa fe ɓáy hṵrusuo.
40020026	Roo lɛ, fe ká mini key na ɗo nun haŋa ni ka ɗo sakra ɓaarì ya. Zaɗka nzoɓ hii ɓay vika ɓa bawda nzoɓ ká sakra ɓaarì lɛ, ka ɗaa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa peɗ ha rì.
40020027	Mase zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw hii ɓay ɗoko pola ɗɛkrɛ ká sakra ɓaarì lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka vi ɓa koy ɓaarì.
40020028	Ɓe ze, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na mì víke tusiri key ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ɗaa peɗ ha̰ mì ya. Roo lɛ, mì vi ɓay ɗáa peɗ ha̰ nzoɓri a mí mbi sùo-i ha̰ huɗ ɓay púoke tul nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.»
40020029	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i zɔl saa Zeriko na báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri se fal-ɛ ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri.
40020030	Lɛɛ, ra̰wri tul-ri siɗi kaw lafaa. Zaɗka i laa mii, Zezu ze kal vǎy na báyḭi lɛ, i tii sa̰w gúu fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ mii: «Mbay, vu bulu Daviɗ, kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy mu kɔ nun síe ɓuru!»
40020031	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ɓaa ɓay ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ziŋ ri ɓay gbṵ́ nzaa-ri. Roo lɛ, i guu fe mgba mgba ɓa pola pola rɔɓay mii: «Mbay, vu bulu Daviɗ, kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy mu kɔ nun síe ɓuru!»
40020032	Lɛɛ, Zezu sìi ɓal-ɛ zik a ɗo a ɗi ri ha ri vi luo-ɛ a vbi ri ɓay mii: «Fe ḭi ze ì hii ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa ha rì lɛ?»
40020033	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mu ɗaa ha̰ nun ɓuru kɔ-kɔ́m.»
40020034	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ nun síe ɓari, a zaa nun-ri, lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy nun-ri na mgbuɗa gbɛrɛrɛ ha ri kɔ-kɔ́m a í se fal-ɛ.
40021001	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm, a í tḭi ɗi ya ɓáy Befaze, ɓa puo ká ɗo lakun kuo Oliviye báyḭi lɛ, ka pie leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri siɗi ha ri se pola
40021002	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se puo ká ɗo pol-rì ku. Zaɗka ì tḭ́i ɗi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy ì kɔ́kɔ maasoɓa mbḭw ɓa máake ká i taa ni ɗo, ká vi-e ɗo lakun-ɛ, lɛ, ì hína ni í víke ri ha̰ mì.
40021003	Zaɗka nzoɓ vbi rì ɓay lɛ, ì ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ŋgɛrɛmbay ze se síeke,” lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, nzoɓke na a pɔ́ŋ ha rì zɔ̌lke í víke ri ha̰ mì.»
40021004	Feke ku na tḭi mini ha̰ ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ká piɛɗke lew ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛ na, ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ɓayke na ze ɗo key:
40021005	«Ì ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká Sio̰n na mii: “Ì kɔ, mbay ɓaarì na vi ɓa luo-rì vuku. Ka ɓa nzoɓ siika sùo ya, a kaw tul maasoɓa, ɓa vu maasoɓa ze ka kaw tul-e.”»
40021006	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri zɔl í vǎa ɗaa munu káʼa ɓaa ha ri na.
40021007	I fa̰a máa maasoɓa ɓáy vi-e na í víke ri. I laɓa maagari ɓari zuɔ tul-ri, lɛ, Zezu hil a kaw ɗi.
40021008	Ruɔ nzoɓri laɓa maagari ɓari zuɔ faa ká pol-e ɓay haŋa ni ka se tul-e a kál, a nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, i kuɗ nzaa tɔy vay puuri í laɓa zuɔ faa riɓ riɓ ɓay ɗáake mbay ɓo tul-e.
40021009	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ká i se pol Zezu, ɓáy ɓari ká i se fal-ɛ na, i guu fe gǔrum gǔrum ɓáy nzaa-ri ɓa siya mii: «Hozana! Naa písiri vu bulu Daviɗ! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka sá̰m fe zuɔ tul nzoɓ ká vi ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay! Hozana! Naa písiri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kaw nulue!»
40021010	Zaɗka Zezu tḭi Zuruzalɛm na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ká ɓil puɔ na, i se tul kḭ hali hali í ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na wa̰a, ka ɓa nzoɓ ve lɛ?»
40021011	Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ɓa Zezu, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká uru saa Nazarɛɗ, puo ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.»
40021012	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi a nii nzoɓ ɗáɓ fe híeri ɓáy ɓari ká i se ɗi ɓay híe fe na riw bele. Ka kira tutakra ɓari nzoɓ kṵu kḭ lariri, ɓáy kariŋgaw nzoɓ hie ka̰y bɛɗɛri zuɔ nza̰ri nza̰ri.
40021013	Falɛ lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ ká ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: “Hul ɓi na i ɗika ɓa hul ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.” Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì ɗo fɛ́rɛ ni ɓa pṵy nzoɓ riiɓari!»
40021014	Lɛɛ, ra̰wri ɓáy nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri, i soro ɓa lakun-ɛ ká ɓil mgbaŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, lɛ, ka vaa ri.
40021015	Roo lɛ, zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol Ziɓri kɔ fe kere káʼa ɗaa, rɔɔ ɓáy leɗri ká i ɗaa fe ɓáy nzaa-ri gǔrum gǔrum ká ɓil mgbaŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Hozana! Naa písiri vu bulu Daviɗ» na lɛ, law-ri fa̰a ri ɓamba,
40021016	ha ri vbi Zezu mii: «Ɓayri ká leɗri ɓaa ku na wa̰a, mù la-laa kḭ zu lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì la-laa na kḭ. Ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na wa̰a, ì kḭi ya rɔɓay lɛ woo? Ɓayke ɓaa mii: “Feri ká mù ɗaa na ha̰ leɗri ɓáy leɗ nzaa wa̰nri hɔy kara, i mgbuɗa nzaa-ri í pisi mù.”»
40021017	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu pɔŋ ri a tḭi ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na, a se Betani a vǎa naa ɗi.
40021018	Zezu tḭi tiɓie a yḭ̀i a se ɓa ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm. Zaɗkaʼa se faa kɔɓ rɔɓay na, kɔn sɛ ni.
40021019	Lɛɛ, ka mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ puu nzum mbḭw munu ká ɗo lakun faa a to a se sa̰w-ɛ. Roo lɛ, ka kɔ ɓa vayke hɔy. Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ puu nzum na mii: «Ɓo na mù ti líe mbǎa wṵ̌m.» Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, puu nzum na huɔ wǔɔ riw bele.
40021020	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer í vbi ni mii: «Ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, puu nzum key na huɔ wǔɔ saa zaɗɛ hɔy key lɛ?»
40021021	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka ì ɗo ɓáy mbika law, rɔɔ í má̰y ɓay ká ɗi ya lɛ, ì máa ɗáa fe munu ká mì ɗaa ziŋ puu nzum key hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ì máa ɓay ɓáa ha̰ kuo ká ɗo key na mii: “Mu mṵu ɓáy sa̰w-a ká zaɗ ni key a mú zo ɓo maambii,” lɛ, feke na a ɗoko munu na kḭ.
40021022	Zaɗka ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, feri riw bele ká ì vbi ká ɓil nzaa ɓay kere na, kaʼa ɗáa ha rì.»
40021023	Zezu se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi, a fere nzoɓri fe ká ɗi. Zaɗkaʼa ɗo fére nzoɓri fe na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri i soro í vi lakun-ɛ í vbi ni ɓay mii: «A ve ze mbi nzaa ha̰ mù nda̰w rɔɔ mù ɗáake fe niri key lɛ? Mase, nzoɓ ve ze ha̰ mù faake lɛ?»
40021024	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓi kara, mì vbika rì ɓay mbḭw hɔy ɓay kɔ́kɔ nda̰w. Zaɗka ì yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓayke ha̰ mì lɛ, ɓi kara mì kíɛ rì nzoɓ ká mbi nzaa ha̰ mì ɗáake fe niri key na.
40021025	Ɗáa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ká Za̰a ɗaa na wa̰a, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mase, uru saa luo nzoɓri hɔy lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Náa ɓáari mina ro lɛ? Zaɗka náa yḭiŋrari ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, a yḭ́i a vbi naari mii, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, náa ɗáari law naari ɓo tul ɓay ká Za̰a ɓaa na ya lɛ?
40021026	A zaɗka náa ɓaarì mii, uru saa luo nzoɓri lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri úru í ɗaa so tul naari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele kɔ Za̰a na ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
40021027	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ Zezu mii: «Ɓuru kɔ ya.» Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Munu zu lɛ, nda-ndaɗ! Ɓi hɔy kara, mì ti kíɛ rì nzoɓ ká mbi nzaa ha̰ mì ɗáake fe niri key na ya nda̰w.»
40021028	Zezu mbi ɓay rɔɓay a ɓaa mii: «Ì ker mina ze ká ɓil law-rì lɛ? Nzoɓ mbḭw ɗo ɓáy leɗ wa̰rari ɓa siɗi. Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ ŋgɛrɛ leɗ na mii: “Vu-i, vuri key na mu se wáa ɓi, ɓo mú vǎa ɗaa peɗ ká ɗi.”
40021029	Lɛɛ, leɗ na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: “Mì hii ya.” Falɛ lɛ, law-ɛ nzaa ni ha̰ ni suo kér ɓay ɓe, a se wáa na a vǎa ɗaa peɗ ká ɗi.
40021030	«Báyḭi lɛ, bǎa leɗri na vǎa vbi nzoɓ vbiele na faa mbḭw munu nda̰w. Lɛɛ, leɗ na ɓaa ha̰ bi-ɛ mii: “Mbay ɓi, mì hi-hii, mì séke,” roo lɛ, ka se ya wṵ̌m.
40021031	Wa̰a, sakra leɗri ká siɗi key na, nzoɓ ha̰a ze ɗaa law hiiya bi-ɛ na lɛ?» Lɛɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri na, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa ŋgɛrɛ leɗ.» Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tii sa̰w réke mbay ká tul nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ɓáy má̰y ɗáa nun pieri na pola ha rì.
40021032	Za̰a Batis na vi luo-rì, a fere rì ɗáa fe ká ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Roo lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul ɓay ɓe na ya. Ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ɓáy má̰y ɗáa nun pieri na ze i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay ɓe. A falɛ ká ì kɔ fe ɗáa nzoɓkeri na ku hɔy kara, ì fɛrɛ ɓil law-rì ɓay ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul ɓay ɓe na ya.»
40021033	«Ì te suku-rì í láake law ɓay kḭ ro. Ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ wáa mbḭw munu mgba wáa a maa pa̰ra puuri ɗo ɗi, a te kpaŋ gbi gbi kiri ɗi gbuk, a tie luɔ mbḭw ɗo ɗi ɓay ɗúɔke lere puu na, rɔɔ a mbuo fe ga-gaŋ ɗo ɓil wáa ha̰ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔkeri kaw ɗi. Falɛ lɛ, ka pɔŋ peɗke zuɔ nduo nzoɓ peɗkeri káʼa fa̰a ri na, ɓay haŋa ɓo few hóro lere puu na vi lɛ, i wál taa ɓeri a í pɔ́ŋ taa ɓari. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a zɔl a se varu.
40021034	«Zaɗka few hóro lereke na vi báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na pie leɗ káw ɓeri ɓa luo nzoɓ peɗkeri na ɓay ya̰aŋa lereke ká ɗo ɓay tul-e na.
40021035	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ peɗkeri na i mgba̰m leɗ káw ɓeri í ndaka nzoɓ mbḭw wɔɓ wɔɓ, í mgba nzoɓ mbḭɛ í i ni, a í vbuku nzoɓ ndeke ɗi sayke ɓáy tisawri í i ni.
40021036	«Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na pie leɗ káw ɓe taa kḭri kal nzoɓ polari ku rɔɓay. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ peɗkeri na ɗaa ziŋ ri ndaya faa mbḭw munu ká i ɗaa ziŋ nzoɓ polari na ku.
40021037	Laa lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na pie vi-e kḭ ro ɓa luo-ri; a ker ká ɓil law-ɛ mii, i hḭ́ɛ vu ɓeri na.
40021038	Roo lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ peɗkeri na mbi nun-ri í kɔ vu nzoɓ wáa ká se vuku na báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: “Ì kɔ, nzoɓ káʼa mgbaka fe pile na zu! Náa séri náa vǎa íri ni, a ɓo náa pɔ́ŋri fe pile na ɓa taa naari.”
40021039	Ro, í vǎa mgba ni í vbu ni ɓo fal wáa na a í i ni.
40021040	«A munu ku wa̰a, zaɗka nzoɓ wáa na vi lɛ, fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ a ɗáa ziŋ nzoɓ peɗkeri na lɛ?»
40021041	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Kaʼa ika nzoɓ ndayakeri na taŋ kɔ́kɔ nun síe ɓari. Rɔɓay a ya̰aŋa wáa na a ɗaa nduo ndúo nzoɓ kḭri, ɓay haŋa few hóro lereke na vi lɛ, i séke ɓáy taa ɓe na ha̰ ni.»
40021042	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na wa̰a, ì kḭi ya hɔy lɛ? “Tisaw ká nzoɓ mbúo hulri vbu ɓo ɓisuy na, yḭ̀i a vi ɓa tisaw kere ká kal tul tisaw ha̰wri pavbaɗ, a ɓa tisaw tigba̰a hul taa tusuɛke. Feke ku na ɓa peɗ ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a ɓa fe ká ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay kɔ́kɔ.”
40021043	«Sa̰wke mini ze, mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: fe kereri riw bele ká ì ɗǒke í ɓa nzoɓ taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa saa nduo-rì a ha̰ sa̰w nzoɓ kḭri ká i ɗáa fe ká ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ a rii law-ɛ.
40021044	[Nzoɓ ká lie ɓo tul tisaw key na lɛ, a gur sùo-ɛ ruk ruk. A zaɗka tisaw na ze tɔɗɔ ɓo tul nzoɓ laa lɛ, a rɛ̰ŋ ni rɛ̰nɛnɛ.»]
40021045	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy Fariziri laa law ɓayri key ká Zezu ɓaa na ku báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ í ɓaa mii, ka ɓaa ɓay se tul ɓari zu.
40021046	Ro ze, i nzaa faa ɓay mgbaka ni, roo lɛ, i hḭɛ ruɔ nzoɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri na i kɔ Zezu ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
40022001	Zezu mbi law ɓay kḭ na rɔɓay, a ɓǎake ɓay ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɗo láa ɓay ɓe na mii:
40022002	«Síe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key na ɗo munu ɓa mbay ká ɗaa bawda fe sṵm suoriya ya̰aŋa má̰y ha̰ vi-e,
40022003	a ɗi nzoɓri ká ɓay haŋa ri vi zaɗɛ. Zaɗka namke na vi báyḭi lɛ, ka pie leɗ káw ɓeri vǎa ɗi nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri pola na ɓay haŋa ri ví sṵ fe sṵm suoriya na. Roo lɛ, nzoɓkeri na i hii vika ya.
40022004	Lɛɛ, mbay na pie leɗ káw ɓe kḭri rɔɓay a ɓaa mii: “Ì vǎa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká mì ɗi ri pola na mii: ‘Timbɛɗɛ key na, mì leke fe sṵm suoriya ɓi na zuɔ zeɓ zeɓ ro. Nday ɓiri ɓáy vuy ɓiri ká ŋgɔɓ ndaɓ ndaɓ na, mì i ri ro. A feri riw bele na, mì leke zuɔ zeɓ zeɓ ro. Ì vi ɓo, í sṵ fe sṵm suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na.’”
40022005	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri na, i ker se tul ɗiw ɓe na mbḭw ya. Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, mbi faa a se zaɗ seɗ ɓe. Nzoɓ ni zɔl a se wáa ɓe, a nzoɓ nu zɔl a se zaɗ fɛ́rɛ nun lari ɓe laa.
40022006	A nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, i mgba leɗ káw ɓeri na, í ɗara ri mboloŋ mboloŋ a í i ri.
40022007	Zaɗka mbay na laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ɛ fa̰a ni puu-u ha̰ ni mbi nzi-ɛ, a pie nzoɓ yṵm ɓeri ha ri vǎa i ri, a í nzuɗ puo ɓari ɓáy huu kpoy kpoy.
40022008	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, mbay na ɓaa ha̰ leɗ káw ɓe kḭri mii: “Fe sṵm suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na, mì leke zuɔ zeɓ zeɓ ro. Roo lɛ, ɓari ká mì ɗi ri na, fe ɗáa ɓari maa ɓay haŋa ri vi ya.
40022009	Munu zu lɛ, ì se ɓáy waɗ faari a í ɗi nzoɓri riw bele ká ì ziŋ ri na ha ri ví sṵ fe sṵm bawda suoriya na.”
40022010	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ káwri na i se ɓáy waɗ faari, í mbṵ nzoɓri riw bele ká i ziŋ ri na: nzoɓ law ndayari nda̰w, nzoɓ law kereri nda̰w pi. Ɓe ze, ha̰ ɓil hul fe sṵm suoriya na mbaa ɓa nzoɓri mɛr mɛr.
40022011	«Báyḭi lɛ, mbay na nduo a se hula, a kɔ nzoɓri ká i kaw nzaa tutakra fe sṵm na. Lɛɛ, ka kɔ wa̰ra nzoɓ mbḭw ká nduo gari séke zaɗ suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na ya hɔy, kal a kaw ɗi nda̰w.
40022012	Lɛɛ, mbay na vǎa vbi ni mii: “Nzoɓ buɔ-i, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, mù nduo mú vi zaɗ suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na key, taŋ ndúo gari ya̰aŋa kḭ na lɛ?” Lɛɛ, zaɗ ɓay zee leɗban na sɛl.
40022013	Ɓe nu ku ro, mbay na ɓaa ha̰ leɗ káw ɓeri mii: “Ì mgba ni í siŋ ɓal-ɛri ɓáy nduo-ɛri, í vbu ni ɓo zaɗ ká sii nduŋ ká kɛlɛ. Ɓa zaɗ ká nzoɓri rɛ́kɛ rɛw ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo, a í sṵ sere-ri ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r ká ɗi.”»
40022014	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu siŋ tul law ɓay na a ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗi nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba, roo lɛ, nzoɓri káʼa nan ri na, i ŋgḭi ya nzɛkrɛ hɔy.»
40022015	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri vǎa mbṵ kḭ í nzaara faa ɓay nzáa nzaa Zezu ɓáy faa vbiwri.
40022016	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, i pie nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa leɗ nduoɓal-ri, ɓáy Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i zuɔ fal Mbay Eroɗ na ha ri vǎa ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, ɓuru kɔ nda̰w, ɓo na mù ɓaa sùo ɓay, a mú fere nzoɓri tusuɛ ɓay ká se tul fe ɗáa ká rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Mù ya̰a kér ɓay nzoɓ mú ɗáake fe ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓo na mù ɓaa ɓay ziŋ nzoɓ taŋ náa nun nzoɓ.
40022017	Munu zu lɛ, mu tína kér ɓay ɓo ha̰ ɓuru laa. Wa̰a, bol kusol naari ha̰ faa ɓay haŋa nzoɓ puo larimbuo ha̰ Mbay Sezar mase, ha̰ faa ya lɛ?»
40022018	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ kér ɓay ɓari ká ndaya na a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì nzaa nzaa-i ɓay mgbaka mì ɓáy ɓay lɛ?
40022019	Lari ká i púoke larimbuo na, ì kíɛ mì ha̰ mi kɔ.» Lɛɛ, i tina lari na mbḭw í kiɛ ni.
40022020	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a vbi ri mii: «Tul nzoɓ, ɓáy riŋ nzoɓ ká i vbie ɗo lari key na wa̰a, ɓa nzoɓ ve zu lɛ?»
40022021	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa Mbay Sezar.» Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Munu zu lɛ, feri ká ɗo ɓay tul Mbay Sezar lɛ, ì ha̰ Sezar, a feri ká ɗo ɓay tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru laa lɛ, ì ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
40022022	Zaɗka Fariziri laa ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha ri munu na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer a í pɔŋ ni í zɔl yɔ́rɔŋ yɔrɔŋ.
40022023	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓáy ɓil namke ku na Sadusiri soro í vi luo Zezu. Ɓa ɓari Sadusiri na ze i ker í ɓaa mii, nzoɓ hu lɛ, ti tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ ya.
40022024	Ro, í vi vbi Zezu mii: «Mbay, Moyze ɓaa mii, zaɗka nzoɓ hu taŋ mbóŋ nzoɓ lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa yṵ-ɛ ka ya̰a má̰y pile ɓe na a mboŋke nzoɓ, a kɔ̌rɔke mḭiri yṵ-ɛ ká hu na.
40022025	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ɓáy yṵ-ɛri tul-ri tɔnɔ say i ɗo sakra ɓuru. Ŋgɛrɛ leɗ ká ya̰a má̰y na hu taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ, a pɔŋ má̰y pile na ha̰ tɔŋnɔ fal-ɛ.
40022026	Nzoɓ ndeke ɗi siɗike na ví hu a pɔŋ má̰y pile na ha̰ nzoɓ ndeke ɗi sayke. Nzoɓ ndeke ɗi sayke na kara feke ɗo ziŋ ni munu na nda̰w, ha̰ ɓari ká tul-ri tɔnɔ say na, i ya̰a má̰yke na a í hu taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele.
40022027	Ká fal huɗ ɓari ku riw bele na, má̰y na kara ví hu nda̰w.
40022028	A munu ku wa̰a, síeke ká nzoɓri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, nzoɓ ve ká sakra ɓari ká tul-ri tɔnɔ say ku na, má̰y na a ɓá taa ɓe lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓari ká tul-ri tɔnɔ say riw bele na, i ya̰a ni ya̰a ɓáy zaɗ ɓari.»
40022029	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì wṵru faa, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì laa ya nda̰w, a í kɔ hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya nda̰w pi.
40022030	Tusuɛke lɛ, síe ká nzoɓri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, wa̰rari ɓáy má̰yri i ti ya̰aŋa kḭ ya, roo lɛ, i ɗoko munu ɓa leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká nulue.
40022031	A ɓay ká se tul tḭ́i nzoɓri saa luɔ huɗ na wa̰a, ì kḭi ɓayke ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe ha rì na ya hɔy lɛ woo? Fal huɗ Abaraham nda̰w, Izak nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy Zakoɓ nda̰w na, bole ɗi ɗi nda̰w rɔɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii:
40022032	“Mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Abaraham, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Izak, a mí ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Zakoɓ nda̰w.” Munu zu lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ káw ɓáy kumnunri ɓo, ka ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ huɗeri ya.»
40022033	Ruɔ nzoɓri ká i laa ɓay fe fére Zezu na tuku ri ha ri kaw yer riw bele.
40022034	Zaɗka Fariziri laa mii, Zezu mgba nzaa Sadusiri na báyḭi lɛ, i mbṵ tul kḭ,
40022035	lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ká ɓa nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol Ziɓri na soro ɓa lakun Zezu ɓay nzáa nzi-ɛ ɓáy ɓay, ze a vbi ni mii:
40022036	«Mbay, ká ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol naari na wa̰a, bol kusol taa ha̰a ze kal taa ha̰wri riw bele lɛ?»
40022037	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «“Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo na, mù híi ni ɓáy ɓil law-ari riw bele nda̰w, ɓáy pa̰ra nun sùo-ɔri riw bele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy kér ɓay ɓori riw bele nda̰w pi.”
40022038	Ɓe key ze ɓa titire bol kusol ká kal taa ha̰wri riw bele.
40022039	A bol kusol ndeke ɗi siɗike ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri a rìi bol kusol taa titireke nda̰w na ze ɗo key: “Mù híi kṵ-ɔ munu ká sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ.”
40022040	Bol kusol niri ká siɗi key na, mbṵ fe fére mbeɗe bol kusol Moyze ɓáy taa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele.»
40022041	Nam mbḭw munu Fariziri mbṵ kḭ. Zaɗka Zezu kɔ ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi ri ɓay mii:
40022042	«Ì ker ɓay mina ze ká ɓil law-rì lɛ? Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na wa̰a, ka ɓa vu bulu ve lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ka ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ.»
40022043	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a vbi ri ɓay mii: «A munu ku wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, Mbay Daviɗ ká ɓaa ɓay ɓáy faa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɗi ni ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ? Mbay Daviɗ na ɓaa mii:
40022044	“Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓi mii: ‘Mu ví káw tunduo hoɗo ɓi, kpṵru maa ɓáy haŋa mì haw yṵm ká tul nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓori ha ri ɗo ɓa fe ɗáa ɓal-a zuɔ ɗi’.”
40022045	«A zaɗka Mbay Daviɗ ɗi Krisike na ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay na wa̰a, ɗaa mina rɔɔ a yḭ́i a ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ nda̰w lɛ woo?»
40022046	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw káʼa yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni na tiya. Úru saa namke ku na nzoɓ mbḭw káʼa zíŋ faa ɓay vbika ni ɓay na ti mbǎa.
40023001	Falɛ ká Zezu ɓaa ɓay ziŋ Fariziri na, ka ɓaa ɓay ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii:
40023002	«Nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri na, ɓa peɗ ɓari ká ɓay tína sa̰w ɓay bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru munu ká Moyze ɗaa ká pola lew na.
40023003	Munu zu lɛ, feri riw bele ká i ɓaa ɓayke ha rì na, ì ɗaa vu mbom ka ɓo ɗi. Roo lɛ, fe ɗáa ɓari na ì mbóro ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, feri ká i fere na, i ɗaa feke ya.
40023004	Ɓari na i siŋ soɓa ká hii ɓamba tasiri í ɗaa ɓo tul kpa̰a nduo nzoɓri, roo lɛ, vu nduo-rì ŋgɛɗɛŋ mini hɔy kara, i hii záake ya.
40023005	Feri riw bele ká i ɗaa na, i ɗaa ɓay kíɛke sùo-ri ká nun nzoɓri hɔy. Ɓe ze, vu ɓɔl huɔ ká i siŋ ɗo nzaa pol-ri ɓáy puu nduo-ri na, taa ɓari ŋgɔɓ kal taa nzoɓ ha̰wri, í nduo gari ká i tuŋ nzi-ɛ ɓáy sal ha̰ ni pie yul na, kal taa nzoɓ ha̰wri nda̰w.
40023006	I hii káw zaɗ káw riŋ ɗika ká zaɗ fe sṵm suoriya luyeri, í hii zaɗ káw riŋ ɗika ká ɗo pola ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari nda̰w.
40023007	I hii haŋa nzoɓri hii soko korma korma ha ri ká zaɗ ruɔ ká nun nzoɓri, a í hii haŋa nzoɓri ɗi ri ɓa “mbay, mbay” nda̰w pi.
40023008	«Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì ha̰ nzoɓri ɗi rì ɓa “mbay” ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbay ɓaarì mbḭw hɔy keklek, a ɓaarì riw bele na ì ɓa yṵ kḭ.
40023009	Ì ɗi nzoɓ mbḭw mini ká tusiri key ɓa “bǎa” ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Bǎa ɓaarì mbḭw hɔy kaw nulue.
40023010	Ì ha̰ nzoɓri ɗí rì ɓa “gaŋ ɓi” ya nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, gaŋ tul-rì mbḭw hɔy ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi na.
40023011	Nzoɓ ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ ká tul-rì ká sakra ɓaarì na, a ɗáa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓaarì, ɓay ḭi lɛ,
40023012	nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ura tul-e ɓa siya lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a mgbaka ɗiŋ siri, a nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗiŋ tul-e ɓa siri laa lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a úra ɓa siya.»
40023013	«Kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri ká ì ɓa nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Nzoɓri ká i hii ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na, ì gbakra faake ha ri. Ɓaarì kḭ sùo-rì hɔy kara, ì hii ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-rì ya, a nzoɓri ká i hii ɓayke hɔy kara ì haa ri faake.»
40023014	[«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Ì kɔ nun síe má̰y pileri ya, í duku mḭiri feziŋa ɓari ruɗuɗu bele, ɓe nu ku hɔy kara ì ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere pì-pie ká nun nzoɓri ɓay kíɛke sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ kereri. Sa̰wke mini ze, ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a kúŋ ɓo tul-rì na, a ŋgɔ́ŋ ɓamba tasiri kal taa nzoɓ ha̰wri rɔɓay.»]
40023015	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Ì ha̰ari ɓáy zaɗri riw bele, ɓáy faa ɓil mbiiri, ɓáy tusiri buo ɗi ɗi í nzaa nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ha ri vi ɓa nzoɓ kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. A zaɗka ì ziŋ nzoɓ mbḭw lɛ, ì ɗaa ha̰ ni vi ɓa nzoɓ ká ndaya ká maa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe, mba rì faa ɓal ba siɗi rɔɓay ká ɓil huu ka ru-ruma ya na!»
40023016	«Ɓaarì ra̰wri ká ì nda faa pol nzoɓri na: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ì ɓaa mii: “Zaɗka nzoɓ haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, ɓa fe ya ɓáy. A zaɗkaʼa haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri ká ɗo ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ro lɛ, ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, ì ɓaa mii ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa ɓáy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓke mbi sùo-ɛ a háake huɗ ɓa tusuɛ.”
40023017	Ɓaarì ká ì ɓa kɔ̀kɔ, í ɓa ra̰w! Ɓa lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri na mase, hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗaa ha̰ lari na vi ɓa fe ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ze ndaɗ mba mbini na ya lɛ woo?
40023018	Ì ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: “Zaɗka nzoɓ haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ tutakra fe poy Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, ɓa fe ya rɔɓay. A zaɗkaʼa haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ fe haŋa hɔy ká ɓo tul tutakra fe poy na ku ro lɛ, ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, ì ɓaa mii ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa ɓáy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓke mbi sùo-ɛ a háake huɗ ɓa tusuɛ.”
40023019	Ɓaarì ra̰wri! Fe haŋa hɔy mase, tutakra fe poy Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗaa ha̰ fe haŋa hɔy na vi ɓa fe ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ze ndaɗ mba mbini na ya lɛ woo?
40023020	Ɓe ze, nzoɓ ká haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ tutakra fe poy na, ka haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ tutakra fe poy ɓáy fe haŋa hɔyri riw bele ká zuɔ ɗi zu.
40023021	Nzoɓ ká haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kaw ɓil-e zu.
40023022	A nzoɓ ká haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ nulue laa lɛ, ka haa huɗ ɓáy riŋ kariŋgaw káw Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ káw ɗi na.»
40023023	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Vay feri ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa mante, mase anɛte, mase kumɛ̰ na, duɔ lɛ, ì naa mbḭw ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy zaɗɛ zaɗɛ. Roo lɛ, fe ká ɗo ɓil bol kusol ká ɗo nun ɗáa, munu ká ɓa ɗáa fe ká ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, kɔ́kɔ nun síe nzoɓri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɗoko tul Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w na, ì yḭiŋra ɗáake. Ɓe ze, ɓa feri ká ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa nun-rì ɓo ɗi taŋ yḭiŋra ɓie fe ha̰wri.
40023024	Ɓaarì ra̰wri ká ì nda faa pol nzoɓri! Mbii ɓaarì ká fe hoy ká ndḭi ɗo ɗi na ì ɗu-ɗuɔ rɔɔ í nzɔ, roo lɛ, ì tṵu zambal ɓáy kukre malak ɓa ɓil-rì taŋ kɔ́kɔke!»
40023025	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Fal tuŋguo tɔy ɓáy tuŋguo ŋgaw ze ì wàa ha̰ ni taŋ kaɗ kaɗ, roo lɛ, fe ká mbaa ɓil-e ká ì sṵ í nzɔ na, ì ziŋ ɓáy faa riiɓa ɓáy kɔ́kɔ nun fe.
40023026	Ɓo Farizi, nzoɓ nun ra̰w! Mu wáa ɓil tuŋguo tɔy ɓáy tuŋguo ŋgaw pola ha̰ ni ka táŋ kaɗ kaɗ ro lɛ, fal-ɛ kara a táŋ kaɗ kaɗ ɓáy.»
40023027	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri: kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì! Ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri! Ì rìi tupalri ká i rɔŋ ɓáy pɔr ha̰ ni puu kpa̰a kpa̰a a ndaɗ ká fal-ɛ kɛlɛ key hɔy, roo lɛ, ɓil-e ká nziiya na ɓa hṵru huɗ nzoɓri ɓáy fe púŋkeri ká kḭri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ.
40023028	Ɓaarì hɔy kara ì ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w. Ká nun nzoɓri ká kɛlɛ na, i kɔ rì ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, roo lɛ, ká ɓil law-rì nziiya na, nzaa rúɔ ɓayri ɓáy fe ɗáa ka̰ayari ze mbaa ɗi nzḭi nzḭi.»
40023029	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy Fariziri, ɓaarì nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓa taa ɓaarì. Ɓaarì na ì mbuo tupal nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy kere, a í ɗaa tupal nzoɓri ká i ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na vur vur
40023030	a í ɓaa mii: “Ɓa fe ká ɓuru ɗo ziŋ bulu ɓuru ká piɛɗke lew na lɛ, ɓuru ti zúɔ ziŋ ri ɓay ɗáa sím nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na zuɔ siri ya.”
40023031	Ɓe ze, ɓáy ɓay ɓáa ɓaarì kḭ ì kɔ́ke sùo-rì mii, ì ɓa vu bulu nzoɓri ká i i nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
40023032	Munu zu lɛ, ì se nun-rì ɓa pola í ɔ́rɔ ɓie peɗ ká bulu ɓaarì tii sa̰w ɗáake na!
40023033	Ɓaarì sɔyri! Mḭiri kuɔtɔlri! Ì ɗáa mina í tḭi ɗul ká ɓil kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya káʼa tḭ́i tul-rì na lɛ woo?
40023034	Ì laa key: mì píe ɓáy nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, nzoɓ nun nzɛmri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓri ká i fére ri bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w pi. Ì ika nzoɓ ha̰nɛri, a í ɓer nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ha ri hu ká tul puu say huɗ. Ì ndáka nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓaarì, rɔɔ í nii ri puo ɓáy puo munu ká bulu ɓaarì ɗaa na,
40023035	ɓay haŋa ɓay sím nzoɓri riw bele ká ɓaarì Ziɓri ì i ri gɔr hɔy taŋ ka̰aya ká i ɗaa ziŋ nzoɓ na, ka mgba tul-rì, tii sa̰wke saa tul sím Abɛl ká ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ, kpṵru tḭ́ike tul-e taa Zakari, vu Baraki ká ì i ni ká sikɗa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy zaɗ ká tutakra fe poy ɓo ɗi na.
40023036	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓay sím nzoɓ niri key riw bele na, a mgbaka tul sa̰w nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ key.»
40023037	«Zuruzalɛm, Zuruzalɛm! Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm ká ì i nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a í vbuku nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie ri ha rì na ɓáy tisawri í i ri. Wa̰a, faa ɓal ba mina ze, mì hii ɓay mbṵ́ nzoɓ ɓaarì na ɗo sa̰w ɓal-i, munu ká máa ka̰y mbṵ́ke vi-eri ɗo sa̰w ɓal-ɛ a guɓa tul-ri ɓáy ta̰y bar-ɛ na lɛ! Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì hii puu ɓayke ya.
40023038	Ì kɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a pɔ́ŋ hul ka̰ni ɓaarì na bavbaw ha rì.
40023039	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: úru saa vuri key na, ì ti kɔ́kɔ mì mbǎa kpṵru maa ɓáy síeke ká ì ɓáa mii: “Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka sá̰m fe zúɔ tul nzoɓ ká vi ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay!”»
40024001	Zezu tḭi saa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Zaɗkaʼa ɗo zɔ́l báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í kiɛ ni hulri ká i mbuo ɓa gama ká ɗo ɓil mgbaŋ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓay haŋa ni ka kɔ.
40024002	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Fe niri riw bele key na wa̰a, ì kɔ-kɔ kḭ zu lɛ? Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: tisaw ká i mbúoke hulri key na, ti tɔ́ŋ mbḭw ka̰y tul kḭ ká zaɗ ni key ya. Nzoɓri gá̰y ri riw bele zuɔ siri.»
40024003	Zezu se a kaw tul kuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Oliviye. Zaɗkaʼa kaw ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kḭ ro i soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í ɗo fi mbḭw í vbi ni mii: «Mu ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa, síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, fe niri key na a vika lɛ? Rɔɓay, fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ a kál a kiɛ ɓuru nam ká mù yḭ́i, mase síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ká tusiri key na lɛ?»
40024004	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ka úla rì ya,
40024005	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ví ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓáy riŋ-i í ɓaa mii: “Ɓa ɓi ze mì ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.” I úla nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.
40024006	Ì láa ɓay soro ruyri ká nzoɓri ruu kḭ ká lakun-rì, a í laa soro ruyri ká nzoɓri ruu kḭ ɗi ɗi nda̰w. Roo lɛ, ì ha̰ sùo-rì ka tɔ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa fe niri key na ka tḭi pola nda̰w rɔ! Roo lɛ, ɓa síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ká tusiri key na ya rɔɓay.
40024007	Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari mbḭw, i úru ɓay rúu ziŋ nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo kḭri ɓoɗ. Nzoɓri ká ɓil puoruo mbḭw, ì úru ɓay rúu ziŋ nzoɓ puoruo kḭri. Kɔn luye a líe ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ nda̰w, tusiri a láŋ yik yik ɓáy zaɗri nda̰w pi.
40024008	Fe nuri riw bele ku na, a ɗoko munu ɓa tiika nduo ká sɛ má̰y nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni ka mboŋ.
40024009	I mgbaka rì í ɗaa nun-rì tuɔ síe a í i rì. Sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key na i fṵ́y rì ɓay tul-i.
40024010	Síeke ku na, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i pɔ́ŋ mbika law ɓari; i mbika tul kḭ a í fṵy kḭ.
40024011	Nzoɓri ká i ɗi sùo-ri ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na i ŋgḭi ɓamba, i tḭ́i í ula nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.
40024012	Ka̰aya nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ká ya̰a zaɗ ɓa pola pola na, a ɗáa ha̰ fal ini nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba a húoke ɗeŋ ɗeŋ.
40024013	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká mgba ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ kpṵru tḭi síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa ni.
40024014	Ɓay Kere ni ká se tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká re mbay ká tul nzoɓri na, i ka-káake ɓáy zaɗri riw bele ká tusiri key ɓay haŋa sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele i laa ɓayke. Falɛ ku nda̰w rɔɔ, ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na a ví ɓáy.»
40024015	«Ɓaarì na ì kɔ́kɔ nzoɓ ká i ɗi ɓa “Fe Ḭ̌m ká maa ɓáa ya” ká Daniyɛl, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓayke piɛɗke lew na. Fe ḭ̌mke ku na a ɗoko siya ká zaɗ ká taŋ kaɗaŋ ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. (Nzoɓ ká kḭi mbeɗe key na lɛ, ka laa sa̰wke ta-taŋ!)
40024016	Zaɗka i kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri ɗúu ɓa tul kuori.
40024017	Nzoɓ káʼa mgbaka ta̰ram ká tul hul siya na, ka ti ɗí ɓay vǎa fa̰a fe ɓeri ká hula ya nda̰w,
40024018	a nzoɓ káʼa ɗoko wáa na ti yḭ́i se puɔ ɓay mbika maagari ɓe ya nda̰w pi.
40024019	Namkeri ku na, má̰yri ká i ɗoko ɓil, ɓáy má̰yri ká leɗri á̰w wa̰n ɓari na, i kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba.
40024020	Ì kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɗul ɓaarì na, ka ɗo ɓáy few lew teɗ ya nda̰w, mase ɓáy nam mgbaka ta̰ram naari Ziɓri ya nda̰w pi!
40024021	Ká ɓil namke ku na, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe káʼa tḭ́i tul nzoɓri na, a kál tul zaɗ pavbaɗ: úru saa nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗáake tusiri kpṵru tḭi vuri key na, kḭri kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká mini na nzoɓ kɔ ya rɔɓay, rɔɔ ɓil namri káʼa vi vuku hɔy kara, nzoɓ ti kɔ́kɔ kḭri sɛkɛ fe ká mini mbǎa mgbaŋ.
40024022	Zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay yḭ́iŋra namkeri ku na ɓa fal ya lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara, ti káw ɓáy kumnun ya. Roo lɛ, namkeri ku na ka yḭiŋra ɓa fal ɓay tul nzoɓ ɓeri káʼa nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ.
40024023	Zaɗka nzoɓ ɓaa ha rì mii: “Ì kɔ-kɔ́m í kɔ Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ka ɗo zaɗ ni key,” mase, “ka ɗo lew,” lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ka ɓo ɗi ya.
40024024	Ì kɔ, nzoɓri ká i ɗi sùo-ri ɓa Krisi, ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɗi sùo-ri ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i tḭ́i í ɗaa bawda fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ɓay úlake nzoɓri. Ze faa ɗo ɗi lɛ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe na hɔy kara, i úla ri nda̰w.
40024025	Ì laa key, mì ɓaa ɓayke ha rì ro.»
40024026	«Munu zu lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓri ɓaa ha rì mii: “Ì kɔ, Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi na, ɗo ɓil law kɔr,” lɛ, ì se ɗi ya. Mase, i ɓaa ha rì mii: “Krisi mṵu sùo-ɛ ɗo key,” lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ka ɓo tul ɓay ɓari na ku ya,
40024027	ɓay ḭi lɛ, munu ká mbam siɛ yela ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ haraŋ saa fi tḭi síe kpṵru tḭi fi riŋ síe na, síeke ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì ví na, a ɗoko faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
40024028	Nzoɓri riw bele i kɔ́kɔ ni, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗ ká huɗ fe ɓo ɗi na, zaɗɛ na ku ze ta̰miri mbṵ kḭ ká ɗi.»
40024029	«Ɓa vaa hɔy ká fal kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil namkeri ku na, síe a ɗoko guu nda̰w, few ti híe mbǎa nda̰w, mbaymawri gá̰y saa tumbam nda̰w, rɔɔ hṵrusuori ká tumbam kara i láŋ yik yik nda̰w pi.
40024030	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, fe káʼa kíɛ vika ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na a tḭ́i ká tumbam. Ká síeke ku na, sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key na i rɛ́kɛ sùo-ri, lɛ, í kɔ́kɔ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ká mì ví saa nulue ká ɓil síi mbam ɓáy bawda hṵrusuo, ɓáy riŋ ɗika.
40024031	Báyḭi lɛ, bawda tḭw a mgbaka ɓáy zaɗ gǔrum gǔrum, lɛ, mì píe leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓiri ká nulue ha ri se ɓáy tḭw zaɗri ká niŋ ká tusiri key, ɓay haŋa ri mbṵ nzoɓ ɓiri ka mì nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓi na, saa fi mbḭɛ mgba gbṵ zaɗ ká fi mbini.»
40024032	«Ì laa má̰ra ɓay ká se tul puu nzum na, a í fére fe ká ɗi! Zaɗka ì kɔ rɔɔ nzaa tɔykeri luo vay a ɗo rék rek lɛ, ì kɔ ta-taŋ mii, nzaa bura mbam ɗo ɗi ya ro zu.
40024033	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, zaɗka ì kɔ fe niri key na riw bele tḭi lɛ, ì kɔ nda̰w mii, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na mì ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓay ví; mì ɗo faa hul ro.
40024034	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ key na, i ti huka riw bele ya hɔy ze fe niri riw bele key na a tḭ́i.
40024035	Tumbam ɓáy tusiri na a kál hɔ̰́n bele. A roo lɛ, ɓay ɓiri na ti kál ya mgbaŋ.»
40024036	«Ɓay ká se tul namke mase sa̰w síeke ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì yḭ́i ɓay ví na, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara kɔ ya. Leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká nulue ya nda̰w, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ kara ya nda̰w; ɓa Bǎa huo-ɛ hɔy ze kɔ.
40024037	Fe ká kal ɓáy sewke taa Noe na, síeke ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì vika na, a ɗoko faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
40024038	Ì kɔ, ɓáy ɓil sewke taa Noe ká pola lew ká mbii ya̰a zaɗ ya rɔɓay na, nzoɓri sṵ fe í nzɔ fe, má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari i ya̰a kḭ, mase i ha̰ vu ɓariri kara ya̰a kḭ kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká Noe ndǔoke ɓil hul tumbii na.
40024039	Nzoɓri ma̰y ɓay ká tul sùo-ri kpṵru maa ɓáy mbii ká ví ya̰a zaɗ mgbǎ̰ri, a fa̰a ri riw bele. Nam ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì yḭ́i mí vi na kara, a ɗoko faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
40024040	Ɓe mini ze, wa̰rari siɗi ká i ɗoko wáa na, i mbika nzoɓ mbini, a í pɔŋ nzoɓ mbḭɛ mgba̰mi.
40024041	A má̰yri siɗi ká i ɗo naŋ fe na, i mbika nzoɓ mbini, a í pɔŋ nzoɓ mbḭɛ mgba̰mi.
40024042	Munu zu lɛ, ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaarì a víke na ì kɔ ya.
40024043	Ì kɔ ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Zaɗka nzoɓ puo kɔ sa̰w síe ká nzoɓ riiɓa a víke ɓil hul ɓe ɓa suŋ na lɛ, a káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-ɛ kekeke ɓo, ka ti pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ nzoɓ riiɓa haw faa hul ɓe a fa̰a fe ɓeri ya.
40024044	Sa̰wke mini ze, ɓaarì hɔy kara ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, sa̰w síe ká ì ker ya na nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na mì víke ɓáy.»
40024045	«Munu ku wa̰a, leɗ káw ha̰a ze ɗo ɓáy nun nzɛm, a ɗo tul peɗ ɓe ɓáy zaɗɛ lɛ? Ɓe key na, bǎa káw ɓe pɔŋ peɗ zuɔ nduo-ɛ a ha̰ ni kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa tul leɗ káw ha̰wri, ɓay haŋa ni ka leke ri fe sṵm ɓari ɓáy zaɗɛ zaɗɛ ɓáy nam nam.
40024046	Suoriya a ɓá taa leɗke ká bǎa káw ɓe yḭ̀i a ví ziŋ ni ká zaɗ ɗáa peɗ ká mini key.
40024047	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓe na, bǎa káw ɓe a pɔ́ŋ peɗ kɔ́rɔ fe ɓeri riw bele zuɔ nduo-ɛ.
40024048	Roo lɛ, zaɗkaʼa ɓa leɗ káw ká ndaya lɛ, a kér ɓay ká ɓil law-ɛ mii: “Bǎa káw ɓi mgba roy ká ɓay vika.”
40024049	Ro, a tii sa̰w ɓɔ́ɗ bǎw peɗ ɓeri na a sṵ a nzɔ ziŋ koy himri nda̰w.
40024050	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓáy nam káʼa ker ya na, bǎa káw ɓe na a ví tḭ́i tul-e mbuɗa ɓáy sa̰w síe káʼa kɔ ya.
40024051	Lɛɛ, kaʼa mgbaka ni a ɗara ni kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba, a ɗaa ni kaw zaɗ kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ziŋ nzoɓ ha̰wri ká i ɓa nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri. Ɓa zaɗ ká nzoɓri rɛ́kɛ rɛw ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo, a í sṵ sere-ri ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r ká ɗi.»
40025001	Zezu ɓaa mii: «Síeke ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a réke mbay ká tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key na, a ɗoko munu ɓa má̰y tikɗiri ká tul-ri duɔ, ká i fa̰a huu ndele ɓari a í tḭ́ike ɓay vǎa suɔ nun nzoɓ má̰y fie.
40025002	Nzoɓ ndeɓeri ká sakra ɓari ku na i ɓa kɔ̀kɔri, a nzoɓ ndeɓekeri laa lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri.
40025003	Ɓari ká i ɓa kɔ̀kɔri na, i fa̰a huu ndele ɓari munu hɔy taŋ mgbaka num kḭ ɗo nduo-ri.
40025004	A ɓari nzoɓ nun nzɛmri na laa lɛ, i fa̰a huu ndele ɓari ɗo nduo-ri ɓáy num kḭ kɛk.
40025005	Munu ká nzoɓ má̰y fie na vi vaa ya na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari riw bele ká tul-ri duɔ na, i duku nam gbaru gbaru, a í zuɔ nam ráɗ bele.
40025006	«Maa ɓáy nzaa zaɗ buo báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ mii: “Nzoɓ má̰y fie na se vuku ro, ì tḭi í suɔ nun-ɛ!”
40025007	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari má̰y tikɗiri riw bele na i tuma saa tul nam a í tii sa̰w léke huu ndele ɓari.
40025008	Lɛɛ, ɓari kɔ̀kɔri na i gɔŋ má̰y nun nzɛmri na mii: “Ì ha̰ ɓuru num ɓaarì na ndḭi ha̰ ɓuru ɗaa zúɔ ɓil huo huu ndele ɓuru ká ɗo ruma key woo!”
40025009	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y nun nzɛmri na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: “Úwaa, num ɓuru na ŋgḭi maa haŋa náa ɗoŋri kḭ ya. Ì se luo nzoɓ ɗáɓkeri na í vǎa hie.”
40025010	Zaɗka kɔ̀kɔ má̰y tikɗiri na i zɔl ɓay vǎa híe num na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ má̰y fie na ví tḭi ká fal-ri. Lɛɛ, ɓari má̰y nun nzɛmri ká i giyaŋ ni kekeke na, i nduo ziŋ ni mbḭw hɔy í se hul suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na, lɛ, i dar faa gbak ɓo tul-ri.
40025011	«Falɛ ku ndḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓari kɔ̀kɔri ká ndeɓe na i vi í ɗi nzoɓ má̰y fie na mii: “Mbay, Mbay, mgbúɗa faa ha̰ ɓuru!”
40025012	Lɛɛ, kaʼa yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: “Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: mì kɔ rì ya.”
40025013	«Munu zu lɛ, ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, namke ɓáy sa̰w síeke na ì kɔ ya.»
40025014	Zezu ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: «Síe yḭ́i ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, a ɗoko munu ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɗo séke ɓa varu, lɛ, ka ɗi leɗ káw ɓeri a pɔŋ feziŋa ɓeri zuɔ nduo-ri.
40025015	Leɗ káw ɓe ká mbḭw na, ka fa̰a lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi zuɔ bawda ɓɔl ɓa ndeɓe ha̰ ni. Nzoɓ ndeke ɗi siɗike lɛ, ka fa̰a zuɔ ɓɔl ɓa siɗi ha̰ ni, a nzoɓ ndeke ɗi sayke laa lɛ, ka fa̰a zuɔ ɓɔl ɓa mbḭw ha̰ ni. Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ha̰ ni lari maa ɓáy tul hṵrusuo-ɛ. Falɛ ku nda̰w rɔɔ, a uru a zɔl faa varu ɓe na.
40025016	Úru saa namke ku hɔy lɛ, leɗ káw ɓe ha̰y ká ya̰a ɓɔl lari ɓa ndeɓe na, se a vǎa fɛrɛ nun lari na, a ziŋ kḭ ɓɔl ndeɓe zuɔ tul-e.
40025017	Nzoɓ ha̰y ká ya̰a ɓɔl lari ɓa siɗi na kara ɗaa faa mbḭw munu na nda̰w, a ziŋ mbiike ɓa ɓɔl siɗi a ɗaa zuɔ tul-e nda̰w.
40025018	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ taa ha̰y ká ya̰a ɓɔl lari ɓa mbḭw na, se a vǎa tie luɔ a mbɛɗɛ lari bǎa gaŋ ɓe na diɓ diɓ ɗo ɗi.
40025019	«Zaɗka bole ɗi maa fe na báyḭi lɛ, bǎa gaŋ ɓari na yḭ̀i a vi a tii sa̰w kḭiŋa fal fe ɓeri na ziŋ ri.
40025020	Nzoɓ ha̰y ká ya̰a lari ɓɔl ndeɓe na soro ɓa lakun bǎa gaŋ ɓe ɓáy ɓɔl lari kḭ ɓa ndeɓe zuɔ tul-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mbay, mu kɔ, mù ha̰ mì ɓɔl lari ɓa ndeɓe, lɛ, mì ziŋ kḭ ɓa ndeɓe zuɔ tul-e.”
40025021	Lɛɛ, bǎa gaŋ ɓe na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ndaɗ ɓamba, mù ɓa leɗ káw kere, mù ɗo tul fe ká mì ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ɔ na ɓáy zaɗɛ. Munu ká fe ká ndḭi ká mì ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ɔ ká mù ɗaa ha̰ ni tii suku na, timbɛɗɛ key mì pɔ́ŋ feri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ro zuɔ nduo-ɔ. Mu ví káw ɓil suoriya ziŋ mì.”
40025022	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe káʼa ya̰a ɓɔl lari ɓa siɗi na soro a vi lakun bǎa gaŋ ɓe na nda̰w a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mbay, mu kɔ, mù ha̰ mì ɓɔl lari ɓa siɗi, lɛ, mì ziŋ mbiike ɓɔl siɗi zuɔ tul-e.”
40025023	Lɛɛ, bǎa gaŋ ɓe na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ndaɗ ɓamba, mù ɓa leɗ káw kere, mù ɗo tul fe ká mì ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ɔ na ɓáy zaɗɛ. Fe ká ndḭi ká mì ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ɔ ká mù ɗaa ha̰ ni tḭi suku na, timbɛɗɛ key na mì pɔ́ŋ feri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ro zuɔ nduo-ɔ. Mu ví káw ɓil suoriya ziŋ mì.”
40025024	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe káʼa ya̰a ɓɔl lari ɓa mbḭw na soro a vi lakun bǎa gaŋ ɓe a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mbay, mì kɔ nda̰w, ɓo na mù ɓa nzoɓ ká mù yḭŋ ɓamba tasiri. Ɓo na mù hii ɓay zíŋ fe ká ɓil peɗ kṵ-ɔri: fe ká mù ru ya na, mù vbie; a fe ká mù mii pa̰rɛ ya kara, mù mbṵ zuɔ tul kḭ.
40025025	Mì ɗaa hḭɛ ŋgḭi ɓamba, ze mí vǎa tie luɔ mí mbɛɗɛ lari ɓo na ɗo ɗi. Mu kɔ, ɓe ze ɗo key. Mu ya̰a fe ɓo na.”
40025026	Báyḭi lɛ, gaŋ tul-e na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ɓo leɗ káw ká mù ndaya, a mú ɓa lay! Munu ká mù kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ká mì ru fe ya, a lɛ, mì vbie feke, a mí mii pa̰ra fe ya, a lɛ, mì mbṵ feke zuɔ tul kḭ, wa̰a,
40025027	ɗaa mina mù ha̰ lari ɓi na ha̰ nzoɓ kḭ kpaa a ɗáake peɗ, ze síe yḭ́i ɓi lɛ, mì ziŋ mbiike zúɔ tul-e ya lɛ?”
40025028	Báyḭi lɛ, bǎa gaŋ ɓe na ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri na mii: “Ì naa ɓɔl lari na ká nduo-ɛ í ha̰ nzoɓ taa ha̰y ká ɗǒke ɓáy ɓɔl duɔ na ka nde tul-e taa ɓe,
40025029	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗo ɓáy fe na, i haŋa ni kḭ nde tul-e, lɛ, ka kaw ɓil ndaɗi. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ti ɓáy fe ya na, ha̰y ká ndḭi hɔy káʼa ɗǒke na kara, i náa ɗɔɗ ɓay pɔ́ŋ ni.”
40025030	A ɓe leɗ káw ká ɓa nzoɓ ká gɔr na, ì mbi ni í vbu ni ɓo zaɗ ká sii nduŋ ká kɛlɛ. Ɓa zaɗ ká nzoɓri rɛ́kɛ rɛw ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo, a í sṵ sere-ri ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r ká ɗi.»
40025031	«Zaɗka ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì yḭ́i ɓáy riŋ ɗika mbay ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗri riw bele ká nulue na báyḭi lɛ, mì káw tul kariŋgaw riŋ ɗika ɓi.
40025032	Sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele i mbṵ́ kḭ ká pol-i, lɛ, mì kɛ́lɛ ri ha ri ɗo ɓoɗ ɓoɗ, munu ká nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ fe hɔl kɛ̌lɛke sakra baɗuri ɓáy vuyri ɗo ɓoɗ ɓoɗ.
40025033	Mì ɗáa baɗuri ɗo tunduo hoɗo ɓi, a vuyri laa lɛ, ɗo tunduo gel ɓi.
40025034	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓi ká mì ɓa mbay na mì ɓáa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɗo tunduo hoɗo ɓi na mii: “Ɓaarì ká Bǎa sa̰m fe zuɔ tul-rì na, ì ví ya̰a fe kere puoruo káʼa leke ɓay tul-rì ɓáy titire ɗáa tusiri ká piɛɗ lew hɔy na ɓa taa ɓaarì,
40025035	ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗka kɔn sɛ mì na, ì ha̰ mì fe sṵm mì sṵ, kɔn mbii hɔy sɛ mì kara, ì ha̰ mì mbii mì nzɔ nda̰w. Mì ɓa varu nzoɓ na, ì mgba mì ɓa sùo-rì,
40025036	mì se tigba̰a-i hɔy kara, ì ha̰ mì gari mì nduo nda̰w, sùo-i ká sɛ mì na, ì kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa tul-i nda̰w, rɔɔ, hul sal ká mì naa ɗi kara, ì vǎa kɔ mì nda̰w pi.”
40025037	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛri na, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: “Mbay, síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ ɓuru kɔ mù ká kɔn sɛ mù, rɔɔ ɓuru ha̰ mù fe sṵm mù sṵ; mase síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ kɔn mbii sɛ mù, rɔɔ ɓuru ha̰ mù mbii mù nzɔ lɛ?
40025038	Mase síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓuru kɔ mù ɓa varu nzoɓ, rɔɔ ɓuru mgba mù ɓa sùo ɓuru; mase síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, mù se tigba̰a-a hɔy, rɔɔ ɓuru ha̰ mù gari mù nduo lɛ?
40025039	Síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓuru kɔ mù ɓáy sɛm, mase mù naa hul sal nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓuru vǎa kɔ mù lɛ?”
40025040	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓi ká mì ɓa mbay na mì yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: “Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: síe ha̰a ha̰a ká ì ɗaa fe niri key na ziŋ nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa leɗ ká ndḭi hɔy ká sakra yṵ-iri lɛ, ɓa ɓi ze ì ɗaa feke key na ziŋ mì nda̰w ku.”
40025041	«Falɛ lɛ, ɓi ká mì ɓa mbay na mì ɓáa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i kaw tunduo gel ɓi na mii: “Ì zɔ́l ká nzaa-i ɗi ɗi ɓa lew, ɓaarì ká faɗi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgba rì! Ì zɔ́l í se ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya ɓaŋguɔ ká i leke ɗo ɓay tul ŋgɛrɛtemndaya ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓeri,
40025042	ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗka kɔn sɛ mì na, ì ha̰ mì fe sṵm mì sṵ ya; kɔn mbii sɛ mì kara, ì ha̰ mì mbii mì nzɔ ya nda̰w.
