40025043	Mì ɓa varu nzoɓ, lɛ, ì mgba mì ɓa sùo-rì ya; mì se tigba̰a-i hɔy kara, ì ha̰ mì gari mì nduo ya nda̰w; sùo-i sɛ mì, mase mì naa hul sal kara, ì vǎa kɔ mì ya nda̰w pi.”
40025044	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: “Mbay, síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓuru kɔ kɔn ká sɛ mù, mase kɔn mbii ká sɛ mù, mase mù ɓa varu nzoɓ, mase tigba̰a-a ká ɗo hɔy, mase sùo-ɔ ká sɛ mù, mase hul sal ká mù naa ɗi na rɔɔ, ɓuru vǎa sɔ mù ya lɛ?”
40025045	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓi ká mì ɓa mbay na, mì yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: “Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka ì ɗaa fe niri key na ziŋ nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa leɗ ká ndḭi hɔy ká sakra yṵ-iri ya lɛ, ɓa ɓi ze ì ɗaa feke key na ziŋ mì ya nda̰w ku.”
40025046	Ɓari nzoɓkeri key na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ri kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara na. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛri na, i káw ɓáy kumnun ɓaŋguɔ.»
40026001	Zaɗka Zezu fere nzoɓri ɓay ɓeri key na ɔ riw bele báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii:
40026002	«Ì kɔ nda̰w, tɔ̀ŋ nam siɗi hɔy ro ɓay ɗáa nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na, lɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na i pɔ́ŋ mì ɓo nduo nzoɓri ha ri ɓer mì ɗo tul puu say huɗ.»
40026003	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri mbṵ kḭ ká ɓil boro mbay ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye ká ɓa Kayif,
40026004	ro, í nzaa faa ɓa law ɓay mgbaka Zezu ɓay ika ni.
40026005	Roo lɛ, i ɓaa mii: «Ndaɗ ɓay mgbaka ni ká síe nam fe sṵm suoriya ya, ká ruɔ nzoɓri úru í ɗaa so tul naari.»
40026006	Zezu na ɗo Betani luo nzoɓ ká i ɗi ni ɓa Simo̰n nzoɓ kpḭri.
40026007	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y mbḭw munu soro a vi lakun-ɛ. Ka mgba guma ká i ɗaa ɓáy tisaw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa alabastre ká num mbaa ɗi. Numke ku na ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy ká larike kara ŋgɔŋ ɓamba. Zaɗka Zezu kaw nzaa fe sṵm na, má̰y na vǎa kuna num na tɔlɔlɔ zuɔ tul-e.
40026008	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kɔ feke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri sɛ ri ha ri ɓaa mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ka ɓiɛ num na mini key zuɔ ɓisuy gɔr hɔy lɛ?
40026009	Ɓa fe ká nzoɓ hie ɓa pola zu lɛ, a zíŋ larike ŋgḭi ɓamba a pɔŋ larike ha̰ nzoɓ kṵkuri!»
40026010	Zaɗka Zezu kɔ kér ɓay ɓari na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mina ze ì yɔklɔ má̰y key na mini lɛ? Fe káʼa ɗaa ziŋ mì key na, ɓa fe kere ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri.
40026011	Ì kɔ, nzoɓ kṵkuri na i ɗoko ziŋ rì ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara, roo lɛ, ɓi na, mì ti ɗoko ziŋ rì ɓaŋguɔ ya.
40026012	Má̰y na kuna num ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy na zuɔ tul-i, rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri vǒroke mì ɓáy.
40026013	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗri riw bele ká tusiri key ká i ka-káa Ɓay Kere key ká ɗi na, i loko soro fe ká má̰y key ɗaa na, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri kěrke ɓay se tul-e.»
40026014	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi, ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zudas Iskariyoɗ na, se luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri
40026015	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka mì pɔŋ Zezu ɓo nduo-rì lɛ, fe ḭi ze ì haŋa mì lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i fa̰a lari rɔm ɓa síŋ say í ha̰ ni.
40026016	Úru saa síeke ku na báyḭi lɛ, Zudas tii sa̰w nzáa faa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰w síe káʼa máa ɓay pɔ́ŋ Zezu ɓo nduo-ri.
40026017	Titire nam ká i ɗáake suoriya maapa ká taŋ fe hew fe na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Zaɗ ha̰a ze mù hii ɓay haŋa ɓuru se ɗi ɓúru vǎa leke fe sṵm suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na ká ɗi lɛ?»
40026018	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì se ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm ká luo nzoɓ mbḭw munu í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mbay ɓaa mii: ‘Ɓi na, sa̰w síe ɓi tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ hɔy ro, lɛ, ká ɓil hul ɓo key ze mì ɗáa fe sṵm suoriya nam tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-iri ká ɗi.’”»
40026019	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri ɗaa munu káʼa mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri, ro í leke fe sṵm suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na.
40026020	Zaɗka síe riŋ bele na, Zezu kaw nzaa fe sṵm ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na.
40026021	Zaɗka i ɗo sṵŋa fe báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì na, a mbika tul-i.»
40026022	Lɛɛ, ɓayke ku na ɗaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗáake síe ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri, í tii sa̰w vbika ni ɓay mbḭw mbḭw ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele mii: «Mbay, ɓa ɓi ya na maa?»
40026023	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Nzoɓ ká mbṵ nduo fe sṵm ziŋ mì na, ɓa ɓe ze a mbika tul-i.
40026024	Ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì huka munu ká i ɓaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-i. Roo lɛ, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe taa minake ze a ɗoko ɓay tul nzoɓ ká mbi tul ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na lɛ! Nzoɓke ku na, mbóŋ ni ya ndaɗ mba mbóŋ ni.»
40026025	Báyḭi lɛ, Zudas ɓe káʼa pɔ́ŋ ni ɓo nduo nzoɓri na vbi ni mii: «Mbay, ɓa ɓi ya na maa!» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa ɓo ya mina lɛ?»
40026026	Zaɗka i ɗo sṵŋa fe na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi maapa a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w rɔɔ, a haw a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ya̰a í sṵ; ɓe ni key na ɓa naysuo-i zu.»
40026027	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a mbi koɓo a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a ha ri a ɓaa mii: «Ì ya̰a í nzɔ ɓáy zaɗ ɓaarì riw bele.
40026028	Ɓe ni key na ɓa sím sùo-i zu. Ɓa sím ɓi káʼa úo zuɔ siri ɓay síŋke sáka kuni ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru saa ziŋ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓay haŋa ni ndǎke buma feya̰a nzoɓri.
40026029	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: tii sa̰wke saa vuri key na, mì ti nzɔkɔ mbii lere puu key na ziŋ rì mbǎa kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká mì nzɔkɔke taa fie ziŋ rì ɓáy nam ká Bǎa a réke mbay ká tul nzoɓri na.»
40026030	Falɛ ká i ɗi sim nam suoriya í písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na báyḭi lɛ, i zɔl í vǎa kaw tul kuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Oliviye.
40026031	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɓil suŋ key na, feri káʼa tḭ́i tul-i na, a haŋa rì ɗuu riw bele í pɔŋ mì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: “Mì ika nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗu, lɛ, kuɗu baɗuri na, i zékre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ riw bele.”
40026032	Roo lɛ, zaɗka mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, mì vǎa giyaŋ rì ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.»
40026033	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ze nzoɓ ha̰wri riw bele pɔŋ mù hɔy kara, ɓi na, mì ti pɔ́ŋ mù ya mgbaŋ.»
40026034	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ká ɓil suŋ ká ɗo key na, pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa tuo ka-káa lɛ, mù má̰y ɓay ká tul-i faa ɓal ba say mii, mù kɔ mì ya.»
40026035	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ze ɓay haŋa mì hu na ziŋ mù hɔy kara, mì ti má̰y ɓay ká tul-a ya.» Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri riw bele na i ɓaa faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
40026036	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu fa̰a leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a tḭ́ike zaɗ mbḭw munu ká i ɗi ɓa Gesemane. Ká zaɗɛ ku na, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì káw zaɗ ni key, ká mì náa sùo-i ndḭi ɓay vǎa ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.»
40026037	Báyḭi lɛ, ka naa Piyɛr ɓáy vu Zebederi ká tul-ri siɗi na ha ri se ziŋ ni. A lɛ, ka tii sa̰w kɔ́kɔ síe, a law-ɛ sɛ ni rìi fe ká se ɓay mḭ-miira mini,
40026038	ro a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil law-i maa huɗ. Ì káw zaɗ ni key ziŋ mì ɓáy nzaa ɓal-iri kekeke.»
40026039	Falɛ káʼa ala ri a se ɗi ndḭi munu ɓa pola na báyḭi lɛ, ka guɓa siri mbuka a koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Bǎa, zaɗka faa ɗo ɗi lɛ, fe sɛkɛ káʼa ɗáa mì key na, mu ha̰ ni ka ɗo ɗi ɗi ziŋ mì, roo lɛ, mu ɗaa fe munu ká law-a ze hii ɓo, munu ká law-i ze hii ya.»
40026040	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se luo leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say na, lɛ, ka ziŋ ri ká tul nam. Ro, a tuma ri a ɓaa ha̰ Piyɛr mii: «Ì maa káw siya ziŋ mì sa̰w síe mbḭw ya hɔy lɛ woo?
40026041	Ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-iri kekeke í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere, ká ɓay líe ɓo ɓil nzaa úla. Ká ɓil law nzoɓ na, law hiiya ɗáa kere ze mbaa ɗi gba̰y gba̰y, roo lɛ, hṵrusuo-ɛ maa ya.»
40026042	Ka naa sùo-ɛ na rɔɓay faa ɓal ba siɗike, a vǎa koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Bǎa, zaɗka fe sɛkɛ káʼa ɗáa mì key na, faa náake ká ɓay haŋa mì kɔ na tiya lɛ, mu ɗaa fe ká law-a ze hii.»
40026043	Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a ví ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na rɔɓay ká tul nam, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam hii nun-ri dik dik ɓáy.
40026044	Ka naa sùo-ɛ ɓa kḭ na rɔɓay, a vǎa koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ndeke ɗi faa ɓal ba sayke, a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere faa mbḭw munu káʼa ɗaa ká polari na.
40026045	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a ví ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì na-nam rɔɓay í mgba ta̰ram sùo-rì kɛlɛ? Sa̰w síe ká i pɔ́ŋke ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ɓo nduo nzoɓ feya̰ari na vi ro.
40026046	Ì úru siya náa séri! Ì kɔ-kɔ́m í kɔ nzoɓ káʼa mbika tul-i na ɗo key.»
40026047	Zaɗka Zezu ɗo ɓáa ɓay kɔɓ ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, Zudas ká ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi tḭi ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri buɗ buɗ. I vi ɓáy maamiiri ɓáy puuri gbiri gbiri ɗo nduo-ri. Nzoɓkeri ku na, ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ze pie ri.
40026048	Zudas, nzoɓ mbika tul Zezu na, ka leke ɓay ziŋ ruɔ nzoɓri a ɓaa mii, fe ká ɓeri ɗáa ɓay haŋa ri kɔ́ke ni na ze ɗo key: «Nzoɓ ká mì mgba ni girik mí a̰w nzi-ɛ lɛ, ɓa ɓe ká ì hii na zu. Ì mgba ni.»
40026049	Ví Zudas ká munu na báyḭi lɛ, ka soro koɗ hɔy ɓa lakun-ɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Soko woo Mbay,» lɛ, ka mgba ni girik a a̰w nzi-ɛ.
40026050	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Nzoɓ buɔ-i, fe ká mù vi ɓay ɗáake na, mu ɗaa.» Ro, nzoɓ ha̰wri ɗaa so tul Zezu kuruk í mgba ni.
40026051	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ká i ɗo ziŋ Zezu na, naa maamii ɓe hiyaw saa ŋgole, a téke suku leɗ káw ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na mbɛkɛɗ ɓo ɓisuy.
40026052	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu yḭiŋra maamii ɓo na ka nduo ŋgole, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ká i ru-ruy ɓáy maamii na, i huka huɗ maamii nda̰w.
40026053	Mù ker mii, zaɗka mì koɗ Bǎa ɓay haŋa ni ka pie ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue ha ri ví sɔ mì lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy na, ka ti píe ɓáy kuɗu ɓari ŋgḭi hɔ̰ŋɔ hɔ̰ŋɔ zaɗ duɔ fal-ɛ siɗi ha̰ mì ya kḭ lɛ woo?
40026054	A zaɗkaʼa ɗaa munu ku na wa̰a, a ɗáa mina ha̰ ɓay ká se tul fe káʼa tḭ́i ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe na, a ɗoko munu ɓáy zaɗɛ lɛ?»
40026055	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri na mii: «Ì tḭi ɓáy maamiiri ɓáy puuri gbiri gbiri ɓay mgbaka mì rìi fe ká mì ɓa dɔmbirim nzoɓ lɛ woo! Namri riw bele na, mì kaw ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay fére rì fe, lɛ, ì mgba mì ya.
40026056	Roo lɛ, fe niri riw bele key na tḭi mini ha̰ ɓay ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe pola na, ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ.» Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri riw bele pɔŋ ni, a í zuɔ ɗul haɗ bele.
40026057	Nzoɓri ká i mgba Zezu na, i séke ni luo Kayif ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye. Ká zaɗɛ ku na, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri, ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri mbṵ kḭ ká ɗi.
40026058	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na dii fal Zezu ɗi ɓáy salke a se ɗaka ɗaka kpṵru a tḭi nzaa mgbaŋ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na. Ka rìi a kaw ɓil mgbaŋ ziŋ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ zaɗri ɓay kɔ́kɔ, wa̰a, fekeri ku na a kál mina lɛ?
40026059	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye ká luo Ziɓri na, i nzaa faa ɓay kúɗ ɓay zuɔ nzaa Zezu, ɓo ɓay ɗáake ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-e, a í i ni.
40026060	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ kúɗ ɓayri vi ŋgḭi ɓamba í kuɗ ɓay zuɔ nzi-ɛ, roo lɛ, i ziŋ ɓay mbḭw mini ká mgba tul-e ya. Laa lɛ, wa̰rari siɗi tḭi
40026061	í ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na ɓaa mii: ɓeri maa ɓíɛ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru key na wukluk wukluk, a nam say lɛ, ɓeri mbúo ɗo zaɗɛ.»
40026062	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na, uru siya a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Ɓay niri ká nzoɓ niri mbi ɓo tul-a key na wa̰a, mù ti yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay mbḭw ya hɔy lɛ?»
40026063	Roo lɛ, Zezu mgba nzi-ɛ ɗo ɗi. Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Káw Ɓáy Kumnun na, mu haa huɗ mú yḭ́iŋrake ɓáy vbiw ká mì vbi mù key na ha̰ ɓuru laa. Wa̰a, mù ɓa Krisi, Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na lɛ?»
40026064	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓe kḭ ze mù ɓaa ku. Roo lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: úru saa vuri key na, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na ì kɔ́kɔ mì kaw tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo. Rɔɓay, ì kɔ́kɔ mì ká mì ví saa nulue ká ɓil síi mbam.»
40026065	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na gɔ gari ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ tǐr a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na mii: «Ì kɔ í kɔ mbǎa, ka tḭiri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru! Náa vbikari nzoɓ nasi ɓay kḭri ɓay ɗáake mina ɓáy lɛ? Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa tḭiri ni na, ì laa sùo-rì kḭ riw bele ro!
40026066	Wa̰a, ì ker mina lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ɓay mgba tul-e, a ɗaa fe ká maa huɗ.»
40026067	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, i sa̰-sa̰mi zuɔ nun-ɛ, a í ɓɔɗ ni; nzoɓ ha̰nɛri nda hala nun-ɛ í vbíke nzi-ɛ mii:
40026068	«Ɓo ká mù ɗi sùo-ɔ ɓa Krisi na, nzoɓ ve ze nda mù key lɛ? Ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa!»
40026069	Piyɛr kaw mgbaŋ ká kɛlɛ, lɛ, leɗ má̰y mbḭw munu ká ɓa leɗ káw soro ɓa lakun-ɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo kara mù se ziŋ Zezu, leɗban ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na nda̰w.»
40026070	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ma̰y ɓayke ká nun nzoɓri riw bele a ɓaa mii: «Ɓay ɓo ká mù ɓaa key na, mì ta̰a láa kpṵy.»
40026071	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka se nun-ɛ ɓa nzaa kɔ̀kɔ munu, lɛ, leɗ má̰y kḭ ká ɓa leɗ káw kɔ ni a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na mii: «Leɗban key na, ka se-seɗ ziŋ Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ na mbḭw hɔy!»
40026072	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr yḭ̀i a ma̰y ɓay ɓa kḭ na rɔɓay, a haa huɗ mii: «Leɗban key na, mì kɔ ni ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ!»
40026073	Falɛ ku ndḭi hɔy lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ku na, i soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, mù ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku, ɓay ḭi lɛ, kusol ɓay ɓo na rìi taa ɓari nda̰w.»
40026074	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tii sa̰w háa huɗ zuɔ tul-e mii: «Mi hu mak mak! Leɗban key na, ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, mì kɔ ni ya!» Lɛɛ ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, tuo ka-káa kɔŋrɔŋ.
40026075	Zaɗkaʼa laa káa tuo na báyḭi lɛ, ka ker se tul ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni pola mii: «Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa tuo ka-káa lɛ, mù má̰y ɓay ká tul-i faa ɓal ba say mii, mù kɔ mì ya na.» Báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi ɓáy mbii mḭ́iri mgboɓo mgboɓo.
40027001	Ɓáy tiɓie piɛɗ na, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri riw bele na i mbi nzaa-ri í ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul Zezu.
40027002	Báyḭi lɛ, i ha ri mgba ni í siŋ ni í séke ni ha̰ Pilaɗ nzoɓ réke tul puo ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude.
40027003	Lɛɛ, Zudas ká mbi tul Zezu na laa soro ɓay huɗ ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, kér ɓay i ni ɓa huɗ ha̰ ni fa̰a lari rɔm ká síŋ say ká i ha̰ ni pola ɓay mbíke tul Zezu na, a yḭ̌ike a vǎa zǐŋke ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri
40027004	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɗaa feya̰a, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì mbi tul nzoɓ ká ɓay mbḭw mgba tul-e ya ha ri ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-e.» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay ɓuru ti ɗi ya! Ɓa peɗ ɓo zu.»
40027005	Báyḭi lɛ, Zudas mii lari na zǎ̰y zuɔ ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, a zɔl a vǎa ɗaa sal taa sol-e a hu taa puu teŋ reŋ.
40027006	Lɛɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri fa̰a lari na nḭm ɗo nduo-ri í ɓaa mii: «Lari key na, bol kusol naari haa faa ká ɓay ɗáa zuɔ ɓil guma lari ká ɓo ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru key, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa lari sím.»
40027007	Falɛ ku lɛ, i siŋ tul ɓay i fa̰a larike na, í vǎa híeke wáa nzoɓ mbúo pa̰y, í fɛrɛ wáake na ɓa zaɗ vóro huɗ nzoɓ tul puori.
40027008	Sa̰wke mini ze, kpṵru tḭi vuri key hɔy kara, i ɗi wáake na ɓa wáa sím.
40027009	Ɓe ze ha̰ ɓay ká Zeremi nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ká piɛɗke lew na ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ka ɓaa mii: «I ya̰a lari rɔm ká síŋ say ká leɗ Izarayɛlri ker mii, a máa híe nzoɓke na,
40027010	í fa̰a í ha̰ ɓay híeke wáa nzoɓ mbúo pa̰y na, munu ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ mì na.»
40027011	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗo pol Pilaɗ nzoɓ réke tul puo ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude. Lɛɛ, ka vbi ni mii: «Ɓo kḭ ze, mù ɓa mbay Ziɓri kɛ́lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓe kḭ ze mù ɓaa ku.»
40027012	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri i ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-e na, ka fɛrɛ nzaa-ri mgbuɗ ya.
40027013	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓayri riw bele ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-a key na wa̰a, mù la-laa kḭ zu lɛ?»
40027014	Roo lɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ ɓay mbḭw mini kara ha̰ ni ya, a ha̰ ɓayke ku na tuku nzoɓ réke tul puo na ha̰ ni kaw yer.
40027015	Ká ɓil mbiimbamri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele na, zaɗka nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy vi báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ réke tul puo tina nzoɓ mbḭw ká naa hul sal ká nzoɓri hii ɓay ɓe na ɓaŋguɔ munu munu ha ri.
40027016	Lɛɛ, ɓil namke ku na nzoɓ mbḭw munu, ká ɓay fe ɗáa ndaya ɓe ya̰a zaɗ kpol kpol na, naa hul sal; riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezu-Barabas.
40027017	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ vbi ruɔ nzoɓri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká ɗi na mii: «Nzoɓ ha̰a ze ì hii ɓay haŋa mì tina ni ha rì lɛ? Zezu-Barabas mase, Zezu ká i ɗi ni ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na lɛ?»
40027018	Ka vbi ri munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka kɔ nda̰w, ɓa fe ɗáa sere ze i pɔ̌ŋke Zezu nduo nduo-ɛ.
40027019	Ɓáy namri ká Pilaɗ kaw tul kariŋgaw kúŋ sal ɓay na, má̰y ɓe pie nzaa peɗ ha̰ ni mii: «Kɔkɔ ká mù ɗaa sùo-ɔ nduo ɓil ɓay leɗban ni key ká ɓay mbḭw kara mgba tul-e ya na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, suŋɛ na, mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓáy lɔm ɓay tul-e.»
40027020	Ro, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri i ɗaa ɓay nduo law ruɔ nzoɓri ɓa pola pola ɓay haŋa ri vbi nzoɓ réke tul puo na ha̰ ni ka tína Barabas ze ha ri, a í i Zezu.
40027021	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ réke tul puo na mbi ɓay a vbi ri rɔɓay mii: «Sakra nzoɓri ká siɗi key na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze ì hii ɓay haŋa mì tina ni ha rì lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay gbaw mii: «Barabas!»
40027022	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ vbi ri mii: «A ku wa̰a, Zezu ká i ɗi ni ɓa Krisi na, ha̰a ḭi ze mì ɗáa ziŋ ni lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele mii: «Ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ!»
40027023	Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ yḭ̀i a vbi ri mii: «Ka̰aya ḭi rɔɔ ka ɗaa lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i guu fe ɓáy nzaa-ri gǔrum mgba mgba ɓa siya mii: «Ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ!»
40027024	Zaɗka Pilaɗ kɔ ká kér ɓay ɓari kal tul-e pavbaɗ, a fe gúu ɓari kara se ɓa pola pola báyḭi lɛ, ka ya̰a mbii a sḭ̌ɛke nduo-ɛ ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri na a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay huɗ leɗban key na ka mgba tul-i ya, mì naa nduo-i ká ɗi. Ɓa ɓay ɓaarì kḭ ro zu.»
40027025	Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele ɓaa mii: «Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓay sím ɓe na, ka ɓo tul ɓuru ɓáy vu ɓururi.»
40027026	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ tina Barabas na ha ri; ka ha ri nda Zezu ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ raɗ raɗ nda̰w rɔɔ, a pɔŋ ni ha ri vǎa ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ ɓáy.
40027027	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵm Pilaɗri sùu Zezu í séke ni ɓil boro mbay nzoɓ réke tul puo, lɛ, kuɗu nzoɓ yṵmri riw bele na mbṵ kḭ í kiri ni.
40027028	I mgba ni í nan gari ɓeri a í nduo ni maagari mbay ká sḭ̀i ŋga̰w ŋga̰w.
40027029	Falɛ ku lɛ, i kaŋ ŋgatukru ɓa taguɓa mbay nda̰w rɔɔ, í mbi guɓa tul-e. I ɗaa ŋgasikri nduo ndúo hoɗo ɓe, a í huku siri ká pol-e í siɛ ni mii: «Soko woo, mbay Ziɓri!»
40027030	I sa̰-sa̰mi toɓ toɓ zuɔ nun-ɛ, a í ya̰a ŋgasikri na saa nduo-ɛ, í zɔ̌ɗke tul-e raɗ raɗ.
40027031	Zaɗka i siɛ ni kpṵru maa ri na báyḭi lɛ, i naa maagari mbay ká i nduo ni na, í yḭ̀i í nduo ni gari ɓeri nda̰w rɔɔ, í séke ni ɓay ɓér ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ.
40027032	Zaɗka i tḭi ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na báyḭi lɛ, i dar nzoɓ mbḭw munu gbukru ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simo̰n, nzoɓ ká Sirɛ̰n. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri i mgba ni í haa ni ya̰a puu say huɗ Zezu na a soɓ.
40027033	Lɛɛ, i tḭi zaɗ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Gɔlgota, má̰rake lɛ ɓaa mii, zaɗ tuŋguo tul.
40027034	Ká zaɗɛ ku ze, i ha̰ Zezu him ká i zukri ɓáy zóɗi ɓay haŋa ni ka nzɔ. Roo lɛ, zaɗka Zezu pṵu horoɓ a lie a kɔ lɛ, ka hii ɓay nzɔkɔ ya a pɔŋ.
40027035	Falɛ ká i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ na báyḭi lɛ, i fa̰a gari ɓeri í ɗaa dḭi dḭi rɔɔ í leke kḭ.
40027036	Lɛɛ, i kaw siri ká zaɗɛ ku a í kɔrɔ ni kɛk.
40027037	Rɔɓay, ká ɓay kíɛke ɓay huɗ ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-e na, i ɗaa mbeɗe í ɓer ɗo tul puu say huɗ ká siya mii: «Ɓe key na, ka ɓa Zezu, mbay Ziɓri.»
40027038	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓer dɔmbirimri siɗi ɗo lakun-ɛ. Nzoɓ mbini ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo hoɗo ɓe, a nzoɓ mbḭɛ laa lɛ, ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo gel ɓe.
40027039	Nzoɓri ká i kal ká zaɗɛ ku na, i raɗ ni í téke tul-ri ɓoko ɓoko
40027040	í ɓaa mii: «Ɓo ká mù hii gbúr hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a nam say hɔy lɛ, mù mbúo kḭ ɗo zaɗɛ na, zaɗka mù ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ lɛ, mu ya̰a sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ, a mú ɗì saa tul puu say huɗ na ku ha̰ ɓuru kɔ!»
40027041	Ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri, ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri kara, i siɛ ni faa mbḭw munu nda̰w mii:
40027042	«Ka ya̰a nzoɓ ha̰wri, roo lɛ, ka maa ɓay ya̰aŋa sùo-ɛ ɓe kḭ ya! Zaɗkaʼa ɓa mbay leɗ Izarayɛlri kḭ lɛ, ka ɗì saa tul puu say huɗ na timbɛɗɛ key ha̰ ɓuru kɔ! Ɓe ro lɛ, ɓuru ɗáa law ɓuru ɓo tul-e ɓáy!
40027043	Ɓe na ka ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Munu zu lɛ, nda-ndaɗ! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii ni lɛ, ka ya̰a ni ká tul puu say huɗ na ha̰ ɓuru kɔ! Wa̰a, ka ɓaa mii, ɓeri ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya lɛ woo?»
40027044	Báyḭi lɛ, dɔmbirimri ká i ɓer ri ɗo lakun-ɛ na kara, i raɗ ni faa mbḭw munu nda̰w pi.
40027045	Ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul na, fe guɓa nun síe ha̰ zaɗ ɗo gbukru kpṵru maa ɓáy síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ.
40027046	Maa ɓáy síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ɓay ɓáy bawda kusol-e ɓeleŋ mii: «Eli, Eli, Lema Sabatani,» ɓáy nzaa ɓay naari lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓi! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓi! Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù pɔŋ mì lɛ?»
40027047	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ká i laa kusol-e ká mgba ɓeleŋ na i ɓaa mii: «Ì kɔ ni káʼa ɗi Eli ku!»
40027048	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku na ɗuu a vǎa mbi vay gari ká nzɔ mbii nzɔ, a ɗoŋ mbii fe sṵ́uke zuɔ ɗi, a siŋ ɗo nzaa ŋgasikri, rɔɔ a zuɗa ha̰ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka nzɔ.
40027049	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰wri ɓaa mii: «Giyaŋ náa kɔ́ri! Eli na a ví ya̰aŋa ni lɛ, náa kɔ́kɔri ɓáy!»
40027050	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗaa fe ɓeleŋ ɓa kḭ, lɛ, law-ɛ ví tuo.
40027051	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, gari ká kuŋ ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na saka tǎr saa siya kpṵru mgba siri gbaa. Tusiri laŋ yik yik nda̰w, tisawri kara saka hɛŋlɛŋ hɛŋlɛŋ nda̰w,
40027052	tupalri kara mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy ndúo nduo ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ í hu na, i tḭi saa luɔ huɗ.
40027053	I zɔl saa tupal ɓari na, a fal tḭ́i Zezu saa luɔ huɗ na, i se Zuruzalɛm, ŋgɛrɛpuo ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi kɔ ri.
40027054	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm ɓáy nzoɓ yṵm ha̰wri ká i kɔrɔ Zezu na, i kɔ tusiri ká laŋ ɓáy feri riw bele ká tḭi munu na báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri í ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na, ka ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa tusuɛ!»
40027055	Má̰y ha̰nɛri ká i dii fal Zezu saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele lew ká í ɗaa peɗ ha̰ ni na, ì ɗo ɗi ɗi í kɔ feri ká kal na ɗeke.
40027056	Ká sakra ɓari ku na, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala ɗo ɗi nda̰w, Mari máa Zak ɓáy Zezeɓ nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy máa vu Zebederi nda̰w pi.
40027057	Zaɗka zaɗ ɓa láw na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ feziŋa mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezeɓ ká puo ɓe ɗo Arimate vi. Ɓe kara ka ɓa leɗ nduoɓal Zezu nda̰w.
40027058	Ɓe na, ka uru a se luo Pilaɗ a vbi ni huɗ Zezu na. Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri mbi huɗ Zezu na í ha̰ ni.
40027059	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezeɓ mbi huɗ na a kaa ɓáy gari fie ká ndaɗ ɓamba a taŋ kaɗ kaɗ,
40027060	a vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo huo tisaw fie káʼa kpɛrɛ ɓa taa ɓe Zezeɓ kḭ sùo-ɛ ɗo ɓa tá̰w na. Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a ha ri giri bawda maa tisaw, a mbǐike diɓ ɗo ɗi a zɔl.
40027061	Báyḭi lɛ, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala ɓáy Mari taa mbḭwke na, i kaw siri ká nzaa tupal na í kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa ɓaɗi.
40027062	Tḭi nzaaruo nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri, ɓáy Fariziri i se mbḭw hɔy luo Pilaɗ
40027063	í ɓaa mii: «Mbay, ɓuru ker se tul ɓay ká nzoɓ úla nzoɓri key ɓaa ɓáy káw ɓáy kumnun ɓe kɔɓ rɔɓay mii: ɓeri hu, ze ɓo ɗaa nam say lɛ, ɓeri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ ɓay kaw ɓáy kumnun.
40027064	Munu zu báyḭi lɛ, mu mbi nzaa-a ha̰ nzoɓ yṵmri kɔ́rɔ tupal na kɛkɛkɛ kpṵru mgba nam ndeke ɗi sayke ɓay haŋa leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri, i vi í rii huɗ ɓe na í vǎa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri mii: “Ka tḭi saa luɔ huɗ” na ya. Kúɗ ɓay ká mini key na, a kál taa pola ká mii, ɓeri ɓa nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi na pavbaɗ rɔɓay.»
40027065	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì kɔ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ zaɗri na ze i kaw ku. Ì ha ri se í vǎa kɔ́rɔ tupal na munu ká law-rì hii.»
40027066	Báyḭi lɛ, i se í vǎa rḭi nzaa huo tisaw na gbɛ̰rɛkɛŋ ɗo ɗi, í ɗaa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ zaɗri na kaw nzi-ɛ kɛkɛkɛ.
40028001	Ɓáy tiika nam dimasi ká fal nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala ɓáy Mari taa kḭ na, i se í vǎa piyɛŋ tupal na.
40028002	Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na tusiri laŋ yik yik, lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay vi saa nulue a giri bawda maa tisaw ká i rḭ́ike nzaa huo na ɓo fi mbḭw a kaw tul-e.
40028003	Ka ndṵy ndá̰w ndǎ̰w munu ɓa mbam ká siɛ, a gari ɓeri puu zeɗeɗe munu ká sa̰ri ha̰
40028004	nzoɓ yṵmri ká i kɔrɔ tupal ká í kɔ ni na, hḭɛ ɗaa ri í tɔ kpak kpak, í zuɔ siri raɗ munu ɓa nzoɓ huɗeri.
40028005	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue na mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ má̰yri na mii: «Ì ɗaa hḭɛ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì kɔ nda̰w, Zezu ká i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ na, ɓe ze ì nzaa ni key.
40028006	Ka ti zaɗ ni ya; ka tḭi saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy kumnun munu káʼa ɓaa ɓayke ha rì pola na. Ì vi í kɔ zaɗ ká i ɗaa ni ɓo ɗi na.
40028007	Ì se ɓa vaa í vǎa ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: “Zezu na tḭi saa luɔ huɗ. Ka se ɓay vǎa giyaŋ rì ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Ɓe ze ɓa zaɗ ká ì kɔ́kɔ ni ká ɗi.” Ɓe ze ɓa ɓay ká mì hii ɓay ɓáa ha rì zu.»
40028008	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri na i zɔl saa tupal ku na koɗ hɔy ɓáy nun hḭɛ nda̰w, ɓáy bawda suoriya nda̰w pi. I ɗuu í vǎa ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri na.
40028009	Lɛɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy Zezu suɔ nun-ri a ɓaa mii: «Soko ɓaarì woo!» Lɛɛ, i soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í huku siri í mgba ɓal-ɛ í ruo ni.
40028010	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ɗaa hḭɛ ya! Ì se í vǎa ɓaa ha̰ yṵ-iri ha ri se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Zaɗɛ ku ze í kɔ́kɔ mì ká ɗi.»
40028011	Zaɗka má̰yri na i se faa kɔɓ rɔɓay na, nzoɓ yṵm ha̰nɛri ká sakra nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ tupalri na i se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo í vǎa kḭi fal feri ká kal na riw bele ha̰ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri.
40028012	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri laa munu na báyḭi lɛ, i mbṵ kḭ ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri, a i leke ɓay zuɔ ɓil kḭ riw bele, ro i fa̰a lari wuruk wuruk ha̰ nzoɓ yṵmri na í ɓaa ha ri mii:
40028013	«Ì ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri mii: “Suŋɛ ká ɓuru na-nam ɓáy ze, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri ví rii huɗ ɓe na serere í zɔ̌lke!”
40028014	A zaɗka nzoɓ réke tul puo laa ɓayke lɛ, ɓuru kḭ ɓuru léke law-ɛ, ɓay náake ɓay ká tul-rì ɓáy.»
40028015	Zaɗka nzoɓ yṵmri na ya̰a lari na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa faa mbḭw munu ká i kǐɛke ri. Ɓe ze ha̰ ɓayke na yǎ̰ake zaɗ kpol kpol ká sakra Ziɓri kpṵru tḭi vuri.
40028016	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ mbḭw na, i zɔl í se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele ká tul mbɔrɔ ká Zezu ɓaa ɓayke pola ha ri.
40028017	Zaɗka i kɔ ni na báyḭi lɛ, i huku pol-e í ruo ni. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ma̰y ɓay ká tul-e rɔɓay.
40028018	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu soro ɓa lakun-ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ mì hṵrusuo ká tul feri riw bele, ká nulue nda̰w, ká tusiri key nda̰w pi.
40028019	Munu zu lɛ, ì se ɓáy sa̰w puo nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele, a í ɗaa ha ri vi ɓa leɗ nduoɓal-iri, ɓo í ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Bǎa nda̰w, riŋ Leɗ nda̰w, rɔɔ riŋ Tem Law Pie nda̰w,
40028020	a í fére ri ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul feri riw bele ká mì fere rì na. A lɛ, ɓi na, mì sáɗ ziŋ rì ɓáy namri riw bele kpṵru maa ɓáy ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ká tusiri key.»
41001001	Tiika Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu Krisi, Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ze ɗo key:
41001002	Ká piɛɗke lew ká ɓil mbeɗe Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ha̰ Zezu Krisi mii: «Mu kɔ key! Ɓi na, mì píe leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓi ha̰ ni se pol-a ɓay léke faa ɓo.
41001003	Ì láa kusol nzoɓ mgba ɓeleŋ ká ɓil law kɔr mii: Ì léke faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy kere! Ì léke ha̰ ni ka ɗo sikɗa kparak kparak!»
41001004	Báyḭi lɛ, Za̰a se ɓil law kɔr a ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii, a ka-káa ha̰ nzoɓri mii: «Ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì, ɓo í ɗaa tul-rì nduo mbii, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a ɓaarì ziŋ rì.»
41001005	Nzoɓri ká ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm ɓáy nzoɓ vu puo ha̰wri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude riw bele na, i se luo-ɛ. Zaɗka i se í vǎa naa nzaa-ri ká tul feya̰a ɓari na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii Zurdɛ̰.
41001006	Za̰a na nduo gari ká i kaŋ ɓáy sṵy zambal, a siŋ ɓil-e ɓáy sal ɓil huɔ. Tazala ɓáy num zoro ká ɓisuy ze ɓa fe sṵm ɓe.
41001007	Ka ka-káa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri a ɓaa mii: «Nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-i vuku na hṵrusuo-ɛ kal tul-i pavbaɗ. Mì maa húku siri ɓay hina sal dikɔn ɓe ya.
41001008	Ɓi na, mbii ze mì ɗaa tul-rì nduo ɗi, roo lɛ, ɓe na a ɗáa rì nduo ɓil Tem Law Pie.»
41001009	Ɓil sewke ku na, Zezu uru saa puo ká Nazarɛɗ, kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Lɛɛ, Za̰a ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii Zurdɛ̰.
41001010	Zaɗka Zezu tḭi saa mbii na báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy ka kɔ nulue mgbuɗa gbɛrɛrɛ ɗo hɔy, lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɗì zà̰a munu ká bɛɗɛ pie ɗì a ví kaw tul-e kɔkrɔ.
41001011	Lɛɛ, ka laa kusol nzoɓ mgba ɓeleŋ ká nulue mii: «Mù ɓa vu-i; mì kɔ mù ɓa nzoɓ nun-i. Ɓa ɓo na ze sùo-i rii mì ɓamba ká tul-a.»
41001012	Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy Tem Law Pie ha̰ Zezu se ɓil law kɔr
41001013	a kaw ɗi nam síŋ niŋ, lɛ, Satan vǎa lie law-ɛ ká ɗi. Ka kaw sakra nay ɓisuyri, lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ví tina fe sṵm ha̰ ni sṵ.
41001014	Ká ɓil sewke ku na i mgba Za̰a ɓo hul sal. Falɛ na ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele a ka-káa Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗi
41001015	a ɓaa mii: «Nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tuu na vi ro. Sa̰w síe káʼa ví réke mbay ká tul nzoɓri na tɔ̀ŋ ɗi mbǎa ro! Ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì í ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
41001016	Báyḭi lɛ, ka se nzaa kporo maambii ká Galele. Lɛɛ, ka kɔ Simo̰n ɓáy yṵ-ɛ Andere ká i ɓa nzoɓ súo mbii, i ɗo vbuka basaŋ ɓari ɓo mbii ɓay súo.
41001017	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se fal-i, lɛ, mì haŋa rì vi ɓa nzoɓ nzáa nzoɓri laa ro.»
41001018	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, i pɔŋ basaŋ ɓari na, a í se fal Zezu.
41001019	Zaɗka Zezu se ndḭi ɓa pola na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ Zak vu Zebede, ɓáy yṵ-ɛ Za̰a ká i kaw ɓil tuo ɓari í ɗo léke nun basaŋ ɓari.
41001020	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, ka ɗi ri. Lɛɛ, i pɔŋ bǎa ɓari Zebede ɓáy nzoɓ peɗ ɓariri kaw ɓil tuo na a í se fal Zezu.
41001021	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i uru í se ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Kapɛrnayum. Ká ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri na, Zezu se a nduo ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri, a tii sa̰w fére nzoɓri fe.
41001022	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri ká i laa ɓay ɓe na, tuku ri ha ri kaw silili ɓay tul gosi fe fére ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka fere ri fe ɓáy hṵrusuo ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo, ka fere ri fe munu ká nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri na ku ya.
41001023	Ká zaɗɛ ku ká Zezu ɗo fére fe na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká temndaya ɗo tul-e tḭi tul-ri ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari na a ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ mii:
41001024	«Ɓo Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ, ɓay ḭi kḭ gbaɗ rɔɔ, mù nzáake fal ɓuru mini key lɛ? Wa̰a, mù vi ɓay ɓíɛ ɓuru lɛ woo? Mù ɓa ve lɛ na, mì kɔ ta-taŋ: mù ɓa nzoɓ ká mù taŋ kaɗaŋ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie mù vi!»
41001025	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭw temndaya na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu mgba nzaa-a ɗo ɗi; mú tḭi ká tul leɗban na key!»
41001026	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, temndaya mgba nzoɓ na, a laŋ ni yik yik, a guu fe ɓeleŋ, rɔɔ a tḭi ká tul-e.
41001027	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ku na, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl ha ri vbi ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Ha̰a ḭi zu lɛ? Ɓa fe fére fie ɓáy hṵrusuo kɛ́lɛ? Leɗban key na, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ temndayari hɔy kara, i hḭɛ ni mgbum ya!»
41001028	Feke ku na ɗaa ha̰ riŋ Zezu mgba ya̰a zaɗ kpol kpol ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele riw bele.
41001029	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tḭi saa hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, i se ɓil hul Simo̰n ɓáy Andere. Lɛɛ, Zak ɓáy Za̰a su ri.
41001030	Zaɗka i rìi hula na, nzoɓri ɓaa ɓay máa fay Simo̰n ha̰ ni, ɓay ḭi lɛ, sùo-ɛ zaŋ biɗ biɗ ha̰ ni naa siri.
41001031	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu soro ɓa lakun má̰y na, a mgba nduo-ɛ a ura ni ha̰ ni kaw siya. Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, sùo zaŋa ɓe na pɔŋ ni, lɛ, má̰y na ha̰ fe sṵm ha̰ Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri.
41001032	Zaɗka síe riŋ ha̰ zaɗ ɗo pira pira báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri fa̰a nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri riw bele ɓáy ɓari ká temndayari ɗo tul-ri na, a í séke ri ha̰ Zezu.
41001033	Nzoɓri ká ŋgɛrɛpuoke riw bele mbṵ kḭ ɓa faa hul ɓari na.
41001034	Lɛɛ, Zezu vaa nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká kḭri sɛm ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na. Ka nii temndayari ŋgḭi ɓamba nda̰w, a haa ri faa ɓáa ɓay, ɓay ḭi lɛ, temndayari na kɔ ni kɔ.
41001035	Tiɓie piɛɗ, ká nzaaruo sil ɔ ya ɓáy hɔy lɛ, Zezu uru a tḭi saa hula a se ɓa zaɗ ká ɗo ɓisuy kɔlɔk a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɗi.
41001036	Lɛɛ, Simo̰n ɓáy nzoɓ buɔ-ɛri i vǎa nzaara ni kpṵru kpṵru.
41001037	Zaɗka i ziŋ ni báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nzoɓri riw bele i nzaara mù.»
41001038	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Náa séri zaɗ kḭ ɓa vu puori ká ɗo lakun naari. Ɗo nun haŋa mì vǎa ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká ɗi; sa̰wke mini ze mì víke.»
41001039	Ɓe ze, ka se puo ɓáy puo ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele riw bele, a ka-káa ɓay ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ká ɗi, a nii temndayari nda̰w.
41001040	Nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká kpḭri ɗo sùo-ɛ vi luo Zezu a huku siri a koɗ ni mii: «Zaɗka mù hii lɛ, mù maa ɓay haŋa sùo-i key na ka duo mgbereŋ.»
41001041	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ nun síe ɓe a ndaɗa nduo-ɛ a zaa ni a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì hi-hii! Sùo-ɔ na, ka duo mgbereŋ ha̰ mù.»
41001042	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, kpḭri na ɔ ha̰ sùo-ɛ ɗo ɓáy kere.
41001043	Lɛɛ, pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ni zɔl na, Zezu ɓaa ɓay ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ziŋ ni mii:
41001044	«Kɔkɔ ká mu ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ! Roo lɛ, mu se mú vǎa kíɛ sùo-ɔ ha̰ nzoɓ fe poy Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka kɔ. Falɛ ku ro lɛ, fe poy ká bol kusol Moyze mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi ha̰ nzoɓri ká kpḭri ɗo sùo-ri ká i vaa lɛ i puo na, mu puo. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, a kíɛ nzoɓri riw bele ha ri kɔ mii, sùo-ɔ na vaa ɓáy kere kaɗ kaɗ ɓáy.»
41001045	Roo lɛ, leɗban na zɔl a vǎa kḭi ɓay feri ká kal na ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ha̰ ɓayke ya̰a zaɗ kpol kpol. Sa̰wke mini ze, Zezu ziŋ faa ká ɓay séke ŋgɛrɛpuori na mbǎa; ro a kaw nzaa zaɗ ŋgereŋ. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, nzoɓri tḭi ɓáy zaɗri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ í vi luo-ɛ.
41002001	Namri kal ká falɛ ku ndḭi rɔɔ, Zezu yḭ̀i a se Kapɛrnayum na ɓáy. Lɛɛ, zaɗka nzoɓri laa mii ka ɗo puɔ na báyḭi lɛ,
41002002	ruɔ nzoɓri mbṵ kḭ ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ká luo-ɛ ha̰ zaɗ tɔkɔ ɓal ká faa hul ká kɛlɛ kara tiya. Lɛɛ, Zezu ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha ri.
41002003	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri i víke ɓáy nzoɓ mbḭw ká sùo-ɛ hu wǔɔ luo Zezu; wa̰rari ɓa niŋ ze i soɓ ni.
41002004	Zaɗka i tḭi luo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, i ziŋ faa ká ɓay séke ɓáy nzoɓ suosɛrɛm na ha̰ ni ya ɓay tul ruɔ nzoɓri. Ze í hil tul hul ká siya í vuo maa ɓáy zaɗ káw Zezu. Ɓáy faa ká i vuo na, i ɗǐrake nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ hu wǔɔ na ɓáy híi ɓe za̰a ɓo pol Zezu.
41002005	Zaɗka Zezu kɔ law-ri ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-e na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ hu wǔɔ na mii: «Vu-i, feya̰a ɓori na mì nda bumake ziŋ mù ro.»
41002006	Nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol ha̰nɛri ká i kaw zaɗɛ nda̰w na, zaɗka i laa ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa na báyḭi lɛ, i ker ɓay ká ɓil law-ri mii:
41002007	«Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, leɗban key na ɓaa ɓay munu a tḭ̌irike riŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ woo? Nzoɓ ve ze maa ɓay ndáka buma tul feya̰a nzoɓri lɛ? Ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru huo-ɛ hɔy ya lɛ woo!»
41002008	Zaɗka i ɗo kér ɓayke munu hɔy lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na Zezu kɔ kér ɓay ɓari a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ kér ɓay ká mini key na ɗo ɓil law-rì lɛ?
41002009	Ɓay ha̰a ze ɓáake sɛ ya ɓay ɓáa ha̰ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ hu wǔɔ na lɛ? “Mì nda buma feya̰a ɓori na ziŋ mù,” mase, “Úru siya mú mbi híi ɓo mú se-seɗ” lɛ?
41002010	Roo lɛ, mì hii ɓay haŋa rì kɔ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ká tusiri key ɓay ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a nzoɓri!»
41002011	Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ hu wǔɔ na mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù, úru siya mú mbi hii ɓo a mú se puɔ!»
41002012	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, leɗban na uru siya, a mbi hii ɓe, a zɔl ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri. Zɔ́li ɓe na tuku nzoɓri riw bele ha ri pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru í ɓaa mii: «Fe ká ɗo mini key na, ɓuru kɔ ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ!»
41002013	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i ɓa kḭ a se nzaa kporombii ká Galele. Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri vi luo-ɛ, a lɛ, ka fere ri fe.
41002014	Kali ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ Levi ká ɓa vu Alfe kaw hul ya̰aŋa larimbuo. Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se fal-i!» Báyḭi lɛ, Levi na uru siya a se fal-ɛ.
41002015	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu se hul Levi a kaw nzaa fe sṵm ziŋ ni. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ɓáy nzoɓri ká soro ɓay ɓari mgba ndaya ká Fariziri ɗi ri ɓa nzoɓ feya̰ari na, i ŋgḭi ɓamba kaw nzaa fe sṵm ziŋ Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i se fal Zezu ŋgḭi ɓamba na, ruɔkeri ɓa kḭri nzoɓri ká mini key.
41002016	Zaɗka nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká i ɓa Fariziri na, i kɔ Zezu kaw nzaa fe sṵm ziŋ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ɓáy nzoɓri ká Fariziri ɗi ri ɓa nzoɓ feya̰ari na báyḭi lɛ, i vbi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ka sṵ fe ziŋ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuori ɓáy nzoɓri ká soro ɓay ɓari mgba ndaya mini key lɛ?»
41002017	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu laa ɓay ɓari na a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓri ká sùo-ri ɗo ɓáy kere ɓáy na, i se síe nzoɓ haŋa sa̰wpuu váa nzoɓ ya. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri ze se síe nzoɓ haŋa sa̰wpuu. Mì vi ɓay ɗika nzoɓri ká i ker mii, ɓari ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa fe ɓáy zaɗɛri na ya, roo lɛ, mì vi ɓay tul nzoɓri ká i kɔ sùo-ri ɓa nzoɓ feya̰ari.»
41002018	Ká sewke ku na, leɗ nduoɓal Za̰a Batisri ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal Fariziri i saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ví vbi Zezu ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, leɗ nduoɓal Za̰ari ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal Fariziri saŋ sùo-ri, a pɔŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ari mǎa i ɗaa munu ya lɛ?»
41002019	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Nam ká nzoɓ ya̰a má̰y fie na, zaɗka nzoɓ má̰y fie na ɗo ziŋ ri kɔɓ ɓáy lɛ, nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri vi zaɗ suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ na, i sáŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya mina lɛ? Munu ya mgbaŋ! Zaɗka nzoɓ má̰y fie ɗo ziŋ ri kɔɓ rɔɓay na, i ti sáŋ sùo-ri ya.
41002020	Roo lɛ, namri káʼa ví vuku na, i náa nzoɓ má̰y fie ká sakra ɓari; namke na ku nda̰w rɔɔ, i sáŋ sùo-ri ɓáy.
41002021	«Nzoɓ mbḭw ti kúŋ gari fie a sa̰a ɗo tul tá̰w gari ya. Zaɗka nzoɓ ɗaa munu lɛ, nzaa gari fieke na, a haŋa tá̰w gari na gɔɗɔ tir tir ha̰ gɔ́ɗɔ garike ku na mba taa pola ku rɔɓay.
41002022	Rɔɓay nzoɓ mbḭw ti áŋ him fie zuɔ tá̰w ɓɔl huɔri ya. Zaɗka nzoɓ ɗaa munu lɛ, him na a lóŋ a fuo ɓɔl huɔri na, ha̰ him nda̰w, ɓɔl nda̰w na ɓa fe ká ɓiɛ siɗi bele. Munu zu lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay áŋ him fie zuɔ ɓɔl huɔ fieri.»
41002023	Nam mbḭw munu ká ɓa nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri na, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i saka ɓáy ɓil wáa fe payri. Lɛɛ, ɓáy seɗ ɓari ku na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tii sa̰w háw tul fe pay na ɓay sṵŋa.
41002024	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri kɔ munu ro í vbi Zezu mii: «Mu kɔ, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ leɗ nduoɓal-ari ɗaa fe ká bol kusol naari haa faa ɗáake ká síe nam mgbaka ta̰ram na lɛ?»
41002025	-
41002026	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì kḭi mbeɗe ká ɓaa ɓay se tul fe ɗáa Daviɗ ɓáy nam ká zaɗ ŋgɔŋ ziŋ ni na ya wṵ̌m kḭ lɛ woo? Zaɗka kɔn i Daviɗ ɓáy nzoɓ ɓeri na, ka se ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗaa ɓáy huɔ, a fa̰a maapari ká i ha̰ ɓa fe tunduo ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nzoɓ fe poyri huo-ri hɔy ze maa ɓay sṵŋa na a sṵ a ha̰ nzoɓ ɓeri na sṵ ziŋ ni nda̰w. Sewke ku na Abiyatar ze ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye.»
41002027	Zezu ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa nam mgbaka ta̰ram ɓo ɓay tul nzoɓri, ɓo nzoɓ ɗo ɓay tul nam mgbaka ta̰ram ya.
41002028	Munu zu lɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, nam mgbaka ta̰ram kara mì ɓa mbayke.»
41003001	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a se ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ɓa kḭ rɔɓay. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɗi ku na nduo-ɛ hu wǔɔ.
41003002	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ku na i ŋga̰a Zezu zii ɓay kɔ́kɔ wa̰a, káʼa váa leɗban na ká síe nam mgbaka ta̰ram na lɛ? I kɔ ni munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i nzaa faa ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-e.
41003003	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ká nduo-ɛ hu wǔɔ na mii: «Úru siya mú vi ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri ku riw bele.»
41003004	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka vbi ɓari ká i kɔ ni na mii: «Bol kusol naari na ɓaa mina lɛ? Ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa fe kere mase ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa ndaya ze ká síe nam mgbaka ta̰ram na lɛ? Ndaɗ ɓay ya̰aŋa nzoɓ mase ndaɗ ɓay pɔ́ŋ nzoɓ ha̰ ni hu lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i hii ɓay fɛ́rɛ nzi-ɛ ya.
41003005	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ-kɔ́m rie falɛ gbuk ɓáy law fa̰a. Law-ɛ kara sɛ ni mgbuk mgbuk ɓay tul law-ri ká ŋgɔŋ na. Ze a ɓaa ha̰ leɗban na mii: «Ndáɗa nduo-ɔ!» Lɛɛ, leɗban na ndaɗa nduo-ɛ na, lɛ, nduo-ɛ na vaa ɓáy kere.
41003006	Zaɗka Fariziri kɔ Zezu ká vaa leɗban na ku báyḭi lɛ, i tḭi saa ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ í vǎa ziŋ Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i zuɔ fal Mbay Eroɗ, a í nzaa faa ɓay ika Zezu.
41003007	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i naa sùo-ri ká zaɗɛ ku í se ɓa nzaa kporombii ká Galele. Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i se fal-ɛ. I uru saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele nda̰w, kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude nda̰w,
41003008	ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm nda̰w, tusiri Idume nda̰w, tusiri ká nzaa mbii Zurdɛ̰ fi kɛlu nda̰w, rɔɔ zaɗ ká ɗo maa ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo Tir ɓáy Sido̰n nda̰w na; i vi luo-ɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i laa ɓay soro feri riw bele ká Zezu ɗaa na.
41003009	Munu ká nzoɓri ruɔ ŋgḭi ɓamba na, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓay haŋa ri mgba tuo í siŋ ɗo fi mbḭw ha̰ ni, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri i tɔ́ɗ ni ya.
41003010	Tusuɛke lɛ, munu káʼa vaa nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri ŋgḭi ɓamba na, nzoɓri riw bele ká sɛm ɗaa nun-ri tuɔ síe na, i takra í tɔɗ fal ɓal kḭ mbɔ̌r mbɔ̌r ɓa luo-ɛ ɓay záa sùo-ɛ.
41003011	A zaɗka temndayari kɔ ni na báyḭi lɛ, i ví naa pol-e gbǎ̰y í ɗaa fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ mii: «Mù ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!»
41003012	Roo lɛ, Zezu baka ri ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓay haŋa ri ɓaa ɓay ɓe ha̰ nzoɓri tuu ni ya.
41003013	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu se a hil tul kuo a kaw ɗi, rɔɔ a ɗi nzoɓri ká law-ɛ hii, lɛ, i vi luo-ɛ.
41003014	Ka nan ri ɓa duɔ falɛ siɗi ká sakra ɓari ku a ɗi ri ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓay haŋa ri ɗo ziŋ ni nda̰w, ɓay píe ri ha ri ka-káa Ɓay Kere,
41003015	a ha ri hṵrusuo ká ɓay níike temndayari nda̰w pi.
41003016	Nzoɓri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi káʼa nan ri na ze ɗo key: Simo̰n (ɓe ká Zezu ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr),
41003017	Zak ɓáy yṵ-ɛ Za̰a ká i ɓa vu Zebede (ká Zezu tuu riŋ ha ri ɓa Buanɛze, sa̰wke ɓaa mii, i ɗo munu ɓa mbam ká yḭw),
41003018	Andere nda̰w, Filiɓ nda̰w, Batelemi nda̰w, Matiye nda̰w, Toma nda̰w, Zak vu Alfe nda̰w, Tade nda̰w, Simo̰n ká hii nzoɓ ɓeri a ru-ruy ɓay tul-ri nda̰w,
41003019	rɔɔ Zudas Iskariyoɗ, ɓe káʼa mbika tul Zezu nda̰w pi.
41003020	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i ɗi saa tul kuo í se hula. Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri mbṵ kḭ ŋgḭi ɓamba mɛr mɛr ha ri ziŋ faa sṵŋa fe ya.
41003021	Zaɗka nzoɓ ini Zezuri laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, i mbi faa í se ɓay vǎa su Zezu ɓay zɔ́lke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ker í ɓaa mii: «Tul-e fɛ-fɛrɛ.»
41003022	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká i uru saa Zuruzalɛm í vi zaɗɛ na i ɓaa mii: «Bɛlzebul ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛtemndaya ɗo tul-e! Ɓa mbay tul temndayari na ze ha̰ ni hṵrusuo ɓay haŋa ni níike temndayakeri na ku.»
41003023	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi ri a ɓaa ɓay ɓáy faa law ɓay ha ri mii: «Wa̰a, Satan a ɗaa mina a nii Satan lɛ?
41003024	Zaɗka puoruo mbḭw, rɔɔ nzoɓkeri te ɓil kḭ lɛ, puoruoke ku na ti séke seɗ ya.
41003025	A zaɗka nzoɓ iniri te ɓil kḭ sùo-ri lɛ, i ɓíɛ kḭ.
41003026	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, zaɗka Satan ruu ziŋ sùo-ɛ sùo-ɛ, rɔɔ téke ɓil kḭ ɗo puoruo ɓe na lɛ, hṵrusuo-ɛ ti tiika ya ha̰ puoruo ɓe na gbṵ.
41003027	«Ì kɔ, nzoɓ mbḭw maa ɓay ríi hul nzoɓ hṵrusuo ɓay fá̰a fe ɓeri ya, roo lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay síŋ ni pola nda̰w rɔɔ, a fa̰a feri ká ɓil hul ɓe na ɓáy.
41003028	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: feya̰a nzoɓri riw bele ɓáy tḭ́iri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele ká nzoɓri ɗaa na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a máa ndáka bumake ziŋ ri.
41003029	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká tḭiri Tem Law Pie na, ka ti ndáka bumake ziŋ ni ya mgbaŋ. Ɓay feya̰a ɓe na ɗo tul-e ɓaŋguɔ.»
41003030	Zezu ɓaa ɓay key mini ha ri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓaa mii: «Temndaya ɗo tul-e.»
41003031	Báyḭi lɛ, máa Zezu ɓáy yṵ-ɛri i ví ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ, í pie nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni vǎa ɗi Zezu ká hula ha ri.
41003032	Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri kaw sa̰w ɓal Zezu í kiri ni gbuk a í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu laa key! Máa-ŋa ɓáy yṵ-ɔri i ɗo kɛlu í vbi ɓay ɓo ɓay kɔ́kɔ mù.»
41003033	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ve ze ɓa máa, mase nzoɓ veri ze i ɓa yṵ-iri lɛ?»
41003034	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa tul ruɔ nzoɓri ká i kiri ni gbuk na a ɓaa mii: «Ì kɔ! Máa ɓáy yṵ-iri na ze ɗo key.
41003035	Nzoɓ ká ɗaa law hiiya Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ɓa yṵ-i, mase tinǎa, mase máa.»
41004001	Zezu tii sa̰w fére nzoɓri fe ɓa kḭ rɔɓay ká nzaa maambii ká Galele. Ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba mbṵ kḭ mɛr mɛr í kiri ni ha̰ ni hil a kaw ɓil tuo ká tul maambii, a pɔŋ ruɔ nzoɓkeri riw bele kaw siri ká nzaa maambii na.
41004002	Ka fere ri feri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓáy faa law ɓayri mii:
41004003	«Te suku-rì í laa key! Nzoɓ pay mbḭw munu tḭi a se wáa ɓe ɓay mii pa̰ra fe pay.
41004004	Zaɗkaʼa ɗo míi pa̰ra fe pay na báyḭi lɛ, pa̰rɛ ha̰nɛri toɗ kporoŋ kporoŋ zuɔ lafaa. Lɛɛ, nduyri vi í re.
41004005	A pa̰rɛ ha̰nɛri laa lɛ, ga̰y zuɔ tul tisaw ká siri laa tul-e ndḭi munu hɔy. Lɛɛ, fe paykeri na uru vbuɓuɓu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, siri laa tul tisawke na laa hɔy.
41004006	A zaɗka síe zaŋ báyḭi lɛ, ví nzuŋ vay fe paykeri na ha̰ ni huɔ wǔɔ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, sa̰w-ɛ ɓar siri ŋgḭi ya.
41004007	A pa̰rɛ ha̰nɛri ga̰y zuɔ ɓil ŋgatukruri nda̰w, lɛ, ŋgatukruri na uru a kpaŋ tul fe paykeri na ha ri lie mbḭw ya.
41004008	Roo lɛ, pa̰rɛ ha̰nɛri ga̰y zuɔ tusiri kere, lɛ, fe paykeri na tḭi ɓáy kere a gaŋ a lie ɓáy kere. Ha̰nɛri ɗaa pa̰ra ɓa síŋ say, ha̰wri ɗaa pa̰ra ɓa síŋ yie, a ɓil-eri laa lɛ, ɗaa pa̰ra ɓa ike mbḭw.»
41004009	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy suku ɓay láake lɛ, ka laa.»
41004010	Zaɗka Zezu naa sùo-ɛ ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗo lakun-ɛ ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na, í vbi ni ɓay haŋa ni ka tína sa̰w law ɓayri na ha ri laa.
41004011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na, fe ká ɗo zaɗ muni ká se tul faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru réke mbay ká tul nzoɓri na ka ha rì kɔ. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰wri na, i laa ɓayke ɓáy faa law ɓayri kḭ hɔy,
41004012	ɓay haŋa ɓo, “I kɔ ɓáy nun-ri kḭ, roo lɛ, i kɔ ɓa ɓaɗi munu hɔy; I laa ɓayke ɓáy suku-ri kḭ, roo lɛ, i kɔ sa̰wke ya. Zaɗka i laa ɓayke ɓáy kere lɛ, i súo ker ɓay ɓari í vi luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni nda buma ká tul feya̰a ɓari na!”»
41004013	Falɛ lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì laa sa̰w law ɓay na key ya wṵ̌m lɛ woo? A wa̰a, ì ɗáa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay láa sa̰w law ɓay ha̰wri riw bele lɛ?
41004014	Nzoɓ mii pa̰ra fe pay na ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
41004015	A nzoɓ ha̰nɛri laa lɛ, i ɗo munu ɓa lafaa ká pa̰ra fe pay ga̰y zuɔ ɗi. Zaɗka i laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, Satan vi koɗ hɔy a naa ɓay na ká i ru ɗo ɓil law-ri na hɔ̰́n ɓa fal.
41004016	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɗo munu ɓa tul tisaw ká pa̰ra fe pay ga̰y zuɔ ɗi, lɛ, sa̰w-ɛ ɓar siri ya. Ɓari na, zaɗka i laa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i ya̰a koɗ hɔy ɓáy suoriya.
41004017	Lɛɛ, i ha̰ Ɓayke na ɓar sa̰w ká ɓil law-ri ya; i ɗo tul Ɓayke na bole ɗi ndḭi hɔy. Zaɗka fe sɛkɛ, mase fe ɗáa nun tuɔ síe tḭi tul-ri ɓay tul Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na lɛ, i pɔŋ mbika law-ri na yak.
41004018	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri rɔɓay, i ɗo munu ɓa pa̰ra fe pay ká ga̰y zuɔ ɓil ŋgatukruri. Nzoɓkeri ku na, i laa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na kḭ,
41004019	roo lɛ, ker ɓay feri ká tusiri key, mase kɔn feziŋari ká ula ri, mase kɔn feri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká ɗo ɓil law-ri na, kpaŋ Ɓayke na ha̰ pa̰rɛ mbḭw tiya.
41004020	A nzoɓ ɓil-eri laa lɛ, i ɗo munu ɓa pa̰ra fe pay ká ga̰y zuɔ tusiri kere. Ɓa nzoɓri ká i laa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru í ya̰a ɓo law-ri, a í lie lereke ɗo ɗi. Lereke ha̰nɛri ɓa síŋ say, ha̰wri ɓa síŋ yie, a ɓil-eri laa lɛ, ɓa ike mbḭw.»
41004021	Falɛ lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Wa̰a, nzoɓ a mbika huu ndele a ɗaa sìi rɔɔ, a ɗaa tuŋguo guɓa ɗi, mase a ɗaa sìi sa̰w ŋgɔŋ ɗokro lɛ? Úwaa, munu ya! Wa̰a, ndaɗ ɓay ɗaa sìi tutakra ya lɛ woo?
41004022	Tusuɛke lɛ, feri riw bele ká ɗo lanzɔŋ na, namke vi lɛ, a tḭ́i ɗo zaɗ hie gbay gbay ká nun nzoɓri. A feri riw bele ká ɗo zaɗ muni kara, feke na a tḭ́i ɗo kɛlɛ gbay gbay ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ.
41004023	Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy suku láa ɓay lɛ, ka laa.»
41004024	Ka ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii: «Ɓay ká ì laa na, ì kɔ ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Faa mbḭw munu ká ì lie fe ha nzoɓri na, ɓe nda̰w ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a líeke fe ha rì; ze fe kḭ kara a ɗáa nde ɗi ha rì rɔɓay.
41004025	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy fe na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ni kḭ nde tul-e. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗǒke ya na, ha̰y ká ndḭi káʼa ɗǒke na kara, kaʼa náa ɗɔɗ a pɔŋ ni.»
41004026	Zezu ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii: «Réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓri na ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ ká ru mḭiri ká ɓil wáa.
41004027	Zaɗka rúkake ɔ báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓke zɔl a se puɔ. Suŋ ɓáy ɓisie, ze ka na-nam mase ka kaw siya nzokɗo hɔy kara, fe pay na tḭi a ŋgɔŋ ha̰ nzoɓ wáa na kɔ ŋgɔ́ŋke ya wṵ̌m.
41004028	Tusiri na uru fe pay sùo-ɛ. Titire lɛ, fe pay na ɗaa vay; falɛ lɛ, ka ɗaa tul; rɔɔ a hṵu ɓáy kere.
41004029	Zaɗka fe pay na ŋgɔŋ báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓke na vi ɓáy mii a vbieke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, few vbíe fe pay na vi ro.»
41004030	Zezu ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: «Fe ḭi rɔɔ náa mgbakari ɓay líeke réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key na lɛ? Mase ɓáy faa law ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, náa ɗáari ha ri láake ɓay ká se tul-e na lɛ?
41004031	Réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɗo munu ɓa pa̰ra túŋ. Ká sakra mḭiriri riw bele ká tusiri key na, pa̰rake na ŋgɔɓ ya kakalke,
41004032	roo lɛ, zaɗka i mii ni na, ka tḭi a ví ŋgɔɓ mbaa fe pay ha̰wri riw bele. Nzaa tɔykeri na ŋgɔɓ ɓamba ha̰ nduyri maa kaw temke í ɗaa kpaŋ ɓari ɗo ɗi.»
41004033	Ɓe mini ze, Zezu fere ri Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy faa kḭri law ɓayri ká mini key ŋgḭi ɓamba ha̰ nzoɓri, maa ɓáy zaɗ hṵrusuo-ri ká ɓay haŋa ri láake ɓaykeri na.
41004034	Ɓay káʼa ɓaa ha ri taŋ mbika law ɓay ya na, tiya, roo lɛ, zaɗka ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri huo-ri hɔy i kaw na, ka tina sa̰w ɓaykeri riw bele ha ri laa.
41004035	Namke ku ká ɓa láw na, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Náa séri ɓa nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu.»
41004036	Lɛɛ, i pɔŋ ruɔ nzoɓri kaw zaɗɛ ku, í kaw ɓil tuo ká Zezu kaw ɗi a í se ziŋ ni. Bawda tuo ha̰nɛri ɗo lakun-ɛ taa ɓe nda̰w.
41004037	Báyḭi lɛ, zuu bura uru bivbiɗ a tii sa̰w kúuka ha̰ mbii nda tuo paw pǎw a kal a mbaa ɓil tuo na.
41004038	Roo lɛ, Zezu ɗaa fe geɗe tul-e a na-nam ká tigba̰a tuo na. Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tuma ni í gúuke fe ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, huɗ káʼa ika naari key na wa̰a, mù kɔ ɓa fe ya lɛ woo?»
41004039	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu uru saa tul nam a ɓaa ɓay ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ziŋ zuu ɓáy mbii na mii: «Pɔŋ! Mgba nzaa-a!» Lɛɛ, nzaa zuu na kuŋ nzɛɗ ha̰ zaɗ ɗo ndiŋ.
41004040	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɗaa mina rɔɔ, ì ɓa toko mini key lɛ? Wa̰a, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i ya ɓáy lɛ?»
41004041	Hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba ha ri ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Nzoɓ ni key na wa̰a, ɓa nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ, zuu ɓáy mbiiri kara ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul-e mini key lɛ?»
41005001	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu ká tusiri nzoɓ Gerazari.
41005002	Zezu ɗì saa ɓil tuo, lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, nzoɓ mbḭw munu tḭi saa zaɗ ká tupalri ɗo ɗi a suɔ nun-ɛ. Leɗbanke ku na, temndaya ɗo tul-e
41005003	ha̰ ni ɗaa puo ká tupalri. Nzoɓ mbḭw maa ɓay mgbaka ni ɓay síŋ ni ya. Sal lari kara maa ɓay síŋke ni ya.
41005004	Tusuɛke lɛ, faa ɓal ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ze i siŋ nduo-ɛ ɓáy ɓal-ɛ ɓáy sal lari, lɛ, ka mḭira sal larikeri na mgbaɗ mgbaɗ riw bele. Nzoɓ mbḭw mini ká maa ɓay mgbaka ni na tiya.
41005005	Ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara, suŋ ɓáy ɓisie na, ka ha̰ari sakra tupalri ɓáy kuori a guu fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ, a yḭw sùo-ɛ ɓáy tisawri ha̰ ni tḭ̀i nṵɔ.
41005006	Zaɗka leɗban na kɔ Zezu ká se lew vuku na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗuu a se luo-ɛ a vǎa huku pol-e
41005007	a guu fe ɓeleŋ a ɓaa mii: «Zezu, Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya, fe ḭi ze ɗo sakra náa lɛ woo? Mì koɗ mù ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, mu fɛ́rɛ tul-i ya!»
41005008	Leɗban na ɓaa munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay haŋa temndaya na ka tḭi ká tul-e.
41005009	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi leɗban na a ɓaa mii: «Riŋ-a ɓa ḭi lɛ?» Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Riŋ-i ɓa Ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓuru temndayari na ɓuru ŋgḭi ɓamba.»
41005010	Rɔɓay, leɗban na koɗ ni a naa pol-e mgbáa, ɓay haŋa ni ka nii temndayari na ha ri zɔl ɗi ɗi ká zaɗɛ na ku ya.
41005011	Ká zaɗɛ ku na kuɗu mbel puɔri ŋgḭi ɓamba i ɗo sṵŋa fe ɗi ya ɓáy ha̰n kuo.
41005012	Báyḭi lɛ, temndayari ká i ɗo tul leɗban na, i koɗ Zezu í ɓaa mii: «Nii ɓuru se tul mbelri na ku ɓay haŋa ɓuru rìi tul-ri!»
41005013	Lɛɛ, ka pɔŋ faa ha ri, ze temndayari na tḭi ká tul leɗban na í ɗuu í vǎa rìi tul mbelri na. Kuɗu mbelri ká tul-ri maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ siɗi na, i zuɔ ɗul vbuɓuɓu ɓáy takra í tḭi nzaa ŋgeŋ í zoɗ kirim kirim zuɔ maambii ha̰ mbii ya̰a ri riw bele.
41005014	Nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ mbel puɔri na, zaɗka i kɔ munu báyḭi lɛ, i haw ɗul í vǎa ɗaa ɓayke nda zaɗ ká ŋgɛrɛpuo ɓáy vu puori ká ɗo ɓisuy. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri se riw bele í kɔ fekeri ká kal na.
41005015	Zaɗka i tḭi luo Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ leɗban ká temndayari ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ɗo tul-e pola na kaw ɗi, gari ɗo sùo-ɛ, a ɗo ɓáy kere. Lɛɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri.
41005016	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i kɔ temndayari ká tḭi ká tul leɗban a í rìi tul mbel puɔri na, i kḭi ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
41005017	Zaɗka i laa ɓayke munu na báyḭi lɛ, i tii sa̰w kóɗ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka zɔ́l ká tusiri ɓari.
41005018	Falɛ lɛ, Zezu hil a kaw ɓil tuo na, lɛ, nzoɓ ká temndayari ɗo tul-e pola káʼa vaa ni na vbi ni ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ ɓeri ɗo ziŋ ni.
41005019	Roo lɛ, Zezu ha̰ ni faa ya a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Yḭ̀i mú se puɔ ká luo nzoɓ ini ɓori, a mú kḭi fal feri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ziŋ mù ɓáy faa law kere ɓe na ha ri laa.»
41005020	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗban na uru a zɔl kḭ na laa, a tii sa̰w ka-káa ɓay feri riw bele ká Zezu ɗaa ziŋ ni na ha̰ nzoɓri ká tusiri Dekapol. Nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓayke na i kaw yer.
41005021	Zezu yḭ̀i ɓáy tuo na rɔɓay a se nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu. Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba mbṵ kḭ í kiri ni gbuk ká nzaa kporombii na ku.
41005022	Báyḭi lɛ, mbay tul hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri mbḭw munu ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zayrus tḭi zaɗɛ na ku. Zaɗkaʼa kɔ Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, ka kii a naa pol-e
41005023	a koɗ ni mii: «Mbay! Vu-i ká ɓa leɗ má̰y nzoɓ naa siri ɓa huɗ. Kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy, mu ví ɗaa nduo-ɔ ɓo tul-e ɓo ha̰ sùo-ɛ ka vaa a káw ɓáy kumnun ha̰ mì.»
41005024	Zaɗka Zezu laa ɓay ɓe na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka uru a se ziŋ ni. Ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba se fal-ɛ í mbuo ni luo luo.
41005025	Lɛɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na, má̰y mbḭw ɗo ɗi ku ká sím tḭi ni ɗaa mbiimbam duɔ falɛ siɗi ro.
41005026	Ɓáy faa ha̰ari ɓe ká luo nzoɓ haŋa sa̰wpuu váa nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ŋgḭi ɓamba na, ka kɔ́ke sɛkɛ fe ká nduo-ri ɓamba, a ɓiɛ lari ɓe riw bele. Roo lɛ, sa̰wpuukeri ku na sɔ ni mbḭw ya, ha̰ sím na tḭi ni ɓa pola pola.
41005027	Zaɗka leɗ má̰y na laa soro ɓay ká se tul Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, ka rìi sakra ruɔ nzoɓri, a ṵu kpṵru a tḭi ká fal-ɛ a zaa gari ɓe,
41005028	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ká ɓil law-ɛ mii: «Zaɗka mì zaa gari ɓeri kḭ hɔy lɛ, sùo-i na a váa.»
41005029	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, sím ká tḭi ni na nzi-ɛ kuŋ nzɛɗ ha̰ ni kɔ mii, sùo ɓeri vaa ɓáy kere.
41005030	Lɛɛ, ɓa vaa hɔy Zezu kɔ mii, hṵrusuo tḭi saa sùo ɓeri, a fɛrɛ nun-ɛ ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri a vbi ri mii: «A ve ze zaa gari ɓi lɛ?»
41005031	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ruɔ nzoɓri ká i mbuo mù luo luo key na, mù kɔ ya rɔɔ, mú ɓaa mii, a ve ze zaa sùo-ɔ lɛ, na lɛ woo?»
41005032	Roo lɛ, Zezu kɔ-kɔ́m rie ni ɓay kɔ́kɔ nzoɓ ká ɗaa fe na ku.
41005033	Lɛɛ, leɗ má̰y na hḭɛ ɗaa ni ha̰ ni tɔ ɗɛk ɗɛk, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká ɗaa ha̰ sùo-ɛ vaa na ka kɔ kɔ. Ka ví huku siri ká pol Zezu, a ɓaa sùo ɓay ká ɓil law-ɛ riw bele ha̰ ni.
41005034	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Vu-i má̰yke, law-a ká mù ɗaa ɓo tul-i na, ha̰ sùo-ɔ na vaa mù. Mu se ɓáy kere ɗɛkɛkɛ; suosɛrɛm ɓo na ti ɗáa mù mbǎa.»
41005035	Zaɗka Zezu ɗo ɓáa ɓay kɔɓ rɔɓay na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ nzaapeɗ ha̰nɛri vi saa puo mbay Zayrus í ɓaa ha̰ Zayrus na mii: «Vu-ɔ na hu-hu. Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù yɔklɔ mbay Zezu na ɓáy lɛ?»
41005036	Zezu laa ɓay ɓari ka i ɓaa na, roo lɛ, ka ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo ɗi ya; ka ɓaa ha̰ mbay tul hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na mii: «Ha̰ hḭɛ ka ɗáa mù ya; mu ɗaa law-a ka ɓo tul-i!»
41005037	Zezu pɔŋ faa ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw su ni ya. Roo lɛ, ɓa Piyɛr ɓáy Zak ɓáy yṵ-ɛ Za̰a huo-ri hɔy ze i su ni.
41005038	Zaɗka i tḭi puo mbay tul hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ nzoɓri ká i kaw zaɗ huɗ ká í ɗo ɓɔ́ɗ sùo-ri í rɛke rɛw í nda saa nzaa ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ.
41005039	Lɛɛ, ka rìi a se hula a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì ɗara sùo-rì, í rɛ-rɛw mini key lɛ? Leɗ má̰y tikɗi na hu ya, roo lɛ, ka na-nam.»
41005040	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari na i siɛ ni siɛ hɔy. Lɛɛ, Zezu ha ri tḭi kɛlɛ riw bele, a ha̰ bǎa leɗ ɓáy máa leɗ, rɔɔ ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say na rìi ziŋ ni í se zaɗ ká leɗ má̰y tikɗi na naa ɗi.
41005041	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mgba nduo-ɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Talita Kum.» Ɓay nzaa ɓay naari lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Má̰y tikɗi, mì ɓaa ha̰ mu, úru siya.»
41005042	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, leɗ má̰y tikɗi ká ɗo ɓáy mbiimbam duɔ falɛ siɗi na uru siya a tii sa̰w se-seɗ. Zaɗka i kɔ feke na, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl ha ri kaw yer.
41005043	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ɓay ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ mii: «Ì ha̰ ɓay key na ka tḭi ká nzaa-rì ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ka laa ya.» Falɛ ku rɔɔ a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ha̰ ni fe sṵm ha̰ ni sṵ!»
41006001	Zezu uru ká zaɗɛ na ku a se puo káʼa ŋgɔŋ ká ɗi, lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri su ni.
41006002	Zaɗka nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri vi báyḭi lɛ, Zezu se hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari Ziɓri a tii sa̰w fére nzoɓri fe. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká í laa fe fére ɓe na tuku ri ha ri ɓaa mii: «Hay! Fe fére ɓeri key na, uru saa ha̰a lɛ? Nun nzɛm key na, a ve ze ha̰ ni lɛ? Mase a ve rɔɔ ha̰ ni hṵrusuo ɗáa kḭri fe saŋri ká mini key lɛ?
41006003	Wa̰a, ka ɓa nzoɓ sáka puu, vu Mari na ya lɛ? Ka ɓa yṵ Zak ɓáy Zoze ɓáy Zud ɓáy Simo̰n ya lɛ? Tini-ɛri ti sakra naari key ya lɛ woo?» Feke ku na ɗaa ha ri ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul Zezu ya.
41006004	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ɓay ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i hḭɛ ni ɓáy zaɗri riw bele, roo lɛ, ɓa nzoɓ puo mboŋ niri ɓáy nzoɓ sa̰w ka̰ni ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri huo-ri hɔy ze i hḭɛ ni ya.»
41006005	Sa̰wke mini ze, Zezu maa ɗáa fe saŋ ká puo mboŋ ni ya, roo lɛ, ka ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul nzoɓ suosɛrɛm ha̰nɛri a vaa ri.
41006006	Law-ri ká i hii ɗáa ɓo tul-e ya na tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer. Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu se puori ká kiri Nazarɛɗ kɔr a fere fe ká ɗi.
41006007	Ka ɗi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi, a tii sa̰w píe ri siɗi siɗi, a ha ri hṵrusuo ká tul temndayari.
41006008	Pola rɔɔ ɓay píe ri na, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì mgba fe mbḭw ɗo nduo-rì ɓáy seɗ varu ɓaarì ya, ká̰w hɔy ze ì mgba. Ì se ɓáy fe sṵm ya nda̰w, ɓɔl ya nda̰w, í ɗaa lari ka nduo tul gari ɓaarì ya nda̰w.
41006009	Ì nduo gari ka ká̰y tul kḭ ya. Ì ndaa dikɔn ze ka ɗo ɓal-rì.»
41006010	Ka ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii: «Zaɗka ì se puo mbḭw, rɔɔ nzoɓ ɗí rì ɓay haŋa rì kaw ziŋ ni ká puo ɓe na lɛ, ì káw ɗi kpṵru maa ɓáy zɔ́l ɓaarì.
41006011	Zaɗka ì se puo mbḭw munu, rɔɔ nzoɓ puokeri hii ɓay mgbaka rì ɓáy kere ya, mase i hii ɓay láa ɓay ɓaarì ya lɛ, ì tḭi ká puoke ku, a í nda kusal puoke ká ɓal-rì kuɓ kuɓ ɓay bákake ri se tul fe ka̰aya ká i ɗaa na.»
41006012	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri zɔl í se ka-káa ɓay haŋa nzoɓri suo kér ɓay ɓari.
41006013	I nii temndayari ŋgḭi ɓamba nda̰w, a í ɗaa num zuɔ tul nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri ŋgḭi ɓamba ha ri vaa nda̰w pi.
41006014	Soro ɓay Zezu mgba a ya̰a ɓáy zaɗri riw bele ha̰ ɓayke tɔɗɔ a ɓo suku Mbay Eroɗ. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa ɓay ká tul Zezu mii: «Ɓa Za̰a Batis ká tḭi saa luɔ huɗ! Sa̰wke mini ze, ka ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ká ɓay ɗáa fe saŋri.»
41006015	Nzoɓ ha̰wri ɓaa mii: «Ɓa Eli.» Nzoɓ kḭri ɓoɗ rɔɓay ɓaa mii: «Ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw ká ɗo munu ká nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naari ká piɛɗke lew.»
41006016	Zaɗka Mbay Eroɗ laa ɓayke munu na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: «Ɓa Za̰a Batis ká mì ha ri kuŋ tul-e na; ɓa ɓe na ze ka tḭi saa luɔ huɗ ku lɛ!»
41006017	Tusuɛke lɛ, zaɗka Za̰a kaw ɓáy kumnun kɔɓ ɓáy na, Mbay Eroɗ mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri mgba Za̰a í siŋ ni ɓáy sal lari í ɗaa ni ɓo hul sal, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Mbay Eroɗ ká ya̰a Eroɗiade ká ɓa má̰y yṵ-ɛ Filiɓ na,
41006018	Za̰a ɓaa ha̰ ni ɓaŋguɔ mii, ka ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay kɔrɔ má̰y yṵ-ɛ na ɓa taa ɓe ya.
41006019	Ɓa fe ká ɗaa ha̰ law Eroɗiade fa̰a ni ká tul Za̰a a hii ɓay ika ni, roo lɛ, ka maa ɗáa munu ya ɓay tul Eroɗ
41006020	ká hḭɛ ni, a kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ze a kɔrɔ ni. Zaɗka Mbay Eroɗ laa ɓay Za̰a na, law-ɛ nzaa ni. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ka hii láa ɓay ɓe na mgbum.
41006021	Báyḭi lɛ, nam mbḭw munu na Eroɗiade ziŋ faa. Namke ku na ɓa nam mboŋa Mbay Eroɗ káʼa ɗáake fe sṵm ha̰ nzoɓri. Ka ɗi ŋgɛrɛ ɓeri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵmri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ réke tul puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.
41006022	Báyḭi lɛ, vu Eroɗiade ká ɓa leɗ má̰y tikɗi na rìi a se ɓil hul fe sṵm ɓari na a nda-nday. Lɛɛ, nday káʼa nda na rii law Mbay Eroɗ ɓáy nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri kaw ziŋ ni na. Báyḭi lɛ, Mbay Eroɗ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Vbi mì fe ká law-a hii, lɛ, mì haŋa mù.»
41006023	Ka haa huɗ ká ɗi mii: «Fe ká mù vbika mì na, mì haŋa mù na kḭ. Ze ɓa na tafɛlɛ puoruo ɓi hɔy kara, mì haŋa mù!»
41006024	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ má̰y tikɗi na zɔl ká nzaa Mbay Eroɗ na, a se luo mi-ɛ a vbi ni mii: «Ha̰a ḭi ze mì vbika lɛ woo?» Lɛɛ, mi-ɛ na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se mú vbi ni tul Za̰a Batis ze ha̰ mì.»
41006025	Lɛɛ, leɗ má̰y tikɗi na takra a yḭ̀i ɓáy tul ɓal-ɛ nzɛk, a se luo mbay na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì hii ɓay haŋa mù ha̰ mì tul Za̰a Batis ká zaɗ ni key koɗ hɔy ka ɓo ɓil patinza ha̰ mì.»
41006026	Zaɗka Mbay Eroɗ laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, sùo-ɛ rii ni ya. Roo lɛ, ka hii ɓay ɓéɗ leɗ má̰y tikɗi na ya, ɓay tul huɗ káʼa haa ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri kaw ziŋ ni na.
41006027	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy, ka mbi nzi-ɛ a pie nzoɓ yṵm mbḭw ká kɔrɔ zaɗ na ɓay haŋa ni se a vǎa kuŋ tul Za̰a Batis a víke. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ yṵm na se ɓil hul sal na a kuŋ tul Za̰a Batis
41006028	a ɗaa ɓo ɓil patinza a víke ha̰ leɗ má̰y tikɗi na, lɛ, leɗ má̰y tikɗi na ya̰a a séke ha̰ mi-ɛ na.
41006029	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal Za̰ari laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, i ví mbi huɗ ɓe na í voro.
41006030	Nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ Zezuri yḭ̀i saa zaɗ ka-káa Ɓay Kere, í se luo-ɛ í kḭi fal feri riw bele ká i ɗaa ɓáy fe ká i fere nzoɓri na ha̰ ni.
41006031	Nzoɓri ká i vi luo-ɛ a í zɔl na i ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ha̰ Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i ziŋ faa ká ɓay sṵŋa fe kara ya. Sa̰wke mini ze, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na mii: «Ì vi ziŋ mì, ɓo náa vǎa káwri zaɗ ká ɗo kɔlɔk í mgba ta̰ram sùo-rì ká ɗi ndḭi.»
41006032	Báyḭi lɛ, i tḭi í zɔl huo-ri hɔy í vǎa hil ɓil tuo í se ɓa zaɗ ká ɗo kɔlɔk na.
41006033	Roo lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba kɔ Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká i kaw ɓil tuo í zɔl vǎw na. Lɛɛ, i tḭi ɓáy puo puo riw bele, í ɗuu fal kḭ ɓáy ɓal-ri í tḭi zaɗɛ na ku pola ha̰ Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na.
41006034	Zaɗka Zezu tḭi saa ɓil tuo, a kɔ ruɔ nzoɓri ká i mbṵ kḭ mɛr mɛr na ku báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ nun síe ɓari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓkeri rìi baɗuri ká nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ ri tiya. Lɛɛ, Zezu tii sa̰w fére ri fe ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41006035	Zaɗka síe tɔ̀ŋ ndḭi ɓay riŋ na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Síe kal ro, a zaɗ ni key na ɓa ɓil law kɔr ze ɗo key.
41006036	Ha̰ nzoɓri key na i se puori ɓáy vu puori ká kiri naari key í vǎa hie fe sṵm í sṵ.»
41006037	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì kḭ ze ì ha ri fe sṵm ha ri sṵ.» Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni mii: «Úwaa, mù hii ɓay haŋa ɓuru vǎa hie maapa ha̰ nzoɓri sṵ lɛ? Fe sṵmke ku na a máa lari peɗ nam isɔɗ sɔɗ siɗi!»
41006038	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ɗo ɓáy maapa ɓa mina lɛ? Ì se í vǎa kɔ!» Zaɗka i se í vbi ɓay í laa na báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru ɗo ɓáy maapa ɓa ndeɓe ɓáy sḭiri ɓa siɗi.»
41006039	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓay haŋa ri ha̰ nzoɓri kaw siri ɓáy kuɗuke kuɗuke ká tul suy pamɛ.
41006040	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri kaw ɓáy kewke kewke. Kewke taa síŋ ndeɓe ndeɓe nda̰w, isɔɗ sɔɗ nda̰w pi.
41006041	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ya̰a maapa ká ndeɓe ɓáy sḭ̀i ká siɗi na, a ura nun-ɛ ɓa siya a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a haw maapa na a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓay haŋa ri leke nzoɓri na. Ka leke ri sḭ̀i ká siɗi na nda̰w ká sakra ɓari riw bele.
41006042	Ɓari riw bele na i sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri maa ɓáy zaɗ kɔn ɓari.
41006043	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na i fa̰a ɓie maapa ɓáy sḭ̀i na mbaa buɗu ɓa duɔ falɛ siɗi.
41006044	Ɓari ká i sṵ maapa na, wa̰rari maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe (5.000).
41006045	Falɛ ku ndḭi hɔy lɛ, Zezu ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri hil í kaw ɓil tuo í zɔl pola ha̰ ni ɓay séke ɓa nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu ɓa ŋgɛrɛpuo Besayda. Zaɗka i zɔl na, Zezu tɔ̀ŋ fal kɔɓ ɓay ɓáa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri zɔl faa puɔ.
41006046	Falɛ káʼa ha̰ nzoɓri zɔl na báyḭi lɛ, ka se tul kuo ɓay ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.
41006047	Zaɗ sii báyḭi lɛ, tuo na ɗo ɓil law mbii, lɛ, Zezu huo-ɛ hɔy ze ɗo siri.
41006048	Nzaa fa̰a nzaaruo na leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri ziŋ faa ká ɓay híla tuo na mbǎa, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zuu kuu ŋgḭi ɓamba a suɔ nun-ri. Zaɗka Zezu kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, ka se tul mbii takam takam ɓa luo-ri, tɔ̀ŋ ndḭi munu hɔy ɓay haŋa ni kál ri.
41006049	Zaɗka i kɔ ni káʼa se tul mbii na munu báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ í ɓaa mii ɓa wṵru, ro í guu fe gǔrum gǔrum.
41006050	Tusuɛke lɛ, i kɔ ni ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele, a í tɔ kpak kpak. Roo lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa ɓi kḭ zu, ì siŋ law-rì, ì ha̰ hḭɛ ka ɗáa rì ya!»
41006051	Falɛ ku rɔɔ a hil a kaw ziŋ ri ká ɓil tuo na, lɛ, nzaa zuu na ví kuŋ nzɛɗ. Feke ku na tuku ri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ha ri kaw yer.
41006052	Tusuɛke lɛ, fe saŋ ká Zezu ɗaa ɓáy maapa na, fe kɔ́kɔ ɓari maa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke ya.
41006053	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tuo maambii i tḭi fi kɛlu ká zaɗri ká kiri Zenezarɛɗ kɔr, a í siŋ tuo na ɗo nzaa kporombii.
41006054	Zaɗka i tḭi saa ɓil tuo na munu hɔy lɛ, nzoɓri kɔ ɓa Zezu.
41006055	Zaɗ káʼa ɗo ɗi ká nzoɓri laa ɓay ɓe na, i ɗuu ɓáy tul puori riw bele, a í tii sa̰w fa̰a nzoɓ sɛmri ɓáy hiike í séke ha̰ ni.
41006056	Zaɗri riw bele ká Zezu se ɗi, ká ɓa vu puori ká ɗo ɓisuy, mase puori, mase ŋgɛrɛpuori kara, nzoɓri vi ɓáy nzoɓ sɛm ɓari í ɗaa zuɔ zaɗ áake ká nun ruɔ, a í koɗ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔŋ faa ha ri zaa nzaa gari ɓe fi siri hɔy. Lɛɛ, ɓari riw bele ká i zaa nzaa gari ɓe na, i vaa ɓáy kere.
41007001	Fariziri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol ha̰nɛri ká i uru saa Zuruzalɛm na, í ví mbṵ kḭ í kiri Zezu.
41007002	Báyḭi lɛ, i ŋga̰a leɗ nduoɓal Zezu ha̰nɛri ká i sṵ fe taŋ sḭ́ɛ nduo-ri taŋ kaɗ kaɗ munu ká Ziɓri ɗaa ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari na ya.
41007003	Tusuɛke lɛ, Fariziri ɓáy Ziɓ ha̰wri riw bele na, i ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul fe fére bulu ɓari ká i ya̰a; i sḭɛ nduo-ri taŋ kaɗ kaɗ rɔɔ í sṵ fe ɓáy.
41007004	Zaɗka i uru saa zaɗ fe hie hɔy kara, i sḭɛ nduo-ri taŋ kaɗ kaɗ munu ká bol kusol ɓari kiɛ na rɔɔ, í sṵ fe ɓáy. I ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul fe sa̰w puo ha̰wri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ŋgḭi ɓamba, munu ká faa wáa koɓo ɓáy tasa ɓáy suna.
41007005	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri na i vbi Zezu ɓay mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ leɗ nduoɓal-ari ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul fe sa̰w puo ká bulu naari ɗaa na ya lɛ? I sḭɛ nduo-ri ɓáy faake munu ká bulu naari fere naari na ya hɔy í sṵ fe!»
41007006	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓay ká Ezay ya̰a saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-rì na ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ì ɓa nzoɓ nzaa rúɔ ɓayri munu káʼa ɗaa ɗo mbeɗe mii: “Nzoɓri key na i ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-i ɓáy nzaa-ri hɔy, roo lɛ, ɓil law-ri ɗo ɗi ɗi ziŋ mì.
41007007	Rúo ká nzoɓri key ruo mì na ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, feri ká i fere nzoɓri na ɓa fe sa̰w puo nzoɓri kḭ hɔy ɓo, ɓa Ɓay ɓi ya.”
41007008	«Ɓaarì na, ì pɔŋ bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo fi mbḭw í ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul fe sa̰w puo nzoɓri hɔy.»
41007009	Falɛ lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì kɔ faa túŋ bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ŋgereŋ, ɓay mgbaka fe sa̰w puo ɓaarì ká i fere nzoɓri na ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ!
41007010	Tusuɛke lɛ, bol kusol ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ Moyze na ɓaa mii: “Mu ɗaa vu mbom ka ɓo tul bǎa-ka ɓáy máa-ŋa.” Rɔɓay, “Nzoɓ ká faɗ mi-ɛ ɓáy bi-ɛ lɛ, ɗo nun ika ni.”
41007011	Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì fere fe sa̰w puo ɓaarì mii, zaɗka nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy fe ɓay sɔ́kɔke bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ, rɔɔ a ɓaa mii, ɓeri ti haŋa ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa kɔrban, ɓayke ɓaa mii, ɓa fe ká ɓeri kɔrɔ ɗo ɓoɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, lɛ,
41007012	ì pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ nzoɓke ku na ɓay haŋa ni ka sɔ nzoɓ mbóŋ niri na mbǎa.
41007013	Ɓáy faa fe fére sa̰w puo ɓaarì ká ì suo í fere kḭ mini key na, ì pɔ̌ŋke Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo fi mbḭw. Rɔɓay, ì ɗaa feri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká rìi kḭrɛ ɓe niri key nda̰w.»
41007014	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi ruɔ nzoɓri na rɔɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì riw bele na, ì te suku-rì í láake ɓay ɓi key na ɓáy kere í tuu sa̰wke ta-taŋ!
41007015	Fe mbḭw ká nzoɓ sṵ se ɓil-e ká ɗaa ha̰ ni síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, tiya. Roo lɛ, fe ká tḭi saa ɓil law nzoɓ ze ɗaa ha̰ ni síike ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
41007016	[Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy suku ɓay láake lɛ, ka laa.»]
41007017	Zaɗka Zezu pɔŋ ruɔ nzoɓri a rìi hula báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni sa̰w law ɓayke káʼa ɓaa ha ri na.
41007018	Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì kara, ì ta̰a láa ɓay key na kpṵy lɛ woo? Fe sṵm mbḭw mini ká nzoɓ sṵ se ɓil-e na ti ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓ síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya,
41007019	ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe key na kal a se ɓil-e ɓo, ɓo ɓil wa̰ra law-ɛ ya; falɛ lɛ, ka níike mḭ́iri riw bele ɓa kɛlɛ.» Ɓe ze ɓáy faa ɓayri key na, Zezu ɓaa mii, fe sṵmri riw bele na ɓa fe kere ká maa ɓay sṵŋa.
41007020	Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: «Ɓa fe ká tḭi saa ɓil wa̰ra law nzoɓ, ze ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ síike ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru,
41007021	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ká ɓil wa̰ra law nzoɓ ká nziiya ze kér ɓay ka̰ayari ká ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáake fe ka̰ayari na tḭi saa ɗi: kér ɓay riiɓa nda̰w, ika nzoɓ nda̰w, ɗáa nun pie nda̰w,
41007022	kɔ́kɔ nun fe nda̰w, ɗáa law mgbɔrɔ nda̰w, úla nzoɓ nda̰w, taka mgbá̰y bapiɓi nda̰w, ɗáa sere nda̰w, ra̰ŋa kḭ nda̰w, siika sùo nda̰w, rɔɔ fe ɗáa kɔ̀kɔ nda̰w pi.
41007023	Feya̰akeri riw bele key na uru saa ɓil law nzoɓ, rɔɔ a ɗaa ha̰ ni síike ndiŋ ndiŋ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
41007024	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu uru ká zaɗɛ na ku, a se tusiri ká ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo Tir. Ka tḭi puoke ku a rìi a se hul mbḭw munu a hii ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw kara ka kɔ zaɗ káw ɓe ya, roo lɛ, faa mṵu sùo-ɛ tiya.
41007025	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy, má̰y mbḭw munu ká temndaya ɗo tul vi-e ká ɓa leɗ má̰y tikɗi na laa soro ɓay Zezu, lɛ, ka vi a naa pol-e.
41007026	Má̰yke ku na ka ɓa Ziɓ ya, i mboŋ ni ká Fenisi ká tusiri Siri. Lɛɛ, ka koɗ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka nii temndayari ká ɗo tul vi-e na.
41007027	Roo lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ála leɗri ha ri sṵ fe ha̰ ɓil-ri mbaa pola nda̰w rɔ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay mbika fe sṵm ká ɗo ɓay tul leɗri a vbu ha̰ vu váyri ya.»
41007028	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗɛ kḭ na zu, Mbay. Roo lɛ, vu váyri ká i naa sa̰w tutakra na, i dam bum fe sṵm ká ga̰y saa nzaa leɗri siya na í sṵ.»
41007029	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se puɔ. Ɓáy faa ɓay ká mù yḭiŋra ɓáy kere na, temndaya na tḭi ká tul vu-ɔ na ro.»
41007030	A zaɗka má̰y na yḭ̀i a se puɔ báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ vi-e na ká temndaya tḭi ká tul-e a pɔŋ ni naa hii.
41007031	Zezu uru ká tusiri Tir a yḭ̀i ɓáy faa ká tḭi Sido̰n, a kal ɓáy tusiri Dekapol, rɔɔ a se ɓa nzaa maambii ká Galele.
41007032	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri vi ɓáy mbiki ká ta̰a ɓáa ɓay kpṵy na ha̰ ni, a í koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul mbiki na a vaa ni.
41007033	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mgba ni a tḭ́ike ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri, a ɗaa vu nduo-ɛri nduo suku mbiki na, rɔɔ a sa̰-sa̰mi a ɗaa nda rḭm-ɛ.
41007034	Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a ura nun-ɛ ɓa siya, a ya̰a ɔ̰mi fɔ̰n a ɓaa ha̰ leɗban na mii: «Efata.» Ɓáy nzaa ɓay naari lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Suk-ari ka laa ɓay.»
41007035	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy suk-eri na vuo nda̰w, a rḭm-ɛ kara taŋ ɓáy kere ha̰ ni ɓaa ɓay yororo yororo.
41007036	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu baka nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na ɓay haŋa ri ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ya. Roo lɛ, ɓaŋguɔ káʼa ɓaa munu ha ri na hɔy kara, i ɗaa ha̰ ɓayke se ɓa pola pola.
41007037	Law nzoɓri naa wǒl a tuku ri ha ri kaw yer í ɓaa mii: «Feri riw bele káʼa ɗaa na ndaɗ ɓamba! Ka ha̰ mbikiri laa ɓay nda̰w, a nzoɓri ká i ɓaa ɓay ya hɔy kara, i ɓaa ɓay taŋ kaɗ kaɗ nda̰w pi.»
41008001	Ɓil sewke ku na, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba mbṵ kḭ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay ká luo Zezu, roo lɛ, fe sṵm tiya. Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii:
41008002	«Mì kɔ nun síe nzoɓri key, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa nam say ro i ɗo ziŋ mì a í ti ɓáy fe sṵm ya.
41008003	Zaɗka mì ha ri zɔl taŋ sṵŋa fe lɛ, i líe kɔn ká faa, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ruɔkeri ká sakra ɓari ku na i uru faa ɗi ɗi.»
41008004	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa! Zaɗ ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ ɓuru séke ɗi ɓay zíŋ fe sṵm ha̰nɛ ha̰ nzoɓri sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri ká ɓil law kɔr key lɛ?»
41008005	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri mii: «Maapa ɓa mina ze ì ɗǒke lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tɔnɔ say.»
41008006	Ro, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri kaw siri. Falɛ lɛ, ka ya̰a maapa ká tɔnɔ say na a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a haw a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓay haŋa ri leke ruɔ nzoɓri na. Lɛɛ, i ya̰a í leke ri na.
41008007	I ɗo ɓáy vu sḭ̀i ha̰nɛri nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul sḭ̀ikeri na, a ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓay haŋa ri leke nzoɓri na rɔɓay.
41008008	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri riw bele sṵ mbaa ɓil-ri siɓ siɓ maa ɓáy zaɗ kɔn ɓari. A ɓie maapakeri ɓáy sḭiri ká saɗ na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri fa̰a mbaa buɗu ɓa tɔnɔ say.
41008009	Nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na, i maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ niŋ (4.000). Falɛ ku rɔɔ Zezu pɔŋ faa ha ri zɔl, lɛ,
41008010	ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na, i hil í kaw ɓil tuo í se ɓa tusiri Dalamanuta.
41008011	Farizi ha̰nɛri vi luo Zezu í tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ziŋ ni ɓay nzáake nzi-ɛ. Ze í vbi ni ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa fe saŋ mbḭw ha̰ ɓari kɔ mii, hṵrusuo-ɛ na uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
41008012	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ya̰a bawda ɔ̰mi fɔ̰n a ɓaa mii: «Ɓay ḭi kḭ rɔɔ, nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ key vbi ɓay kɔ́kɔ fe saŋ lɛ? Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, fe saŋ mbḭw mini kara mì ti haŋa rì kɔ ya!»
41008013	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka pɔŋ ri a hil a kaw ɓil tuo ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri í yḭ̀i a í se ɓa nzaa maambii ká fi kɛlu.
41008014	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri yḭiŋra fa̰a maapa na sɛl. I ɗo ɓáy maapa mbḭw munu hɔy ká ɓil tuo.
41008015	Lɛɛ, Zezu baka ri a ɓaa mii: «I nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì! Ì kɔ́rɔ sùo-ri ká tul fe fére ka̰aya Fariziri ɓáy nzoɓ Eroɗri ká ɗo munu ɓa fe hew fe na.»
41008016	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ɗo ɓáy maapa ya.
41008017	Munu ká Zezu kɔ fe ká i ɓaa ɓayke na, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì ma̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii, ì ɗo ɓáy maapa ya lɛ? Wa̰a, ì kɔ ya ɓáy lɛ woo? Ì kɔ táŋke ya ɓáy lɛ? Nun-rì mgbuɗa ká ɗi ya ɓáy dɔrɔ zu lɛ?
41008018	-
41008019	Ì ɗo ɓáy nun ɓay kɔ́kɔke fe, lɛ, ì kɔ ya! Ì ɗo ɓáy suku ɓay láa ɓay, lɛ, ì láake ya! Wa̰a, mina lɛ woo? Maapa ká ndeɓe ká mì haw ha̰ nzoɓri ká isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe (5.000) ha ri sṵ na wa̰a, ì yḭ-yḭiŋra lɛ? Wa̰a, ì fa̰a ɓie mbaa buɗu mina lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbaa buɗu duɔ falɛ siɗi.»
41008020	Zezu vbi ri rɔɓay mii: «Zaɗka mì haw maapa ɓa tɔnɔ say ɓay tul nzoɓri ká isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ niŋ (4.000) na wa̰a, ì fa̰a ɓie mbaa buɗu dɔrɔrɔ dɔrɔrɔ ɓa mina lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tɔnɔ say.»
41008021	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri rɔɓay mii: «Wa̰a, ì kɔ ya ɓáy lɛ woo?»
41008022	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi Besayda. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri sùu nzoɓ ra̰w mbḭw munu ká ɗi, i víke ha̰ Zezu í koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka zaa ni ɓo a vaa.
41008023	Báyḭi lɛ, ka mgba nduo ra̰w na a tḭ́ike ni saa ɓil puɔ a séke nzaa zaɗ. Falɛ lɛ, ka ɗaa mbii sa̰mi ɗo nun ra̰w na, a ɗaa nduo-ɛri ɓo tul-e a vbi ni mii: «Mù kɔ fe lɛ?»
41008024	Lɛɛ, ra̰w na ura nun-ɛ ɓa siya a ɓaa mii: «Mì kɔ nzoɓri, roo lɛ, i rìi puuri ká se-seɗ.»
41008025	Falɛ ku rɔɓay lɛ, Zezu ɗaa nduo-ɛri ɓa kḭ ɓo tul nun nzoɓ ra̰w na. Báyḭi lɛ, ra̰w na kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa sikɗa, lɛ, nun-ɛ na taŋ ha̰ ni kɔ zaɗ ɓáy kere kaɗ kaɗ.
41008026	Falɛ ku ká ɓay haŋa ra̰w na ka zɔ́l na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se ɓil puɔ ya.»
41008027	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri, i zɔl ɓa vu puori ká ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo Sezare-Filiɓ. Zaɗka i se faa ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, nzoɓri ɓaa ɓay mina ze se tul-i lɛ?»
41008028	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii, mù ɓa Za̰a Batis. Nzoɓ kḭri ɓoɗ ɓaa mii, mù ɓa Eli. Nzoɓ ha̰wri rɔɓay ɓaa mii, mù ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu.»
41008029	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri mii: «A ɓaarì kḭ na wa̰a, ì ɓaa mii, mì ɓa nzoɓ ve lɛ?» Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mù ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni vi.»
41008030	Ɓe nu ku ro, Zezu baka ri ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓay haŋa ri ɓaa ɓayke na ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ya.
41008031	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu tii sa̰w fére leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri fe mii: «Ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, ɗo nun haŋa mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba. Ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri na i túŋ mì ŋgereŋ a í i mì, a ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.»
41008032	Zezu ɓaa ɓayke ta-taŋ ha ri. Lɛɛ, Piyɛr mgba ni a tḭ́ike ŋgereŋ ɓa nzaa zaɗ a tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ziŋ ni ɓay tul ɓayri káʼa ɓaa na.
41008033	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ nun-ɛ a kɔ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a yḭw Piyɛr mii: «Satan, mu zɔ́l ká lakun-i ɗi ɗi ɓa lew, ɓay ḭi lɛ, kér ɓay ɓo na ɗo ɓa kér ɓay nzoɓri hɔy ɓo, ɗo ɓa kér ɓay taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.»
41008034	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɗi ruɔ nzoɓri ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká hii ɓay séke fal-i lɛ, ka pɔ́ŋ sùo-ɛ yaklak ha̰ mì, a mbi puu say huɗ ɓe, a soɓ a séke fal-i.
41008035	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ ká hii ɓay kɔ́rɔ kumnun ɓe na, kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ka ti zíŋ ya. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ káʼa pɔ́ŋ sùo-ɛ yɔɗ ɓay tul-i, mase ɓay tul Ɓay Kere na, a zíŋ kumnun taa tusuɛke.
41008036	A zaɗka nzoɓ ziŋ feri ká tusiri key riw bele, rɔɔ a ziŋ kumnun taa tusuɛke ya na wa̰a, ɓa feziŋa ḭi kḭ zu lɛ woo!
41008037	Fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ a máa ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a súoke kumnun taa tusuɛke na lɛ?
41008038	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗaa sahoy ɓay tul-i, ɓáy tul ɓay ɓiri ká nun nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ key ká i pɔŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru í ɗaa fe ka̰aya na, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, síeke ká mì vika ɓáy riŋ ɗika ká Bǎa ha̰ mì ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká nulue na, mì ɗáa sahoy ɓay tul nzoɓke nda̰w.»
41009001	Rɔɓay ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ká i ɗo zaɗ ni key na, i ti huka ya kpṵru ɓay kɔ́kɔ nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ví réke mbay ɓáy hṵrusuo-ɛ na ɓáy nun-ri nda̰w rɔɔ í hu ɓáy.»
41009002	Falɛ ká ɗaa nam yie na, Zezu ha̰ Piyɛr, Zak ɓáy Za̰a se ziŋ ni tul kuo ká gaŋ zeŋleŋ ká ɗo nzaa zaɗ a í kaw ɗi huo-ri. Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na, sùo Zezu fɛrɛ gbǎ̰y ká nun-ri.
41009003	Gari ɓeri ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri a puu kpa̰a kpa̰a. Nzoɓ mbḭw ká tusiri key ká maa ɓay wáa gari ha̰ ni puu ɗo munu na, tiya.
41009004	Báyḭi lɛ, Eli ɓáy Moyze tḭi ri mbuɗa í ɗo loko soro ziŋ Zezu.
41009005	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay haŋa náa káwri zaɗ ni key. Ha̰ ɓuru ɗaa hul puɗi ɓa say. Mbḭw ɓa taa ɓo, mbḭw ɓa taa Moyze, a mbḭwke laa lɛ, ɓa taa Eli.»
41009006	Tusuɛke lɛ, ka kɔ ɓay ɓáa ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki.
41009007	Báyḭi lɛ, síi mbam ví guɓa tul-ri gbukru, lɛ, ká ɓil síi mbamke ku na kusol mgba ɓeleŋ ká ɗi mii: «Ɓe key na ka ɓa Vu-i; mì kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ nun-i. Ì laa ɓay ɓe!»
41009008	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri kɔ-kɔ́m rie ri gbuk, roo lɛ, i kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw mbǎa, ɓa Zezu huo-ɛ hɔy ze ɗo ziŋ ri.
41009009	Zaɗka i ɗo ɗíra saa tul kuo na, Zezu mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri mii: «Feri ká ì kɔ key na, ì ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ya kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì tḭ́ike saa luɔ huɗ.»
41009010	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓay káʼa ɓaa ha ri na, roo lɛ, i ma̰y ɓay ziŋ kḭ mii: «Tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ ká fal huɗ ɓe na wa̰a, ɓayke ɓaa mina zu lɛ?»
41009011	Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓaa mii, “Ɗo nun haŋa Eli ka vi pola nda̰w rɔɔ, Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni na, ka vi ɓáy” lɛ?»
41009012	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɗo nun haŋa Eli na ka vi pola nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓay léke feri riw bele ha̰ ni ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ zeɓ zeɓ. Roo lɛ, mì vbika rì ɓay: “Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii, ɗo nun haŋa Vu Nzoɓ na a kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba, a í tuŋ ni ŋgereŋ lɛ?”
41009013	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ: nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu ká Eli na vi ro, lɛ, nzoɓri ɗara ni munu ká law-ri hii, munu ká mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓayke pola se tul-e na.»
41009014	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say i vi ɗi ya ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i kiri leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri na, ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol ha̰nɛri ká i ɗo má̰y ɓáy ziŋ kḭ.
41009015	Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri kɔ Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri a í ɗuu ɓa luo-ɛ ɓay híi soko ha̰ ni.
41009016	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri na mii: «Fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì má̰yke ɓay ziŋ kḭ munu lɛ?»
