41009017	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri ku na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mì vi ɓáy vu-i ha̰ mù, ɓay ḭi lɛ, temndaya ɗo tul-e a yɔklɔ ni ŋgḭi ɓamba ha̰ ni ta̰a ɓáa ɓay kpṵy.
41009018	Zaɗri riw bele ká temndaya mbi ni ká ɗi na, ka ɗaa ni nda siri gba̰y ha̰ mbii nzi-ɛ tḭi fǔka fǔka nda̰w, a sṵ sere ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r a ɓo kpamgbaŋ nda̰w pi. Ze mì koɗ leɗ nduoɓal-ari ɓay haŋa ri nii temndayake na, lɛ, faake mba ri.»
41009019	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri mii: «Ɓaarì nzoɓ law ŋgɔ-ŋgɔri! Wa̰a, nam tɔ̀ŋ ɓa mina ɓáy rɔɔ ɓay haŋa mì kaw ziŋ rì rɔɓay lɛ? Nam tɔ̀ŋ ɓa mina ɓáy rɔɔ mì íki law-i ká tul-rì lɛ? Mgba leɗ na ɓa líe ha̰ mì.»
41009020	Lɛɛ, i mgba leɗ na í séke ha̰ ni. Zaɗka temndaya mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ Zezu báyḭi lɛ, ka mgba leɗ na a laŋ ni yik yik, a ɗaa ni ɓo siri gbirik. Leɗ na giri siri mgbeleŋ mgbeleŋ, a mbii nzi-ɛ kara tḭi fǔka fǔka nda̰w pi.
41009021	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi bǎa leɗ na a ɓaa mii: «Fe ni key na, ɗaa ni nam mina ro lɛ?» Lɛɛ, bǎa leɗ na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɗaa ni ɓáy tɔ́y ɓe kḭ hɔy kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key.
41009022	Ɓaŋguɔ na, temndaya na mbi ni ɓo huu nda̰w, ɓo mbii nda̰w ɓay ika ni. Roo lɛ, zaɗka hṵrusuo-ɔ maa ɗáa fe lɛ, mu kɔ nun síe ɓuru a mú sɔ ɓuru.»
41009023	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mina rɔɔ mù ɓaa mii: “Zaɗka hṵrusuo-ɔ maa ɗáa fe lɛ,” na lɛ? Nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i lɛ, fe mbḭw ti mbaka ni ya.»
41009024	Lɛɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, bǎa leɗ na rɛ ɓeleŋ a ɓaa mii: «Mì ɗaa law-i ɓo tul-a; mu sɔ mì ká tul mbika law-i ká ŋgḭi ya!»
41009025	Zaɗka Zezu kɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗuu í nde tul ruɔ nzoɓri ká i kiri ni na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭw temndaya na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo temndaya ká mù haa leɗ key ha̰ ni ta̰a ɓáa ɓay kpṵy, a laa ɓay ya nda̰w key na, mì ɓaa ha̰ mù, tḭi ká tul leɗ na mú yḭ̀i mú vi mbǎa wṵ̌m.»
41009026	Lɛɛ, temndaya na laŋ ni yik yik a guu fe ɓeleŋ, a tḭi saa tul leɗ na, a pɔŋ ni naa siri kparak rìi nzoɓ ká hu-hu ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗo zaɗɛ na i ɓaa mii: «Ka hu-hu!»
41009027	Ro, Zezu mgba nduo-ɛ a ura ni ha̰ ni ɗo siya zékre.
41009028	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i rìi í se hula í ɗo huo-ri hɔy na báyḭi lɛ, i vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓuru maa ɓay níi temndaya ni key na ya lɛ?»
41009029	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Kḭri temndaya ká mini key na, ɓáy faa nzaa ɓay kere kḭ hɔy ze nzoɓ a níike ni.»
41009030	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tḭi saa hula na ku í zɔl, í kal ɓáy kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Zezu hii ɓay haŋa nzoɓri kɔ zaɗ kaw ɓe ya,
41009031	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo fére leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri fe. Ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, i mgbaka mì í pɔ́ŋ mì ɓo nduo nzoɓri, lɛ, i ika mì. Falɛ ɗaa nam say lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.»
41009032	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa sa̰w ɓayke na taŋ ya, a í ɗaa hḭɛ ká ɓay vbika ni.
41009033	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi Kapɛrnayum í rìi í se hula. Zaɗka i rìi hula na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri ɓay mii: «Fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì ma̰y ɓayke ziŋ kḭ ká faa ku lɛ?»
41009034	Lɛɛ, i ɗo silili, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ká faa na i ma̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ ɓay kɔ́kɔ wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze ká sakra ɓari rɔɔ, ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ lɛ?
41009035	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kaw siri a ɗi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká hii ɓay ɗoko pola lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo ɓa ɔ́rɔ fal, a ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa peɗ ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele.»
41009036	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka mgba leɗ mbḭw ká ndḭi munu, a ɗaa ni ɗo sakra ɓari, rɔɔ a mbi ni a mbuɔ ni a ɓaa ha ri mii:
41009037	«Nzoɓ ká mgba leɗ mbḭw munu ká leɗ key na ɓa sùo-ɛ ɓay tul-i lɛ, ɓa ɓi kḭ sùo-i ze ka mgba mì ɓa sùo-ɛ ku. A nzoɓ ká mgba mì ɓa sùo-ɛ lɛ, ɓa ɓi hɔy ze ka mgba mì ya, roo lɛ, ka mgba nzoɓ ká píe mì vi na nda̰w.»
41009038	Za̰a mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, ɓuru kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ká nii temndayari ɓáy riŋ-a, lɛ, ɓuru nzaa faa ɓay háa ni, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka se-seɗ ziŋ naari ya.»
41009039	Roo lɛ, Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì haa ni ya. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa fe saŋ ɓáy riŋ-i na, ti ɓáa ɓay ka̰aya ziŋ mì ɓa vaa ya,
41009040	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ká ruu ziŋ naari ya na, ka ɓa nzoɓ fal ŋgaŋ naari.
41009041	A nzoɓ káʼa káa mbii tuŋguo tɔy mbḭw ha rì nzɔ, ɓay ɓáa ká ì ɓa nzoɓ Krisi lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓke ku na a zíŋ fe tunduo ɓe.»
41009042	«Nzoɓ ká ula leɗ mbḭw ká ndḭi mini ká sakra leɗri ká ɗo key ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-i na ha̰ ni ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, síŋ bawda tisaw ɗo sol nzoɓke a vbu ni ɓo maambii na ndaɗ mba haŋa ni kaw ɓáy kumnun a ula leɗ na.
41009043	Zaɗka ɓa nduo-ɔ ze ɗaa ha̰ mù ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, mu kuŋ ni ɓo ɓisuy. Séke ɓáy nduo mbḭw se zaɗ kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ndaɗ mba séke ɓáy nduo-ɔ siɗi bele se zaɗ kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya ɓaŋguɔ.
41009044	[Ɓa zaɗ ká kayri hu ká ɗi ya nda̰w, huu kara ruma ká ɗi ya nda̰w ɓaŋguɔ.]
41009045	A zaɗka ɓa ɓal-a ze ha̰ mù ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, mu kuŋ ni ɓo ɓisuy. Séke kpɛɗɛ ɓáy ɓal mbḭw se zaɗ káw kumnun taa tusuɛke na, ndaɗ mba séke ɓáy ɓal-a siɗi bele ha ri vbu mù ɓo zaɗ kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya.
41009046	[Ɓa zaɗ ká kayri hu ká ɗi ya nda̰w, huu kara ruma ká ɗi ya ɓaŋguɔ nda̰w.]
41009047	Rɔɓay, zaɗka ɓa nun-a ze ɗaa ha̰ mù ɗaa feya̰a lɛ, mu ŋgókɗo ni mú naa ni. Séke ɓáy nun-a mbḭw da̰ru ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-a na, ndaɗ mba séke ɓáy nun-ari siɗi bele ha ri vbu mù ɓo zaɗ kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil huu ká ru-ruma ya.
41009048	Ɓa zaɗ ká kayri hu ká ɗi ya nda̰w, huu kara ruma ká ɗi ya ɓaŋguɔ nda̰w.
41009049	Kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká nzoɓri riw bele kɔ na ha ri ví ndǎɗke munu ká tom ɗaa ha̰ fe sṵm ndaɗ.
41009050	Tom na ɓa fe kere, roo lɛ, zaɗka ráake tḭi na wa̰a, fe ḭi ze ì ɗáake ha̰ ni yḭ̀i a raa ɓa kḭ ɓáy lɛ? Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓaarì kḭ ze ì ɓa tom ráake, a í kaw ɗɛkɛkɛ ká sakra kḭ.»
41010001	Zezu uru ká zaɗɛ ku a se ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude ká nzaa baa Zurdɛ̰ fi kɛlu. Ruɔ nzoɓri mbṵ kḭ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay ká luo-ɛ. Lɛɛ, ka tii sa̰w fére ri fe munu káʼa ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ na.
41010002	Báyḭi lɛ, Farizi ha̰nɛri soro ɓa lakun-ɛ ɓay nzáa nzi-ɛ ze í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ká ɓil bol kusol naari na wa̰a, wa̰ra nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay níi má̰y ɓe lɛ?»
41010003	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a vbi ri mii: «Bol kusol ḭi ze Moyze ha rì lɛ?»
41010004	I yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Moyze pɔŋ faa ha̰ nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa mbeɗe níi má̰y ɓe na nda̰w rɔɔ a nii ni zɔ́l ɓáy.»
41010005	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay tul law ŋgɔŋɔ ɓaarì ze Moyze mbíke bol kusol na ku a ɗáake mbeɗe ha rì.
41010006	Roo lɛ, zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa feri riw bele ɓáy tiikake lew hɔy na, ka ɗaa wa̰ra nzoɓ ɓáy má̰y nzoɓ zeɓ.
41010007	“Sa̰wke mini ze, wa̰ra nzoɓ a pɔ́ŋ bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ ɓay káw ziŋ má̰y ɓe,
41010008	lɛ, ɓari siɗi bele reɓ na, i ví ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw.” Ɓe mini ze, i ɓa nzoɓ ká siɗi mbǎa, roo lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw.
41010009	Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru siŋ ri zuɔ kḭ na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ka wál sakra ɓari ya.»
41010010	Falɛ ká Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i yḭ̀i í se hula na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni ɓayri ɓa kḭ se tul ɓay káʼa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri na ku.
41010011	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka nzoɓ nii má̰y ɓe zɔl, rɔɔ a ya̰a má̰y kḭ lɛ, ka ɗaa ka̰aya ziŋ má̰y ɓe na a ɗaa nun pie.
41010012	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, má̰y nzoɓ ká zɔl saa hul wa̰ra, rɔɔ a ya̰a wa̰ra kḭ lɛ, ka ɗaa nun pie nda̰w.»
41010013	Nzoɓri vi ɓáy leɗri ha̰ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-ri, roo lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri haa ri.
41010014	Zaɗka Zezu kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, law-ɛ sɛ ni a ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na mii: «Ì ála leɗri ha ri vi luo-i ɓo, ì haa ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul ɓari ká i ɗo munu ká leɗri key.
41010015	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ká ya̰a Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa law-ɛ ha̰ ni re mbay ká tul-e munu ká leɗ na ya lɛ, ka ti ɗoko sakra nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na ya wṵ̌m.»
41010016	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka fa̰a leɗri na a mbuɔ ri ɗo nduo-ɛ, rɔɔ a ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-ri.
41010017	Zaɗka Zezu se faa ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu ɗuu a vǎa huku pol-e a vbi ni mii: «Mbay kere, ha̰a ḭi ze mì ɗáa rɔɔ ɓay zíŋke kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na lɛ?»
41010018	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ mù ɗi mì ɓa nzoɓ kere lɛ? Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ huo-ɛ hɔy ze ɓa nzoɓ kere ɓo, nzoɓ kḭ mbḭw mini ká nde ni nde na, tiya.
41010019	Mu kɔ bol kusolri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ nzoɓri ká ɓaa mii: “Mù ti ika nzoɓ ya, mù ti ɗáa nun pie ya, mù ti ri-riiɓa ya, mù ti kúɗ ɓay zuɔ nzaa nzoɓ ya, mù ti úla nzoɓ mú ya̰a fe ɓe ya, rɔɔ mù ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul bǎa-ka ɓáy máa-ŋa.”»
41010020	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, bol kusolkeri ku na, ɓáy kuban ɓi kḭ hɔy mì ɗo tul-e riw bele tḭi vuri.»
41010021	Lɛɛ, Zezu ḭri ni a hii ni a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Fe mbḭw puo mù. Mu se mú vǎa hie fe ɓori riw bele ká mù ɗǒke na, ɓo mú pɔ́ŋ larike ha̰ nzoɓ kṵkuri. Munu nda̰w rɔɔ, mù ɗoko ɓáy feziŋa taa tusuɛkeri ká nulue. Falɛ ro lɛ, mu yḭ̀i mú se fal-i ɓáy.»
41010022	Zaɗka nzoɓ na laa ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa munu na báyḭi lɛ, ka siŋ tunun-ɛ mbiɗ mbiɗ a zɔl mgbiriŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy feziŋari ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41010023	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kɔ-kɔ́m rie fal-ɛ gbuk a ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ɓay haŋa nzoɓ feziŋari ɗiŋ tul-ri ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri!»
41010024	Ɓayri káʼa ɓaa na yɔklɔ kér ɓay leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri. Roo lɛ, Zezu ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: «Vu-iri, ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ka ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-e!
41010025	Haŋa zambal nduo luɔ zɔy a tḭi ká nun-ɛ na ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri. Roo lɛ, haŋa nzoɓ feziŋa ɗiŋ tul-e ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-e na, ɗo ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri kal ɗi rɔɓay.»
41010026	Ɓayri ká Zezu ɓaa na, tuku leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ha ri kaw yer í vbi kḭ ɓay mii: «A munu ku waa, nzoɓ ve ze a máa ɓay zíŋ pam na ɓáy lɛ?»
41010027	Zezu ḭri ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa fe ká mba nzoɓri, roo lɛ, mba Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na fe ká mba ni mba na, mbḭw tiya.»
41010028	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu kɔ, ɓuru na ɓuru pɔŋ feri riw bele ɓay séke fal-a.»
41010029	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Nzoɓ ká pɔŋ hul ɓe, mase yṵ-ɛri ɓáy tini-ɛri, mase bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ, mase vi-eri, mase wáa ɓe ɓay tul-i, mase ɓay tul Ɓay Kere na lɛ,
41010030	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ni kḭri isɔɗ sɔɗ kal tul-e taa ha̰y ká vuri key. A haŋa ni hulri nda̰w, yṵ-ɛri nda̰w, tini-ɛri nda̰w, mí-ɛri nda̰w, vi-eri nda̰w, wáari nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy ɗáa nun tuɔ síeri kara nda̰w ká ɓil sew ká náa káwri ɗi timbɛɗɛ key. Falɛ lɛ, ká ɓil sew káʼa ví vuku na, káʼa haŋa ni kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ.
41010031	Roo lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i ɗo pola timbɛɗɛ key na, i ɗoko fal. A nzoɓri ká i ɗo fal timbɛɗɛ key na, i ɗoko pola.»
41010032	Zaɗka Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i se faa í tḭi zaɗ ká hil ɓa Zuruzalɛm na, ka se pol-ri, lɛ, law leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tɔ, a nzoɓri ká i tɔŋ fal-ri na kara hḭɛ ɗaa ri nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, ka fa̰a leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na a ɗǒke fi mbḭw a ɓaa ɓay feri káʼa tḭi tul-e na ha ri
41010033	mii: «Ì laa key, náa séri ɓa Zuruzalɛm na ro vǎy. Ɓa zaɗ ká i pɔ́ŋ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na ɓo nduo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká ɗi. Ɓari na i ɗáa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-i í pɔŋ mì ɓo nduo nzoɓri ká i tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.
41010034	Ɓari key na i síɛ mì, í sa̰-sa̰mi zuɔ nun-i, í ndaka mì ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ a í i mì. Falɛ ká ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.»
41010035	Falɛ lɛ, vu Zebederi ká ɓa Zak ɓáy Za̰a, i soro ɓa lakun Zezu í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, fe ká ɓuru vbika mù key na, ɓuru hii ɓay haŋa mù ɗaa feke ha̰ ɓuru.»
41010036	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ri mii: «Wa̰a, fe ḭi ze ì hii ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa ha rì lɛ?»
41010037	I ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Síeke ká mù káw ɓa mbay ɓáy riŋ ɗika na, mu ha̰ ɓuru káw lakun-a, nzoɓ mbḭw ka káw tunduo hoɗo ɓo, a nzoɓ mbini ka káw tunduo gel ɓo laa.»
41010038	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Fe ká ì vbi key na, ì kɔ ya hɔy. Sɛkɛ fe ká ɗo ɓil koɓo ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa mì nzɔ na wa̰a, ì maa ká ɓay nzɔkɔ nda̰w, mase ì maa ká ɓay nduo ɓil-e ká i ɗáa mì nduo ɗi na nda̰w lɛ?»
41010039	Lɛɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ṵ̀u! Ɓuru ma-maa.» Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɓaarì na, fe sɛkɛ ká ɗo ɓil koɓo ká mì nzɔkɔ na ì nzɔkɔ nda̰w, a í nduo ɓil kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká i ɗáa mì nduo ɗi na nda̰w.
41010040	Roo lɛ, káw tunduo hoɗo ɓi, mase káw tunduo gel ɓi na, ɓa ɓay ɓi ya. Zaɗkeri ku na ɗo ɓay tul nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leke ɓay tul-ri.»
41010041	Zaɗka ɓie leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká tɔ̀ŋ duɔ na, i laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri sɛ ri ká tul Zak ɓáy Za̰a.
41010042	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi ri riw bele a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì kɔ nda̰w, nzoɓri ká i kɔ ri ɓa mbay nzoɓri ká tusiri key na, i re tul puori ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ha̰ nzoɓri hḭɛ bol nzaa-ri. A ɓari ká i ɓa nzoɓ rewpuori na kara i ha̰ nzoɓri ɗaa fe ɓáy hṵrusuo.
41010043	Roo lɛ, fe ká mini key na ì ha̰ ni ɗo sakra ɓaarì ya. Zaɗka nzoɓ hii ɓay vika ɓa bawda nzoɓ ká sakra ɓaarì lɛ, ka ɗaa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa peɗ ha rì.
41010044	Mase zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw hii ɓay ɗoko pola ɗɛkrɛ ká sakra ɓaarì lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka vi ɓa koy ɓaarì riw bele.
41010045	Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na mì vi tusiri key ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ɗaa peɗ ha̰ mì ya. Roo lɛ, mì vi ɓay ɗáa peɗ ha̰ nzoɓri a mí mbi sùo-i ha̰ huɗ ɓay púoke tul nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.»
41010046	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri tḭi ŋgɛrɛpuo Zeriko. Zaɗka i ɗo kál Zeriko ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, ra̰w mbḭw ká ɓa vu Time ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Batime kaw lafaa a gɔŋ fe.
41010047	Zaɗkaʼa laa mii, ɓa Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ ze ɗo kali ku na báyḭi lɛ, ka tii sa̰w gúu fe ɓeleŋ mii: «Zezu vu bulu Daviɗ, kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy mu kɔ nun síe ɓi!»
41010048	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i gbṵ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ nzi-ɛ. Roo lɛ, ka guu fe mgba mgba ɓa pola pola rɔɓay mii: «Vu bulu Daviɗ, mu kɔ nun síe ɓi!»
41010049	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu sìi ɓal-ɛ zik a ɗo a ɓaa mii: «Ɗi ni ha̰ mì.» Lɛɛ, i ɗi Batime nzoɓ ra̰w na í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Siŋ law-a mú úru siya, Zezu ɗi mù!»
41010050	Báyḭi lɛ, ra̰w na vbu maagari ɓe gbukra ɓo siri, a zo zakra zakra a se ɓa luo Zezu.
41010051	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ni mii: «Fe ḭi ze mù hii ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa ha̰ mù lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, ra̰w na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mu ɗaa ha̰ mì kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa kḭ rɔɓay.»
41010052	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se ɓáy kere, law-a ká mù ɗaa ɓo tul-i na vaa mù ro.» Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, ka kɔ-kɔ́m a mbi faa fal Zezu na.
41011001	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm, a í ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy vu puori ká riŋ-ri ɓa Befaze ɓáy Betani ká ɗo lakun kuo Oliviye. Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na Zezu pie leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri siɗi ha ri se pola
41011002	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se puo ká ɗo pol-rì ku. Zaɗka ì tḭ́i ɗi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy ì zíŋ vu maasoɓa mbḭw ká i taa ni ɗo ɗi ká nzoɓ kaw tul-e ba mbḭw ya rɔɓay, lɛ, ì hína ni í víke ha̰ mì.
41011003	Zaɗka nzoɓ vbi rì mii: “Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ ì ɗaa munu lɛ,” lɛ, ì ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Ŋgɛrɛmbay ze se síeke; ndḭi hɔy lɛ a píeke ha̰ mù ɓáy.”»
41011004	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká siɗi na, i zɔl í vǎa ziŋ vu maasoɓa ká i síŋ ni ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ ká lakun faa na í hina ni.
41011005	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɗo ɗi na, i vbi ri ɓay mii: «Fe ḭi ze ì ɗaa munu lɛ? Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì hina vu maasoɓa na key lɛ?»
41011006	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri munu ká Zezu ɓaa ha ri pola na. Ro, nzoɓkeri ku na ala ri ha ri zɔ̌lke,
41011007	lɛ, i se ɓáy vu maasoɓa na ha̰ Zezu, í laɓa maagari ɓari zuɔ tul-e, lɛ, Zezu hil a kaw ɗi.
41011008	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i laɓa maagari ɓari zuɔ faa ká pol-e ɓay haŋa ni ka se tul-e a kál, a nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, i laɓa nzaa tɔy vay puuri ká i kuɗ ká ɓil wáa.
41011009	Ɓari ká i se pol Zezu ɓáy ɓari ká i se fal-ɛ na, i guu fe gǔrum gǔrum ɓáy nzaa-ri ɓa siya mii: «Hozana! Náa písiri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka sá̰m fe zuɔ tul nzoɓ ká vi ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay!
41011010	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka sá̰m fe zuɔ tul nzoɓ káʼa pie ni vi re mbay ká puoruo bulu naari Daviɗ na! Hozana! Naa písiri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kaw nulue!»
41011011	Zezu tḭi Zuruzalɛm a kal a rìi ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka kɔ-kɔ́m rie fal-ɛ gbuk a ŋga̰a feri riw bele ká kal na. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka tḭi a se ɓa Betani ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ fal-ɛ siɗi na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, síe ti mbǎa ro.
41011012	Nzaaruo kḭ ká ɓa tiɓie na, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi saa Betani í se faa, lɛ, kɔn sɛ ni.
41011013	Lɛɛ, ka mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ puu nzum mbḭw munu ɓáy vayke ka ɗo lew. Ka se sa̰w-ɛ ɓay zíŋ lereke ha̰nɛ ɓay sṵŋa. Zaɗkaʼa se sa̰w-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, lereke mbḭw tiya; ɓa vayke hɔy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa few líeke ya ɓáy.
41011014	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ puu nzum na mii: «Nzoɓ mbḭw ti sṵŋa lere ɓo mbǎa mgbaŋ.» Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa ɓay káʼa ɓaa na.
41011015	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi Zuruzalɛm, lɛ, ka rìi a se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi a tii sa̰w níi nzoɓ ɗáɓ fe híeri ɓáy ɓari ká i se ɗi ɓay híe fe na. Ka kira tutakra ɓari nzoɓ kṵu kḭ lariri ɓáy kariŋgaw nzoɓ híe ka̰y bɛɗɛri zuɔ nza̰ri nza̰ri.
41011016	Ka ala faa ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw kal ɓáy soɓa ɓe ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya.
41011017	Falɛ ku rɔɔ, ka fere nzoɓri fe a ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ ká ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: “Hul ɓi na i ɗika ɓa hul ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele,” roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì fɛrɛ ni ɓa pṵy nzoɓ riiɓari.»
41011018	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, i nzaa faa ɓay ika Zezu. Tusuɛke lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe káʼa fere ruɔ nzoɓri na tuku ri riw bele ha ri kaw yer.
41011019	Zaɗka zaɗ ɓa láw na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi saa ŋgɛrɛpuo na ku í zɔl.
41011020	Nzaaruo kḭ ká Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i ɗo kal faa ɓa tiɓie piɛɗ na, i kɔ puu nzum na huɔ wǔɔ tḭi sa̰w-ɛ.
41011021	Báyḭi lɛ, law Piyɛr ker se tul ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ puu nzum pola na a ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, mu kɔ-kɔ́m mú kɔ! Puu nzum ká mù faɗ ni na huɔ wǔɔ ɗo ku!»
41011022	Lɛɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Ì ɗaa law-rì ka ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!
41011023	Zaɗka nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ kuo key na mii: “Mu mṵu ká zaɗ ni key a mú zo ɓo maambii,” rɔɔ nzoɓke ma̰y ɓay ká ɓil law-ɛ ya, a ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul fe káʼa ɓaa ɓayke na lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ni feke na.
41011024	Sa̰wke mini ze, mì ɓaa ha rì: feri riw bele ká ì vbi ɓáy nzaa ɓay kere na, ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa law-rì ɓo ɗi í ɓaa mii, ì ziŋ feke na ro, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa rì feke na.
41011025	Rɔɓay, zaɗka ì ɗo siya í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere, rɔɔ ì kɔ ká ì ɗo ɓáy ɓay ziŋ nzoɓ lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa rì nda buma ka ziŋ ni. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, Bǎa ɓaarì ká kaw nulue na, a ndáka buma ká tul fe ka̰aya ɓaarì na ziŋ rì nda̰w ɓáy.
41011026	[Roo lɛ, zaɗka ì nda buma ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ka̰aya ziŋ rì na ya lɛ, Bǎa ɓaarì ká nulue na ti ndáka buma ziŋ rì ká tul fe ka̰aya ɓaarì na ya nda̰w pi.»]
41011027	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i yḭ̀i í se Zuruzalɛm ɓa kḭ rɔɓay. Zaɗka Zezu ha̰ari ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri, rɔɔ ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri nda̰w na, i vi luo-ɛ
41011028	í vbi ni ɓay mii: «A ve ze mbi nzaa ha̰ mù nda̰w rɔɔ mù ɗáake fe niri key lɛ? Mase, nzoɓ ve ze ha̰ mù faa ɗáake lɛ?»
41011029	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì vbika rì ɓay mbḭw hɔy ɓay kɔ́kɔ. Zaɗka ì yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓayke ha̰ mì lɛ, mì kíɛ rì nzoɓ ká mbi nzaa ha̰ mì ɗáake fe niri key na.
41011030	Ɗáa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ká Za̰a ɗaa na wa̰a, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mase, uru saa luo nzoɓri hɔy lɛ? Ì yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓayke ha̰ mì laa.»
41011031	Báyḭi lɛ, i tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Náa ɓáari mina ro lɛ? Zaɗka náa yḭiŋrari ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, a yḭ́i a vbi naari mii, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ náa ɗáari law naari ɓo tul ɓay ká Za̰a ɓaa na ya lɛ?
41011032	A zaɗka náa yḭiŋrari mii, uru saa luo nzoɓri lɛ, a ɗoko mina lɛ?» Tusuɛke lɛ, i ɗaa hḭɛ ruɔ nzoɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele kɔ Za̰a ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tusuɛke.
41011033	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ Zezu mii: «Ɓuru kɔ ya.» Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Munu zu lɛ, nda-ndaɗ! Ɓi hɔy kara, mì ti kíɛ rì nzoɓ ká mbi nzaa ha̰ mì ɗáake fe niri key na ya nda̰w.»
41012001	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ha ri ɓáy faa law ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Nzoɓ mbḭw munu mgba wáa a maa pa̰ra puuri ɗo ɗi, a te kpaŋ gbi gbi kiri ɗi gbuk, a tie luɔ mbḭw ɗo ɗi ɓay ɗúɔke lere puu na, rɔɔ a mbuo fe ga-gaŋ ɗo ɓil wáa ha̰ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔkeri kaw ɗi. Falɛ lɛ, ka pɔŋ peɗke zuɔ nduo nzoɓ peɗkeri káʼa fa̰a ri na, ɓay haŋa ɓo few hóro lere puu na vi lɛ, i wál taa ɓeri a í pɔ́ŋ taa ɓari. Falɛ ku rɔɔ a zɔl a se varu.
41012002	Zaɗka few hóro lereke na vi báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ wáa na pie leɗ káw ɓe mbḭw se luo nzoɓ peɗkeri na ɓay ya̰aŋa lereke ká ɗo ɓay tul ɓeri na.
41012003	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ peɗkeri na i mgba leɗ káw ɓe na, í ndaka ni wɔɓ wɔɓ, í nii ni zɔl nduo-ɛ hɔy soli taŋ haŋa ni fe.
41012004	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ wáa na pie leɗ káw ɓe kḭ rɔɓay se luo-ri. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe na, i ndaka tul-e wɔɓ wɔɓ nda̰w, a í raɗ ni.
41012005	Nzoɓ wáa na pie leɗ káw ɓe kḭ rɔɓay. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe na, i i ni. Ka yḭ̀i a pie leɗ káw ɓe kḭri ŋgḭi ɓamba, lɛ, i ɗara ri faa mbḭw munu nda̰w: i ndaka nzoɓ ha̰nɛri, a í i nzoɓ ha̰wri.
41012006	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ wáa na ti ɓáy leɗ káwri mbǎa, ɓa vi-e káʼa kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ nun-ɛ ro ze tɔ̀ŋ. Ka pie ni ɓa ɔ́rɔ fal ɓa luo-ri, a ker ká ɓil law-ɛ mii, i hḭ́ɛ vu ɓeri na.
41012007	Roo lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ peɗkeri na mbi nun-ri í kɔ vu nzoɓ wáa na báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: “Ì kɔ, nzoɓ káʼa mgbaka fe pile na zu! Náa séri náa vǎa íri ni ɓo, náa pɔ́ŋri fe pile na ɓa taa naari.”
41012008	Ro, í vǎa mgba leɗ na í i ni, a í vbu ni ɓo fal wáa na.»
41012009	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri ɓay mii: «A munu ku wa̰a, nzoɓ wáa na a ɗáa mina lɛ? Kaʼa vǎa ika nzoɓ peɗkeri na, a ha̰ wáa na ha̰ nzoɓ kḭri.
41012010	Ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru key na wa̰a, ì kḭi ya ɓáy lɛ? Ɓayke ɓaa mii: “Tisaw ká nzoɓ mbúo hulri vbu ɓo ɓisuy na, yḭ̀i a vi ɓa tisaw kere ká kal tul tisaw ha̰wri pavbaɗ, a ɓa tisaw tigba̰a hul taa tusuɛke.
41012011	Feke ku na ɓa peɗ ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a ɓa fe ká ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay kɔ́kɔ.”»
41012012	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol Ziɓri, rɔɔ ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri nda̰w na, i nzaa faa ɓay mgbaka Zezu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔ nda̰w, law ɓay káʼa ɓaa na, ka túŋke ri tuŋ. Ro, í pɔŋ ni í zɔl, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i hḭɛ ruɔ nzoɓri.
41012013	Falɛ ku lɛ, i pie Farizi ha̰nɛri ɓáy Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i zuɔ fal Mbay Eroɗ ha ri kaw lakun Zezu ɓay nzaa nzi-ɛ ɓáy faa vbiw.
41012014	Ze í vbi ni mii: «Mbay, ɓuru kɔ nda̰w, ɓo na mù ɓaa sùo ɓay. Mù ya̰a kér ɓay nzoɓ mú ɗáake fe ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓo na mù ɓaa ɓay ziŋ nzoɓ taŋ náa nun nzoɓ, a mú fere nzoɓri tusuɛ ɓay ká se tul fe ɗáa ká rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Mu ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa. Wa̰a, bol kusol naari ha̰ faa ɓay haŋa nzoɓ puo larimbuo ha̰ Mbay Sezar mase, ha̰ faa ya lɛ? Ndaɗ ɓay púo larimbuo ha̰ ni mase, ndaɗ ɓay púo ha̰ ni ya lɛ?»
41012015	Lɛɛ, Zezu kɔ ɓay huo ɓari na nda̰w a vbi ri mii: «Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì nzaa nzaa-i ɓay mgbaka mì ɓáy ɓay lɛ? Ì mbi lari na mbḭw i víke ha̰ mì kɔ.»
41012016	Báyḭi lɛ, i mbi lari na í víke ha̰ ni, lɛ, ka vbi ri mii: «Tul nzoɓ, ɓáy riŋ nzoɓ ká i vbie ɗo lari key na wa̰a, ɓa nzoɓ ve zu lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa Mbay Sezar.»
41012017	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Munu zu lɛ, feri ká ɗo ɓay tul Mbay Sezar lɛ, ì ha̰ Sezar, a feri ká ɗo ɓay tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru laa lɛ, ì ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.» Lɛɛ, ɓay káʼa yḭiŋra ha ri na tuku ri ha ri kaw yer.
41012018	Falɛ ku lɛ, Sadusi ha̰nɛri i vi luo Zezu ɓay vbika ni ɓay. Ɓa ɓari Sadusiri na ze i ker í ɓaa mii, nzoɓ hu lɛ, ti tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ ya. Báyḭi lɛ, i vbi ni ɓay mii:
41012019	«Mbay, Moyze ɗaa bol kusol ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ha̰ naari mii, zaɗka nzoɓ ɗo ɓáy yṵ-ɛ, rɔɔ a hu a pɔŋ má̰y ɓe taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa yṵ-ɛ na ka ya̰a má̰y pile na, a mboŋke nzoɓ a kɔ̌rɔke mḭiri yṵ-ɛ ká hu na.
41012020	Ɓe ze, nzoɓ ɓáy yṵ-ɛri tul-ri tɔnɔ say, lɛ, ŋgɛrɛ leɗ na ya̰a má̰y a hu taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ.
41012021	Tɔŋnɔ fal-ɛ nzoɓ ndeke ɗi siɗike ya̰a má̰y pile ɓe na, a hu taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ na rɔɓay. Leɗ ndeke ɗi sayke na kara ɗo munu na nda̰w.
41012022	Nzoɓri ká tul-ri tɔnɔ say na, i ya̰a má̰yke na ya̰a riw bele, í hu taŋ mboŋke nzoɓ. Ká fal huɗ ɓari ku riw bele na, má̰y na kara ví hu nda̰w.
41012023	A munu ku wa̰a, síeke ká nzoɓri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, nzoɓ ve ká sakra ɓari ku na, má̰y na a ɓá taa ɓe lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓari ká tul-ri tɔnɔ say riw bele na, i ya̰a ni ya̰a ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele.»
41012024	Ro, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì wṵru faa; a wa̰a ì kɔ feke kɔ lɛ woo? Ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì laa ya nda̰w, a í kɔ hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya nda̰w pi.
41012025	Tusuɛke lɛ, síe ká nzoɓri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, wa̰rari ɓáy má̰yri i ti ya̰aŋa kḭ ya, roo lɛ, i ɗoko munu ɓa leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká nulue.
41012026	A ɓay ká se tul nzoɓri ká i tḭi saa luɔ huɗ na wa̰a, ì kḭi ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ká Moyze ɗaa na ya lɛ? Zaɗka Moyze ɓaa ɓay se tul puu ká gbúɗa ká huu sɛ ɗi ká ɓil law kɔr na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ha ni mii: “Mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Abaraham, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Izak, a mí ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Zakoɓ nda̰w.”
41012027	Munu zu lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ káw ɓáy kumnunri ɓo, ka ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ huɗeri ya. Ɓaarì na, ì wṵru faa mak mak ɓa tusuɛ.»
41012028	Nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká ɓa nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká laa má̰y ɓay ɓari a kɔ Zezu ká yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ɓáy zaɗɛ ha̰ Sadusiri na báyḭi lɛ, ka soro ɓa lakun-ɛ a vbi ni mii: «Bol kusol ha̰a ze ɓa ŋgɛrɛke kal ha̰wri riw bele lɛ?»
41012029	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu kɔ, bol kusol ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛke kal ha̰wri riw bele na ze ɗo key: “Izarayɛlri, ì te suku-rì í laa! Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naari na, ɓe huo-ɛ keklek hɔy ze ka ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
41012030	Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo na, mù híi ni ɓáy ɓil law-ari riw bele nda̰w, pa̰ra nun sùo-ɔri riw bele nda̰w, kér ɓay ɓori riw bele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy hṵrusuo-ɔri riw bele nda̰w pi.”
41012031	Bol kusol ndeke ɗi siɗike ze ɗo key “Mù híi kṵ-ɔ munu ká sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ.” Bol kusol kḭ ká kal ɓe niri ká siɗi key na tiya.»
41012032	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol na ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, zaɗɛ zu. Ɓay ká mù ɓaa na ɓa sùo ɓay kḭ! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru huo-ɛ keklek hɔy ze ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo, wṵru kḭ ká nde ni nde na tiya.
41012033	Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka hii Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ɓil law-ɛri riw bele, kér ɓay ɓeri riw bele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy hṵrusuo-ɛri riw bele nda̰w pi. Ka hii kṵ-ɛ munu ká sùo-ɛ ɓe kḭ. Ɗáa fekeri ku na kal haŋa fe poy ká i tay ɓáy huu ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓáy fe poy ha̰wri riw bele na.»
41012034	Zaɗka Zezu laa ɓay káʼa yḭiŋra ɓáy faake na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mù ɗo ɗi ya ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka re mbay ká tul-a.» Falɛ ku lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ziŋ faa ɓay vbika ni ɓay na mbǎa.
41012035	Zezu ɗo fére nzoɓri fe ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi ri mii: «Ɗaa mina rɔɔ nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓaa mii, Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ka ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ lɛ woo?
41012036	Ì kɔ, Mbay Daviɗ ká Tem Law Pie nda faa pol-e na ɓaa sùo-ɛ kḭ mii: “Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓi mii: ‘Mu ví káw tunduo hoɗo ɓi kpṵru maa ɓáy haŋa mì haw yṵm ká tul nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓori ha ri ɗo ɓa fe ɗáa ɓal-a zuɔ ɗi’.”
41012037	Mbay Daviɗ kḭ sùo-ɛ na ɗi Krisike na ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay. A munu ku wa̰a, ɗaa mina rɔɔ Krisi na a yḭ́i a ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ nda̰w lɛ woo?» Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba laa ɓay Zezu na ɓáy suoriya.
41012038	Zezu fere nzoɓri fe a ɓaa mii: «Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay tul nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká i hii ɓay ndúo maagari ká pì-pie yul ɓay há̰arike ha̰ nzoɓri hii soko korma korma ha ri ká zaɗ ruɔ ká nun nzoɓri,
41012039	í nzaa zaɗ káw riŋ ɗika ká ɗo pola ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭri ɓáy zaɗ kaw ŋgɛrɛri ká nam fe sṵm suoriya ɓay kaw ɗi.
41012040	I ya̰a fe má̰y síeri kpakla kpakla riw bele, rɔɔ í yḭ̀i í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere pì-pie ɓay haŋa nzoɓri kɔ lɛ, i písike ri. Nzoɓkeri ku na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗáa ri kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba.»
41012041	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu kaw siri maa ɓáy zaɗ ɓúo lari ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a kɔ nzoɓri ká i vi ɓay ɗáa lari zuɔ ɓil huo fe ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Nzoɓ feziŋari ŋgḭi ɓamba vi ɗaa lari ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi zuɔ ɗi.
41012042	Lɛɛ, má̰y síe mbḭw munu ká ɓa kṵku ví ɗaa soli siɗi hɔy ká ɓa vu lari nzik nzik na zuɔ ɗi.
41012043	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì kɔ key! Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, má̰y síe key ká kṵku ɓamba na, ka ha̰ lari kal nzoɓ ha̰wri riw bele ká i vi ɗaa lari ɓari zuɔ ɓil huo fe key,
41012044	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰wri riw bele na, i wal feziŋa ɓari ká maa ri mgbak mgbak na í ha̰. Roo lɛ, má̰y key ká feri riw bele puo ni na, ka ha̰ fe káʼa ɗǒke ɓay hɔ́lke sùo-ɛ na lɔɗ bele ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
41013001	Zaɗka Zezu tḭi saa ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ mbḭw munu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mu kɔ-kɔ́m mú kɔ bawda tisaw kereri ká ndaɗ ku! Mu kɔ hulri ká i ura ndaɗ key ku!»
41013002	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mù kɔ bawda tisaw kereri ká i ǔrake hulri na kḭ zu lɛ? Nam ha̰nɛ lɛ, tisawkeri key na ti tɔ́ŋ mbḭw ká̰y tul kḭ ya. Nzoɓri gá̰y ri riw bele zuɔ siri.»
41013003	Zezu se a kaw tul kuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Oliviye, ká ɗo maa ɓáy hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr, Zak ɓáy Za̰a, rɔɔ Andere nda̰w na, ɓari huo-ri ze i kaw ziŋ ni fi mbḭw í vbi ni ɓay mii:
41013004	«Mu ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa, síe ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ fe niri key na a vika lɛ? Rɔɓay, fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ a kál a kiɛ ɓuru nam ká fe niri riw bele a víke na lɛ?»
41013005	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ka úla rì ya.
41013006	Nzoɓri ví ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓáy riŋ-i í ɓaa mii: “Ɓa ɓi ze mì ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.” I úla nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41013007	Zaɗka ì láa soro ɓay ruyri ká nzoɓri ruu kḭ ká lakun-rì, a í laa soro ruyri ká nzoɓri ruu kḭ ɗi ɗi nda̰w na lɛ, ì ha̰ sùo-rì ka tɔ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa fe niri key na ka tḭi nda̰w rɔ! Roo lɛ, ɓa síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ká tusiri key ya rɔɓay.
41013008	Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari mbḭw, i úru ɓay rúu ziŋ nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo kḭri ɓoɗ. Nzoɓri ká ɓil puoruo mbḭw, ì úru ɓay rúu ziŋ nzoɓ puoruo kḭri. Tusiri a láŋ yik yik ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ nda̰w, kɔn luye a líe ɓáy zaɗri nda̰w pi. Fekeri ku na a ɗoko munu ɓa tiika nduo ká sɛ má̰y nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni ka mboŋ.
41013009	Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì kɔ sùo-rì ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Nzoɓri mgbaka rì ɓay pɔŋ rì ɓo nduo nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓayri, i ndaka rì ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri nda̰w. I fá̰a rì ɓay ɗáa rì kaw pol nzoɓ réke tul puori nda̰w, pol mbay luyeri nda̰w ɓay tul-i, a lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na ì ɓáa nasi ɓay ká se tul-i na ha ri.
41013010	Ɗo nun ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na riw bele ha ri laa pola nda̰w rɔɔ, ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ká tusiri na ka vi ɓáy.
41013011	A zaɗka i mgba rì ɓay ɗáa rì kaw pol nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓayri lɛ, ì ha̰ law-rì ka nzaa rì ɓay tul ɓayri ká i vǎa ɓáa na ku ya. Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, ì ɓáa ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha rì. Ɓayke ku na, ti uru saa luo-rì ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Tem Law Pie ze a ɗáa ɓaykeri na zuɔ nzáa-rì ha rì ɓaa ɓáy.
41013012	Namke ku na, yṵ kḭri mbika tul kḭ ha ri i ri nda̰w, bǎa leɗri ɗáa munu ziŋ vu ɓari nda̰w, a leɗri kara i úru ziŋ nzoɓ mbóŋ ri rì ha ri ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-ri nda̰w.
41013013	Nzoɓri riw bele i fṵ́y rì ɓay tul-i. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká mgba ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ kpṵru tḭi gbṵke lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa ni.»
41013014	«Namke ku na ì kɔ́kɔ nzoɓ ká i ɗi ni ɓa “Fe Ḭ̌m ká maa ɓáa ya” kaw zaɗ káʼa maa káw ɗi ya. (Nzoɓ ká kḭi mbeɗe key na lɛ, ka laa sa̰wke ta-taŋ!) Zaɗka i kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri ɗúu ɓa tul kuori.
41013015	Nzoɓ káʼa mgbaka ta̰ram ká tul hul siya na, ka ti ɗí ɓay vǎa mbika fe ká hula ya nda̰w,
41013016	a nzoɓ káʼa ɗoko wáa na ti yḭ́i se puɔ ɓay mbika maagari ɓe ya nda̰w pi.
41013017	Namkeri ku na, má̰yri ká i ɗoko ɓil, ɓáy má̰yri ká leɗri á̰w wa̰n ɓari na, i kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41013018	Ì kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa feri key na, ka tḭi ɓáy few lew teɗ ya!
41013019	Ká ɓil namkeri ku na, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe káʼa tḭ́i tul nzoɓri na, a kál tul zaɗ pavbaɗ. Úru saa nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗáake feri riw bele kpṵru tḭi vuri key na, kḭri kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká mini na nzoɓ kɔ ya rɔɓay, rɔɔ ɓil namri káʼa vi vuku hɔy kara, nzoɓ ti kɔ́kɔ kḭri sɛkɛ fe ká mini mbǎa mgbaŋ.
41013020	A zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay yḭ́iŋra namkeri ku na ɓa fal ya lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti káw ɓáy kumnun ya. Roo lɛ, namkeri ku na ka yḭiŋra ɓa fal ɓay tul nzoɓ ɓeri káʼa nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe.
41013021	Zaɗka nzoɓ ɓaa ha rì mii: “Ì kɔ-kɔ́m í kɔ Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ka ɗo zaɗ ni key” mase “ka ɗo lew,” lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ka ɓo ɗi ya,
41013022	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗi sùo-ri ɓa Krisi, ɓáy nzoɓri ká i ɗi sùo-ri ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i tḭ́i í ɗaa fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ɓay úlake nzoɓri. Ze faa ɗo ɗi lɛ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe na hɔy kara, i úla ri nda̰w.
41013023	Munu zu lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì! Mì ɓaa ɓayke riw bele ha rì ro.»
41013024	«Ká ɓil namkeri ku, ká fal kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ feke ku na, síe a ɗoko guu nda̰w, few ti híe mbǎa nda̰w,
41013025	mbaymawri tiika sa̰w gá̰y saa tumbam nda̰w, rɔɔ hṵrusuori ká i ɗo tumbam kara i láŋ yik yik nda̰w pi.
41013026	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri kɔ́kɔ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ká mì ví saa nulue ká ɓil síi mbam ɓáy bawda hṵrusuo, ɓáy riŋ ɗika.
41013027	Ɓi na, mì píe leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓiri ha ri se ɓáy tḭw zaɗri ká niŋ ká tusiri key ɓay mbṵ́ nzoɓri ká mì nan ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓi na, saa fi mbḭɛ mgba gbṵ zaɗ ká fi mbini.»
41013028	«Ì laa máa ɓay ká se tul puu nzum na, a í fére fe ká ɗi! Zaɗka ì kɔ rɔɔ nzaa tɔykeri luo vay a ɗo rék rek lɛ, ì kɔ ta-taŋ mii, nzaa bura mbam ɗo ɗi ya ro zu.
41013029	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, zaɗka ì kɔ fe niri key na tḭi lɛ, ì kɔ nda̰w mii, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓay ví; mì ɗo faa hul ro.
41013030	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓri ká timbɛɗɛ key na, i ti huka riw bele ya hɔy ze fe niri riw bele key na a tḭ́i.
41013031	Tumbam ɓáy tusiri na a kál hɔ̰́n bele. A roo lɛ, ɓay ɓiri na ti kál ya mgbaŋ.»
41013032	«Ɓay ká se tul namke mase sa̰w síeke ká ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì yḭ́i ɓay ví na, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara kɔ ya. Leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká nulue ya nda̰w, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ kara ya nda̰w; ɓa Bǎa huo-ɛ hɔy ze kɔ.
41013033	Munu zu lɛ, ì kɔ sùo-rì ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, namke káʼa vika na ì kɔ ya.
41013034	Ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗo séke ɓa varu káʼa pɔŋ fe ɓeri zuɔ nduo leɗ káw ɓeri. Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ha̰ ni peɗ ká maa ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa. Ka baka nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul ɓay haŋa ni ka káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-ɛ.
41013035	Munu zu lɛ, ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ká ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ puo a yḭ́i a vi na, ì kɔ ya. Kɔ ya lɛ, kaʼa vika ɓáy nzaa láw, mase ɓáy nzaa zaɗ buo, mase ɓáy tuo ká ka-káa, mase ɓáy tiɓie kara, ì kɔ ya nda̰w.
41013036	Zaɗkaʼa tḭi tul-rì mbuɗa lɛ, kɔkɔ káʼa zíŋ rì ká tul nam!
41013037	Ɓay ká mì ɓaa ha rì key na, mì ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele: ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke!»
41014001	Nam tɔ̀ŋ siɗi hɔy ro ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy ɓáy nam suoriya maapa ká i ɗaa taŋ fe hew fe na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol Ziɓri i nzaa faa ɓa law ɓay mgbaka Zezu ɓay ika ni.
41014002	Lɛɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ kḭ mii: «Ndaɗ ɓay mgbaka ni ká síe nam fe sṵm suoriya ya, ká ruɔ nzoɓri mgbaka í uru ziŋ naari.»
41014003	Zezu na ɗo Betani luo nzoɓ ká i ɗi ni ɓa Simo̰n nzoɓ kpḭri. Zaɗkaʼa kaw nzaa fe sṵm na báyḭi lɛ, má̰y mbḭw rìi tul-ri ká hula ɓáy guma ká i ɗaa ɓáy tisaw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa alabastre ká num mbaa ɗi. Numke ku na riŋ-ɛ ɓa nar ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy, a taŋ ka̰rara ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba. Ro, a haw nzaa guma numke na a kuna tɔlɔlɔ zuɔ tul Zezu.
41014004	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i kaw ɗi na, law-ri sɛ ri ha ri ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Úwaa! Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ má̰y key na ɓiɛ num na munu lɛ?
41014005	Ɓa fe ká nzoɓ hie ɓa pola zu lɛ, a zíŋ larike maa lari peɗ mbiimbam mbḭw ɓay haŋa nzoɓ kṵkuri.» Ze, í ɓaa ɓay ziŋ má̰y na ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ.
41014006	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì pɔ́ŋ ni ɗɛkɛkɛ! Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì yɔklɔ ni mini key lɛ? Fe káʼa ɗaa ziŋ mì key na, ɓa fe kere ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri.
41014007	Ì kɔ, nzoɓ kṵkuri na, i ɗoko ziŋ rì ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara. Ze ɓo ì hii ɗáa kere ziŋ ri lɛ, faa ɗo hɔy ì ɗaa. A roo lɛ, ɓi na, mì ti ɗoko ziŋ rì ɓaŋguɔ ya.
41014008	Má̰y na, fe ká maa ɗáa ni ze ka ɗaa. Ka kuna num ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy na zuɔ tul-i pola nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri vǒroke mì ɓáy.
41014009	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗri riw bele ká tusiri key ká i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká ɗi na, i loko soro fe ká má̰y key ɗaa na, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri kěrke ɓay se tul-e.»
41014010	Báyḭi lɛ, Zudas Iskariyoɗ, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na se luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓay léke faa ɓay pɔ́ŋ Zezu ɓo nduo-ri.
41014011	Zaɗka i laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa suoriya í waa ziŋ ni ɓay haŋa ni lari. Ro, Zudas tii sa̰w nzáa faa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰w síe káʼa máa ɓay pɔ́ŋke Zezu ɓo nduo-ri na.
41014012	Titire nam ká i ɗáake suoriya maapa ká taŋ fe hew fe na, ɓa nam ká i ike baɗuri í púoke fe ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay í ɗáake fe sṵm suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy. Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Zezuri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Zaɗ ha̰a ze mù hii haŋa ɓuru se ɗi ɓúru vǎa leke fe sṵm suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na ha̰ mù lɛ?»
41014013	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu pie leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri siɗi a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm. Ká zaɗɛ ku na ì zíŋ wa̰ra nzoɓ mbḭw soɓ tinay mbii, lɛ, ì se fal-ɛ.
41014014	Hul káʼa ríi ɗi na, ì ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ hulke na mii, “Mbay ɓaa mii, wa̰a, ɓil hul ká ɓeri káw ɗi ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal ɓeriri ɓay sṵŋa fe sṵm suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na ɗo ha̰a lɛ?”
41014015	Lɛɛ, kaʼa kíɛ rì hul ká̰y tul kḭ mbḭw ká ɓil-e aa raɗ raɗ ká i leke feri riw bele zeɓ zeɓ zuɔ ɗi ɓáy zaɗɛ ro na. Zaɗɛ ku na ze, ì léke fe sṵmri na ká ɗi ɓay haŋa náa sṵ́ri.»
41014016	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na i zɔl í tḭi ŋgɛrɛpuo í vǎa ziŋ feri riw bele ɓáy zaɗɛ munu ká Zezu ɓaa ha ri na. Ze í leke fe sṵm suoriya na ká ɗi.
41014017	Zaɗka síe riŋ bele na, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na i se í tḭi ɓil hulke na.
41014018	A zaɗka i kaw nzaa tutakra fe sṵm, í ɗo sṵŋa fe na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì ká sṵ fe ziŋ mì key na, a mbika tul-i.»
41014019	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗaa síe riw bele í tii sa̰w vbika ni ɓay mbḭw mbḭw ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele mii: «Ɓa ɓi ya na maa?»
41014020	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì ká duɔ falɛ siɗi key ká mbṵ nduo fe sṵm ziŋ mì.
41014021	Ɓa tusuɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na, mì huka munu ká i ɓaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-i. Roo lɛ, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe taa minake ze a ɗoko ɓay tul nzoɓ ká mbi tul ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na lɛ! Nzoɓke ku na, mbóŋ ni ya ndaɗ mba mbóŋ ni.»
41014022	Zaɗka i ɗo sṵŋa fe na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi maapa a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w rɔɔ, a haw a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ya̰a; ɓe ni key na, ɓa naysuo-i zu.»
41014023	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a mbi koɓo, a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a ha ri nzɔ ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele.
41014024	Ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓe ni key na ɓa sím sùo-i zu. Ɓa sím ɓi káʼa úo zuɔ siri ɓay síŋke sáka kuni ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru saa ziŋ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41014025	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: mì ti nzɔkɔ mbii lere puu na mbǎa, kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká mì nzɔkɔke taa fie ziŋ rì ɓáy nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a réke mbay ká tul nzoɓri na.»
41014026	Falɛ ká i ɗi sim nam suoriya í písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na báyḭi lɛ, i zɔl í vǎa kaw tul kuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Oliviye.
41014027	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì pɔ́ŋ mì riw bele munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: “Mì ika nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗu, lɛ, baɗuri na i zékre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ riw bele.”
41014028	Roo lɛ, zaɗka mì tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ na, mì vǎa giyaŋ rì ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.»
41014029	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ze nzoɓ ha̰wri riw bele pɔŋ mù hɔy kara, ɓi na mì ti pɔ́ŋ mù ya.»
41014030	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: vuri, ká ɓil suŋ key na, pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa tuo ka-káa ba siɗi lɛ, ɓo na mù má̰y ɓay ká tul-i faa ɓal ba say mii, mù kɔ mì ya.»
41014031	Roo lɛ, Piyɛr geɗe ɓayke ɓáy hṵrusuo mii: «Ze ɓay haŋa mì hu na ziŋ mù hɔy kara, mì ti má̰y ɓay ká tul-a ya!» A lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri riw bele na i ɓaa faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
41014032	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i tḭi zaɗ mbḭw munu ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Gesemane. Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì káw zaɗ ni key, a ɓi lɛ, mì séke ɓay vǎa ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.»
41014033	Zezu ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Zak ɓáy Za̰a i se ziŋ ni. Lɛɛ, law-ɛ tii sa̰w sɛkɛ ni rìi fe ká se ɓay mḭ-miira mini key, a hḭɛ ɗaa ni zikiki.
41014034	Ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká ɓil law-i maa huɗ. Ì káw zaɗ ni key ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke.»
41014035	Ka se ndḭi munu ɓa pola a kii raɗ a naa siri a koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɓo, zaɗka faa ɗo ɗi lɛ, sɛkɛ fe káʼa ɗoko ɓay tul-e na ka ɗaa ni ya.
41014036	Ka ɓaa mii: «Bǎa, fe ká mba mù mba na tiya. Fe sɛkɛ káʼa ɗáa mì key na, mu ha̰ ni ka ɗo ɗi ɗi ziŋ mì, roo lɛ, mu ɗaa fe ká law-a ze hii ɓo, fe ká law-i ze hii ya.»
41014037	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se luo leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká say na, lɛ, ka ziŋ ri ká tul nam. Ro, a tuma ri a ɓaa ha̰ Simo̰n Piyɛr mii: «Simo̰n, mù na-nam lɛ woo? Mù maa káw siya sa̰w síe mbḭw ya hɔy lɛ woo?
41014038	Ì káw ɓáy nzaa ɓal-rì kekeke í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere, ká ɓay líe ɓo ɓil nzaa úla. Ká ɓil law nzoɓ na law hiiya ɗáa kere ze mbaa ɗi gba̰y gba̰y, roo lɛ, hṵrusuo-ɛ maa ya.»
41014039	Ka naa sùo-ɛ na rɔɓay a vǎa koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru munu káʼa ɗaa pola na ɓáy.
41014040	Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a ví ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri na rɔɓay ká tul nam, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam hii nun-ri dik dik ɓáy. Lɛɛ, i kɔ ɓay ká ɓay yḭ́iŋra ha̰ ni ya.
41014041	Zaɗkaʼa yḭ̀i saa zaɗ ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere faa ɓal ba sayke na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì na-nam rɔɓay í mgba ta̰ram sùo-rì kɛlɛ? Maa ro; sa̰w síe ká i pɔ́ŋke ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ɓo nduo nzoɓ feya̰ari na vi ro.
41014042	Ì úru siya náa séri! Ì kɔ-kɔ́m í kɔ nzoɓ káʼa mbika tul-i na ɗo key.»
41014043	Zaɗka Zezu ɗo ɓáa ɓay kɔɓ ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, Zudas ká ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ fal-ɛ siɗi na, tḭi ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri ká i vi ɓáy maamiiri ɓáy puuri gbiri gbiri ɗo nduo-ri. Ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ze pie ri se.
41014044	Zudas, nzoɓ mbika tul Zezu na, ka leke ɓay ziŋ ruɔ nzoɓri a ɓaa mii, fe ká ɓeri ɗáa ɓay haŋa ri kɔ́ke ni na ze ɗo key: «Nzoɓ ká mì mgba ni girik mí a̰w nzi-ɛ lɛ, ɓa ɓe ká ì hii na zu. Ì mgba ni í kɔrɔ ni ha̰ ni se ziŋ rì.»
41014045	Ví Zudas ká munu hɔy lɛ, ka soro ɓa lakun-ɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay!» Lɛɛ, ka mgba ni girik a a̰w nzi-ɛ.
41014046	Ro, nzoɓ ha̰wri ɗaa so tul Zezu kuruk í mgba ni.
41014047	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ká ɗo zaɗɛ na, naa maamii hǎr a téke suku leɗ káw ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na mbɛkɛɗ ɓo ɓisuy.
41014048	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì tḭi ɓáy maamiiri ɓáy puuri gbiri gbiri ɓay mgbaka mì rìi fe ká mì ɓa dɔmbirim nzoɓ lɛ woo!
41014049	Namri riw bele na mì ɗo ziŋ rì mí fere rì fe ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, lɛ, ì mgba mì ya. Roo lɛ, fekeri tḭi munu ɓay haŋa ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ.»
41014050	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri riw bele pɔŋ ni, a í zuɔ ɗul haɗ bele.
41014051	Lɛɛ, leɗ kuban mbḭw munu rie gari nam hɔy ɗo sùo-ɛ a séke fal Zezu. Báyḭi lɛ, i lie mgbaka ni.
41014052	Roo lɛ, ka pɔŋ gari nam ɓe na ɓa nduo-ri a ɗuu sùo-ɛ hɔy nduɔɗi.
41014053	I se ɓáy Zezu ká luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye, lɛ, i mbṵ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri riw bele, ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri nda̰w ká ɗi.
41014054	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na dii fal Zezu ɗi ɓáy salke ɗaka ɗaka kpṵru a tḭi ɓil mgbaŋ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na. Ká zaɗɛ ku na, ka kaw a nṵu huu ziŋ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ zaɗri.
41014055	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye ká luo Ziɓri na riw bele, i nzaa faa ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul Zezu ɓay ika ni. Roo lɛ, i ziŋ ɓay mbḭw ká ɓay ɗáa ɓo tul-e ya.
41014056	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i kuɗ ɓay zuɔ nzaa Zezu, lɛ, ɓay ɓari na zuɔ kḭ ya.
41014057	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri uru í kuɗ ɓay zuɔ nzi-ɛ mii:
41014058	«Ɓuru laa ɓay ká nzi-ɛ mii, ɓeri ɓíɛ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nzoɓ mbuo ɓáy nduo-ɛ. A nam say hɔy lɛ, ɓeri ɗáa kḭ ká nduo nzoɓ ɗaa ya.»
41014059	Roo lɛ, ká tul ɓay na ku hɔy kara, ɓay ɓari zuɔ kḭ ya wṵ̌m.
41014060	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na uru siya ká sakra nzoɓri a vbi Zezu mii: «Ɓay niri ká nzoɓ niri mbi ɓo tul-a key na wa̰a, mù ti yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay mbḭw ya hɔy lɛ?»
41014061	Lɛɛ, Zezu mgba nzi-ɛ ɗo ɗi a ɓaa ɓay mbḭw ya. Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na vbi ni ɓay ɓa kḭ rɔɓay mii: «Wa̰a, mù ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na lɛ? Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nzoɓri pisi ni na wa̰a, mù ɓa vi-e lɛ woo?»
41014062	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗɛ zu; mì ɓa ɓe na kḭ, lɛ, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na ɓaarì riw bele na, ì kɔ́kɔ mì kaw tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo. Rɔɓay, ì kɔ́kɔ mì ká mì ví saa nulue ká ɓil síi mbam.»
41014063	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na gɔ gari ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ tǐr a ɓaa mii: «Káy! Náa vbikari nzoɓ nasi ɓay kḭri ɓay ɗáake mina ɓáy lɛ?
41014064	Ɓay niri káʼa ɓaa a tḭ̌irike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì la-laa. Wa̰a, ì ker mina lɛ?» Lɛɛ, nzoɓri riw bele na ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-e í ɓaa mii: «Ɓay mgba tul-e, a ɗaa fe ká maa huɗ.»
41014065	Ɓe nu ku ro, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri tii sa̰w sa̰-sa̰mi zuɔ nun-ɛ, í siŋ nun-ɛ ɓáy vay gari, í nda ni gúk guk í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa; kíɛ ɓuru nzoɓ ká nda mù key!» Ro, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ zaɗri na, i nda hala nun-ɛ kpǎy kpǎy.
41014066	Piyɛr kaw ɓil mgbaŋ kɔɓ hɔy lɛ, leɗ má̰y mbḭw munu ká sakra leɗ káw ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na tḭi ɓil mgbaŋ na.
41014067	Zaɗkaʼa kɔ Piyɛr ɗo nṵ́u huu báyḭi lɛ, ka ŋga̰a ni zii a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo kara mù se ziŋ Zezu, leɗban ká Nazarɛɗ na nda̰w.»
41014068	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ma̰y a ɓaa mii: «Mì kɔ ya. Ɓay ká mù ɓaa key na, mì ta̰a láa kpṵy.» Falɛ ku lɛ, ka uru a tḭi saa nzaa mgbaŋ na ndḭi munu, [lɛ, tuo ka-káa.]
41014069	Roo lɛ, leɗ má̰y na kɔ ni a tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay na rɔɓay ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na mii: «Leɗban key na, ka ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku.»
41014070	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr yḭ̀i a ma̰y ɓay ɓa kḭ rɔɓay. Falɛ ku ndḭi hɔy lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, mù ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù ɓa nzoɓ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.»
41014071	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tii sa̰w háa huɗ mii: «Mi hu mak mak! Leɗban ká ì ɓaa ɓay ɓe ha̰ mì key na, ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, mì kɔ ni ya!»
41014072	Lɛɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, tuo ka-káa faa ɓal ba siɗike. Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ker se tul ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni pola mii: «Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa tuo ka-káa ba siɗi lɛ, mù má̰y ɓay ká tul-i faa ɓal ba say mii, mù kɔ mì ya na.» Báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi ɓáy rɛw ɓɔɗɔk ɓɔɗɔk.
41015001	Ɓáy tiɓie piɛɗ hɔy, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri, rɔɔ ɓáy kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye ká luo Ziɓri bele na, i mbṵ kḭ ɓay mbika nzaa-ri ɓay ɗáa fe ziŋ Zezu. Báyḭi lɛ, i ha ri mgba ni í siŋ ni í séke ni ha̰ Pilaɗ.
41015002	Ro, Pilaɗ vbi Zezu mii: «Ɓo kḭ ze, mù ɓa mbay Ziɓri kɛ́lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓe kḭ ze mù ɓaa ku.»
41015003	Falɛ lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɗaa ɓayri ŋgḭi ɓamba zuɔ tul-e.
41015004	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ yḭ̀i a vbi ni ɓay rɔɓay mii: «Mù ti yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ya lɛ? Ɓayri riw bele ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-a key na wa̰a, mù la-laa kḭ zu lɛ?»
41015005	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mbḭw ha̰ ni ya, ha̰ ɓayke ku na tuku Pilaɗ ha̰ ni kaw yer.
41015006	Ká ɓil mbiimbamri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele na, zaɗka nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy vi báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri vǎa vbi Pilaɗ ha̰ ni tina nzoɓ mbḭw ká hul sal ha ri.
41015007	A lɛ, sewke ku na, nzoɓ mbḭw riŋ-ɛ ɓa Barabas naa hul sal ɓáy nzoɓri ká i tḭ̀i ká tul nzoɓ rewpuori, a í i nzoɓ mbḭw.
41015008	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri se luo Pilaɗ, a í tii sa̰w vbika ni feri káʼa ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ ha ri na.
41015009	Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Wa̰a, ì hii ɓay haŋa mì tina Zezu, mbay ɓaarì Ziɓri na ha rì lɛ?»
41015010	Ka vbi ri munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka kɔ nda̰w, ɓa fe ɗáa sere ze ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri pɔ̌ŋke Zezu nduo nduo-ɛ.
41015011	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri na, i suru tigba̰a ruɔ nzoɓri ɓay haŋa ri koɗ Pilaɗ ha̰ ni ka tína Barabas ze ka ha̰ ɓari.
41015012	Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ mbi ɓay a vbi ruɔ nzoɓri ɓa kḭ mii: «Wa̰a, ha̰a ḭi ze ì hii ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa ziŋ nzoɓ ká ì ɗi ni ɓa mbay Ziɓri na lɛ?»
41015013	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa fe ɓáy nzaa-ri ɓa kḭ gɔ̌m í ɓaa mii: «Ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ!»
41015014	Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ vbi ri mii: «A ku wa̰a, ka̰aya ḭi rɔɔ ka ɗaa lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, i guu fe ɓáy nzaa-ri gǔrum mgba mgba ɓa siya mii: «Ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ!»
41015015	Munu ká Pilaɗ hii ɓay ɗáa fe ha̰ sùo ruɔ nzoɓri rii ri na, ka tina Barabas ha ri, a ha̰ nzoɓ yṵm ɓeri nda Zezu ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ raɗ raɗ. Falɛ ku nda̰w rɔɔ, a pɔŋ ni ha ri vǎa ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ ɓáy.
41015016	Nzoɓ yṵmri na i séke ɓáy Zezu ká ɓil boro mbay nzoɓ réke tul puo na, a í ɗi kuɗu nzoɓ yṵmri riw bele na mbṵ kḭ ziŋ ri ká ɗi.
41015017	I nduo ni maagari mbay ká sḭ̀i hola hola. I kaŋ ŋgatukru ɓa taguɓa mbay rɔɔ í mbi guɓa tul-e.
41015018	Falɛ ku rɔɔ i tii sa̰w hii soko ha̰ ni mii: «Soko woo, mbay Ziɓri!»
41015019	Ro í zɔɗ tul-e ɓáy ŋgasikri raɗ raɗ, í sa̰-sa̰mi toɓ toɓ zuɔ nun-ɛ; í huku siri ká pol-e, í ɗiŋ tul-ri munu ká i kǎwke pol mbay.
41015020	Zaɗka i siɛ ni kpṵru maa ri na báyḭi lɛ, i naa maagari mbay ká sḭ̀i hola hola na, í yḭ̀i í nduo ni gari ɓeri nda̰w rɔɔ, í tḭ́ike ni ɓa nzaa zaɗ ɓay ɓér ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ.
41015021	Nzoɓ mbḭw, puo ɓe ɗo Sirɛ̰n, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simo̰n, ka ɓa bǎa Alezandere ɓáy Rufusi, uru saa puo ɓisuy a ɗo kali ɓáy faa na ku. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri mgba ni í haa ni ya̰a puu say huɗ Zezu na a soɓ.
41015022	Lɛɛ, i séke ni ɓa zaɗ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Gɔlgota, má̰rake lɛ ɓaa mii, zaɗ tuŋguo tul.
41015023	Ká zaɗɛ ku na, i hii ɓay haŋa ni him ká i zukri ɓáy fe zóŋke ká i ɗi ɓa mir na ha̰ ni nzɔ. Roo lɛ, ka nzɔ ya.
41015024	Falɛ ku lɛ, i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ, a í leke kḭ gari ɓeri í ɗaa dḭi dḭi ɓay kɔ́kɔ fe ká nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a a zíŋ.
41015025	Sa̰w síe ká i ɓérke ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ na, maa ɓáy síe ká uru ndḭi ɓa siya.
41015026	Mbeɗe huɗ ká i ɓer ɗo tul-e na, kiɛ nzoɓri ɓay huɗ ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-e. Mbeɗeke ku na ɓaa mii: «Mbay Ziɓri.»
41015027	I ɓer dɔmbirimri siɗi ɗo tul puu say huɗri nda̰w ká lakun Zezu. Nzoɓ mbini ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo hoɗo ɓe, a nzoɓ mbḭɛ laa lɛ, ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo gel ɓe.
41015028	[Ɓe munu rɔɔ, ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ɓayke ɓaa mii: «Nzoɓri kḭi ni ɗo sakra dɔmbirimri.»]
41015029	Nzoɓri ká i kal ká zaɗɛ ku na, i raɗ ni í téke tul-ri ɓoko ɓoko í ɓaa mii: «Hɛ̰ɛ! Ɓo ká mù hii gbúr hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a nam say hɔy lɛ, mù mbúo kḭ ɗo zaɗɛ na,
41015030	mu ya̰a sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ, a mú ɗì saa tul puu say huɗ na ku ha̰ ɓuru kɔ!»
41015031	Ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri, i siɛ ni faa mbḭw munu na nda̰w ká sakra kḭ mii: «Ka ya̰a nzoɓ ha̰wri, roo lɛ, ka maa ɓay ya̰aŋa sùo-ɛ ɓe kḭ ya!
41015032	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓe Krisi, mbay Izarayɛl na, ka ɗì saa tul puu say huɗ na timbɛɗɛ key ha̰ ɓuru kɔ! Zaɗka ɓuru kɔ ro lɛ, ɓe rɔɔ ɓuru ɗáa law ɓuru ɓo tul-e ɓáy!» A nzoɓri ká i ɓer ri ɗo tul puu say huɗ ká lakun Zezu na, i raɗ ni nda̰w.
41015033	Ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul na, fe guɓa nun síe ha̰ zaɗ ɗo gbukru kpṵru maa ɓáy síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ.
41015034	Síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ɓay ɓáy bawda kusol-e ɓeleŋ mii: «Eloy, Eloy, lama sabatani!» Ɓáy nzaa ɓay naari lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓi! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓi! Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù pɔŋ mì lɛ?»
41015035	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ká i laa kusol-e ká mgba ɓeleŋ na i ɓaa mii: «Ì laa! Ka ɗi Eli!»
41015036	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku ɗuu a vǎa ɗoŋ mbii fe sṵ́uke zuɔ vay gari ká nzɔ mbii nzɔ, a siŋ ɗo nzaa ŋgasikri, rɔɔ a zuɗa ha̰ Zezu ɓay haŋa ni ka nzɔ a ɓaa mii: «Ì giyaŋ náa kɔ́ri! Wa̰a, Eli na a ví ɗíra ni saa tul puu say huɗ na lɛ?»
41015037	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗaa fe ɓeleŋ, lɛ, law-ɛ ví tuo.
41015038	Ɓe nu ku lɛ, gari ká kúŋ ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na saka tǎr saa siya kpṵru mgba siri gbaa.
41015039	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm ká ɗo pol Zezu káʼa kɔrɔ ni na kɔ kḭri huɗ ká Zezu hu na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa tusuɛ kḭ!»
41015040	Má̰y ha̰nɛri i ɗo zaɗɛ ku nda̰w, i ɗo ɗi ɗi í kɔ feri ká kal na ɗeke. Ká sakra ɓari ku na, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala nda̰w, Mari máa Zoze ɓáy Zak ká ɓa leɗ kuban nda̰w, rɔɔ Salome nda̰w pi.
41015041	Ɓari na ze i se fal Zezu í ɗaa peɗ ha̰ ni ɓáy namri káʼa ɗǒke kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na. Má̰y kḭri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ká i uru saa Galele í se ziŋ Zezu kpṵru se ŋgɛrɛpuo Zuruzalɛm na, i ɗo zaɗɛ ku nda̰w.
41015042	Nam ká Zezu hu na ɓa nam ká ɗo pol nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri, ká i lěkeke fe sṵm ɓay tul namke na. Munu ká zaɗ ɓa láw ro na báyḭi lɛ,
41015043	Zezeɓ ká puo ɓe ɗo Arimate na vi. Ɓe na ka ɓa ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ká ɓil kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye, ká i hḭɛ ni ɓamba. Ɓe kara ka giyaŋ nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ví réke mbay ká tusiri key na nzokɗo. Báyḭi lɛ, ka mgba sùo-ɛ ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓa wa̰ra nzoɓ, a se luo Pilaɗ a vbi ni huɗ Zezu ɓay vóro.
41015044	Zaɗka Pilaɗ laa mii, Zezu hu-hu na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ni, ze a ɗi ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm a vbi ni mii: «Zezu na hu bole ɗi ɗi ro lɛ?»
41015045	Zaɗkaʼa laa ɓay ká nzaa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm ká ɓaa ha̰ ni mii, Zezu hu ro na báyḭi lɛ, ka pɔŋ faa ha̰ Zezeɓ mbi huɗ na.
41015046	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezeɓ se a vǎa hie gari pie ká ndaɗ ɓamba a víke a ɗira huɗ Zezu saa tul puu say huɗ a kǎarike ni. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka mbi a vǎa ɗaa ɓo huo tisaw ká i kpɛrɛ ɓa luɔ huɗ ɓa tá̰w, rɔɔ a ha ri giri bawda maa tisaw, a mbǐike diɓ ɗo ɗi.
41015047	Lɛɛ, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala ɓáy Mari máa Zoze na, i kɔ zaɗ ká i ɗaa huɗ Zezu na ɓo ɗi.
41016001	Zaɗka nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri kal na báyḭi lɛ, Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala, ɓáy Mari máa Zak, rɔɔ ɓáy Salome nda̰w na, i se í vǎa hie numri ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy ɓay séke ɓay ɗáa zuɔ tul huɗ Zezu.
41016002	Tiɓie ká síe dimasi ká síe tḭi mbuu na báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri na i se ɓa tupal,
41016003	lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «A wa̰a, a ve ze a giri maa tisaw ká mbii nzaa huo na ɓa zaɗ kḭ a pɔŋ faa ha̰ naari lɛ?»
41016004	Zaɗka i mbi nun-ri í kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa ɓaɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ bawda maa tisaw na giri ɓo fi mbḭw ro.
41016005	Báyḭi lɛ, i se í rìi luɔ huɗ na, lɛ, i kɔ leɗ kuban mbḭw ká nduo maagari ɓa pie kaw fi hoɗo. Lɛɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba.
41016006	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ kuban na ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì hḭ́ɛ ya! Ì nzaa Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ, ɓe ká i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ. Ka tḭi saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy kumnun; ka ti zaɗ ni ya. Ì kɔ-kɔ́m í kɔ zaɗ ká i ɗaa ni ɓo ɗi na ze ɗo key.
41016007	Ì se ɓo í vǎa ɓaa ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal Zezu ha̰wri mii, ka se ɓay vǎa giyaŋ rì ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Ɓe ze ɓa zaɗ ká ì kɔ́kɔ ni ká ɗi munu káʼa ɓaa ha rì pola na!»
41016008	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri na i tḭi saa luɔ huɗ na, í ɗuu ɗi ɗi ɓáy tupal na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba a í tɔ ɗɛk ɗɛk. Hḭɛ ká ɗaa ri na ha ri ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ mbḭw ya.
41016009	[Falɛ ká Zezu tḭi saa luɔ huɗ ɓa tiɓie piɛɗ ká síe dimasi na báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi tul Mari ká Madala pola, ɓe káʼa nii temndayari tɔnɔ say ká tul-e.
41016010	Mari na se a kḭi ɓayke na ha̰ ɓari ká i ɗo ziŋ ni ká í ɗaa síe í kaw ɓáy rɛw.
41016011	Lɛɛ, zaɗka i laa ɓayke káʼa ɓaa mii, Zezu kaw ɓáy kumnun ká ɓeri kɔ ni ɓáy nun ɓeri na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay ɓe na ya.
41016012	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu kiɛ sùo-ɛ ɓáy faa kḭ ɓoɗ, a tḭi tul leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká tul-ri siɗi ká i ɗo séke ɓa vu puo ká ɓisuy.
41016013	Ɓari na, i yḭ̀i í kḭi ɓayke ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ ha̰wri. Lɛɛ, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay ɓari na ya nda̰w.
41016014	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu tḭi tul leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ mbḭw ká i kaw nzaa tutakra ɓay sṵŋa fe. Ka uru ziŋ ri ɓay law-ri ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-e ya nda̰w, ɓay law-ri ká ŋgɔŋ ká í ɗo tul ɓay ɓáa ɓari ká mii, ɓari kɔ ni ɓáy kumnun ro na ya nda̰w pi.
41016015	Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì se ɓáy zaɗri riw bele ká tusiri key, í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele.
41016016	Nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i, a ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa ni. A nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i ya laa lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-e.
41016017	Lɛɛ, ɓari ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-i na, fe saŋri ká i ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ na ze ɗo key: i níi temndayari ɓáy riŋ-i nda̰w; i ɓáa nzaa fieri nda̰w.
41016018	Zaɗka i mgba sɔy ɓáy nduo-ri, mase i nzɔ sa̰wpuu huɗ kara, feke ti ɗáa ri sɛkɛ mbḭw ya; i ɗáa nduo-ri ɓo tul nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri, lɛ, i váa ɓáy kere kiyaw kiyaw nda̰w.»
41016019	Falɛ ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ɓaa ɓay munu ha ri na báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ni se nulue a ha̰ ni kaw tunduo hoɗo ɓe.
41016020	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri se í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ɓáy zaɗri riw bele. Ŋgɛrɛmbay saɗ ziŋ ri ɓáy peɗri ká i ɗaa. Ɓáy faa fe ɗáa saŋri na, nzoɓri kɔ mii, ɓay ɓari na ɓa tusuɛ kḭ.]
42001001	Soko ɓo Tiyofil ká mù ɓa nzoɓ luye. Nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i nzaa faa í ɗaa mbeɗe í kḭ́ike feri ká kal ká sakra ɓuru na ɓáy zaɗɛ.
42001002	Nzoɓri ká i kɔ fekeri ɓáy nun-ri titire ɗɛkrɛ ká í vi ɓa nzoɓ ka-káa Ɓay Kere na, i kḭi fal fekeri ɓáy nzi-ɛ riw bele ha̰ ɓuru laa.
42001003	Ɓe mini ze, ɓi kara mì kɔ ɓa fe ká ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay ɗáa mbeɗe kḭ ɓay kḭ́ike feri ká kal ɓáy nzi-ɛ lɛm lɛm na ha̰ mù ɓo Tiyofil nzoɓ luye, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì vbi sa̰w fekeri ká kal ɓáy titire ɗɛkrɛ na riw bele, mí kɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ ta-taŋ ŋgiɗ bele.
42001004	Mì ɗaa mini key ɓay haŋa mù ya̰a ɓay ká i fere mù pola na ka ɓa sùo ɓay.
42001005	Sew ká Eroɗ re mbay ká tusiri Ziɓri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu ɓa nzoɓ fe poy, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zakari. Ká sakra nzoɓ fe poyri na, ka kaw ziŋ kuɗu nzoɓ taa Abiyari. Riŋ má̰y ɓe ɓa Elizabɛɗ, vu bulu Aro̰n, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy ká piɛɗke lew.
42001006	Ɓari siɗi bele na, i ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, í ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛmbay í hḭɛ bol nzi-ɛ ɓáy zaɗɛ riw bele.
42001007	Lɛɛ, i mboŋ leɗ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Elizabɛɗ na se suo. Ɓari siɗi bele na i ɗi tá̰w ɓamba ro.
42001008	Nam mbḭw munu kuɗu nzoɓ Zakariri i ɗo ɗáa peɗ ɓari ká pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, lɛ, Zakari kara ɗo ɗáa peɗ ɓe ká pol-e nda̰w.
42001009	Munu ká ɓa fe sa̰w ɓari nzoɓ fe poyri na, i ɗaa dḭi dḭi í náake ni ɗo ɓoɗ ɓay haŋa sa̰w síe ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na vi lɛ, ka nduo a se ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a uu fe ha̰ ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
42001010	Zaɗka sa̰w síe káʼa ɗo úuke fe ká ɓil hula na vi báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele mbṵ tul kḭ í kaw kɛlɛ í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere.
42001011	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbḭw ká nulue tḭi tul Zakari a ɗo pol-e ká fi hoɗo tutakra úu fe na.
42001012	Zaɗka Zakari kɔ ni na báyḭi lɛ, ha̰ hḭɛ ɗaa ni a tɔ gbala gbala.
42001013	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Zakari, mu hḭ́ɛ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká mù koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓayke na tɔɗɔ ɓo suk-e. Elizabɛɗ ká ɓa má̰y ɓo na, a mbóŋ leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ, lɛ, mù túu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Za̰a.
42001014	Kaʼa ɓá fe bawda suoriya ɓo, a nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba i ɗáa suoriya ɓay tul mboŋa ɓe nda̰w,
42001015	ɓay ḭi lɛ, a ɓá bawda nzoɓ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka ti nzɔkɔ him yḭŋke ya nda̰w, him ha̰y ká yḭŋ ya kara ka ti nzɔkɔ ya nda̰w. Tem Law Pie ze a mbáa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y ɓáy ɗol ɓe káʼa ɗǒke ɓil mi-ɛ kɔɓ hɔy na.
42001016	Ɓe na, a haŋa leɗ Izarayɛlri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri yḭ̀i í se fal Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓari na.
42001017	Kaʼa séke pol Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓay léke faa ɓe. Fe ɗáa ɓeri ɓáy kér ɓay ɓeri, a ɗoko ɓáy hṵrusuo munu ká taa Eli, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Kaʼa léke law bǎa leɗri ɓáy vu ɓari ɓay haŋa ri zuɔ ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy nda̰w, a leke law nzoɓ mbaka nzaari, a ha ri ya̰a nun nzɛm nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛri ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w pi. Kaʼa ɗáa munu a lěkeke law nzoɓri ha ri ɗǒke ɗi ya ɓáy vika Ŋgɛrɛmbay.»
42001018	Báyḭi lɛ, Zakari yḭ̀i a vbi leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na mii: «Wa̰a, mì ɗáa mina rɔɔ mí kɔ ɓay ká mù ɓaa ha̰ mì key na ɓa sùo ɓay lɛ? Ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi na, mì ɗi tá̰w ro, a má̰y ɓi kara ɓa ŋgɛrɛma̰y nda̰w pi.»
42001019	Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɓa Gabiriyɛl, nzoɓ ɗoko pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay ɗáa peɗ ha̰ ni. Ze ka píe mì ɓay haŋa mì ví ɓaa Ɓay Kere key na ha̰ mù.
42001020	Ze mu laa: timbɛɗɛ key na kusol-a a mbíi gbaŋ, mù ti máa ɓáa ɓay ya kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká fekeri a ví na nda̰w rɔɔ, mù ɓáa ɓay na ɓáy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù ɗaa law-a ɓo tul ɓay ká mì ɓaa ha̰ mù na ya. Roo lɛ, feri ká mì ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ mù na, sewke vi lɛ, a ɗoko munu.»
42001021	Báyḭi lɛ, síeke ku na, ruɔ nzoɓri ká i kaw kɛlɛ na, i giyaŋ Zakari na kurum a ha̰ law-ri nzaa-ri ɓay tul káw káʼa kaw ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ bole ɗi ɓamba na.
42001022	Zaɗkaʼa tḭi saa ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ka ziŋ faa ká ɓay ɓáa ɓay ziŋ ri ya, a ɗaa ɓa nduo-ɛ hɔy ze ha ri a kaw ɓa mbiki. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri kɔ í ɓaa mii: «Fe tina nun ha̰ Zakari ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
42001023	Zaɗka nam peɗ Zakari ɔ na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se puɔ.
42001024	Fal namkeri ku na báyḭi lɛ, má̰y ɓe Elizabɛɗ na ya̰a ɓil, a mṵu ɓilke ku na ɓa few ndeɓe a ɓaa mii:
42001025	«Ì kɔ fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ziŋ mì na ze ɗo key: timbɛɗɛ key na ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓo tul-i, a naa fe ká ɗaa sahoy ɓo nun-i ká sakra nzoɓri.»
42001026	Ɓil káʼa ɗo ndeke ɗi few yieke na báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Gabiriyɛl se puo ká Nazarɛɗ kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele,
42001027	luo má̰y tikɗi mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Mari. Ka ɓa má̰y mbana nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezeɓ ká ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ.
42001028	Leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na nduo a se zaɗ ká Mari kaw ɗi a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Soko woo, ɓo ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa law kere ziŋ mù! Ɓo na, Ŋgɛrɛmbay saɗ ziŋ mù.»
42001029	Zaɗka Mari laa ɓayke na ku báyḭi lɛ, ɓil law-ɛ nzaa ni ha̰ ni ɓaa ká ɓil law-ɛ mii: «Kḭri soko ḭi ze mini key lɛ?»
42001030	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mari, mu hḭɛ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa law kere ziŋ mù.
42001031	Mu kɔ, mù ya̰aŋa ɓil ɓay mbóŋ leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ, lɛ, mù túu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezu.
42001032	Kaʼa ɓá bawda nzoɓ, i ɗika ni ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya. Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, a ɗáa ni kaw tul kariŋgaw mbay ká sa̰w ka̰ni bul-e Daviɗ.
42001033	Kaʼa réke mbay ká tul leɗ Izarayɛlri ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara wṵ̌m. Puoruo ɓe na, gbṵke ti tiika ya.»
42001034	Báyḭi lɛ, Mari vbi leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na mii: «Fe key na wa̰a, a ɗoko mina zu lɛ? Ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì naa ziŋ wa̰ra nzoɓ ya ɓáy.»
42001035	Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Tem Law Pie a ví káw tul-a, a hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya na a guɓa tul-a ɓáy tem ɓe riɗiɗi. Sa̰wke mini ze, leɗ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká mù mbóŋ ni na, i ɗika ni ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
42001036	Rɔɓay, mu kɔ, Elizabɛɗ ká ɓa nzoɓ ini ɓo káʼa ɗi tá̰w, ká i ɗi ni ɓa máa suo na, ka ɗo ɓil ɓa few yie ro. Ɓilke ku na a mbóŋ ɓa leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ,
42001037	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, fe mbḭw mini kara mba ni ya.»
42001038	Báyḭi lɛ, Mari ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓa leɗ káw Ŋgɛrɛmbay. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa ziŋ mì munu ká mù ɓaa ká nzaa-a ku.» Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na pɔŋ ni a zɔl.
42001039	Ɓil namke ku hɔy na, Mari uru vaɗ a se ɓa puo ká ɗo lakun kuori ká tusiri Zuda,
42001040	a nduo a se ɓil hul Zakari a vǎa hii soko ha̰ Elizabɛɗ.
42001041	Zaɗka Elizabɛɗ laa kusol Mari ká hii soko ha̰ ni na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ ká naa ɓil-e na uru ndururu ndururu, lɛ, Elizabɛɗ na kara Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y,
42001042	a ha̰ ni ɓaa ɓay ɓáy bawda kusol-e ɓeleŋ mii: «Ɓo na, fe sa̰mi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo tul-a ká sakra má̰y kṵ-ɔri. Leɗ ká ɗo ɓil-a hɔy kara, fe sa̰mi ɗo tul-e nda̰w!
42001043	Máa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓi ká vi ɓay kɔ́kɔ mì key na wa̰a, law kereke uru saa ha̰a rɔɔ, a vi tul-i mini key lɛ,
42001044	ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗka kusol soko ɓo tɔɗɔ ɓo suk-i na, leɗ ká ɗo ɓil-i na uru ndururu ndururu ɓáy bawda suoriya.
42001045	Suoriya ɓa taa ɓo ká mù ɗaa law-a ɓo tul ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ mù na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fekeri na a ɗoko ɓáy zaɗɛ.»
42001046	Báyḭi lɛ, Mari ɓaa mii: «Mì sìi gay Ŋgɛrɛmbay!
42001047	Ɓil law-i ɗaa suoriya ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓay tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa mì.
42001048	Ɓi ká mì ɓa leɗ káw ɓe taa má̰yke hɔy ká mí ɗiŋ tul-i na, ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓo tul-i. Sa̰wke mini ze, tii sa̰wke vuri key kpṵru vǎw na, nzoɓri riw bele i ɓáa mii, bawda suoriya ɓa taa ɓi,
42001049	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo na ɗaa feri ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri ziŋ mì. Riŋ-ɛ taŋ kaɗaŋ,
42001050	a kɔ nun síe nzoɓri ká i hḭɛ ni na mbiimbam ɓáy mbiimbam ɓaŋguɔ.
42001051	Hṵrusuo nduo-ɛ na ɗaa feri ká ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri. Ka nii nzoɓ siika sùori na ha ri ɗuu kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ.
42001052	Ka nii mbayri ká tul kariŋgaw mbay ɓari, a yḭ̀i a ura tul nzoɓri ká i ɗiŋ tul-ri.
42001053	Ka ha̰ nzoɓ kɔnri fe kereri ŋgḭi ɓamba ha̰ ɓil-ri vbiɗa kpaɗ kpaɗ, a ha̰ nzoɓ feziŋari zɔl nduo-ri hɔy soli.
42001054	-
42001055	Ka ví sɔ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri ká i ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri na. Ka ker se tul Abaraham ɓáy vu bul-eri, a mgba ini ziŋ ri ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara munu káʼa waa na, ɓo ka yḭiŋra ri ya.»
42001056	Lɛɛ, Mari na kaw ziŋ Elizabɛɗ maa few say nda̰w rɔɔ, a yḭ̀i a se puɔ ɓáy.
42001057	Zaɗka nam maa ɓay haŋa Elizabɛɗ mboŋ na báyḭi lɛ, ka mboŋ ɓa leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ.
42001058	Zaɗka nzoɓ tul kpaŋ ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri kɔ bawda law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa suoriya ziŋ ni mbḭw hɔy.
42001059	Zaɗka leɗ na ɗaa nam ndeke ɗi tɔnɔ siɗike na báyḭi lɛ, i vi ɓay kúŋ ŋgori ɓe, í hii ɓay túu riŋ bi-ɛ Zakari ze ɓo tul-e.
42001060	Roo lɛ, mi-ɛ mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ṵ́-uu, munu ya. I túu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Za̰a.»
42001061	Ɓari riw bele ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa, ɓo na, nzoɓ ini ɓo ha̰a rɔɔ, i tuu riŋ-ɛ mini key lɛ?»
42001062	I yḭ̀i í fɛrɛ kɔ́m bɔm ɓa luo bi-ɛ ɓay kɔ́kɔ wa̰a, riŋ ḭi ze ka hii ɓay túu ha̰ ni lɛ?
42001063	Báyḭi lɛ, Zakari yḭ̀i a vbi ri tutakra ɗáa mbeɗe. Lɛɛ, ka vbie fe ɗo ɗi mii: «Za̰a ze ɓa riŋ-ɛ.» Zaɗka i kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari riw bele na, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl.
42001064	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy, kusol Zakari na vuo ɓoloŋ ha̰ ni ɓaa ɓay ɓa kḭ, a tii sa̰w pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
42001065	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ tul kpaŋ ɓari riw bele ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki. A nzoɓri riw bele ká i ɗaa puo ká lakun kuori ká kuɗu zaɗke ká Zude na, i lo soro feri ká kal na.
42001066	Ɓari riw bele ká i laa ɓayke na, i kɔrɔ ɗo ɓil law-ri í ɓaa mii: «Leɗ key na wa̰a, a ɗoko mina lɛ?» Tusuɛke lɛ, nduo Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗo tul leɗ na.
42001067	Zakari, bǎa leɗ tupɛŋ na, Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y ha̰ ni tǐnake ɓay káʼa ya̰a saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na mii:
42001068	«Mì pisi Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naari leɗ Izarayɛlri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa tul nzoɓ taa ɓeri, a ví ya̰a naari.
42001069	Ka ha̰ naari Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓ ká ɓa Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo ká tḭi saa sa̰w bulu naari, Mbay Daviɗ ká ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓe,
42001070	munu káʼa ɓaa ɓayke piɛɗ lew hɔy ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛri káʼa nan ri ɗo ɓoɗ na.
42001071	Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓ káʼa pie ni ha̰ naari na, a ya̰aŋa naari saa nduo nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni naari, ɓáy ɓari riw bele ká i hii ɗáa sɛkɛ ziŋ naari.
42001072	Sa̰wke mini ze, ka kǐɛke bawda law ini ɓe ha̰ bulu naari, a kěrke ɓaŋguɔ se tul sáka kuni ká taŋ kaɗaŋ káʼa sáake ziŋ ri pola na.
42001073	Ɓa ɓay káʼa waa ziŋ bulu naari Abaraham,
42001074	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka hii ɓay ya̰aŋa naari saa nduo nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni naari ɓay pɔ́ŋ faa ɗo hɔy ɓo, náa ɗáari peɗ ha̰ ni taŋ hḭɛ,
42001075	ɓáy law ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ ɓo, náa ɗori ɓáy zaɗɛ nzɛɗɛm ká nun-ɛ ɓáy namri riw bele ká náa káwri ɓáy kumnun na.
42001076	Ɓo ká mù ɓa leɗ tupɛŋ na, i ɗika mù ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù séke pol Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓay léke faa ɓe,
42001077	ɓay haŋa nzoɓ taa ɓeri kɔ í ɓaa mii, a ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a ɓari a yǎ̰ake ɓari.
42001078	Ɓe ze ɓa fe bawda law kere ɓe káʼa haŋake síe tḭi, a so ɓil law naari nzar.
42001079	Zaɗ taŋake na, a táŋ ká ɓil law nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɓil suŋ ká tem huɗ ɗo tul-ri, a kiɛ naari faa ká ɓay haŋa náa séri ɓáy law ɗɛkɛkɛ.»
42001080	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ na ŋgɔŋ ɓa pola pola, a nzɛ kpay kpay ɓáy kér ɓay. Ka kaw ɓil law kɔr kpṵru maa ɓáy nam káʼa tǐnake sùo-ɛ ká zaɗ hie ká nun leɗ Izarayɛlri.
42002001	Ká ɓil sewke ku na, Mbay Sezar Ogus ká Rɔm mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ká ɓil puo ɓeri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa riŋ-ri ɗo ɓil mbeɗe kḭiŋa nzoɓri.
42002002	Ɗáa riŋ nzoɓri ɗo ɓil mbeɗeke ku na ɓa titireke rɔɓay ká Kirinis ɓáke nzoɓ réke tul nzoɓri ká tusiri Siri.
42002003	Ɓe ze nzoɓri riw bele i séke puu puo ɓari ɓari ɓay ɗáa riŋ-ri ɗo ɓil mbeɗe kḭiŋa nzoɓri na.
42002004	Zezeɓ hɔy kara uru saa puo ká Nazarɛɗ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele ɓay séke ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude. Ka se puo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Betelehɛm, ɓa puo ká i mboŋ Mbay Daviɗ ká ɗi, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɓa vu bulu Daviɗ.
42002005	Ka se ɓáy Mari ká ɓa má̰y mbana ɓe ká ɗo ɓil na ɓay vǎa ɗáa riŋ-ri nda̰w.
42002006	Zaɗka i kaw Betelehɛm kɔɓ rɔɓay na, nam mboŋa ɓe na maa
42002007	ha̰ ni mboŋ leɗ pol ɓe ɓa leɗ wa̰ra nzoɓ. Ka kaa ni ɓáy gari a ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil gbokro fe sṵm ndayri ká zaɗɛ na ku, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hul nam varuri na, zaɗ nam ti ɗi ya.
42002008	Ɗi ya ɓáy Betelehɛm na, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗuri naa wáa í kɔrɔ baɗu ɓari ɓa suŋ ká ɗi.
42002009	Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nulue tḭi tul-ri mbuɗa ha̰ zaɗ hie ri gbɛrɛrɛ, a kiri ri gbuk ɗo sikɗa. Báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ha ri tɔ kpak kpak.
42002010	Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì hḭɛ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì vi ɓáy bawda ɓay suoriya ká ɓa Ɓay Kere fie ha rì. Ɓayke ku na, a ɗoko ɓay tul nzoɓri riw bele.
42002011	Ɓil suŋ ká vuri key na, i mboŋ Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri ká ɓil puo Daviɗ ha rì. Ɓe na ka ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay a ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.
42002012	Fe ká ɓay haŋa rì kɔ́ke ɓa sùo ɓay na ze ɗo key: leɗ tupɛŋke ku na, i kaa ni ɓáy gari, í ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil gbokro fe sṵm ndayri. Ɓe ze ɓa zaɗ ká ì zíŋ ni ká ɗi.»
42002013	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy ruɔ leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue tḭi gikiki, í zuɔ tul leɗ nzaapeɗ taa mbḭwke na, i pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru í ɓaa mii:
42002014	«Riŋ ɗika ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kaw nulue siya! Ɗɛkɛkɛ taa ɓe ɗo tusiri key ɓay tul nzoɓri káʼa hii ri.»
42002015	Zaɗka leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue pɔŋ nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗuri kaw zaɗɛ, í yḭ̀i ɓáy tul ɓal-ri nzɛk ɓa nulue na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗuri na, i ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Munu zu lɛ, náa séri kpṵru ɓa Betelehɛm, ɓo náa vǎa kɔ́ri fe ká kal ká ɗi, fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha̰ náa láari ɓayke na.»
42002016	Báyḭi lɛ, i takra í zɔl fal kḭ ɓa váake, lɛ, i vǎa ziŋ Mari nda̰w, Zezeɓ nda̰w, a í ziŋ leɗ tupɛŋ ká naa ɓil gbokro fe sṵm ndayri na nda̰w pi.
42002017	Zaɗka i kɔ leɗ tupɛŋ na báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay feri ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa se tul leɗ key na ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
42002018	Ɓari riw bele ká i laa ɓay ká nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗuri ɓaa na, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul ɓayri na ku.
42002019	Ɓe Mari laa lɛ, kɔrɔ ɓay feri na ku ɗo ɓil law-ɛ kɔɓ, a ker ɓay ká ɗi ŋgḭi ɓamba.
42002020	Zaɗka nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ baɗuri ɗo yḭ́i ɓa zaɗ káw ɓari na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, í pisi ni ɓay tul feri riw bele ká i laa ɓayke a í kɔ ɓáy nun-ri na ɗo maa ɓáy zaɗɛ munu ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa ɓayke pola ha ri laa na.
42002021	Zaɗka nam tɔnɔ siɗi maa báyḭi lɛ, i kuŋ ŋgori leɗ tupɛŋ na nda̰w rɔɔ, í tuu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezu. Ɓa riŋ ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue tuu pola ɗɔɗ nda̰w rɔɔ, mi-ɛ ɗo ɓil ɓe ɓáy.
42002022	Zaɗka nam maa ɓay haŋa máa leɗ na ka tḭi kɛlɛ na báyḭi lɛ, Zezeɓ ɓáy Mari i mbi faa ɓay séke ŋgɛrɛpuo Zuruzalɛm ɓay ɗáa fe poy se tul-e ɓay tul mboŋa ɓe munu ká bol kusol Moyze ɓaa. I mbi leɗ tupɛŋ na í séke ɓay kíɛ ni ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay
42002023	faa mbḭw munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛmbay mii: «Leɗ polri riw bele ká i ɓa leɗ wa̰rari na, i ɗáa ri zuɔ ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay,»
42002024	ɓay púo fe ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay munu ká i ɓaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛmbay mii: «I mgbaka bɛɗɛ pieri ɓa siɗi, mase i fá̰a vu ka̰y bɛɗɛri ɓa siɗi nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy.»
42002025	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu kaw Zuruzalɛm, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simeo̰n. Nzoɓke ku na ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ, a hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka giyaŋ nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví huo law leɗ Izarayɛlri. Ɓe na, Tem Law Pie saɗ ziŋ ni
42002026	a ɓaa ha̰ ni pola hɔy mii: «Mù ti huka ya kpṵru ɓay kɔ́kɔ Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ɓáy nun-a nda̰w rɔ.»
42002027	Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie suru ni ha̰ ni se ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Zaɗka Zezeɓ ɓáy Mari i mbi Zezu í séke ni ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay ɗáa fe ká bol kusol ɓaa na báyḭi lɛ,
42002028	Simeo̰n na ya̰a ni a mbuɔ ni ɗo nduo-ɛ a písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii:
42002029	«Mbay, fe ká mù waa na mù ɗaa ro. Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓi ká mì ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓo na, mu ála mì ha̰ mì se ɓáy law huoke ɗɛkɛkɛ,
42002030	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì kɔ Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri ká mù pie ni na ɓáy nun-i.
42002031	Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri key na, mù leke faake ká pol sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele.
42002032	Ɓe na, a ɓá zaɗ taŋa ɓay haŋa sa̰w nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká tusiri key tuu mù, a ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul nzoɓ ɓori ká i ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri.»
42002033	Ɓay ká Simeo̰n ɓaa se tul leɗ na ha̰ zaɗ ɓay zee bǎa leɗ ɓáy máa leɗ na sɛl.
42002034	Báyḭi lɛ, Simeo̰n sa̰m fe zuɔ tul-ri, rɔɔ a ɓaa ha̰ mi-ɛ Mari na mii: «Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa leɗ ni key na ha̰ ni ɗo ɓa fe leɗi nzoɓri ká i tuŋ ɓay ɓe ŋgereŋ, a ɓa fe úru siya nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká Izarayɛl ká i ya̰a ɓay ɓe. Ɓe na a yḭ́i a ɓa fe kíɛ law hiiya Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, roo lɛ, nzoɓri túŋ ni ŋgereŋ.
42002035	Ɓe munu nda̰w rɔɔ, a vbíɗake kér ɓay nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká ɗo zaɗ muni na ɓa zaɗ táŋke. A ɓo ká mù ɓa mi-ɛ na, kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓo a ɗoko munu ɓa mii ká i mbi í vbieke wa̰ra law-a.»
42002036	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu ɓa má̰y nzoɓ ɗo ɗi, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Anna. Ka ɓa vu Fanuyɛl, a ɓa sa̰w ka̰ni Azɛr. Ka ɓa má̰y ká mbiimbam ɓe ŋgḭi ɓamba ro. Ɓáy má̰y tikɗi ɓe hɔy na, ka ya̰a wa̰ra, a ɗaa mbiimbam tɔnɔ say ziŋ ni.
42002037	Falɛ ku rɔɔ wa̰ra na hu, a pɔŋ ni kaw ɓa má̰y síe. Ka kaw ɓa má̰y síe kḭ kpṵru a ŋgɔ́ŋke, a ɗaa mbiimbam síŋ tɔnɔ siɗi pa̰rɛ niŋ. Ka se-seɗ ɗi ya ɓáy hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaŋguɔ, a mbi ɓal-ɛ tɔ zaɗ kḭ ya. Ka ɗaa peɗ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru suŋ ɓáy ɓisie, a saŋ sùo-ɛ a ɗáake nzaa ɓay kereri.
42002038	Lɛɛ, ɓe na kara, ka ví ziŋ ri ká sa̰w síeke na ku nda̰w, a tii sa̰w písi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka ɓaa ɓay ká se tul leɗ piyɛŋ na ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ká i giyaŋ mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm na.
42002039	Zaɗka Mari ɓáy Zezeɓ ɗaa fekeri na ɓáy zaɗɛ riw bele faa mbḭw munu ká bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa na báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele, puo ɓari ká Nazarɛɗ.
42002040	Leɗ na ŋgɔŋ ɓa pola pola a nzɛ kpay kpay ɓáy kér ɓay. Nun nzɛm mbaa law-ɛ, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa law kere ziŋ ni.
42002041	Nzoɓ mbóŋ Zezuri na, i se Zuruzalɛm ɓáy mbiimbam mbḭw mbḭw riw bele ɓay ɗáa suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy.
42002042	Zaɗka Zezu na ɗaa mbiimbam duɔ falɛ siɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i sùu ni se Zuruzalɛm zaɗ suoriya munu ká ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari ká i ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ na.
42002043	Zaɗka nam suoriya na ɔ báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i faa puɔ, lɛ, vu ɓari Zezu na kaw Zuruzalɛm kɔɓ. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbóŋ niri na i kɔ ya.
42002044	Ɓari na i ker í ɓaa mii, ka se ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɓa bǎw seɗ varu ɓari. Lɛɛ, i se-seɗ nam mbḭw, a falɛ lɛ, i tii sa̰w nzáara ni ká sakra nzoɓ ini ɓariri nda̰w, nzoɓ buɔ ɓari nda̰w pi.
42002045	Zaɗka i nzaara ni kpṵy, í ziŋ ni ya na báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í se Zuruzalɛm na rɔɓay ɓay nzáara ni ká ɗi.
42002046	Ndeke ɗi nam sayke na báyḭi lɛ, i ziŋ ni ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka kaw sakra nzoɓ fére nzoɓri fe, a te suk-e kie a láake ɓay ɓari. Lɛɛ, ka yḭ̀i a vbi ri ɓay ká tul ɓay ɓari na.
42002047	Ɓari riw bele ká i laa ɓay ɓe na, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul ɓay nun nzɛm ɓe ká tḭi saa nzi-ɛ nda̰w, ɓáy ɓay káʼa yḭiŋra ɓáy kere ɗo ɗi ha ri nda̰w pi.
42002048	Zaɗka mi-ɛ ɓáy bi-ɛ i mbi nun-ri í kɔ ni na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl. Lɛɛ, mi-ɛ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Vu-i, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, mù ɗaa fe mini key ziŋ ɓuru lɛ? Mu kɔ, ɓúru bǎa-ka ɓuru nzaara mù ɓáy rɛw yeŋ yeŋ.»
42002049	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, ì nzaara mì lɛ? Peɗ ká Bǎa pɔŋ zuɔ nduo-i na ndaɗ ɓay haŋa mì mgba sa̰wke. Wa̰a, ì kɔ ya hɔy lɛ woo!»
42002050	Lɛɛ, ɓay ɓe káʼa ɓaa ha ri na, vuo law-ri ya.
42002051	Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i ziŋ ri a se Nazarɛɗ a ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul-ri. Lɛɛ, mi-ɛ na kɔrɔ fekeri na ku riw bele ɗo ɓil law-ɛ.
42002052	Zezu na ŋgɔŋ ɓa pola pola, num nzɛm ɓe kara se ɓa pola pola nda̰w, a vi ɓa nzoɓ law kere ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, nun nzoɓri nda̰w pi.
42003001	Fekeri ku na ɗo ɓáy mbiimbam duɔ falɛ ndeɓeke ká Mbay Tibɛr Sezar réke mbay ká tusiri Rɔm kɔɓ rɔɓay. Sewke ku na, Po̰s Pilaɗ ɓáke nzoɓ réke tul puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude. Eroɗ re tul puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Yṵ-ɛ Filiɓ re tul puori ká tusiri Iture ɓáy Tarakonik. A Lizaniyas laa lɛ, re mbay ká tusiri Abilɛn.
42003002	Ká sakra Ziɓri laa lɛ, Anasi ɓáy Kayif i ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri. Sewke ku na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ɓay tɔɗɔ ɓo suku Za̰a ká ɓa vu Zakari ká ɗo ɓil law kɔr.
42003003	Lɛɛ, Za̰a tii sa̰w séke ɓáy puori riw bele ká kiri mbii Zurdɛ̰ a ka-káa ha̰ nzoɓri mii: «Ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì ɓo, í ɗaa tul-rì nduo mbii, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a ɓaarì ziŋ rì.»
42003004	Ɓe mini ze, ha̰ ɓay ká Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa pola ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe na, ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Ɓayke ɓaa mii: «Ì láa kusol nzoɓ mgba ɓeleŋ ká ɓil law kɔr mii: Ì léke faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy kere; Ì léke ha̰ ni ka ɗo sikɗa kparak kparak!
42003005	Kporori riw bele na i léke maa kḭ gba̰y gba̰y; Kuori ɓáy mbɔrɔri riw bele i gá̰y ri gbururu zuɔ siri, Faa rá̰akeri na i ndaɗa ri ɗo sikɗa kparak kparak, Faari ká ɓa kporo kara i léke ha̰ ni maa kḭ rṵy rṵy nda̰w.
42003006	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri riw bele i kɔ́kɔ faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leke a yǎ̰ake nzoɓri na.»
42003007	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri vi luo Za̰a ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii, lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì mḭiri kuɔtɔlri! A ve ze fere rì ɗúu hɛrɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa tḭ́i ɓáy nam kúŋ sal ɓay na lɛ?
42003008	Ì ɗaa peɗ ká ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ ká kiɛ súo kér ɓay ɓaarì na nda̰w rɔ! Ì ɓaa sùo-rì hɔy mii: “Ɓuru ɓa vu bulu Abaraham” na munu ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì: tisawri ká ɗo key hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru maa ɓay fɛ́rɛ ri ha ri vi ɓa vu bulu Abarahamri!
42003009	Timbɛɗɛ key hɔy kara, tikal ɗo sa̰w puuri ro. Puu ha̰a ha̰a ká lie ndaya lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a kúŋ ni ɓáy sa̰wke nzɛɗ a vbu ni ɓo huu.»
42003010	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri vbi ni ɓay mii: «A munu ku wa̰a, ɓuru ɗáa mina ɓáy sùo ɓuru lɛ woo?»
42003011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy gari ndúo ɗo sùo-ɛ ɓa siɗi lɛ, ka wál mbḭw a ha̰ yṵ-ɛ ha̰y ká tike ya. A nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy fe sṵm na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa faa mbḭw munu na nda̰w.»
42003012	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa larimbuo ha̰nɛri laa ro, i vi luo Za̰a ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii, ze í vbi ni mii: «Mbay, a ɓuru na wa̰a, ɓuru ɗáa mina ɓáy sùo ɓuru lɛ woo?»
42003013	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì ya̰a fe kḭ ka kal tul fe ká bol kusol fere rì na ya.»
42003014	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri laa ro i ví vbi ni ɓay mii: «A ɓuru na wa̰a, ɓuru ɗáa mina ɓáy sùo ɓuru lɛ woo?» Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na, ì ya̰a fe nzoɓ ɓáy hṵrusuo ya nda̰w, í ɗaa ɓay gɔɓ ka ɓo tul nzoɓ ya nda̰w. Fe ká i púoke rì ká ɓa fe tunduo ɓaarì na, ì ɗaa law-rì ka ɓo ɗi ɓo, ì nzaa kḭ ka nde tul-e ya.»
