42022071	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa mii: «Káy! Náa vbikari nzoɓ nasi ɓay kḭri ɓay ɗáake mina ɓáy lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, naari sùo naari kḭ náa láari ɓay ɓeri na ká nzi-ɛ!»
42023001	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri riw bele ká i mbṵ tul kḭ na, i uru í sùu Zezu í séke ni pol Pilaɗ ká ɓa nzoɓ réke tul puo.
42023002	Ká zaɗɛ ku na i tii sa̰w gúo ni í ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na, ɓuru ziŋ ni ká zaɗ úla nzoɓ ɓururi, a ɗaa ha̰ tul nzoɓri ŋgɔŋ a haa ri ɓay haŋa ri puo larimbuo ha̰ Mbay Sezar ya. Ka ɓaa mii, ɓeri kḭ ze ɓeri ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ɓeri ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ɓa mbay ɓuru Ziɓri.»
42023003	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ vbi Zezu mii: «Ɓo kḭ ze, mù ɓa mbay Ziɓri kɛ́lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓe kḭ ze mù ɓaa ku.»
42023004	Báyḭi lɛ, Pilaɗ ɓaa ha̰ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri, ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri mii: «Mì kɔ ɓay mbḭw ká ɓay ɗáa ɓo tul leɗban key na ya.»
42023005	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri geɗe ɓayke ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ kpṵru kpṵru í ɓaa mii: «Fe fére ɓe na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri tḭ̀i ɓay ɓíɛ tusiri ɓuru riw bele, tii sa̰wke saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele, a tḭ́ike kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude riw bele, kpṵru mini key rɔɔ a víke zaɗ ni key.»
42023006	Báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi ri ɓay mii: «Leɗban key na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ká Galele kḭ kɛlɛ?»
42023007	Zaɗka Pilaɗ laa mii, Zezu vi saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele, ɓa tusiri ká Eroɗ re mbay ká ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ka pie ni se luo-ɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, síeke ku na, Eroɗ ɗo Zuruzalɛm.
42023008	Zaɗka Eroɗ kɔ Zezu ku na báyḭi lɛ, sùo-ɛ rii ni ŋgḭi ɓamba, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa piɛɗ ká lew hɔy ka laa soro ɓay ɓe, a hii ɓay kɔ́kɔ ni, a ɗaa law-ɛ te tul haŋa ni ka ɗaa fe saŋ mbḭw munu ha̰ ni kɔ.
42023009	Báyḭi lɛ, Eroɗ na vbi ni ɓayri ŋgḭi ɓamba. Lɛɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ nzi-ɛ mgbuɗ ya.
42023010	Ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na, i ɗaa ɓayri ká ndaya ndaya zuɔ tul-e.
42023011	Falɛ lɛ, Eroɗ ɓáy nzoɓ yṵm ɓeri na, i siɛ ni í luo mbúo ká tul-e, í nduo ni maagari mbay ká ndṵy mgbilik mgbilik, rɔɔ í píeke ni ha̰ Pilaɗ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay.
42023012	Ká ɓil namke ku hɔy, Pilaɗ ɓáy Eroɗ i pɔŋ tul ŋga̰ni ɓari ká pola na, a í vi ɓa nzoɓ buɔ kḭ.
42023013	Pilaɗ mbṵ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri, ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri ɓáy ruɔ nzoɓri
42023014	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì víke ɓáy leɗban key na ha̰ mì í ɓaa mii, ka ula nzoɓri a ɗaa ha̰ tul-ri ŋgɔŋ. Nda ndaɗ! Roo lɛ, zaɗka mì vbi ni ɓaykeri ká pol-rì lɛ, mì ziŋ ka̰aya mbḭw ká ì ɗáake ɓay ɓo tul-e na ya.
42023015	Eroɗ kara ziŋ ka̰aya ɓe ya nda̰w. Sa̰wke mini ze, ka píeke ni ha̰ mì rɔɓay. Leɗban key na, ka ɗaa ka̰aya mbḭw ká maa ɓay haŋa ni zǐŋke huɗ ya!
42023016	Munu kara, mì haŋa ri zɔɗ ni ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ. Falɛ lɛ, mì pɔ́ŋ ni.»
42023017	[Ɓaŋguɔ, ká ɓil nam fe sṵm nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na, Pilaɗ tina nzoɓ mbḭw saa hul sal ha̰ ruɔ Ziɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari.]
42023018	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ɗaa fe ɓáy nzaa-ri gɔ̌m riw bele mii: «I leɗban na key, a í tína Barabas ha̰ ɓuru!»
42023019	Ɓe Barabas na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ká i mgba ni ɓo hul sal, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka suru tigba̰a nzoɓri ha ri tḭ̀i ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm, a i nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɗi.
42023020	Munu ká Pilaɗ hii ɓay pɔ́ŋ Zezu na, ka ɓaa ɓay ɓa kḭ rɔɓay ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri.
42023021	Roo lɛ, i ɗaa fe ɓáy nzaa-ri gǔrum kpṵru mii: «Ɓer ni! Ɓer ni ɓer maa! Ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ!»
42023022	Lɛɛ, Pilaɗ mbi ɓay faa ɓal ba sayke a ɓaa mii: «A ku wa̰a, ka̰aya ḭi rɔɔ ka ɗaa lɛ? Mì ziŋ fe mbḭw ká ɓay haŋa ni zǐŋke huɗ ya. Munu kara, mì haŋa ri nda ni ɓáy ndoy dɔŋ. Falɛ lɛ, mì pɔ́ŋ ni.»
42023023	Ɓe nu ku báyḭi lɛ, i geɗe ɓayke í gúuke fe ɓa pola pola ɓay haŋa ni ɓer Zezu ɗo tul puu say huɗ. Lɛɛ, fe gúu ɓari na kal tul Pilaɗ,
42023024	ro ha̰ ni mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi, a pɔŋ faa ha ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa fe ká law-ri hii.
42023025	Ɓe ze, nzoɓ ká tḭ̀-tḭi a i nzoɓ ká i mgba ni ɓo hul sal na, Pilaɗ tina ni munu ká law-ri hii, a pɔŋ Zezu na mǎa nduo ndúo nzoɓ yṵmri, ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa fe ziŋ ni munu ká law ruɔ nzoɓkeri hii.
42023026	Zaɗka i séke Zezu ɓa zaɗ ika ni na, i dar nzoɓ mbḭw ká Sirɛ̰n ká uru saa puo ɓisuy, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simo̰n. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri mgba ni í haa ni ya̰a puu say huɗ Zezu a soɓ a séke fal-ɛ.
42023027	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri se fal-ɛ ŋgḭi ɓamba. Má̰yri kara se fal-ɛ í rɛ-rɛw ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo, a í nda law-ri zaɗ zaɗ ɓay tul-e.
42023028	Lɛɛ, Zezu fɛrɛ nun-ɛ ɓa luo-ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Má̰y Zuruzalɛmri! I rɛ-rɛw ɓay tul-i ya! Roo lɛ, ì rɛ ɓay tul-rì ɓáy tul vu ɓaarì maa,
42023029	ɓay ḭi lɛ, namri káʼa ví vuku na, nzoɓri ɓáa mii, suoriya ɓa taa máa suori ká i mboŋ nzoɓ ba mbḭw ya, ká leɗ a̰w wa̰n ɓari ya.
42023030	Namke ku na, nzoɓri tiika sa̰w rɛ́kɛ sùo-ri ɓay haŋa kuo ka tɔ́ɗɔ a rɛ̰ŋ ri, mase mbɔrɔ ka guɓa tul-ri gbukru a púɗ ri.
42023031	Ì kɔ, zaɗka i ɗaa fe mini key ziŋ pam puu na wa̰a, fe ḭiri ze i ɗáa ziŋ puu huɔke na ro lɛ?»
42023032	Ro, í vi ɓáy dɔmbirimri siɗi ziŋ Zezu ɓay ika ri ziŋ ni.
42023033	Zaɗka i tḭ́ike ri zaɗ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Tuŋguo Tul na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri ɓer Zezu ɗo tul puu say huɗ ká ɗi. Dɔmbirimri na, i ɓer ri siɗi bele nda̰w. Nzoɓ mbini ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo hoɗo ɓe, a nzoɓ mbḭɛ laa lɛ, ɗo tul puu say huɗ kḭ ká tunduo gel ɓe.
42023034	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa mii: «Bǎa! Mu nda buma ziŋ ri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká i ɗaa ku na, i kɔ ya.» Ro, nzoɓ yṵmri fa̰a gari ɓeri í ɗaa dḭi dḭi rɔɔ í leke kḭ.
42023035	Nzoɓri ɗo zaɗɛ na ku, a í kɔ feri ká kal na. A ɓari ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri laa lɛ, i siɛ Zezu í ɓaa mii: «Zaɗkaʼa ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ni ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na lɛ, ka ya̰a sùo-ɛ ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ munu káʼa ya̰a nzoɓ ha̰wri na ha̰ ɓuru kɔ!»
42023036	Nzoɓ yṵmri kara i siɛ ni nda̰w, í soro ɓa lakun-ɛ, a í ha̰ ni mbii fe sṵ́uke
42023037	í ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka mù ɓa mbay Ziɓri lɛ, mu ya̰a sùo-ɔ sùo-ɔ ha̰ ɓuru kɔ!»
42023038	Mbeɗe huɗ ká Pilaɗ ha ri ɓer ɗo tul-e na ɓaa mii: «Ɓe key na, ka ɓa mbay Ziɓri.»
42023039	Lɛɛ, sakra dɔmbirimri ká siɗi ká i ɓer ri ɗo tul puu say huɗ na, nzoɓ mbini loɗ Zezu a ɓaa mii: «Mù ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ya lɛ woo! Mu ya̰a sùo-ɔ sùo-ɔ kḭ, a mú ya̰a ɓuru nda̰w!»
42023040	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ taa ha̰w uru ziŋ kṵ-ɛ na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mù hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya lɛ woo! Ɓay ká i kuŋ ɓo tul-a na ɗo munu ká taa ɓe nda̰w.
42023041	Taa náa lɛ, ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, náa ziŋ fe ka̰aya náa ká maa ɓáy peɗ ɗáa náa. Roo lɛ, ɓe na, ka ɗaa fe ka̰aya mbḭw ya.»
42023042	Ro, a fɛrɛ nun-ɛ ɓa luo Zezu a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Zezu, zaɗka mù ví réke mbay na lɛ, mu kér se tul-i.»
42023043	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: vuri key na, mù káw ziŋ mì ká zaɗ káw ndaɗi ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
42023044	-
42023045	Maa ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul na báyḭi lɛ, fe guɓa nun síe ha̰ zaɗri riw bele ɗo gbukru kpṵru maa ɓáy síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ. Lɛɛ, gari kúŋ ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na saka saa sikɗa tǎr.
42023046	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗaa fe ɓeleŋ a ɓaa mii: «Bǎa! Mì pɔŋ ɔ̰mi ɓi ɓo ɓil nduo-ɔ!» Fal ɓay na ku báyḭi lɛ, law-ɛ ví tuo.
42023047	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm kɔ feri ká kal na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓaa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, leɗban key na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ká ɓay ti tul-e ya.»
42023048	Ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ví ɗo zaɗɛ ɓay kɔ́kɔ feri ku na, zaɗka i kɔ feri ká kal na munu báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa síe í nda law-ri zaɗ zaɗ, a í yḭ̌ike faa puɔ.
42023049	Nzoɓri riw bele ká i ɓa nzoɓ buɔ Zezu, ɓáy má̰yri ká i su Zezu saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na, i ɗo ɗi ɗi í kɔ feri ká kal na ɗeke.
42023050	-
42023051	Nzoɓ mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezeɓ ká puo ɓe ɗo Arimate ká ɓa puo Ziɓri. Ka ɓa nzoɓ ká law-ɛ ndaɗ ɓamba, a ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ a giyaŋ nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ví réke mbay ká tusiri key na nzokɗo. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra kuɗu nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye ká luo Ziɓri, roo lɛ, ɓay ká i kuŋ ɓo tul Zezu, ɓáy fe ká i ɗaa ziŋ ni na, ka hii ziŋ ri ya.
42023052	Báyḭi lɛ, ka uru a se luo Pilaɗ a vbi ni huɗ Zezu na ɓay voro.
42023053	Zaɗka Pilaɗ hii ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, ka se a vǎa mbi huɗ Zezu na a kaari ɓáy gari pie ká ndaɗ ɓamba, a ɗaa ɓo huo tisaw ká i kpɛrɛ ɓa luɔ huɗ ɓa tá̰w ká i ɗaa huɗ ɓo ɗi ba mbḭw ya ɓáy.
42023054	Ɓa nam peɗ ndeɓe ká sa̰w síe tɔ̀ŋ ndḭi hɔy ɓay haŋa nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri ka tḭi na.
42023055	Má̰yri ká i su Zezu saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na, i se fal Zezeɓ ɓa zaɗ luɔ huɗ ɓay kɔ́kɔ tupal nda̰w, ɓay kɔ́kɔ fe ká i ɗáa ɓáy huɗ Zezu nda̰w pi.
42023056	Zaɗka i kɔ zaɗɛ na báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í se puɔ, í leke numri ɓáy vay feri ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy ɓay ɗáa zuɔ tul huɗ Zezu na. Falɛ ku lɛ, i mgba ta̰ram sùo-ri ká nam mgbaka ta̰ram na, munu ká bol kusol ɓari Ziɓri ɓaa na.
42024001	Tiɓie piɛɗ ká nzaaruo síe dimasi ɗo ɗi ya ɓay sil na, má̰yri na tḭi í se ɓa tupal ɓáy numri ká i zuu ká ba̰rɛ fṵ bǔy bǔy na.
42024002	Zaɗka i tḭi tupal na báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ maa tisaw ká i mbǐike nzaa luɔ huɗ na giri ɓo fi mbḭw.
42024003	Lɛɛ, i rìi í se ɗi, lɛ, i kɔ huɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu na ya.
42024004	Zaɗka i kɔ ɓay ɓáa mbǎa na, nzoɓri siɗi, gari ɓari ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri tḭi ri,
42024005	ha̰ hḭɛ ɗaa ri ŋgḭi ɓamba ha ri ɗiŋ tul-ri ɓa siri. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓkeri ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ ì nzaa nzoɓ ká kaw ɓáy kumnun ká sakra nzoɓ huɗeri lɛ?
42024006	Zezu ti zaɗ ni ya; ka tḭi saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ì kér se tul ɓay káʼa ɓaa ha rì ɓáy ɗol ɓe káʼa ɗǒke kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na.
42024007	Ka ɓaa mii: ɓeri Vu Nzoɓ na, ɗo nun haŋa ri pɔŋ ɓeri ha̰ nzoɓ feya̰ari mgba ɓeri, í ɓer ɓeri ɗo tul puu say huɗ. Ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, ɓeri tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.»
42024008	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri na i ker se tul ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha ri pola na.
42024009	Zaɗka i yḭ̀i saa tupal na ku báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ mbḭw ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰wri ká i ɗo ziŋ ri na riw bele.
42024010	Má̰yri ká i ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, ɓa Mari ká puo ɓe ɗo Madala, Za̰ni nda̰w, Mari máa Zak nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy má̰y ha̰wri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ziŋ ri ku nda̰w pi.
42024011	Roo lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, i laa ɓay ɓáa má̰yri na ɓa lɔm hɔy, ze í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay ɓari na ya.
42024012	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr uru siya a ɗuu a se tupal na, a duu kɔ́m ɓa ɓil luɔ huɗ na, lɛ, ka kɔ gari ká i kǎarike Zezu hɔy zuɔ ɗi. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se puɔ, lɛ, law-ɛ nzaa ni ɓay tul fe ká kal na.
42024013	Namke ku hɔy, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri siɗi se ɓa puo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Emayus. Puoke ku na ɗi ɓáy Zuruzalɛm maa sal faa duɔ falɛ siɗi.
42024014	I ɗo loko soro feri riw bele ká kal na.
42024015	Zaɗka i ɗo ɓáa ɓayri na ku, í má̰yke kḭ báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kḭ sùo-ɛ soro ɓa lakun ri a se ziŋ ri.
42024016	I kɔ ni kḭ, roo lɛ, fe guɓa nun-ri gbiɓli ha ri kɔ ni ɓa Zezu ya.
42024017	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu vbi ri ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Soro ḭi rɔpiɛ tɔɗɔ law-ri rɔɔ, i lo í séke faa mini key lɛ?» Zaɗka i laa vbiw ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, i sìi ɓal-ri zik í ta̰a, í ɗo ɓáy kér ɓay.
42024018	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kiliopas ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nzoɓri riw bele ká ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm key laa ɓay key, wa̰a ɓo mù ɗo ha̰a rɔɔ, mú laa ɓay feri ká kal ká ɓil namri ká síe ni key ya lɛ?»
42024019	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ri mii: «Ɓay ḭiri lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay feri ká kal ká tul Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ káʼa ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ká ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ɗáa fe nda̰w, ɓáa ɓay ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy nun nzoɓri riw bele nda̰w na.
42024020	Ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ naari Ziɓri pɔŋ ni ha ri ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-e í ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ.
42024021	Ɓe ze ɓuru ɗaa law ɓuru te ɗi nzokɗo mii, kaʼa tína leɗ Izarayɛlri saa nduo nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓururi. Fekeri kal ɓa nam say ro vuri.
42024022	-
42024023	Má̰yri ká sakra ɓuru leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri key i tḭi piɛɗ í se tupal, lɛ, i ziŋ huɗ Zezu ya. Ze í yḭ̀i í ví ɓaa mii, leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue ví tḭi tul-ri í ɓaa ha̰ ɓari mii, Zezu kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ɓayke ku na ha̰ ɓuru kaw yer.
42024024	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓuru key na i se tupal na, lɛ, i ziŋ feri riw bele munu ká má̰yri ɓaa na, roo lɛ, ɓe Zezu na i kɔ ni ɓáy nun-ri ya.»
42024025	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ law tiyari! Ɗaa mina ì ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓayri riw bele ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa na vaa ya lɛ woo!
42024026	Ɗo nun haŋa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ka kɔ sɛkɛ fe mini key nda̰w rɔɔ, a ziŋ riŋ ɗika ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na. Wa̰a, ì kɔ ya lɛ woo!»
42024027	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri laa ɓay feri riw bele ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká se tul-e na, tii sa̰wke saa ɓil mbeɗe Moyze a séke kpṵru tḭi ɓil mbeɗe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele.
42024028	Zaɗka i se ɗi ya ɓáy puo ká i se ɓa ɓaɗi na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi nun-ɛ tim rìi nzoɓ káʼa séke ɓa zaɗ kḭ.
42024029	Lɛɛ, i kuŋ ni ɓay haŋa ni kaw ziŋ ri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa tilaw ká síe ti mbǎa. Zaɗkaʼa rìi a kaw ziŋ ri ká hula,
42024030	a kaw nzaa fe sṵm ziŋ ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi maapa a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a haw ha ri.
42024031	Ɓe nu ku rɔɔ, nun-ri ví taŋ ha ri kɔ ni ɓa Zezu na kḭ, roo lɛ, ka zee ká sakra ɓari ku rik.
42024032	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Zaɗkaʼa ví ɓaa ɓay ha̰ ɓuru laa, a tina ɓay feri ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká law ɓuru mbi ɓa huu ká ɗi ha̰ ɓuru ká faa na, law ɓuru vi huo mgbalak ká ɗi. Wa̰a ɗo munu ya lɛ woo?»
42024033	I uru koɗ hɔy í yḭ̀i í se Zuruzalɛm í vǎa ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ mbḭw ɓáy ɓari ha̰wri ká i mbṵ kḭ na.
42024034	Lɛɛ, ɓari ká i mbṵ kḭ na i ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ŋgɛrɛmbay tḭi saa luɔ huɗ kḭ ɓa tusuɛ! Simo̰n kɔ ni ɓáy nun-ɛ!»
42024035	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká tul-ri siɗi na kara, i kḭi fal feri ká Zezu ɗaa ziŋ ri ká faa, ɓáy faa káʼa hǎwke maapa na, ɓe rɔɔ í kɔ́ke ni ɓa Zezu ɓáy.
42024036	Zaɗka i ɗo ɓáa ɓay kɔɓ ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu kḭ sùo-ɛ tḭi sakra ɓari mbuɗa a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɗɛkɛkɛ ka sáɗ ziŋ rì.»
42024037	Báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri ha ri tɔ ɗɛk ɗɛk í ker í ɓaa mii, kɔ ya lɛ ɓari kɔ wṵru.
42024038	Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ri a ɓaa mii: «Mina rɔɔ law-ri nzaa ri munu lɛ? Mina rɔɔ ì ma̰y ɓay ká ɓil law-rì munu lɛ?
42024039	Ì kɔ nduo-iri ɓáy ɓal-iri key í kɔ, ɓa ɓi kḭ ze mì kaw key! Zaa sùo-i í kɔ. Wṵru ti ɓáy naysuo ɓáy hṵru munu ká ì kɔ mì key ya.»
42024040	Zaɗkaʼa ɓaa ɓay na munu ha ri báyḭi lɛ, ka kiɛ ri bol kol nṵɔ ká ɗo nduo-ɛri ɓáy ɓal-ɛri na ha ri kɔ.
42024041	Lɛɛ, suoriya mbaa ɓil law-ri a ɗaa ha ri yǎ̰ake ɓay ɓe na ya a í kaw yer. Lɛɛ, Zezu vbi ri ɓay mii: «Ì ɗo ɓáy fe sṵm lɛ?»
42024042	Lɛɛ, i víke ɓáy sḭ̀i túɔke mbḭw ha ni.
42024043	Ze, ka ya̰a a sṵ ká nun-ri ku.
42024044	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay feri ká mì ɓaa ha rì ɓáy ɗol ɓi ká mì ɗo ziŋ ri kɔɓ rɔɓay na ze ɗo key: Ɗo nun haŋa ɓayri riw bele ká i ɓaa se tul-i ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká Moyze ɗaa, ɓáy taa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy Mbeɗe Simri nda̰w na, ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ.»
42024045	Ze a ha̰ nun-ri ví taŋ ɓay haŋa ri láake ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru,
42024046	a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ká mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa na ze ɗo key: Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, ɗo nun haŋa ni ka kɔ sɛkɛ fe a hu, a ndeke ɗi nam sayke lɛ, a tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy kumnun.
42024047	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri ka-káa Ɓay Kereke ɓáy zaɗri riw bele ɓáy riŋ-ɛ: tii sa̰wke saa ŋgɛrɛpuo Zuruzalɛm key, a se ɓáy sa̰w puo nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele, ɓay haŋa ri suo kér ɓay ɓari ká tul feya̰a ɓari ɓo, ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka nda buma ka ziŋ ri.
42024048	Ɓaarì na, ì ɓa nzoɓ ɓay nasi ɓay fe niri na key.
42024049	A lɛ, fe ini ká Bǎa waa ziŋ rì pola na, ɓi kḭ sùo-i mì píeke ha rì ɓáy. Ze ì káw ŋgɛrɛpuo na key kpṵru ɓo, í zíŋ hṵrusuo káʼa úru saa nulue na nda̰w rɔ.»
42024050	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu tḭi saa Zuruzalɛm a se ziŋ ri ɗi ya ɓáy Betani. Ká zaɗɛ ku na, ka ura nduo-ɛ a sa̰m fe zuɔ tul-ri.
42024051	Zaɗkaʼa ɗo sá̰m fe ha ri munu na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ni ká sakra ɓari a ha̰ ni se luo-ɛ ká nulue.
42024052	A ɓari laa lɛ, i ruo ni. Falɛ lɛ, í yḭ̀i í se Zuruzalɛm ɓáy bawda suoriya.
42024053	Nam ɓáy nam na i kaw ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a í pisi ni.
43001001	Pola nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay haŋa feri riw ɗo na, ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Ɓay na ɗo ɗɔɗ ro. Ka ɗo ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
43001002	Ɓay na ɗo ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy tiika sa̰w feri hɔy.
43001003	Ɓáy faa ɓe na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗáake feri riw bele; fe káʼa ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓe ya na, mbḭw tiya.
43001004	Ɓe na, sa̰w káw ɓáy kumnun uru saa luo-ɛ. A káw ɓáy kumnunke ku na ɓa zaɗ taŋa ká ɗaa ha̰ nun nzoɓri mgbuɗa ká ɗi.
43001005	Zaɗ taŋake ku na hie ɓaŋguɔ ká ɓil suŋ tilo, lɛ, suŋ tilo na ya̰a ɓay zaɗ taŋa na ya.
43001006	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Za̰a.
43001007	Lɛɛ, ɓe na, ka vi ɓa nzoɓ ɓay nasi zaɗ taŋa na, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri riw bele i laa ɓayke ɓo, í ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul ɓay zaɗ taŋake na.
43001008	Ɓe Za̰a kḭ sùo-ɛ na, ka ɓa zaɗ taŋa ya, roo lɛ, ka vi ɓay ɓáa ɓay nasi zaɗ taŋa na.
43001009	Zaɗ taŋake ku na, ɓa zaɗ taŋa taa tusuɛke. Kaʼa ví tusiri key a hie kaɗ kaɗ ká ɓil law nzoɓri riw bele.
43001010	Ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Ɓay na, ka ɗo tusiri key. Ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa tusirike na ɓáy faa ɓe hɔy kara, nzoɓri ká tusiri key na i tuu ni ya.
43001011	Ka vi sa̰w puo ɓe, lɛ, nzoɓri ya̰a ni ɓa sùo-ri ya.
43001012	Roo lɛ, ɓari riw bele ká i ya̰a ni í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e na, ka ha ri faa ɓay haŋa ri vi ɓa vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri.
43001013	I vika ɓa vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru munu ká i mboŋke nzoɓ ya: ɓáy faa sím ya nda̰w, faa law hiiya nzoɓ ya nda̰w, roo lɛ, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ ze ha̰ mboŋa fieke na.
43001014	Ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Ɓay na, ka ví ya̰a sùo ziŋ nzoɓ a ɗaa puo ziŋ naari. Law kere ɓáy tusuɛ ɓay mbaa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y. Ɓuru na, ɓuru kɔ riŋ ɗika ɓe. Ɓa riŋ ɗika leɗ mbḭw hɔy keklek ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
43001015	Za̰a ɓaa nasi ɓay ká se tul-e mii: «Ì kɔ, ɓa nzoɓ key ze mì ɓaa ɓay ɓe mii: “Nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-i vuku na, ka mba mì pavbaɗ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo pola ɗɔɗ nda̰w rɔɔ, i mbóŋ mì ɓáy.”»
43001016	Naari riw bele na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ naari law kere ɓe, ɓa fe sa̰mi ká ka̰y tul kḭ tul kḭ ɓa pola pola.
43001017	Pola lew na, ka ha̰ naari bol kusol ɓáy faa Moyze. Roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, ka ha̰ naari law kere ɓáy tusuɛ ɓay ɓáy faa Zezu Krisi.
43001018	Nzoɓ mbḭw mini kɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy nun-ɛ ya. Roo lɛ, ɓe káʼa ɓa leɗ mbḭw hɔy keklek, a ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ sùo-ɛ, a kaw lakun Bi-ɛ na ze ɗaa ha̰ náa tǔukeri ni.
43001019	Nam mbḭw munu, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ká Zuruzalɛm pie nzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy Leviri ha ri se luo Za̰a ɓay vbika ni ɓay, ɓay kɔ́kɔ wa̰a, ɓe na ka ɓa ve lɛ?
43001020	Zaɗka i se luo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, ka gbir ya a yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ta-taŋ ha ri mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ya.»
43001021	Lɛɛ, i vbi ni na rɔɓay mii «Mù ɓa nzoɓ ve kḭ lɛ? Wa̰a, mù ɓa Eli lɛ?» Za̰a yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ṵ́-uu, mì ɓa ɓe ya.» I yḭ̀i í vbi ni na rɔɓay mii: «A wa̰a, mù ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓayke na lɛ?» Ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓa ɓi ya.»
43001022	Ro, í vbi ni ɓay mii: «A key wa̰a, mù ɓa nzoɓ ve kḭ gbaɗ lɛ woo? Mu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓayke ha̰ ɓuru vǎa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i pie ɓuru na. A ɓo kḭ sùo-ɔ na wa̰a, mù ɓaa ɓay mina kḭ ze se tul-a na lɛ?»
43001023	Lɛɛ, Za̰a yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ká Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa pola lew na mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɓa ɓe ká ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ ká ɓil law kɔr mii: “Ì léke faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha̰ ni ka ɗo sikɗa kparak kparak na!”»
43001024	Ká sakra nzoɓ nzaapeɗri ká i pie ri ɓa luo Za̰a na, Farizi ha̰nɛri ká i ɗo ɗi na,
43001025	i vbi ni ɓay key mii: «Munu ká mù ɓa Krisi ya nda̰w, mú ɓa Eli ya nda̰w, a mú ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓuru giyaŋ ni ya nda̰w na wa̰a, ɓay ḭi kḭ nda̰w rɔɔ, mù ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii lɛ?»
43001026	Lɛɛ, Za̰a yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓi na, mbii ze mì ɗaa tul-rì nduo ɗi, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ɗo sakra ɓaarì ku ká ì kɔ ni ya.
43001027	Ɓe káʼa ví fal-i vuku na, ka kal tul-i pavbaɗ. Sal dikɔn ká ɓal-ɛ hɔy kara, mì maa ɓay hina ya.»
43001028	Fe niri riw bele key na kal ká Betani ká nzaa kporombii Zurdɛ̰ ká fi kɛlu. Zaɗɛ ku ze, Za̰a ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ká ɗi.
43001029	Nzaaruo kḭ na báyḭi lɛ, Za̰a kɔ Zezu ká se vuku ɓa luo-ɛ na ro a ɓaa mii: «Ì kɔ, ɓe key na ka ɓa Vu Baɗu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa náa feya̰a nzoɓri ká tusiri key na zu.
43001030	Ɓa ɓe na key ze, mì ɓaa ɓay ɓe pola mii, “nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-i vuku na, ka kal tul-i pavbaɗ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo pola ɗɔɗ nda̰w rɔɔ i mbóŋ mì ɓáy.”
43001031	Kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ve kara, ɓi na mì kɔ ya. Roo lɛ, mì ví ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ɓay haŋa leɗ Izarayɛlri tǔuke ni ɓa ɓe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay ɓe na.»
43001032	Za̰a ɓaa nasi ɓay ká se tul-e mii: «Mì kɔ Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗì saa nulue munu ká bɛɗɛ pie a kaw tul-e kɔkrɔ.
43001033	Ka ɓa nzoɓ ve kara, mì kɔ ya ɓáy, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká píe mì ha̰ mì ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii na ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: “Mu kɔ́kɔ Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗì a kaw tul nzoɓ mbḭw. Ɓa ɓe ze a ɗáa nzoɓri nduo ɓil Tem Law Pie.”
43001034	Ɓi na, mì kɔ fekeri na ɓáy nun-i, a mí ɓaa nasi ɓayke ha rì mii: ɓe na, ka ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
43001035	Nzaaruo kḭ na, Za̰a ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká tul-rì siɗi na, i ɗo zaɗ ɗol ɓe ká pola na ku rɔɓay.
43001036	Zaɗkaʼa mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ Zezu ká ɗo kali na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: «Ì kɔ, ɓe na ka ɓa Vu Baɗu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!»
43001037	Leɗ nduoɓal Za̰ari ká siɗi na, i laa munu báyḭi lɛ, i uru í tɔŋ fal Zezu na.
43001038	Zaɗka Zezu fɛrɛ kɔ́m a kɔ ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi ri ɓay mii: «Ha̰a ḭi ze ì nzaa lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭ̀i í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Rabi,» (má̰rake ɓaa mii gaŋ tul-i), «Mù naa zaɗ ha̰a lɛ?»
43001039	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì vi lɛ, ì kɔ́kɔ ɓáy.» Báyḭi lɛ, i se ziŋ ni í kɔ zaɗ nam ɓe, a í kaw ziŋ ni kpṵru maa ɓáy huu mgbaŋ ká taa korok.
43001040	Leɗ nduoɓal Za̰ari ká i laa ɓay Zezu a í tɔŋ fal-ɛ na, nzoɓ mbḭwke ɓa Andere, yṵ Simo̰n Piyɛr.
43001041	Falɛ ku lɛ, Andere vǎa ziŋ yṵ-ɛ na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru ziŋ Mesi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na!» (Má̰ra sa̰w riŋke lɛ, ɓa Krisi).
43001042	Lɛɛ, ka su Simo̰n na a séke ni luo Zezu. Zaɗka Zezu mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ ni na, ka ɓaa mii: «Ɓo na, mù ɓa Simo̰n vu Za̰a, i ɗika mù ɓa Sefas.» (Má̰ra sa̰w riŋke lɛ, ɓa Piyɛr.)
43001043	Nzaaruo kḭ na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu hii ɓay séke ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele, ze a vǎa ziŋ Filiɓ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se fal-i.»
43001044	(Filiɓ na ɓa nzoɓ ká Besayda, puo ɓe ɓáy Andere ɓáy Simo̰n Piyɛrri mbḭw hɔy.)
43001045	Lɛɛ, Filiɓ na vǎa ziŋ Nataniyɛl a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nzoɓ ká Moyze ɓaa ɓay se tul-e ɗo ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kara ɓaa ɓay se tul-e nda̰w na, ɓuru ziŋ ni ro! Ɓa Zezu, vu Zezeɓ ká puo ká Nazarɛɗ.»
43001046	Báyḭi lɛ, Nataniyɛl ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Wa̰a, fe kere a úru saa Nazarɛɗ na ku nda̰w zu lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Filiɓ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii «Mu vi lɛ, mù kɔ́kɔ ɓáy.»
43001047	Zaɗka Zezu mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ Nataniyɛl ká vi ɓa luo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ɓay se tul-e mii: «Ì kɔ key, ɓe na, ka ɓa leɗ Izarayɛl taa tusuɛke, ká fe úla nun nzoɓ mbḭw kara ti sùo-ɛ ya.»
43001048	Nataniyɛl na kaw yer a yḭ̀i a vbi ni mii: «Ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ mù tuu mì taŋ mini key lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì kɔ mù ɗɔɗ ɓáy káw ɓo ká sa̰w puu nzum ku hɔy rɔɔ, Filiɓ ɗí mù ɓáy.»
43001049	Báyḭi lɛ, Nataniyɛl ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, ɓo na mù ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a mú ɓa mbay leɗ Izarayɛlri!»
43001050	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mù ɗaa law-a ɓo tul-i ɓay kɔ́kɔ ká mì kɔ mù ká sa̰w puu nzum ku na lɛ? Mù kɔ́kɔ fe kereri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri kal taa ɓe ni key na ɓáy.»
43001051	Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa na rɔɓay mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ì kɔ́kɔ nulue mgbuɗa ɓoloŋ ha̰ leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri hǐlke ɓa luo-ɛ, í ɗǐrake vi luo-i ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na.»
43002001	Falɛ ká ndeke ɗi nam sayke na, nam suoriya ya̰aŋa kḭ ɗo ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Kana ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Máa Zezu ɗo zaɗɛ ku nda̰w,
43002002	lɛ, i ɗi Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɓa zaɗ ya̰aŋa kḭke na ku nda̰w pi.
43002003	Báyḭi lɛ, him puo nzoɓri, lɛ, máa Zezu ví ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Him na ti mbǎa ro.»
43002004	Roo lɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Maa, wa̰a ɓa ɓo nda̰w rɔɔ, mù kíɛ mì fe ká mì ɗáa lɛ woo? Nam ɓi na tɔ̀ŋ rɔɓay.»
43002005	Báyḭi lɛ, mi-ɛ na yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáa peɗri mii: «Fe káʼa ɓaa ha rì na, ì ɗaa.»
43002006	Zaɗɛ ku na durari ká i ɗaa ɓáy tisaw ɓa yie zuɔ ɗi; ɓa durari ká Ziɓri ɗaa mbii zuɔ ɗi ɓay wáake sùo-ri taŋ kaɗ kaɗ munu ká ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari. Ɓil durake mbḭw lɛ, maa tɔy mbii siɗi ya lɛ, sayri munu.
43002007	Ro, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáa peɗri na mii: «Ì ɗáŋ mbii mbaa durari na key.» Ze, i ɗaŋ mbii na ha̰ ni mbaa ɗi dɔrɔrɔ dɔrɔrɔ.
43002008	-
43002009	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì ví kaa mbii key na í séke ha̰ nzoɓ mbika tul peɗ nam suoriya na.» Lɛɛ, i kaa mbii ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ ɓa him na í séke ha̰ ni. Ɓe na, ka kɔ zaɗ ká uru saa ɗi ya, roo lɛ, nzoɓ ɗáa peɗri ká i kaa mbiike na mǎa, i kɔ. Zaɗka nzoɓ mbika tul peɗ nam suoriya na lie mbii ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, ka kaw yer, a ɗi wa̰ra nzoɓ má̰y na
43002010	a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Má̰ra sa̰wke ká ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, i haŋa him ká ndaɗ ɓamba na ha̰ nzoɓri nzɔ maa ri gulay gulay pola nda̰w rɔɔ, í ha ri ha̰y ká raa ya na ɓáy. Roo lɛ, him ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri na, ɓo mù kɔrɔ ɗo kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key!»
43002011	Ɓe ze ɓa fe saŋ ká Zezu ɗaa titire ɗɛkrɛ ká Kana ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Ka kiɛ ri ha ri kɔ riŋ ɗika ɓe, ze leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul-e.
43002012	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka se ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Kapɛrnayum ɓáy mi-ɛ, yṵ-ɛri nda̰w, rɔɔ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri nda̰w a í kaw ɗi nam ha̰nɛri munu.
43002013	Munu ká nam suoriya Ziɓri ká ɓa nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ na, Zezu uru a se ŋgɛrɛpuo Zuruzalɛm.
43002014	Zaɗkaʼa rìi a se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi na, ka ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɓáy ndayri ká ɓay hí-hie nda̰w, baɗuri nda̰w, rɔɔ bɛɗɛri nda̰w. Ka ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɓa nzoɓ kṵu kḭ vu lariri ká nzaa tutakra ɓari na kara nda̰w pi.
43002015	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɗaa ndoy dɔŋ ɓáy sal, a níike ri ɓáy baɗu ɓari ɓáy ndayri na riw bele zuɔ fal hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka mii vu lari nzoɓ kṵu kḭ lariri na, a kira tutakra ɓari na zuɔ siri.
43002016	Ka yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáɓ bɛɗɛri na mii: «Ì fa̰a fe ɓaarì na í tḭ́ike tḭi ká zaɗ ni key ɓa kɛlɛ! Ì ɗaa hul Bǎa na ɓa hul fe hie ya!»
43002017	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri kɔ munu na báyḭi lɛ, i ker se tul ɓay ká i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓaa mii, «Kɔn hul ɓo na ɗáa mì lok lok.»
43002018	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Fe saŋ ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, mù ɗáa ɓay kíɛke ɓuru mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ mù faa ɓay ɗáa fe mini key na lɛ?»
43002019	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Zaɗka ì nduku hul ka̰ni ni key lɛ, nam say lɛ, mì úra ɓa kḭ.»
43002020	Lɛɛ, ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa, hul ká ɓuru ɗaa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ pa̰rɛ yie nda̰w rɔɔ, ɔ key lɛ, ɓo mù ɓaa mii, nam say hɔy lɛ, mù úra ɓa kḭ kɛlɛ?»
43002021	Tusuɛke lɛ, hul ka̰ni ká Zezu ɓaa ɓayke na, ka ɓaa se tul sùo-ɛ káʼa huka a ɗaa nam say lɛ, a tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ.
43002022	Falɛ ká Zezu tḭi saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy kumnun na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ker se tul ɓaykeri káʼa ɓaa ha ri na, a í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul ɓay ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓáy ɓay ká tḭi saa nzaa Zezu na nda̰w.
43002023	Zaɗka Zezu ɗo Zuruzalɛm ɓay ɗáa nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na báyḭi lɛ, ɓil namkeri ku na, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e ɓay tul fe saŋri káʼa ɗaa.
43002024	Roo lɛ, Zezu ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka kɔ kér ɓay ɓari riw bele.
43002025	Ka se síe nzoɓ ká ɓay haŋa ni ka tína sa̰w feri ká tul nzoɓri ha̰ ni ya. Ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ na, ka kɔ fe ká ɗo ɓil law nzoɓri ká nziiya na ŋgiɗ bele.
43003001	Nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká sakra Fariziri riŋ-ɛ ɓa Nikɔdɛm a ɓa ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri.
43003002	Ka vi luo Zezu ɓa suŋ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, ɓuru kɔ lɛ, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ ze píe mù ɓay haŋa mù ɓa nzoɓ fére ɓuru fe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe saŋri ká mù ɗaa na, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru saɗ ziŋ ni ya lɛ, ka ti máa ɓay ɗáa ya.»
43003003	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka i mboŋ nzoɓ ɓa kḭ ya lɛ, nzoɓke ku na ti máa ɓay ɗoko sakra nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na ya.»
43003004	Báyḭi lɛ, Nikɔdɛm na yḭ̀i a vbi ni ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, nzoɓ ɗi tá̰w ɗɔɗ ro key lɛ, a ɗáa mina nda̰w rɔɔ a yḭ̀i ha ri mboŋ ni ɓa kḭ lɛ? Wa̰a, nzoɓ a máa ɓay yḭ́i a rìi ɓil mi-ɛ ha ri mboŋ ni ba siɗi rɔɓay lɛ?»
43003005	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka, i mboŋ nzoɓ ɓáy faa mbii ɓáy Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya lɛ, nzoɓke ku na ti máa ɓay ɗoko sakra nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na ya.
43003006	Nzoɓ ká i mboŋ ni ɓáy faa naysuo lɛ, ka ɗo ɓa naysuo, a nzoɓ ká i mboŋ ni ɓáy faa Tem laa lɛ, ɓa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ ze ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun.
43003007	Ɓay ká mì ɓaa ha̰ mù mii, ɗo nun haŋa ri mboŋ rì ɓa kḭ na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa mu káw yer ká ɗi ya.
43003008	Ì kɔ, zuu kuu munu ká law-ɛ hii, lɛ, mù laa gire, roo lɛ, mù kɔ zaɗ ká uru saa ɗi ya nda̰w, zaɗ ká se ɓa ɓaɗi ya nda̰w pi. Ze mboŋa taa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká mboŋ nzoɓ na kara, ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.»
43003009	Báyḭi lɛ, Nikɔdɛm ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Feke ku na a ɗoko mina zu lɛ?»
43003010	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo ká mù ɓa nzoɓ fére fe ká riŋ-a mgba ɓamba ká tusiri Izarayɛl na wa̰a, mù kɔ sa̰w feri na key ya lɛ?
43003011	Mì ɓaa ha̰ mù ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓuru ɓaa ɓay feri ká ɓuru kɔ ta-taŋ na ha rì, a ɓúru ɓaa nasi ɓay fe ká ɓuru kɔ ɓáy nun ɓuru, roo lɛ, ì hii ɓay ya̰aŋa nasi ɓay ɓuru na ya.
43003012	Zaɗka ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul feri ká ɗo tusiri key ká mì ɓaa ɓayke ha rì na ya wa̰a, ì ɗáa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul feri ká nulue ká mì ɓáa ɓayke ha rì na lɛ?
43003013	Nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara uru ká tusiri key a se nulue a kɔ sa̰w feri ká ɗi ya ɓáy. Ɓa ɓi Vu Nzoɓ huo-i ká mì uru saa nulue mí vi tusiri key, a mí maa ɓay tína sa̰w feri ha rì laa.
43003014	Pola lew na Moyze zuu fe ɓa sɔy a siŋ mgba̰ŋra puu a ura ni ɗo siya ká ɓil law kɔr. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ na i síŋ mì í ura mì ɗo siya
43003015	ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i lɛ, ka káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ.
43003016	Ì kɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii nzoɓri ká tusiri key ŋgḭi ɓamba, a ha̰ Vi-e ká ɓa leɗ mbḭw hɔy keklek, ɓay haŋa ɓo nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e lɛ, ka ti ɓíɛ ya, roo lɛ, a káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na.
43003017	Tusuɛke lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie Vi-e vi tusiri key ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓri ya, roo lɛ, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ya̰a sùo-ri ɓáy faa ɓe.
43003018	Nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e lɛ, ɓay ti tul-e mbǎa. A nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e ya laa lɛ, ɓay ɗo tul-e ɓaŋguɔ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa leɗ mbḭw keklek na ya.
43003019	Faa ɗáa ɓayke na ze ɗo key: zaɗ taŋa vi tusiri key, roo lɛ, nzoɓri hii suŋ tilo a í tuŋ zaɗ taŋa na ŋgereŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, peɗ ɗáa ɓari ndaya.
43003020	Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa fe ká ndaya na, ka ḭ̌m zaɗ taŋa na ḭ̌m a ɗuu ni ɗuu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa hḭɛ ɓay peɗ ɗáa ndaya ɓeri na a tḭ́i a ɗo zaɗ hie gbari gbari.
43003021	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗaa fe ɓáy faa tusuɛ ɓay na, ka vi zaɗ taŋa ɓay haŋa nzoɓri kɔ ta-taŋ mii, peɗ ɗáa ɓeri na, ɓa fe káʼa zǔɔke ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
43003022	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri uru í se ɓa zaɗ kḭ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude a kaw ɗi ziŋ ri nam maa fe, a ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii.
43003023	Za̰a kara ɗo ɗáa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ká Eno̰n; zaɗɛ ku na ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy Salim, ɓa zaɗ ká mbiiri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗo ɗi. Ruɔ nzoɓri vi luo-ɛ, lɛ, ka ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.
43003024	Ká ɓil sewke ku na, i mgba Za̰a naa hul sal ya ɓáy.
43003025	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal Za̰a ha̰nɛri tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ziŋ Ziɓ mbḭw munu se tul wáa sùo ká ɓa fe sa̰w puo ɓari na.
43003026	Ro, í se luo Za̰a a í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, nzoɓ ká ɗo ziŋ mù ká nzaa kporombii Zurdɛ̰ ká fi kɛlu ká mù ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓe ha̰ ɓuru na, timbɛɗɛ key na, ka ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele se ɓa luo-ɛ.»
43003027	Báyḭi lɛ, Za̰a yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ fe ha̰ nzoɓ ya lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara maa ɓay zíŋ ya.
43003028	Ɓi na, mì ɓa Krisi ya, roo lɛ, mì ɓa nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru píe mì vi pola ha̰ ni. Ɓaarì kḭ sùo-rì na, ì maa ɓay ɓáa nasi ɓay ká mì ɓaa na.
43003029	Ì kɔ, wa̰ra nzoɓ má̰y na, má̰y ɓe ɗo ɓay tul-e. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ buɔ nzoɓ má̰y na, ɗo ɗi ya ká lakun-ɛ ɓay láa ni nda̰w, a ɗo ɓáy bawda suoriya ɓay láa kusol nzoɓ má̰y na. Ɓi na, mì ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ buɔ nzoɓ má̰y na. Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri se fal Zezu na, suoriya mbaa ɓil law-i gba̰y gba̰y.
43003030	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa riŋ-ɛ ka mgba ɓa pola pola, a ɓi laa lɛ, mi yḭ̀i ɓa fal.
43003031	Ɓe ká uru saa nulue na ka kaw tul feri riw bele. Nzoɓ ká uru saa tusiri key na, ka ɓa taa tusiri a ɓaa ɓay feri káʼa kɔ ká tusiri key. A nzoɓ ká uru saa nulue a vi laa lɛ, [ka kaw tul feri riw bele,]
43003032	a ɓaa nasi ɓay fe káʼa kɔ ɓáy nun-ɛ nda̰w, a laa ɓáy suk-e nda̰w pi. Roo lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ya̰a nasi ɓay ɓe na ya.
43003033	A roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ya̰a nasi ɓay ɓe na, ka hii ɓayke ɗo ɗi mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa tusuɛ ɓay na kḭ.
43003034	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie ni na, ka nday bol nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ Tem ɓe mbaa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y.
43003035	Bǎa naari na, hii Vi-e a pɔŋ faa ɗáa feri riw bele zuɔ nduo-ɛ.
43003036	Nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Vi-eke na lɛ, ka kaw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ. A nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul-e ya lɛ, ka ti káw ɓáy kumnunke na ya, roo lɛ, hɛrɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo tul-e ɓaŋguɔ.»
43004001	-
43004003	Fariziri laa mii, Zezu ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri vi ɓa leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri, a ɗaa nzoɓri nduo mbii mba Za̰a. (Tusuɛke lɛ, Zezu kḭ sùo-ɛ ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ya, roo lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ze ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii.) Zaɗka Zezu laa mii, soro feri káʼa ɗaa na tɔɗɔ ɓo suku Fariziri na báyḭi lɛ, ka uru ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude a zɔl, a yḭ̀i ɓa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.
43004004	Roo lɛ, ká ɓay haŋa ni se kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na, a kál ɓáy faa ká ɓo kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari.
43004005	Báyḭi lɛ, ka tḭi puo mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sikar ká ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy wáa ká bulu ɓari Zakoɓ ha̰ vi-e Zezeɓ ká pola lew na.
43004006	-
43004008	Ká zaɗɛ ku na, luɔ mbii ká Zakoɓ tie pola lew na ɗo ɗi. Munu ká Zezu ha̰ari a ta̰a ɓamba na báyḭi lɛ, ka ta̰a a kaw nzaa luɔ mbii na. A leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri laa lɛ, i se ɓa ɓil puɔ ɓay híe fe sṵm. Ɓe nu ku lɛ, maa ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul ro zu. Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y mbḭw munu ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari na vi ɓay ɗáŋ mbii. Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Má̰y, ha̰ mì mbii mi nzɔ.»
43004009	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na ɗo yer a yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɗaa mina rɔɔ ɓo ká mù ɓa Ziɓ lɛ, mù gɔ́ŋ mì mbii ɓay nzɔkɔ, ɓi ká mì ɓa má̰y ká Samari na lɛ woo!» (Ka ɓaa munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká Samari na zuɔ kḭ ɓari tiya.)
43004010	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka mù kɔ fe law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgba ziŋ nzoɓri, a mú tuu nzoɓ ká gɔŋ mù mbii nzɔkɔ na lɛ, ɓo kḭ sùo-ɔ ze mù gɔ́ŋ ni mbii na pola, lɛ, a haŋa mù mbii ká uo yaw yaw ká ɓay haŋa mù kǎwke ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na.»
43004011	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na yḭ̀i a vbi ni mii: «Mbay, luɔ mbii lɛ ɗi ɓamba, a ɓo lɛ, mù ti ɓáy fe ɗáŋ mbii ya; wa̰a, mù ɗáa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay zíŋ mbii ni key ká uo yaw yaw na ɓay nzɔkɔ lɛ?
43004012	Luɔ mbii key na bulu ɓuru Zakoɓ ze ha̰ ɓuru. Ɓa luɔ mbii ká ɓe kḭ ka nzɔ, ɓáy vi-eri ɓáy fe hɔl ɓeri kara nda̰w pi. Wa̰a, ɓo na mù mba tul bulu ɓuru Zakoɓ na lɛ woo?»
43004013	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká nzɔ mbii ká luɔ mbii key na lɛ, kɔn mbii kḭ a sɛkɛ ni ɓáy.
43004014	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká nzɔ mbii ká mì haŋa ni na lɛ, kɔn mbii kḭ ti sɛkɛ ni mbǎa mgbaŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbii ká mì haŋa ni na, a ɗoko munu ɓa mbii ká uo suɔ suɔ ká ɓil law-ɛ ɓay haŋa ni káwke ɓáy kumnun káʼa ɗoko ɓaŋguɔ na.»
43004015	Lɛɛ, má̰y na ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, ze ɓo munu zu lɛ, mu ha̰ mì mbiike na ɓay haŋa kɔn mbii kḭ ka sɛ mì mbǎa nda̰w, a mí se síe yḭ́i vi zaɗ ni key ɓay ɗáŋ mbii kḭ na mbǎa nda̰w pi.»
43004016	Zezu yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se mú vǎa ɗi wa̰ra ɓo, a ɓo ɓáy kḭ, í yḭ̀i í vi.»
43004017	Lɛɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ti ɓáy wa̰ra ya.» Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓay ɓo ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ. Wa̰ra ɓo tiya munu ká mù ɓaa,
43004018	roo lɛ, mù ya̰a wa̰ra zaɗ ndeɓe, a ha̰y ká mù kǎwke timbɛɗɛ key kara, ɓa wa̰ra ɓo ya nda̰w. Ɓo na, mù ɓaa sùo ɓay kḭ ze ha̰ mì.»
43004019	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mì kɔ lɛ, mù ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
43004020	Bulu ɓururi na, i rùo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul kuo ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari key, roo lɛ, ɓaarì Ziɓri kḭ ì geɗe mii, zaɗ ká ɓay rúo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗi na ɓa Zuruzalɛm.»
43004021	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Má̰y, mu ɗaa law-a ka ɓo tul ɓay ká mì ɓáa ha̰ mù key. Nam káʼa ví vuku na, zaɗ rúo Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗoko ɓa kḭ-kii; nzoɓ ti séke síe séke tul kuo key ya nda̰w, ká Zuruzalɛm ya nda̰w pi.
43004022	Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari na, nzoɓ ká ì ruo ni na ì kɔ sa̰wke taŋ ya. A ɓuru Ziɓri laa lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɓuru ruo ni na, ɓuru kɔ sa̰wke ta-taŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, pam na vi ɓáy faa Ziɓri.
43004023	A lɛ, nam a ví vuku, ze namke na vi ro, ká nzoɓ rúo Bǎa taa tusuɛkeri na, i rúo ni ɓáy faa Tem nda̰w, ɓáy faa tusuɛ ɓay nda̰w pi. Nzoɓri ká i ruo ni mini key na ze ka hii.
43004024	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓa Tem, a lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ruo ni na, ka hii ɓay haŋa ri rúo ni ɓáy faa Tem nda̰w, ɓáy faa tusuɛ ɓay nda̰w pi.»
43004025	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mì kɔ lɛ, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri, ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Krisi na a vika. Zaɗkaʼa vi lɛ, kaʼa tína sa̰w feri taŋ kaɗ kaɗ riw bele ha̰ naari.»
43004026	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓa ɓi kḭ ze mì ɗo ɓáa ɓay ziŋ mù key.»
43004027	Ká zaɗɛ ku na, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ví ziŋ ni, lɛ, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul má̰y ká Samari káʼa ɗo ɓáa ɓay ziŋ ni na ku. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari káʼa maa ɓay vbika ni ɓay mii, fe ḭi ze ɓeri vbi, mase ɓay ḭi kḭ rɔɔ ɓeri ɓaa ziŋ má̰y na ku kara, tiya nda̰w.
43004028	Báyḭi lɛ, má̰y na pɔŋ tinay mbii ɓe na ɓo nzaa luɔ mbii, a yḭ̀i a se ɓil puɔ a vǎa ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri mii:
43004029	«Ì vi í kɔ leɗban ká kḭi fal fe ɗáa ɓiri riw bele ká mì ɗaa ká pola lew key na zíŋ mì. Wa̰a, a ɓá Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na zu lɛ woo?»
43004030	Lɛɛ, nzoɓri tḭi ká ɓil puɔ yir a í se ɓa luo Zezu na.
43004031	Sa̰w síeke ku na leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri koɗ ni mii: «Mbay, mu sṵ fe!»
43004032	Roo lɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Fe sṵm ɓi ɗo ɗi ku ká ɓay haŋa mì sṵ, roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì kɔ fe sṵmke ya.»
43004033	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi kḭ ɓay ɓa lie ɓa lew mii: «A ku wa̰a, nzoɓ ha̰nɛ vi ɓáy fe sṵm ha̰ ni sṵ lɛ woo?»
43004034	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓa ha ri mii: «Fe sṵm ɓi na ɓa ɗáa law hiiya nzoɓ ká píe mì, a mí ɗaa peɗ káʼa pɔŋ zuɔ nduo-i na ha̰ ni ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ.
43004035	Ɓaarì na ì ɓaa mii: “Few niŋ nda̰w rɔɔ, a ɓá few vbíe fe pay ɓáy.” A ɓi lɛ, mì ɓaa ha rì: ì mbi nun-rì í kɔ wáari ká ɗo ku. Pa̰ra fe paykeri ŋgɔŋ riw bele, a ɗo ɗi ya ɓay vbíe ro! Ɗo faa mbḭw munu ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɗi ya ɓay ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul-i.
43004036	Nzoɓ ká vbie fe pay na, ka ziŋ fe tunduo-ɛ ro; ka mbṵ fe paykeri ká ɓa nzoɓri na, ɓay haŋa ri káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓ ká ru fe, ɓáy nzoɓ ká vbie fe pay na, i ɗaa suoriya ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy,
43004037	ɓay ḭi lɛ, sim ɓay ɓáa nzoɓri ká ɓaa mii, “nzoɓ mbḭw ru fe, a nzoɓ kḭ laa lɛ, vbi-vbieke” na ɓa tusuɛ ɓay na kḭ.
43004038	Mì píe rì ha rì vbie fe pay ká zaɗ ká ì ru fe ká ɗi ya. Nzoɓ kḭri ze i ru fe, rɔɔ ɓaarì na ì vbie fe pay ɓari na ɓáy.»
43004039	Nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu ɓay tul ɓay ká má̰y na ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ka kḭi fal fe ɗáa ɓiri ká pola lew riw bele ha̰ mì na.»
43004040	Sa̰wke mini ze, zaɗka nzoɓkeri ku vi luo Zezu na, i koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka káw ziŋ ri. Ze, Zezu kaw ziŋ ri nam siɗi.
43004041	Nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e ɓay tul ɓay káʼa ɓaa ha ri na.
43004042	I ɓaa ha̰ má̰y na mii: «Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓuru ɗaa law ɓuru ɓo tul Zezu ɓay tul ɓayri ká mù kḭi ha̰ ɓuru hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ɓa fe ká ɓuru laa ɓáy suku ɓuru kḭ, a ɓúru kɔ ta-taŋ mii, ɓa ɓe na kḭ ze ka ɓa Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri ká tusiri key.»
43004043	Zaɗka Zezu ɗaa nam siɗi ziŋ ri ká zaɗɛ ku na, ka uru a se ɓa puo ɓe ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.
43004044	Tusuɛke lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ta-taŋ sùo-ɛ kḭ mii, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-e ká tusiri ɓe ya.
43004045	Roo lɛ, zaɗkaʼa tḭi kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na, nzoɓkeri ya̰a ni ɓáy kere, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓari kara i se zaɗ nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy ká Zuruzalɛm na nda̰w, a í kɔ fe saŋri riw bele ká Zezu ɗaa ká ɗi na.
43004046	Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i yḭ̀i ɓa kḭ í se Kana ká ɗo kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele káʼa fɛrɛ mbii ha̰ ni vi ɓa him ká ɗi na. Ká zaɗɛ ku na, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y mbḭw ɗo ɗi ká sùo vi-e sɛ ni naa puo ká Kapɛrnayum.
43004047	Zaɗkaʼa laa mii Zezu vi saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude a ɗo kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na báyḭi lɛ, ka se luo-ɛ a koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka se a vǎa vaa vi-e ká ɗo ɗi ya ɓay huka na.
43004048	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka ì kɔ fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká ndaɗ kɔ́kɔ ya lɛ, ì ti ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul-i ya.»
43004049	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, kóɗ ŋguɔ hɔy mu se puo ɓi ɓa vaa ká vu-i na a huka.»
43004050	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu zɔ́l mú se puɔ; vu-ɔ na vaa ro.» Ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y na ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni na a zɔl faa puɔ.
43004051	Zaɗkaʼa se faa kɔɓ rɔɓay na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri i suɔ nun-ɛ í ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Vu-ɔ na vaa ɓáy kere!»
43004052	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y na vbi ri ɓay mii: «Maa ɓáy sa̰w síe mina nda̰w rɔɔ leɗ na vaa ku lɛ?» Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ni mii: «Liɛ ku na, maa ɓáy síe ká fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ, ze sùo zaŋa ɓe na ɔ̌ke.»
43004053	Lɛɛ, bi-ɛ kɔ ro, ɓa sa̰w síeke ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii, vu-ɔ na vaa ro na zu. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri riw bele na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu.
43004054	Ɓe ze ɓa fe saŋ ndeke ɗi ba siɗike ká Zezu ɗaa ká fal yḭ́i ɓe saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude, a vi kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele na.
43005001	Fal feri ku na, Ziɓri ɗaa nam suoriya ɓari, lɛ, Zezu uru a se ɓa ŋgɛrɛpuo Zuruzalɛm na rɔɓay.
43005002	Ká Zuruzalɛm na, faa kɔ̀kɔ mbḭw ɓa faa kál baɗuri ɗo ɗi. Ɗi ya ɓáy faake ku na, da̰ŋa ɗo ɗi ká i mbuo fe í puɗ ɓa tem zaɗ ndeɓe ɗo ɗi. Riŋ zaɗke ku na i ɗi ɓáy nzaa eboro ɓa Betesda.
43005003	Temri ká i puɗ ɗo lakun mbiike ku na, nzoɓ sɛmri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri i naa ɗi raɗ raɗ; nzoɓ ra̰wri nda̰w, nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri nda̰w, rɔɔ nzoɓri ká sùo-ri hu wǔɔ nda̰w pi. [Ɓari na, i naa í giyaŋ mbii káʼa láŋ,
43005004	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓil nam ha̰nɛri ku na, leɗ nzaapeɗ taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗì a ví ɗo ɓil mbii na a laŋ. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ sɛm ká ɗì titire ɗɛkrɛ, a ɗo ɓil mbii ká laŋ ku na lɛ, sɛmke na ɗo mina mina hɔy kara, suo nzoɓke na a váa ɓáy kere.]
43005005	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɗi ku na, sùo-ɛ sɛ ni naa ɗi ɗaa mbiimbam síŋ say pa̰rɛ tɔnɔ siɗi ro.
43005006	Zaɗka Zezu mbi nun-ɛ kaʼa kɔ ni naa sɛm bole ɗi ɓamba na báyḭi lɛ, ka vbi ni mii: «Wa̰a, mù hii ɓay haŋa sùo-ɔ vaa lɛ?»
43005007	Nzoɓ sɛm na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, zaɗka mbii na laŋ lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓay mbika mì a ɗáa mì nduo ɗi na tiya. Zaɗka mì nzaa faa ɓay séke ɗi lɛ, nzoɓ kḭ ví kuŋ pol-i gbaɗ a ɗo ɗi pola ɗɔɗ ha̰ mì.»
43005008	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya mú mbi hii ɓo a mú se-seɗ!»
43005009	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, sùo leɗban na vaa ni kiyaw kiyaw, a mbi hii ɓe a se-seɗ. Feke ku na kal ká síe nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri.
43005010	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni na mii: «Vuri key na ɓa nam mgbaka ta̰ram ká nzoɓ ɗaa peɗ ya. Bol kusol ɓuru na ha̰ faa ká ɓay haŋa nzoɓ soɓ hii ká ɓil nam key na ya.»
43005011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká vaa mì key na ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: “Mbi hii ɓo mú se-seɗ.”»
43005012	Báyḭi lɛ, i vbi ni mii: «A wa̰a nzoɓ ve kḭ ze ɓaa ha̰ mù lɛ?»
43005013	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ha̰ sùo-ɛ vaa ni na, ɓa nzoɓ ve kara ka kɔ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Zezu zee rik ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗo zaɗɛ na.
43005014	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, Zezu yḭ̀i a ziŋ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni na ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu laa, timbɛɗɛ key na mù vaa kiyaw kiyaw ro. Roo lɛ, mu ɗaa feya̰a na mbǎa. Munu ya lɛ, fe ká ndaya kal tul-e taa ha̰y key na a ɗáa mù ɓáy.»
43005015	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗban na zɔl a vǎa ɓaa ha̰ ɓari ká i ɓa ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri na mii, ɓa Zezu ze vaa ɓeri.
43005016	Sa̰wke mini ze, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ɗaa nun-ri ɓo tul Zezu lɛr lɛr, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa fe niri key na ká síe nam mgbaka ta̰ram ɓari.
43005017	Ro, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa peɗ ɓa pola pola kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key rɔɓay, a ɓi kara mì ɗo ɗáa peɗ.»
43005018	Ɓay tul ɓayke na ku ze ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri nzǎarake ni mba taa pola na ku rɔɓay ɓay ika ni. I hii ɓay ika ni ɓay tul bol kusol nam mgbaka ta̰ram Ziɓri káʼa tuŋ na ku hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a ɓaa mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa Bǎa ɓeri, ɓe ze a mgba sùo-ɛ a líeke ni.
43005019	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: leɗ na maa ɗáa fe mbḭw ɓáy tul-e ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ ya. Fe ká Bi-ɛ ɗaa na nda̰w rɔɔ, ka ɗaa ɓáy. Feri riw bele ká Bi-ɛ ɗaa na, ɓe na kara ɗaa faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
43005020	Ì kɔ, Bǎa leɗ na kɔ Vi-e ɓa nzoɓ nun-ɛ, a kiɛ ni feri riw bele káʼa ɗaa sùo-ɛ kḭ. Kaʼa kíɛ ni peɗri ká ɓay ɗáa rɔɓay mba ha̰y ká i kɔ key na, lɛ, ì káw yer.
43005021	Munu ká Bǎa tina nzoɓri saa luɔ huɗ a ha ri kaw ɓáy kumnun na, Vi-e kara ha̰ kumnun ha̰ nzoɓri káʼa hii faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
43005022	Rɔɓay, Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na kuŋ ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ mbḭw ya, roo lɛ, ka pɔŋ peɗke zuɔ nduo Vi-e ɓay haŋa ni ka kúŋke ɓay ka ɓo tul nzoɓ,
43005023	ɓay haŋa nzoɓri riw bele i ɗaa mbay ka ɓo tul Vi-e na munu ká i ɗáake mbay ɓo tul Bi-ɛ na. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa mbay ɓo tul Vi-e na ya lɛ, ka ɗaa mbay ɓo tul Bi-ɛ ká píe ni na ya nda̰w.
43005024	«Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ká laa ɓay ɓi, a ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul nzoɓ ká píe mì lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Nzoɓke ku na i ti ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-e ya, roo lɛ, ka kal nzaa huɗ na ro a kaw ɓáy kumnun.
43005025	«Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nam a ví vuku, ze namke na vi ro, ká huɗri láa kusol Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a nzoɓri ká i laa kusol-e na laa lɛ, i káw ɓáy kumnun.
43005026	Munu ká Bǎa leɗ ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo kḭ sùo-ɛ ká ɓay haŋa nzoɓ kaw ɓáy kumnun na, ka ha̰ hṵrusuoke ha̰ Leɗ na ɓay haŋa ni ka ha̰ nzoɓri kaw ɓáy kumnun faa mbḭw munu na nda̰w.
43005027	Rɔɓay, ka ha̰ faa ha̰ Leɗ na ɓay haŋa ni ka kuŋ sal ɓay ka zúɔ tul nzoɓri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɓa Vu Nzoɓ.
43005028	Ì ha̰ ɓay key na ka tuku rì ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam a vika, ká huɗri riw bele ká i naa ɓil luɔ huɗ na, i láa kusol Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru
43005029	a í tḭi saa ɗi. Ɓari nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa peɗ kereri na, a haŋa ri tḭi í kaw ɓáy kumnun. Roo lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ ha̰yri ká peɗ ɗáa ɓari ndaya ɓaŋguɔ na, i tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-ri.
43005030	Ɓi na, mì maa ɓay ɗáa fe mbḭw ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-i ya. Mì kuŋ sal ɓay zuɔ tul nzoɓri, roo lɛ, kúŋ sal ɓay ɓi na ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì nzaa faa ɓay fe ká law-i ze hii ya, roo lɛ, ɓay ɗáa fe ká law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká píe mì ze hii.»
43005031	Zezu ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka ɓa ɓi ze mì ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi sùo-i lɛ, nasi ɓayke na ɗaa fe ya.
43005032	Roo lɛ, ɓa nzoɓ kḭ ɓoɗ ze ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi na. Ze, mì kɔ nda̰w, nasi ɓay káʼa ɓaa se tul-i na ɓa tusuɛ ɓay.
43005033	Ɓaarì na ì pie nzaapeɗ ɓa luo Za̰a, lɛ, nasi ɓay ɓe na ɗo ɓa tusuɛ kḭ.
43005034	Ì kɔ, ɓi na, nasi ɓay nzoɓ ze mì se síeke ya, roo lɛ, mì ɓaa mini ɓay haŋa rì ɗáake law-rì ɓo tul-i í zíŋke pam.
43005035	Za̰a na ɗo munu ɓa huu ndele ká i ɗaa huu taa ɗi káʼa hie kaɗ kaɗ, a lɛ, ɓaarì na ì ɗaa suoriya ká ɓil zaɗ taŋa ɓe na bole ɗi ndḭi munu hɔy.
43005036	A roo lɛ, ɓi na, nzoɓ nasi ɓay ɓi ká kal tul-e taa Za̰a na ɗo ku: ɓa peɗri ká Bǎa pɔŋ zuɔ nduo-i ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa ɔ. Peɗri ká mì ɗaa na ɓaa nasi ɓay se tul-i mii, ɓa Bǎa ze píe mì.
43005037	A Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ sùo-ɛ ká píe mì na, ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi. Ɓaarì na, ì laa kusol-e ba mbḭw ya nda̰w, í kɔ nzaa pol-e ba mbḭw ya nda̰w,
43005038	a ɓay ɓe ɗaa puo ká ɓil law-rì ya nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul nzoɓ káʼa pie ni na ya.
43005039	«Ì bɛ́klɛ ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaŋguɔ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì ker í ɓaa mii, ì zíŋ káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na ká ɗi. Ɓa mbeɗeke na ku ze ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓiri na ká ɗi.
43005040	Ze munu hɔy kara ì hii ɓay vika luo-i ɓay zíŋ káw ɓáy kumnun na ya.
43005041	«Mì nzaa riŋ ɗika ká luo nzoɓ ya,
43005042	roo lɛ, mì tuu rì ta-taŋ a mí kɔ law ini Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ti ɓil law-rì ya.
43005043	Ɓi na, mì vi ɓáy riŋ Bǎa, lɛ, ì hii ɓay mgbaka mì ɓa sùo-rì ya. A roo lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ kḭ ká vi ɓáy riŋ-ɛ ɓe kḭ, lɛ, ɓe ze ì mgba ni ɓa sùo-rì.
43005044	Ɓaarì na, ì hii zíŋ riŋ ɗika ká luo nzoɓ kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew, a í hii nzáa riŋ ɗika ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru huo-ɛ ya. Wa̰a, ì ɗoko zaɗ ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, í ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i lɛ?
43005045	«Ɓaarì na, kɔkɔ ká ì kér í ɓaa mii, ɓi ze mì ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-rì ká pol Bǎa. Ɓa Moyze ká ì ɗaa law-rì te tul-e nzokɗo na ze, a ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-rì.
43005046	Zaɗka ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul ɓay ká Moyze ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe lɛ, ì ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul-i, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbeɗe káʼa ɗaa na, ka ɓǎake ɓay se tul-i zu.
43005047	Roo lɛ, munu ká ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul fe káʼa ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe na ya wa̰a, ì ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ì ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul ɓay ɓiri na lɛ woo?»
43006001	Falɛ ku na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu tuo maambii ká Galele ká i ɗi ɓa maambii ká Tiberiyaɗ nda̰w na a se fi kɛlu.
43006002	Ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri tɔŋ falɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔ fe saŋri káʼa ɗaa a vǎake nzoɓ sɛmri.
43006003	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓáy leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri i hil tul mbɔrɔ í kaw ɗi.
43006004	Nam suoriya Ziɓri ká ɓa nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy na tɔ̀ŋ ɗi mbǎa ro.
43006005	Zezu kɔ-kɔ́m a kɔ ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri ká i vi ɓa luo-ɛ, ze a ɓaa ha̰ Filiɓ mii: «Zaɗ ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ, náa hieri fe sṵm ká ɗi ɓay haŋa nzoɓri key na i sṵ lɛ?»
43006006	Ka vbi ɓay munu ɓay kɔ́kɔ wa̰a, Filiɓ a yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay mina ze ha̰ ni lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka kɔ fe ká ɓe kḭ a vǎa ɗáa na ro.
43006007	Lɛɛ, Filiɓ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Íi! Ze lari peɗ nam isɔɗ sɔɗ siɗi hɔy kara, ɓuru ti híe fe sṵm káʼa máa ɓay haŋa ruɔ nzoɓri key na i ziŋ ndḭi ndḭi í sṵ ya hɔy!»
43006008	Lɛɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ kḭ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Andere, yṵ Simo̰n Piyɛr na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii:
43006009	«Leɗ kuban mbḭw munu ze ɗo ɓáy maapa ɓa ndeɓe, a sḭiri ɓa siɗi. A ku na wa̰a, a máa ruɔ nzoɓri na key lɛ?»
43006010	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele káw siri ɓaw.» Zaɗɛ ku na, suyri luo buɗum ká ɗi ɓamba; ze i kaw tul suy na. Wa̰rari ká i ɗo zaɗɛ ku na, tul-ri maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe (5.000).
43006011	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ya̰a maapa na a ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri leke nzoɓri ká i kaw siri na. Ka yḭ̀i a ɗaa faa mbḭw munu ɓáy sḭiri na nda̰w, a ha ri sṵ maa ri siɓ siɓ munu ká law-ri hii.
43006012	Zaɗka i sṵ maa zaɗ kɔn ɓari riw bele na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ì mbṵ ɓieri ká tɔ̀ŋ na káʼa mgbaka a ɓiɛ gɔr hɔy.»
43006013	Lɛɛ, maapa ká ndeɓe ká i sṵ ká ɓie tɔ̀ŋ na, i fa̰a mbaa buɗu ɓa duɔ fal-ɛ siɗi.
43006014	Zaɗka nzoɓri kɔ fe saŋ ká Zezu ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, i tii sa̰w ɓáa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, leɗban key na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru káʼa vika tusiri key.»
43006015	Munu ká Zezu kɔ ká i hii ɓay mgbaka ni ɓáy hṵrusuo ɓay haŋa ni ka ɓa mbay ɓari na, ka naa sùo-ɛ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay a vǎa kaw tul mbɔrɔ huo-ɛ.
43006016	Zaɗka zaɗ ɗo pira pira na báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri se nzaa maambii
43006017	í hil ɓil tuo í kaw ɗi, a í tii sa̰w tuo mbii ɓa Kapɛrnayum ká ɗo nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu. Ɓe nu ku lɛ, zaɗ sii ɗɔɗ ro zu, roo lɛ, Zezu vǎa ziŋ ri ya rɔɓay.
43006018	Lɛɛ, bawda zuu kuu bivbiɗ bivbiɗ, a laŋ mbii na kpuksu kpuksu.
43006019	Zaɗka leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri hila tuo i se maa sal faa ndeɓe mase yieri munu báyḭi lɛ, i mbi nun-ri í kɔ Zezu ká se-seɗ ká tul mbii a vi ɓa luo-ri vuku. Lɛɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki.
43006020	Roo lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa ɓi kḭ zu, ì ha̰ hḭɛ ka ɗáa rì ya!»
43006021	Ro ze, í hii ɓay mbika ni kaw ɓil tuo ɓari na, lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy tuo na tḭi nzaakoŋ ká i hii séke ɓa ɓaɗi na kpeɗere.
43006022	Nzaaruo kḭ báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri ká i tɔ̀ŋ ká nzaa kporombii ká fi kɛlu na i nzaa Zezu. I kɔ nda̰w ká tuo mbḭw hɔy ze ɗo nzaa mbii na ku ɓa tá̰w. Ze tuoke ku na Zezu hil a kaw ɗi ziŋ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ya, roo lɛ, ɓari huo-ri hɔy ze i kaw ɗi a í zɔ̌lke.
43006023	Lɛɛ, tuo kḭri uru saa ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Tiberiyaɗ, í vi ɗi ya ká lakun zaɗ ká Zezu ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ a ha̰ fe sṵm ha̰ nzoɓri ká ɗi na.
43006024	A zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri kɔ Zezu ya nda̰w, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ya nda̰w na báyḭi lɛ, i uru í hil í kaw ɓil tuori ku na, a í se ɓa Kapɛrnayum ɓay nzáara ni.
43006025	Zaɗka i tḭi fi kɛlu í ziŋ Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, i vbi ni mii: «Mbay, síe ha̰a ze mù vi zaɗ ni key lɛ?»
43006026	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓaarì na ì nzaara mì ɓay maapa ká ì sṵ maa rì siɓ siɓ hɔy ɓo, ì nzaara mì ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰w fe saŋ ká mì ɗaa na ya.
43006027	Ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa peɗ ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ɓay tul fe sṵm káʼa ɓíɛ gɔr hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ɓay tul fe sṵm káʼa haŋa nzoɓri kǎwke ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Fe sṵmke ku na, ɓi Vu Nzoɓ ze mì haŋa rì. Ɓa ɓi kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Bǎa ha̰ mì hṵrusuo ɗáa fe ká kǐɛke mii, ka hii ɓayke ziŋ mì.»
43006028	A báyḭi lɛ, i vbi ni ɓay mii: «Peɗri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii ɓayke na wa̰a, ɓuru ɗáa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓay ɗáa lɛ?»
43006029	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Peɗ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru giyaŋ ɓay kɔ́kɔ ká luo-rì na, ɓa ɗáa law-rì ɓo tul-i ɓi káʼa pie mì vi na.»
43006030	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í vbi ni na rɔɓay mii: «Fe saŋ ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù ɗáa ha̰ ɓuru kɔ, a ɓúru kɔ́ke ɓay ɓo na ɓa sùo ɓay lɛ? Wa̰a, fe ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mù ɗáa lɛ?
43006031	Bulu ɓururi ká pola lew na, i sṵ fe ká i ɗi ɓa manne ká ɓil law kɔr munu ká mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii: “Ka ha ri sṵ fe sṵm ká uru saa nulue.”»
43006032	Roo lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: ɓa Moyze ze ha rì fe sṵm ká uru saa nulue na ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Bǎa ze ha rì ŋgaw taa tusuɛke ká uru saa nulue na.
43006033	Tusuɛke lɛ, ŋgaw ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ na, ɓa ɓe ká uru saa nulue a vi tusiri key, a ha̰ nzoɓri káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na.»
43006034	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mu ha̰ ɓuru ŋgaw key na ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara.»
43006035	Lɛɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓi ze mì ɓa ŋgaw káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Nzoɓ ká vi luo-i lɛ, kɔn ti sɛkɛ ni mbǎa, a nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i lɛ, kɔn mbii kara ti sɛkɛ ni mbǎa nda̰w.
43006036	Roo lɛ, ɓi na mì ɓaa ha rì ro: Ì kɔ mì ɓáy nun-rì, lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i ya.
43006037	Nzoɓri riw bele ká Bǎa ha̰ mì na, i vika luo-i. A nzoɓ ká vi luo-i lɛ, mì ti nii ni ɗo kɛlɛ ya,
43006038	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì vi saa nulue ɓay ɗáa law hiiya ɓi ya, roo lɛ, ɓay ɗáa law hiiya nzoɓ ká píe mì vi na.
43006039	Law hiiya nzoɓ ká pie mì na ze ɗo key: nzoɓri káʼa ha̰ mì na, ka hii ɓay haŋa mì pɔŋ nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ka ɓíɛ ya, roo lɛ, síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, mì tína ri saa luɔ huɗ.
43006040	Tusuɛke lɛ, law hiiya Bǎa na ɓa haŋa nzoɓri riw bele tuu mì ɓa Vi-e, a í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-i ɓo í kaw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, mì tína ri saa luɔ huɗ.»
43006041	Zaɗka Zezu ɓaa mii, «mì ɓa ŋgaw ká uru saa nulue» na, Ziɓri ŋgṵri ɓay ká sakra kḭ
43006042	i ɓaa mii: «Ɓe key na, ka ɓa Zezu, vu Zezeɓ na ya lo? Ɓuru tuu bi-ɛ ɓáy mi-ɛ ta-taŋ. Wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ka ɓaa mii, ɓeri uru saa nulue lɛ?»
43006043	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ì pɔ́ŋ nzaa nduo ŋgṵri sùo ká sakra kḭ.
43006044	Zaɗka Bǎa ká pie mì na ɗi nzoɓ ya lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti vika luo-i a ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i ya. A nzoɓ ká vi luo-i lɛ, síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, mì tína ni saa luɔ huɗ.
43006045	Pola lew na, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: “Ɓari riw bele na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze a fére ri fe.” Ze nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká laa ɓay Bǎa, a ya̰a fe fére ɓe na lɛ, a vika luo-i.
43006046	Nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara kɔ Bǎa na ɓáy nun-ɛ ya, roo lɛ, ɓi huo-i ká mì uru saa luo-ɛ ze, mì kɔ ni.
43006047	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i na, ka ɗo ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na.
43006048	Ɓi na, mì ɓa ŋgaw káw ɓáy kumnun.
43006049	Bulu ɓaarì ká i sṵ fe ká i ɗi ɓa manne ká ɓil law kɔr na, i hu riw bele.
43006050	Roo lɛ, nzoɓri ká i re ŋgaw ni key ká uru saa nulue na, i ti huka ya mgbaŋ.
43006051	Ɓi na, mì ɓa ŋgaw ká ɗo ɓáy kumnun ká uru saa nulue. Zaɗka nzoɓ re ŋgaw ni key na lɛ, a káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Ŋgaw ká mì haŋa na, ɓa naysuo-i. Mì ha̰ munu ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ká tusiri key na, i kǎwke ɓáy kumnun.»
43006052	Zaɗka Ziɓri laa munu na báyḭi lɛ, i uru ɓáy rɔɗi goɗoɗo ká sakra kḭ mii: «Úwaa! Leɗban key na wa̰a, naysuo-ɛ taa minake ze a haŋa ɓuru sṵ lɛ woo?»
43006053	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: zaɗka ì ya̰a naysuo-i ɓi Vu Nzoɓ í sṵ ya nda̰w, a í nzɔ sím sùo-i na ya nda̰w lɛ, ì ti ɗoko ɓáy kumnun ya.
43006054	Nzoɓ ká sṵ naysuo-i, a nzɔ sím sùo-i na lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na. Síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, mì tína ni saa luɔ huɗ.
43006055	Tusuɛke lɛ, naysuo-i na ɓa fe sṵm taa tusuɛke, a sím sùo-i na ɓa mbii nzɔkɔ taa tusuɛke.
43006056	Nzoɓ ká sṵ naysuo-i, a nzɔ sím sùo-i nda̰w na, nzoɓke ku na zuɔ ziŋ mì, a ɓi hɔy kara mì zuɔ ziŋ ni nda̰w.
43006057	Bǎa ká píe mì na, ka kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ɓa ɓe ze, ka ha̰ mì kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, nzoɓ ká sṵ naysuo-i, a nzɔ sím sùo-i na lɛ, mì haŋa ni kaw ɓáy kumnun na nda̰w.
43006058	Ŋgaw ni key na, ɓa ŋgaw ká uru saa nulue. Ŋgawke ku na ɗo ɓoɗ ɓáy fe sṵm ká bulu ɓaarì sṵ ká ɓil law kɔr na. Ze ɓari ká i sṵ na hɔy kara i hu riw bele. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká re ŋgaw ni key na, a káw ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ.»
43006059	Ɓe ze ɓa ɓay ká Zezu fere nzoɓri ká hul mbṵ́ kḭ ká Kapɛrnayum.
43006060	Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri ká i se fal Zezu na, i laa ɓay ɓe munu báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa «Íi!» a í ɓaa mii: «Ɓay ká ŋgɔŋ key na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze a máa láake lɛ?»
43006061	Lɛɛ, Zezu kɔ nda̰w ká leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ɗo ŋgṵri sùo-ri se tul ɓayke na, ze ka ɓa ha ri mii: «Ɓay ká mì ɓaa na tuo law-rì tuo lɛ woo?
43006062	A ku na, zaɗka ɓi Vu Nzoɓ mì úru saa tusiri key, mí yḭ̀i ɓa zaɗ ká mì uru saa ɗi pola na wa̰a, ì kér ɓay mina ká ɗi lɛ?
43006063	Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ha̰ nzoɓ kaw ɓáy kumnun. Hṵrusuo nzoɓ ti ɗáa fe mbḭw ya. Ɓayri ká mì ɓaa na, ɓa kumnun taa tusuɛke ká uru saa luo Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru,
43006064	roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓaarì ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-i ya.» (Ká ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, titire hɔy Zezu kɔ nzoɓri ká i ɗáa law-ri ɓo tul-e ya na nda̰w, a kɔ nzoɓ káʼa mbika tul-e na nda̰w pi.)
43006065	Ka ɓaa rɔɓay mii: «Ɓe ze mì ɓaa ha rì pola mii: zaɗka Bǎa ha̰ faa ha̰ nzoɓ ya lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti vika luo-i, a ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i ya.»
43006066	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ká i se fal-ɛ na, i naa sùo-ri yɔ́rɔŋ yɔrɔŋ a í se fal-ɛ mbǎa.
43006067	Ro, Zezu vbi leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na mii: «Ɓaarì hɔy kara ì hii ɓay náa sùo-rì nda̰w lɛ woo?»
43006068	Báyḭi lɛ, Simo̰n Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, ɓuru na ɓuru séke luo nzoɓ ve ɓáy lɛ woo? Ɓay ɓo na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ kǎwke ɓáy kumnun ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ.
43006069	A ɓuru laa lɛ, ɓúru ɗáa law ɓuru ɓo tul-a, a ɓúru tuu mù ɓa Nzoɓ ká Taŋ Kaɗaŋ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie mù vi.»
43006070	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì ká tul-rì duɔ falɛ siɗi na, ɓa ɓi ze mì nan rì ya lɛ woo? Roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì na ɓa vu ŋgɛrɛtemndaya.»
43006071	Ka ɓaa ɓay munu se tul Zudas Iskariyoɗ, vu Simo̰n. Ze, ka ɓa na leɗ nduoɓal-ɛ kara, ɓe kḭ ze namke vi lɛ, a mbika tul-e.
43007001	Falɛ ku lɛ, Zezu ha̰ari ɓáy puori ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele. Ka hii ɓay séke kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ká ɗi i nzaa faa ɓay ika ni.
43007002	Lɛɛ, nam suoriya hul puɗi Ziɓri na tɔ̀ŋ ɗi mbǎa.
43007003	Ro, yṵ Zezuri ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu zɔ́l ká zaɗ ni key mú se kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude ɓay haŋa ɓo, nzoɓri ká i se fal-a na i kɔ fe saŋri ká mù ɗaa na.
43007004	Zaɗka nzoɓ hii ɓay haŋa riŋ-ɛ mgba lɛ, ka ti mṵu sùo-ɛ ya, a séke ɓa zaɗ hie a ɗaa fe saŋri ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele kɔ. A munu ká mù ɗaa kḭri fe saŋri mini key na, mu ɗaa ɓo ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele kɔ.»
43007005	(Tusuɛke lɛ, yṵ Zezuri kara, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e ya.)
43007006	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nam ɓi na vi ya ɓáy. A ɓaarì lɛ, namri riw bele na, ì se munu ká law-rì hii.
43007007	Ɓaarì na, nzoɓ tukɛlɛri key ti fṵ́y rì ya. A ɓi lɛ, i fṵ́y mì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ɗáa ɓari ká ndaya na, mì ɓaa ɓayke ɓa kɛlɛ ta-taŋ ha ri.
43007008	Ze, ɓaarì na ì zɔ́l í se zaɗ suoriya na. A ɓi lɛ, mì ti séke ɗi ya ɓáy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ɓi na vi ya ɓáy.»
43007009	Fal ɓay káʼa ɓaa munu ha ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka ta̰a a kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele.
43007010	Fal zɔ́l yṵ-ɛri ká i zɔl í se ɓa zaɗ suoriya ká Zuruzalɛm na báyḭi lɛ, ka uru a zɔl ɓa ɓaɗi nda̰w, roo lɛ, ka se ɓa ɓaɗi ɓa muni.
43007011	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ká i ɗo zaɗ suoriyake ku na, i nzaara ni í vbi ɓay ɓe mii: «Wa̰a, leɗban na ɗo zaɗ ha̰a zey lɛ?»
43007012	Ruɔ nzoɓri hɔy kara soro ɓay Zezu ɗo nzaa-ri ya̰a ya̰a, í má̰yke ɓay ziŋ kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: «Leɗban na ɓa nzoɓ law kere.» A nzoɓ kḭri laa lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Ṵ́-uu, mbḭw ya! Ka ula nzoɓri!»
43007013	A lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara maa ɓay áa nzi-ɛ ɓay ɓáa kér ɓay ɓe ɓa kɛlɛ ha̰ nzoɓri laa ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ɗaa hḭɛ ɓay ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri.
43007014	Zaɗka nam suoriyake na kal mgba sikɗa báyḭi lɛ, Zezu se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi, a tii sa̰w fére nzoɓri fe ká ɗi.
43007015	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri laa fe fére ɓe munu na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl ha ri ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na fere mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ka tuu faa fére nzoɓri fe mini lɛ?»
43007016	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Feri ká mì fere nzoɓri na uru saa luo-i ya, roo lɛ, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká pie mì.
43007017	Nzoɓ ká mbi sùo-ɛ ɓay ɗáa law hiiya Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa tusuɛ na, zaɗka fe fére ɓi na uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, káʼa kɔ́kɔ; ze uru saa luo-i hɔy kara a kɔ́kɔ nda̰w.
43007018	Nzoɓ ká ɓaa ɓay ká uru saa luo-ɛ ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ na, ka nzaa riŋ ɗika ɓe sùo-ɛ hɔy zu. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká nzaa riŋ ɗika nzoɓ ká pie ni na laa lɛ, ka ɓaa sùo ɓay, fe úla nun nzoɓ mbḭw kara ti sùo-ɛ ya.
43007019	Ɓaarì na, Moyze ha rì bol kusol kḭ, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini ká sakra ɓaarì kara ɗaa vu mbom ɓo ɗi ya. Wa̰a ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì nzaa faa ɓay ika mì lɛ?»
43007020	Báyḭi lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri uru ɓáy rɔɗi ziŋ ni í ɓaa mii: «Ɓo key na wa̰a, mù ɓa nzoɓ ɓala lɛ woo! A ve ze nzaa faa ɓay ika mù ká zaɗ ni key lɛ?»
43007021	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɗaa fe saŋ mbḭw munu hɔy ɓáy nam mgbaka ta̰ram. Ze, ɓaarì riw bele ká ì kɔ na, zaɗ ɓay zee rì sɛl.
43007022	Ì kér í kɔ. Moyze mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay haŋa vu ɓaarì ká ì mboŋ ri na, i ɗaa nam tɔnɔ siɗi lɛ ì kuŋ ri ŋgori. (Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓa Moyze ze mbi nzi-ɛ ya, roo lɛ, ɓa bulu naari.) Ze, ɓa nam mgbaka ta̰ram hɔy kara, i kuŋ leɗri ŋgori mgbum.
43007023	Ɓaarì na, ì kuŋ leɗri ŋgori ɓáy nam mgbaka ta̰ram ɓay haŋa bol kusol Moyze ka ɗǒke ɓáy zaɗɛ. A wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓi mǎa, mì vaa nzoɓ ha̰ sùo-ɛ nduɔ kiyaw kiyaw ɓáy nam mgbaka ta̰ram lɛ, law-rì fa̰a rì ká tul-i lɛ?
43007024	Ì bɛ́klɛ fe ɗáa nzoɓ ɓáy faake nda̰w rɔɔ, í kuŋ ɓay ka ɓo tul-e ɓáy, ɓo ì kɔ fe ká ɗo nun-rì ká kɛlɛ key hɔy í mbíke ɓay ka ɓo tul nzoɓ ya.»
43007025	Zaɗka nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká Zuruzalɛm kɔ Zezu na báyḭi lɛ, i kaw yer í ɓaa mii:
43007026	«Leɗban ni key ze, i nzaa faa ɓay ika ni ya lɛ woo? Ì kɔ káʼa ɗo ɓáa ɓay ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri, làa ká ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ɗaa fe mbḭw ziŋ ni ya ku na! Ɓari na, i kɔ ni ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ɓa tusuɛ ro zu lɛ woo?
43007027	Ze, Krisi na, zaɗkaʼa vika na, nzoɓ mbḭw ti kɔ́kɔ zaɗ káʼa uru saa ɗi ya. Roo lɛ, leɗban ni key na, ɓuru kɔ zaɗ káʼa uru saa ɗi na ta-taŋ.»
43007028	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ká ɗo fére nzoɓri fe ká ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi na, ɓaa ɓay ɓa siya ɓeleŋ mii: «Ɓaarì na ì kɔ mì kɔ nda̰w, í kɔ zaɗ ká mì uru saa ɗi nda̰w kɛlɛ? Ɓi na, mì vi ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-i hɔy ya. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká pie mì na, ɓa nzoɓ ká maa ɓay ɗáa law ɓo tul-e. Ɓaarì na ì tuu ni ya,
43007029	roo lɛ, mì tuu ni tuu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì uru saa luo-ɛ. Ɓa ɓe kḭ ze ka pie mì vi.»
43007030	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri laa ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa na báyḭi lɛ, i nzaa faa ɓay mgbaka ni. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ɗaa nduo-ɛ zaa ni ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ɓe na vi ya ɓáy.
43007031	Ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri na, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e í ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka Krisi a vika na, a ɗáa fe saŋri kal taa leɗban ni key na lɛ woo?»
43007032	Ɓayri ká ruɔ nzoɓri ɓaa se tul Zezu na tuo ɓo suku Fariziri. Ro, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy Fariziri, i pie nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ɓay haŋa ri vǎa mgba Zezu.
43007033	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ɓi na, mì káw ziŋ rì ndḭi munu hɔy, rɔɔ mí yḭ́i ɓa luo nzoɓ ká pie mì na.
43007034	Ì nzáara mì, roo lɛ, ì ti zíŋ mì ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗ ká mì ɗoko ɗi na, ì maa ɓay séke ɗi ya.»
43007035	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri vbi ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Kaʼa séke ɓa zaɗ ha̰a nda̰w rɔɔ a ɓaa mii, náa ti zíŋri ɓeri mbǎa ku lɛ? Kaʼa séke luo nzoɓ naari ká i kaw sakra Gɛrɛkri ɓay fére ri fe lɛ?
43007036	Ka ɓaa mii, náa nzáarari ɓeri, roo lɛ, náa ti ziŋri ɓeri ya nda̰w, zaɗ ká ɓeri ɗoko ɗi kara, náa maari ɓay séke ɗi ya nda̰w pi. Wa̰a, ɓay ɓe ku na, ɓil-e ɗo mina zu lɛ?»
43007037	Ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam suoriyake ká ɓa nam ká kal taa ha̰wri riw bele na, Zezu uru a ɗo siya ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri a ɓaa ɓay ɓeleŋ ɓa siya mii: «Nzoɓ ká kɔn mbii sɛ ni lɛ, ka vi luo-i a nzɔ.
43007038	Munu ká i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-i na lɛ, mbii káw ɓáy kumnun na, a tḭ́i a uo suɔ suɔ ɓa ŋgḭiŋake saa ɓil law-ɛ.»
43007039	(Zezu ɓaa ɓay key na se tul Tem Law Pie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa nzoɓri ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e. Ká ɓil sewke ku na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ nzoɓri Tem Law Pie ya ɓáy, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Zezu na hu a tḭi saa luɔ huɗ a kaw ɓáy riŋ ɗika Bi-ɛ ya ɓáy.)
43007040	Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri laa ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: «Leɗban key na ka ɓa tusuɛ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓuru giyaŋ ni na.»
43007041	Nzoɓ ha̰wri ɓaa mii: «Ka ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.» Roo lɛ, nzoɓ kḭri ma̰y ɓay ziŋ ri mii: «Lɛɛ, Krisi a úru saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele nda̰w pi zu lɛ woo!
43007042	Mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay píe ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na, a ɓá nzoɓ ká sa̰w bulu Mbay Daviɗ, káʼa úru saa Betelehɛm, puo ká Daviɗ kaw ɗi pola lew na.»
43007043	Ro, ruɔ nzoɓri rɔɗ kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew, í téke ɓil kḭ ɓay tul Zezu.
43007044	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ku na hii ɓay mgbaka ni, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ɗaa nduo-ɛ zaa ni ya.
43007045	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ká ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy Fariziri pie ri ɓay mgbaka Zezu na, i yḭ̀i í ví ziŋ ri. Lɛɛ, ŋgɛrɛri na vbi ri mii: «Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì mgba ni í víke ya lɛ?»
43007046	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓuru kɔ nzoɓ ɓaa ɓay munu ká leɗban nu ku ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ!»
43007047	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri uru ziŋ ri mii: «Ṵ́u! Ɓaarì hɔy kara, ì ya̰a nzaa úla ɓe nda̰w kɛ́lɛ?
43007048	Wa̰a ká sakra ɓuru Fariziri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri na, nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e na, ɗo ɗi ku lɛ woo?
43007049	A ruɔ nzoɓri key ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e na, i tuu bol kusol Moyze na ya. I ɓa nzoɓri ká ɓeɓi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgba tul-ri.»
43007050	Báyḭi lɛ, Nikɔdɛm ká ɓa Farizi mbḭw munu, ɓe káʼa se luo Zezu pola ɓa suŋ na ɓaa ha ri mii:
43007051	«Lɛɛ, bol kusol naari na ha̰ naari faa ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ taŋ láa ɓay ká nzi-ɛ ya nda̰w, taŋ kɔ́kɔ fe ndaya káʼa ɗaa na ya mgbum lɛ woo?»
43007052	Ro, Farizi ha̰wri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri na, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Áa! Ɓo kara, mù ɓa nzoɓ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele nda̰w lɛ woo? Mù bɛklɛ ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy kere lɛ, mù ti zíŋ nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká úru saa Galele na ya!»
43007053	[Falɛ ku lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, uru a zɔl faa puɔ.
43008001	Ro, Zezu uru a se ɓa tul kuo ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Oliviye.]
43008002	[Nzaaruo kḭ ká tiɓie piɛɗ na, Zezu yḭ̀i a se ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi, lɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele soro ɓa lakun-ɛ. Ka kaw siri a tii sa̰w fére ri fe.
43008003	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol Ziɓri ɓáy Fariziri, i dar má̰y ɗáa nun pie mbḭw munu ká wa̰ra nzoɓ ɗo naaŋa ziŋ ni na gbukru í mgba ni í víke luo-ɛ, í ɗaa ni ɗo pol nzoɓri riw bele,
43008004	í ɓaa ha̰ Zezu mii: «Mbay, má̰y key na, ɓuru dar ni gbukru káʼa ɗo ɗáa nun pie, ze ɓúru mgba ni.
43008005	Ká ɓil bol kusol Moyze lɛ, kḭri má̰yri ká mini key na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓuru vbúku ri ɓáy tisaw a ɓúru i ri. A wa̰a, ɓo na, mù ɓaa taa ɓo mina ze ká ɗi lɛ?»
43008006	I ɓaa munu i nzáake nzi-ɛ, ɓo ɓay zíŋ faa lɛ, í ɗáake ɓay ka ɓo tul-e. Roo lɛ, Zezu sol siri a ɗiŋ tul-e a tii sa̰w vbíe fe ɓáy vu nduo-ɛ ɗo siri.
43008007	Munu ká ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri geɗe ni kpaŋ ɓáy vbiw ɓaŋguɔ ɓa pola pola na báyḭi lɛ, Zezu ura tul-e a ndaɗa sùo-ɛ a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká sakra ɓaarì ku ká ɗaa feya̰a ba mbḭw ya lɛ, ka mbi tisaw a vbúke ni pola ɓo náa kɔ́ri!»
43008008	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka sol siri a ɗiŋ tul-e ɓa kḭ a tii sa̰w vbíe fe ɗo siri na rɔɓay.
43008009	Zaɗka i laa ɓay na munu báyḭi lɛ, kér ɓay ɓari ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-ri sùo-ri, ha ri náake sùo-ri í zɔl yɔ́rɔŋ yɔrɔŋ ɓáy zaɗ ɓari. Úru saa ŋgɛrɛri kpṵru mgba tul leɗri na, i pɔŋ Zezu huo-ɛ hɔy ɓáy má̰y na ɗo.
43008010	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezu uru siya a ndaɗa sùo-ɛ a vbi ni mii: «Má̰y, nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-a na, i ɗo zaɗ ha̰a lɛ? Wa̰a, nzoɓ mbḭw ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-a ya wṵ̌m kḭ lɛ?»
43008011	Lɛɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mì kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ya.» Ro, Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓi kara mì ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-a ya nda̰w. Mu se zaɗ seɗ ɓo, a roo lɛ, mu ɗaa feya̰a mbǎa.»]
43008012	Zezu mbi ɓay a ɓaa ɓa kḭ ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri mii: «Ɓi na, mì ɓa zaɗ taŋa nzoɓri ká tusiri key. Nzoɓ ká se fal-i lɛ, a ɗoko ɓáy zaɗ taŋa ɓay káwke ɓáy kumnun, ɓo ka ti séke seɗ ká ɓil suŋ na mbǎa mgbaŋ.»
43008013	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓo kḭ mù ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓo sùo-ɔ. Ɓay ɓo na ɗaa fe mbḭw ya.»
43008014	Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ze mì ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi sùo-i hɔy kara, ɓay ká mì ɓaa na ɓa sùo ɓay. Ì kɔ, ɓi na, mì kɔ zaɗ ká mì vi saa ɗi nda̰w, a mí kɔ zaɗ ká mì séke ɓa ɓaɗi nda̰w pi. Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì kɔ zaɗ ká mì uru saa ɗi ya, a í kɔ zaɗ ká mì séke ɓa ɓaɗi ya nda̰w.
43008015	Ɓaarì na, ì kuŋ ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ munu ká nzoɓri ɗaa ziŋ kḭ. Ɓi na, mì ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ mbḭw ya.
43008016	Ze ɓo, ɓa ɓi ze mì kuŋ sal ɓay laa lɛ, kúŋ sal ɓay ɓi na, ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì ɗo huo-i ze mí kuŋ sal ɓay na ya, roo lɛ, Bǎa ká pie mì na ɗo ziŋ mì.
43008017	I ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol ɓaarì kḭ mii: “Zaɗka nzoɓri siɗi rɔɔ nasi ɓay ɓari maa kḭ lɛ, nasi ɓayke na ɗaa peɗ.”
43008018	Ɓi na, mì ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi sùo-i kḭ, a Bǎa ká píe mì na kara ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓi na nda̰w.»
43008019	Báyḭi lɛ, Fariziri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, bǎa-ka ɗo zaɗ ha̰a lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na, ì tuu mì ya, a í tuu Bǎa ya nda̰w. Zaɗka ì tuu mì lɛ, ì tuuka Bǎa na nda̰w.»
43008020	Ɓe ze ɓa ɓayri ká Zezu fere nzoɓri ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká zaɗ ɓúo lari. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw mgba ni ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ɓe na vi ya ɓáy.
43008021	Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri na rɔɓay mii: «Mì zɔ́l, lɛ, ì nzáara mì kpṵy a í hu ká ɓil feya̰a ɓaarì. Zaɗ ká mì séke ɓa ɓaɗi na, ɓaarì na, ì maa ɓay séke ɗi ya.»
43008022	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri vbi ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Munu káʼa ɓaa mii, ɓuru maa ɓay séke zaɗ ká ɓeri séke ɗi ya na ku wa̰a, kaʼa ika sùo-ɛ sùo-ɛ lɛ woo?»
43008023	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na, ì ɓa nzoɓri ká tusiri key, roo lɛ, ɓi na, mì uru saa nulue. Ɓaarì na, ì ɓa nzoɓ taa tusiriri key, roo lɛ, ɓi na, mì ɓa nzoɓ taa tusiri key ya.
43008024	Ɓe mini ze, mì ɓaa ha rì mii, ì huka ká ɓil feya̰a ɓaarì. Zaɗka ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i mii, mì ɓa nzoɓ ká mì ɗo ɓaŋguɔ na ya lɛ, ì huka ká ɓil feya̰a ɓaarì.»
43008025	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Wa̰a, ɓo na mù ɓa ve lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ɓayke ɓaŋguɔ ɓáy tiikake hɔy ha rì.
43008026	Mì ɗo ɓáy ɓayri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓay ɓáa nda̰w, ɓay ɗáa ɓo tul-rì nda̰w pi. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká píe mì na ɓaa sùo ɓay, a ɓayri ká mì laa ká luo-ɛ na, mì ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká tusiri key.»
43008027	Ɓay ká Zezu ɓaa se tul Bi-ɛ na, i laa ya.
43008028	Lɛɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Zaɗka ì siŋ mì ɓi Vu Nzoɓ í ura mì ɗo siya lɛ, ì kɔ́kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓaŋguɔ nda̰w, a í kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ká mì ɗaa fe mbḭw ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-i ya nda̰w pi. Ɓay ká Bǎa fere mì hɔy ze mì ɓaa.
43008029	Nzoɓ ká píe mì na ka ɗo ziŋ mì, ɓo ka pɔŋ mì ɗo huo-i ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓaŋguɔ na, mì ɗaa fe ká rii law-ɛ.»
43008030	Zaɗka Zezu ɗo ɓáa ɓay munu na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e.
43008031	Zezu ɓaa ɓay ha̰ Ziɓri ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e na mii: «Zaɗka ì ɗo tul ɓay ɓi ká mì fere rì na ɓáy zaɗɛ ɓaŋguɔ lɛ, ì ɓa leɗ nduoɓal-i taa tusuɛkeri.
43008032	Ì tuukake tusuɛ ɓay na, lɛ ɓáy faa tusuɛ ɓayke na, ì tḭ́ike saa ɓil koy feya̰a.»
43008033	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa vu bulu Abaraham, ɓuru ɓa koy nzoɓ ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ. Wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ mù ɓaa mii, ɓuru tḭ́i saa ɓil koy feya̰a na lɛ woo?»
43008034	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa feya̰a na, ka ɓa koy feya̰a.
43008035	Koy nzoɓ na ti ɗaa puo a kaw ɗi ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara ya, roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɓa leɗ ɓil puɔ na, a káw ɗi wṵ̌m ɓaŋguɔ.
43008036	Zaɗka Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina rì saa ɓil koy feya̰a na lɛ, ì káw ɓáy tul-rì ɓa tusuɛ kḭ.
43008037	Mì kɔ nda̰w, ɓaarì na, ì ɓa vu bulu Abaraham. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ì nzaara mì ɓay ika mì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓay ɓi na rìi ɓil law-rì ya.
43008038	Ɓi na, mì ɓaa ɓay fe ká Bǎa kiɛ mì, a ɓaarì laa lɛ, ì ɗaa fe ká bǎa ɓaarì ɓaa ha rì.»
43008039	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Bǎa ɓuru na ze ɓa Abaraham.» Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Úwaa, zaɗka ì ɓa vu Abaraham taa tusuɛkeri lɛ, ì ɗáa feri munu káʼa ɗaa.
43008040	Ì kɔ, fe ká mì ɗaa na, mì ɓaa tusuɛ ɓay ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha rì, ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ì nzaara faa ɓay ika mì. Fe ɗáa ká munu na, Abaraham ɗaa ba mbḭw ya!
43008041	Ɓaarì na, fe ɗáa ɓaarì rìi fe ɗáa bǎa ɓaarì.» Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa leɗ mbanari ya. Bǎa ɓuru mbḭw kḭ hɔy ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»
43008042	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Úwaa, zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa bǎa ɓaarì ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, ì kɔ́kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ nun-rì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì uru saa luo-ɛ ze mí vi. Ɓi na, mì vi ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-i ya, roo lɛ, ɓa ɓe ze ka píe mì.
43008043	Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓay ká mì ɓaa key lɛ, ì ta̰a láa kpṵy lɛ woo? Ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì maa ɓay láa ɓay ɓi key na ya.
43008044	Ɓaarì na, bǎa ɓaarì ɓa ŋgɛrɛtemndaya, ze ì hii ɗáa fe ká law bǎa ɓaarì hii. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ika nzoɓ ɓáy tiikake lew hɔy. Ka ɓa nzoɓ káʼa ɓaa sùo ɓay ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, sùo ɓay mbḭw mini kara ti luo-ɛ ya. Zaɗkaʼa ɓaa ɓay kuɗ ɓay ɓeri na, ɓa fe ká ɗo ɓil naysuo-ɛ ká tii ni tii ro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɓa nzoɓ kúɗ ɓay, a ɓa bǎa nzoɓ ɓay bayluri.
43008045	Ɓi na, mì ɓaa tusuɛ ɓay. Ɓe ze, ì hii ɓay ɗáake law-rì ɓo tul-i na ya!
43008046	Nzoɓ ve ká sakra ɓaarì key rɔɔ, a máa ɓay zíŋ faa ɓay ɗáa ɓay feya̰a ɓo tul-i lɛ? A wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, mì ɓaa tusuɛ ɓay ha rì lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i ya lɛ?
43008047	Nzoɓ ká ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka laa ɓay ɓe, roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì laa ɓay ɓe ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì ɓa taa ɓe ya.»
43008048	Báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Yḭ̀i! Ɓay ɓuru ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ. Mù ɓa nzoɓ ká Samari ya lo? Ɓo na, temndaya ɗo tul-a!»
43008049	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Úwaa, temndaya ɗo tul-i ya, roo lɛ, mì ɗaa mbay ɓo tul Bǎa. A ɓaarì laa lɛ, ì tḭiri mì.
43008050	Ɓi na, mì nzaa riŋ ɗika ɓi sùo-i ya, lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ɗo ɗi ku ze nzaa faa ɓay ɗáa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul-i. Ɓa ɓe ze, a kúŋ sal ɓay ɓáy zaɗɛ.
43008051	Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓay ɓi lɛ, ka ti huka ya mgbaŋ.»
43008052	Báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓuru kɔ ta-taŋ ro! Ɓo na, temndaya ɗo tul-a! Abaraham na hu, a nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kara, i hu nda̰w. Wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓo na, mù ɓaa mii: “Nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓay ɓo lɛ, ka ti huka ya mgbaŋ” lɛ?
43008053	Bulu ɓuru Abaraham na hu ro, wa̰a, ɓo na, mù mba tul-e mba lɛ woo? Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kara, i hu nda̰w! Wa̰a, mù mgba sùo-ɔ ɓa ḭi zu lɛ?»
43008054	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Zaɗka mì ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul-i kḭ sùo-i lɛ, riŋ ɗika ɓi na ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul-i na, ɓe ze ɓa Bǎa. Ɓe kḭ ze ì ɗi ni ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaarì.
43008055	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ì tuu ni ya, a ɓi lɛ, mì tuu ni tuu. Zaɗka mì ɓaa mii: “Mì tuu ni ya” lɛ, mì ɓá nzoɓ kúɗ ɓay munu ká ɓaarì nda̰w. Roo lɛ, mì tuu ni a mí ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓay ɓeri.
43008056	Bulu ɓaarì Abaraham na, zaɗkaʼa ker ɓay se tul nam vika ɓi na lɛ, ka ɗaa suoriya. Zaɗkaʼa kɔ munu na, suoriya mbaa ɓil law-ɛ gba̰y gba̰y.»
43008057	Báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa, ɓo làa ká mù ɗaa mbiimbam síŋ ndeɓe ya ɓáy key na lɛ, mù kɔ Abaraham kereŋ ro key lɛ woo!»
43008058	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Mì ɓaa ha rì ta-taŋ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ: pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri mboŋ Abaraham na, mì ɗo ɗɔɗ ro zu.»
43008059	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri laa munu na báyḭi lɛ, i uru í fa̰a tisawri ɓay vbúkuke ni. Roo lɛ, Zezu mṵu sùo-ɛ ká sakra ruɔ nzoɓri, a tḭi saa zaɗ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na.
43009001	Zaɗka Zezu se faa na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa nzoɓ ra̰w káʼa tḭ́ike saa wṵru.
43009002	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri vbi ni ɓay mii: «Mbay, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ leɗban ni key na, i mboŋ ni ɓa ra̰w lɛ? Wa̰a, ɓay tul feya̰a ká ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ ka ɗaa, mase ɓay tul feya̰a nzoɓ mbóŋ niri lɛ?»
43009003	Lɛɛ, Zezu yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ɗo ɓay tul feya̰a ɓe ya nda̰w, ɓay tul feya̰a nzoɓ mbóŋ niri ya nda̰w, roo lɛ, ka ɓa ra̰w munu ɓay haŋa peɗ ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka tínake sùo-ɛ ɓa kɛlɛ.
43009004	Munu ká ɓa ɓisie ɓáy na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa náa ɗáari peɗ ká nzoɓ píe mì ɗaa zuɔ nduo-i na ha̰ ni ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ. Suŋ ɗo ɗi mbǎa ro ká nzoɓ ti máa ɓay ɗáa peɗ ya.
43009005	Zaɗka mì ɗo tusiri key kɔɓ rɔɓay na, mì ɓa zaɗ taŋa nzoɓri ká tusiri key ha̰ nun-ri mgbuɗa.»
43009006	Falɛ ká Zezu ɓaa ɓayri na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka sa̰-sa̰mi ɓo siri, a zukri ɓáy vu nduo-ɛ ha̰ ni ɓa bɔɗɔ, rɔɔ a ɗaa nṵu tul nun nzoɓ ra̰w na
43009007	a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se mú vǎa wáa nun-a ɓáy mbii da̰ŋa Silowe.» (Má̰ra sa̰w riŋke ɓaa mii, «ka pie mì.») Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ra̰w na se a wàa nun-ɛ munu ká Zezu ɓaa ha̰ ni na. Yḭ́i ɓe saa ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ zaɗ taŋ kaɗ kaɗ.
43009008	Zaɗkaʼa tḭi puɔ na, nzoɓ tul kpaŋ ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ gɔŋma pola na i ɗaa: «Wǔy! Wa̰a, ɓa leɗban ni key ká kaw siri a gɔŋ fe na ya lɛ woo?»
43009009	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: «Ɓa ɓe kḭ.» A nzoɓ ha̰wri laa lɛ, ɓaa mii: «Ṵ́-uu, ɓa ɓe ya, roo lɛ, ɓa ríi kḭ hɔy zu.» A lɛ, nzoɓ ra̰w na ɓaa sùo-ɛ kḭ mii: «Ɓa ɓi na kḭ zu.»
43009010	Báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í vbi ni ɓay mii: «Ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ nun-a mgbuɗa ha̰ mù kɔ-kɔ́m lɛ?»
43009011	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Leɗban ká i ɗi ni ɓa Zezu na ze ɗaa bɔɗɔ ndḭi a ɗaa nṵu tul nun-i ha̰ mì a ɓaa mii: “Mu se da̰ŋa Silowe mú vǎa wáa nun-a.” Ze, mì se ɗi mí vǎa wàa nun-i na, lɛ, mì kɔ zaɗ taŋ kaɗ kaɗ.»
