44001013	Zaɗka i tḭi puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, i hil í se ɓil hul ká̰y tul kḭ ká ɗo siya ká ɓa zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari ɓaŋguɔ na. Riŋ nzoɓkeri na ze ɗo key: Piyɛr nda̰w, Za̰a nda̰w, Zak nda̰w, Andere nda̰w, Filiɓ nda̰w, Toma nda̰w, Batelemi nda̰w, Matiye nda̰w, Zak vu Alfe nda̰w, Simo̰n ɓe káʼa hii nzoɓ ɓeri a ru-ruy ɓay tul-ri nda̰w, rɔɔ Zud vu Zak nda̰w pi.
44001014	Ɓari riw bele ɓáy má̰yri, ɓáy Mari máa Zezu nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy yṵ Zezuri nda̰w na, i zuɔ ziŋ kḭ mbḭw í mbṵ kḭ ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere.
44001015	Nam mbḭw munu ká nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele mbṵ kḭ maa isɔɗ ɓáy síŋ siɗi na, Piyɛr uru siya ká sakra yṵ-ɛri a ɓaa ha ri mii:
44001016	«Yṵ-iri, ɗo nun haŋa ɓay ká Tem Law Pie ha̰ Daviɗ ɓaa ká ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ. Daviɗ na ɓaa ɓayke pola hɔy se tul Zudas, ɓe káʼa nda faa pol nzoɓri ha ri mgba Zezu na.
44001017	Ɓe na, pola na i kḭi ni ziŋ ɓuru nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri, a kaw ziŋ ɓuru mbḭw a ɗaa peɗ ziŋ ɓuru.
44001018	Roo lɛ, leɗbanke ku na fa̰a lari ká i ha̰ ni ɓay tul fe ka̰aya ɓe na a híeke wáa. Ká ɓil wáake na, ka lie kparafal ɓo siri, lɛ, ɓil-e saka a ha̰ ka̰ra ɓil-e tḭi zuɔ siri gbɛrɛm.
44001019	Ɓayke ku na, nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm riw bele laa ha ri tǔuke riŋ wáake ɓáy nzaa ɓay ɓari mii, Hakeledama. Ɓáy nzaa ɓay naari lɛ, ɓaa mii, “wáa sím.”» Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii:
44001020	«Ka ɓil Mbeɗe Simri na Daviɗ ɓaa mii: “Ndaɗ ɓay pɔ́ŋ puo ɓe ha̰ ni ɗo ɓa pile kivbiw. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw kara ka ɗaa puo ká ɗi ya.” Rɔɓay, ka ɓaa mii: “Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ kḭ ɓoɗ, ze ka suo bol peɗ ɓe.”»
44001021	-
44001022	«Munu zu lɛ, náa náari nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra naari key na, ha̰ ni ka suo bol-e a zúɔ ziŋ ɓuru nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓo, a ɓaa nasi ɓay tḭ́i Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu saa luɔ huɗ na. Nzoɓke ku na, ɗo nun haŋa ni ka ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗo ziŋ ɓuru ɓáy namri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ɗǒke sakra naari, tii sa̰wke ɓáy namri ká Za̰a ɗáake tul nzoɓri nduo mbii kpṵru tḭi síeke ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi Zezu ká sakra naari ha̰ ni se nulue.»
44001023	Báyḭi lɛ, i nan nzoɓri siɗi í ɗaa ri ɗo pol-ri: nzoɓ mbḭwke riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezeɓ Barsabas, ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Zustus. A nzoɓ siɗike laa lɛ, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Matiyas.
44001024	Falɛ lɛ, ɓari riw bele na, i ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere í ɓaa mii: «Mbay, ɓo ká mù kɔ ɓil law nzoɓri riw bele na, mu kíɛ ɓuru nzoɓri ká siɗi key, wa̰a, nzoɓ ha̰a ze mù náa ni
44001025	ha̰ ni ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ, a suo bol peɗ Zudas káʼa pɔŋ peɗke a se ɓa zaɗ taa ha̰y ká ɓa taa ɓe na lɛ?»
44001026	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa dḭi dḭi ɓay náa nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari. Lɛɛ, dḭi dḭi na tɔɗɔ ɓo tul Matiyas ha̰ ni nde tul nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ha̰wri ká tɔ̀ŋ duɔ falɛ mbḭw na.
44002001	Zaɗka nam suoriya pantekoɗ vi báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele mbṵ kḭ ká zaɗ mbḭw.
44002002	Lɛɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy, giri fe mgba saa nulue vbuɓuɓu rìi zuu bura, a ya̰a ɓil hul ká i kaw ɗi na kpol kpol.
44002003	Báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ rḭm feri tḭi rìi rḭm huu, wal a ɗo tul-ri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele.
44002004	Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law-ri kpol kpol bele, ha ri tii sa̰w ɓáa nzaa kḭri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ, munu ká Tem Law Pie ha ri ɓaa na.
44002005	Ɓil puo ká Zuruzalɛm na, Ziɓri ká i hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká í uru saa sa̰w puori ká tusiri key ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele na i ɗo ɗi.
44002006	Zaɗka i laa giri fe ká mgba na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗuu giriri í vi ɗi ɓáy ruɔ, lɛ, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a hɔy kara laa ɓay ká i ɓaa na ɓáy nzaa mbóŋ ni mbóŋ ni.
44002007	Báyḭi lɛ, i kaw yer, í ɗakla ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Wa̰a, nzoɓ niri ká i ɓaa ɓay key na, i ɓa Galeleri riw bele ya lɛ?
44002008	Úwaa, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, náa láari ɓayri ká i ɓaa ɓáy nzaa mbóŋ naari mbḭw mbḭw riw bele mini key lɛ?
44002009	Sakra naari key na, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri uru saa Parte nda̰w, Medɛs nda̰w, Elam nda̰w, Mesopotami nda̰w, Zude nda̰w, Kapados nda̰w, Po̰n nda̰w, Azi nda̰w,
44002010	Firizi nda̰w, Pamfili nda̰w, Eziɓte nda̰w, tusiri Libi ká ɗo lakun Sirɛ̰n nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓari ká i vi saa ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Rɔm,
44002011	Ziɓri ɓáy nzoɓri ká i fɛrɛ sùo-ri í vi ɓa nzoɓ kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, Kɛrɛɗri nda̰w, Arabiri nda̰w na, i ɓaa mii, ɗaa mina rɔɔ náa láari ɓay fe ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri ɓáy nzaa mboŋ naari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ mini key lɛ woo?»
44002012	Ɓari riw bele na, i kaw yer ha̰ kér ɓay i ri ɓa huɗ, ha ri ɓaa ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii: «Sa̰wke mina maa lɛ?»
44002013	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri siɛ ri í ɓaa mii: «Him ze ɗaa ri,»
44002014	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ha̰wri ká duɔ falɛ mbḭw na, i uru í ɗo siya. Lɛɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ɓáy bawda kusol-e ha̰ nzoɓri mii: «Ɓaarì Ziɓri, ɓáy ɓaarì riw bele ká ì kaw Zuruzalɛm na, ì te suku-rì í láake ɓay ɓiri ká mì ɓáa ha rì key na ta-taŋ.
44002015	Nzoɓri ká ì kɔ ri key na, ɓa him ze ɗaa ri munu ká ì ker ká ɓil law-rì ku ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, síe ká ɗo key na, ɓa sa̰w síe tɔnɔ mbḭw tiɓie hɔy rɔɓay.
44002016	Roo lɛ, fe ká ɗaa ri key na, ɓa fe ká Zuyɛl nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓayke pola.
44002017	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Síe ɔ́rɔ ɓie namri ká tusiri key na, mì haŋa Tem Law Pie ɓi ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓri riw bele. Vu ɓaarì taa wa̰rakeri ɓáy má̰ykeri na, i ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa-i í ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri. Leɗ kuban ɓaarì na, mì haŋa fe tina nun ha ri, a ŋgɛrɛri hɔy kara ì kɔ́kɔ fe ɓáy lɔm.
44002018	Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, síeke ku na, mì haŋa Tem Law Pie ɓi ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓ peɗ ɓiri taa wa̰rakeri ɓáy má̰ykeri, a í ɓǎake ɓay ká i ya̰a saa nzaa-i na.
44002019	Mì ɗáa feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ká tumbam suku, ɓáy fe saŋri ká kíɛ fe ká tusiri key. Ì kɔ́kɔ sím nda̰w, huu nda̰w, zuu huu nda̰w.
44002020	Síe a fɛ́rɛ sùo-ɛ ɗo guu, few hɔy kara a fɛ́rɛ sùo-ɛ ɓa sḭ́ɛ munu ká sím pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa nam Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɓa bawda nam suoriya na ka vi ɓáy.
44002021	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká koɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa ni.”
44002022	«Ɓaarì Izarayɛlri, ì laa ɓay niri key na ɓáy kere! Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kiɛ ni ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓe ɓáy faa fe saŋri, ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ, rɔɔ ɓáy feri ká ɓa fe kíɛ fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓe ká sakra ɓaarì, munu ká ì kɔ ɓáy sùo-rì ta-taŋ nda̰w ro na.
44002023	Nzoɓ key na, ì pɔŋ ni ɓo nduo ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y ɓaarì. Ze ɓaarì nzoɓ feya̰ari kḭ ì mgba ni í ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ, í i ni munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi pola a leke ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu.
44002024	Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun, a mḭira sal huɗ ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, huɗ maa ɓay mgbaka ni naa ɓil luɔ ya,
44002025	munu ká Daviɗ ɓaa ɓay se tul-e mii: “Mì kɔ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗo ziŋ mì ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara; ka kaw lakun-i ɓay haŋa sùo-i ka tɔ ya.
44002026	Sa̰wke mini ze, ɓil law-i ɗo ɓáy suoriya, ɓay ɓiri ká mì ɓaa na, mì zǎyke sùo-i, a naysuo-i kara a ɗoko ɓáy kere; mí ɗaa law-i te tul-a nzokɗo, Ŋgɛrɛmbay,
44002027	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù ti pɔ́ŋ mì ɗo zaɗ baw ya. Ɓi ká mì ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓo na, mù ti pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ naysuo-i puŋ mbuɗuk mbuɗuk ya.
44002028	Mu ɗaa ha̰ mì kɔ faa ha̰yri ká ha̰ mì káw ɓáy kumnun. Munu ká mù ɗo ziŋ mì na, suoriya mbaa ɓil law-i gba̰y gba̰y.”
44002029	«Ɓaarì yṵ-iri, mì kíɛ rì ɓay ká se tul Daviɗ ká ɓa bulu kadɔk naari na ha rì laa ta-taŋ. Ɓay ká Daviɗ ɓaa key na, ka ɓaa se tul-e ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Daviɗ na hu ha ri voro ni, a luɔ huɗ ɓe hɔy kara ɗo sakra naari key tḭi vuri ɓáy.
44002030	Roo lɛ, zaɗkaʼa kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓáy na, ka ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka kɔ nda̰w mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay, a háake huɗ mii, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sa̰w ka̰ni ɓeri a káw tul kariŋgaw mbay ɓeri a suo bol ɓeri.
44002031	Ɓe ze, munu ká Daviɗ kɔ fe káʼa tḭ́i na, zaɗkaʼa ɓaa mii: “Ŋgɛrɛmbay ti pɔ́ŋ ɓeri ɗo zaɗ baw ya, a naysuo ɓeri kara ti púŋ mbuɗuk mbuɗuk ya nda̰w” na, ɓa ɓay káʼa ɓaa se tul tḭ́i Krisi saa luɔ huɗ.
44002032	Ɓa ɓe Zezu na key ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ, ze ɓuru riw bele ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓayke.
44002033	Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na mbi ni kaw tunduo hoɗo ɓe ká nulue, a ha̰ ni Tem Law Pie káʼa waa ɓayke na. Ɓe ze, Zezu ha̰ Tem Law Pie na ya̰a ɓil law ɓuru kpol kpol munu ká ì kɔ a í laa ɓáy suku-rì nda̰w key ku.
44002034	Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓa Daviɗ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi ni se nulue ya, roo lɛ, Daviɗ na ɓaa mii: “Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓi mii: ‘Mu ví káw tunduo hoɗo ɓi,
44002035	kpṵru maa ɓáy haŋa mì haw yṵm ká tul nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓori ha ri vi ɓa fe ɗáa ɓal-a zuɔ ɗi.’”
44002036	«Ɓe mini ze, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ɓaarì leɗ Izarayɛlri riw bele ì kɔ ta-taŋ mii, ɓe Zezu key ká ì ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ na, ɓa ɓe na kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri, a ɗaa ni kaw ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.»
44002037	Zaɗka nzoɓri laa ɓay Piyɛr na báyḭi lɛ, law-ri kuŋ mbii gbaɗ ha ri vbi Piyɛr ɓáy nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ha̰wri mii: «Yṵ ɓururi, wa̰a, ɓuru ɗáa mina lɛ?»
44002038	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii, «Ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì ɓo, ha ri ɗaa tul-rì nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Zezu Krisi. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ndáka buma ká tul feya̰a ɓaarì ziŋ rì ɓáy. Ɓe rɔɔ, ì zíŋke fe ini Tem Law Pie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓay haŋa rì na ɓáy.
44002039	Tusuɛke lɛ, fe inike ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa na, ɗo ɓay tul-rì nda̰w, vu ɓaarì nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓay tul ɓari riw bele ká i ɗo ɗi ɗi mak mak, ɓari ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naari a ɗika ri ɓay haŋa ri vi luo-ɛ na.»
44002040	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ɓay kḭri ŋgḭi ɓamba a bǎkake ri nda̰w, a ɓo ri nda̰w mii: «Ì tḭi ká sakra nzoɓ ndayari key ɓo, í ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka ya̰a rì.»
44002041	Nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká sakra ɓari na, i ya̰a ɓay ɓe na ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii. Namke ku na, nzoɓri maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ say (3.000) nde tul nzoɓ mbika law ha̰wri.
44002042	Nzoɓ mbika lawri na i mgba sùo-ri ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara: i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓay láa fe fére ká nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri fere ri nda̰w, í zuɔ ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy nda̰w, í sṵ fe ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy nda̰w, a í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy riw bele nda̰w pi.
44002043	Hḭɛ mgba nzoɓri riw bele, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, i ɗaa fe ká mba kɔ́kɔ ŋgḭi ɓamba ɓáy fe saŋri.
44002044	Ɓari riw bele ká i vi ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri na, i mbṵ tul kḭ ká zaɗ mbḭw ɓaŋguɔ, í ɗaa law mbḭw ziŋ kḭ ká tul fe ɓari riw bele.
44002045	I hie zaɗ ɓari ɓáy fe kereri ká i ɗǒke na, í wal larike ha̰ kḭ riw bele maa ɓáy zaɗ fe ká nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, se síeke na.
44002046	Ɓáy namri riw bele na, i mbṵ kḭ ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara ká ɓil mgbaŋ ká hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɗi. I sṵ fe ziŋ kḭ mbḭw hɔy ká faa hul kḭ. Fe sṵm ká i sṵ ziŋ kḭ mbḭw na, i sṵ ɓáy suoriya nda̰w ɓáy law ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ nda̰w pi.
44002047	I pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, í ndaɗ ká nun nzoɓri riw bele. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓáy namri riw bele na, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya̰a ri na, ka ɗaa ri nde tul nzoɓ mbika law ha̰wri.
44003001	Nam mbḭw munu ká síe fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ maa sa̰w síe say ká ɓa sa̰w síe ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere Ziɓri na báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a se ɓa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.
44003002	Lɛɛ, wa̰ra nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká i mboŋ ni ɓa gɔ̌m saa wṵru na, i soɓ ni ha̰ ni kaw faa ríi ɓa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗi ɓa Faa Kere na, ɓay haŋa ni gɔŋ fe ká luo nzoɓri ká i ɗo ríi ɓa ɓaɗi.
44003003	Zaɗka leɗban na kɔ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ká i ɗo ríi ɓa ɓaɗi na báyḭi lɛ, ka gɔŋ ri lari.
44003004	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a siɗi bele i kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa nun-ɛ, ro Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu kɔ ɓuru key.»
44003005	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗban na kɔ-kɔ́m kà̰a ɓa luo-ri a giyaŋ ɓay zíŋ fe ká nduo-ri.
44003006	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii, «Mì ɗo ɓáy lari ká nduo-i key ɓay haŋa mù ya. Roo lɛ, fe ká mì ɗǒke na, mì haŋa mù: Úru siya mú se-seɗ ɓáy riŋ Zezu Krisi ká Nazarɛɗ!»
44003007	Ro, a mgba nduo hoɗo ɓe a ura ni ɗo siya. Zaɗɛ ku hɔy, ɓal-ɛri ɓáy pa̰ra nun ɓal-ɛri ŋgɔŋ kpaŋ ɗo ɗi ha̰ ni.
44003008	Lɛɛ, ka uru vaɗ a ɗo siya a tii sa̰w se-seɗ, a rìi ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ziŋ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na a se-seɗ ɓáy kere, a zo zakra zakra ɓáy suoriya a pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
44003009	Ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele ká i kɔ ni se-seɗ na, i pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w.
44003010	Zaɗka i kɔ ni ɓa ɓe káʼa kaw faa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗi ɓa Faa Kere a gɔŋ fe na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗ ɓay zee ri sɛl ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul fe ká kal ká tul-e na.
44003011	Leɗban na pɔŋ fal Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ya; nzoɓri riw bele ká zaɗ ɓay zee ri na, i uru í ɗuu giriri ɓa luo-ri í vǎa kiri ri ká ɓil pǎl ká i ɗi ɓa pǎl Salomo̰n.
44003012	Zaɗka Piyɛr kɔ munu báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ ruɔ nzoɓri mii: «Ɓaarì Izarayɛlri! Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, fe key na tuku rì mini key lɛ? Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, ì kɔ-kɔ́m ɗeke ɓa tul ɓuru rìi fe ká hṵrusuo ɓuru, mase law ɓuru ká ɓuru ɗaa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ze ha̰ leɗban na séke seɗ key lɛ?
44003013	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Abaraham, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Izak ɓáy Zakoɓ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru bulu naari na, ka ɗaa riŋ ɗika ɓo tul nzoɓ peɗ ɓe ká ɓa Zezu, ká ɓaarì kḭ sùo-rì ì pɔŋ ni ɓo nduo ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰yri í tuŋ ni ŋgereŋ ká pol Pilaɗ; ze ɓa fe káʼa mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi a hii ɓay pɔ́ŋ ni.
44003014	Ɓe káʼa ɓa Nzoɓ ká Taŋ Kaɗaŋ, a ɓa Nzoɓ Fe Ɗáa Ɓáy Zaɗɛ na, ɓaarì kḭ ze ì tuŋ ni ŋgereŋ a í vbi Pilaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka tína nzoɓ mbḭw ká ɓa dɔmbirim nzoɓ ku ze ka ha rì.
44003015	Ɓe mini ze, ɓaarì na ì ɗaa ha ri i mbay nzoɓ haŋa nzoɓri kaw ɓáy kumnun, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ ɓay nasike.
44003016	Leɗban ká ì kɔ ni key í tuu ni nda̰w na, ka se-seɗ ɓáy faa hṵrusuo riŋ Zezu ká ha̰ ni hṵrusuo, ɓáy faa ɗáa law ɓo tul-e. Ɓe ze, ɓa faa ɗáa law ɓo tul Zezu ká ɗaa ha̰ sùo leɗban key na vaa ni kiyaw kiyaw, munu ka ì kɔ ɓáy nun-rì riw bele key ku.
44003017	«Yṵ-iri, fe ka̰ayari ká ì ɗaa ziŋ Zezu na, ɓa fe ká ì kɔ sa̰wke ya, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y ɓaarì hɔy kara kɔ sa̰wke ya nda̰w.
44003018	Roo lɛ, ɓe ze ɗaa ha̰ ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ riw bele pola lew mii, Krisi a kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe na, ɓayke ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ.
44003019	Munu zu lɛ, ì suo kér ɓay ɓaarì, a í fɛ́rɛ sùo-rì ɓa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ni ka bumra feya̰a ɓaarì na ɓa fal.
44003020	Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay a pɔ́ŋ sa̰w síe ha rì ha̰ ɓil law-rì huo lɔm, a píe Zezu, nzoɓ káʼa naa ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ha rì.
44003021	Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɗo nun haŋa Zezu Krisi ka káw nulue, kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a lékeke ɓal feri riw bele ɓa fie, munu káʼa ɓaa ɓayke piɛɗ lew hɔy ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ ká i ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe na.
44003022	Tusuɛke lɛ, Moyze nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓaa mii: “Ŋgɛrɛmbay, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaarì na, a píe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛ mbḭw munu ká ɓi ká sakra ɓaarì na ha rì. Ɓay ɓeri riw bele káʼa ɓáa ha rì na, ì laa í ɗaa feke.
44003023	Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká laa ɓay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru key na ya lɛ, i náa ni ká sakra nzoɓ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri í i ni.”
44003024	Tii sa̰wke saa tul Samiyɛl na, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele ɓaa ɓay feri ká tḭi ká ɓil namri ká náa ɗori ɗi vuri key na suo bol kḭ bol kḭ.
44003025	Fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓáy faa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ na ɗo ɓay tul-rì. Kuni káʼa saa ziŋ bulu ɓaarì na, ì ɗo ɓil-e nda̰w. Ka ɓaa ha̰ Abaraham mii: “Mì sá̰m fe zuɔ tul sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key ɓáy faa sa̰w ɓo.”
44003026	Ɓe mini ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie Zezu ká ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓe na se luo ɓaarì Ziɓri titire ɗɛkrɛ ɓay sá̰m fe zuɔ tul-rì ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká sakra ɓaarì na ka suo kér ɓay ɓe ká tul fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓeri.»
44004001	Zaɗka Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a i ɗo ɓáa ɓay ha̰ nzoɓri kɔɓ ɓáy na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy mbay tul nzoɓri ká i kɔ́rɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Sadusiri ví ziŋ ri ká ɗi.
44004002	Sùo-ri rii ri ya ɓay tul ɓay ká i fere nzoɓri mii, Zezu tḭi saa luɔ huɗ, ɓayke ɓaa mii, nzoɓri ká i hu na i máa tḭ́i saa luɔ huɗ munu nda̰w.
44004003	Báyḭi lɛ, i mgba ri í vbuku ri zuɔ hul sal kpṵru tḭi tiɓie, ɓay ḭi lɛ, síe ti mbǎa.
44004004	Ze munu hɔy kara, nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká i laa ɓay ká i ka-káake ha ri na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu. Namke ku na, wa̰rari ká i mbi law-ri na i nde tul nzoɓ mbika law ha̰wri ká pola, ha ri maa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ ndeɓe (5.000).
44004005	Tiɓieke na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰y Ziɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛri, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri nda̰w na, i mbṵ kḭ ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm.
44004006	Anasi ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye, Kayif ká ɓa fay ɓe nda̰w, Za̰a ɓáy Alezandere nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓe ha̰wri na riw bele i kaw zaɗ ɓay na ku nda̰w.
44004007	Báyḭi lɛ, i ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ví ɗo pol-ri í vbi ri ɓay mii, «Ɓaarì na, ɓáy faa hṵrusuo ve, mase ɓáy riŋ nzoɓ ve ze ì vǎake nzoɓ na ku lɛ?»
44004008	Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ká mbaa ɓil law Piyɛr na ha̰ ni ɓǎake ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì mbay ɓuru Ziɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛri ká Izarayɛl,
44004009	vuri key na ì vbi ɓuru ɓay tul fe kere ká ɓuru ɗaa ziŋ gɔ̌m mbḭw ká uru siya a se-seɗ, a í hii ɓay kɔ́kɔ, wa̰a, sùo-ɛ na vaa ni mina lɛ?
44004010	Munu báyḭi lɛ, ɓaarì riw bele ɓáy leɗ Izarayɛlri riw bele na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa rì kɔ ta-taŋ nda̰w rɔ! Sùo leɗban ká vaa na, vaa ɓáy faa riŋ Zezu Krisi ká Nazarɛɗ ká ɓaarì kḭ ì ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ, ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa sakra nzoɓ huɗeri.
44004011	Ɓa ɓe Zezu ká mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɓay se tul-e mii: “Tisaw ká ɓaarì nzoɓ mbúo hulri ì vbu ɓo ɓisuy na, yḭ̀i a vi ɓa tisaw kere ká kal tul tisaw ha̰wri pavbaɗ a ɓa tisaw tigba̰a hul taa tusuɛke!”
44004012	Nzoɓ kḭ ɓoɗ ká pam a úru saa luo-ɛ na, tiya. Ká ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, riŋ nzoɓ kḭ ɓoɗ ká sakra nzoɓri riw bele ká tusiri key ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ naari ɓay haŋa náa zǐŋkeri pam na, tiya.»
44004013	Zaɗka ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰yri laa ɓay ká Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ɓaa ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ na ku báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a na ɓa nzoɓri ká i se zaɗ fe fére ya, i ɓa nzoɓ hɔykeri munu hɔy, roo lɛ, i kɔ nda̰w, ɓari na i ɓa bǎw seɗ Zezu.
44004014	Rɔɓay, munu ká i kɔ leɗban ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni ká ɗo ziŋ ri ká zaɗɛ ku na báyḭi lɛ, i kɔ faa ká ɓay yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ɗo tul ɓay ɓari na ya.
44004015	Ro, í mbi nzaa-ri ɓay haŋa ri tḭi saa luo nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye ɓari na, í tii sa̰w ma̰y kḭ ɓay ká sakra kḭ mii:
44004016	«Fe ḭi ze náa ɗáari ziŋ nzoɓ niri key na lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe saŋ ká i ɗaa na ɗo zaɗ hie ha̰ nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm kɔ riw bele! Náa maari ɓay má̰yri ɓayke ya.
44004017	Munu báyḭi lɛ, ɓay haŋa ɓayke ka ya̰a zaɗ ɓa pola pola ká sakra nzoɓri ya lɛ, náa háari ri a náa ɓaarì ha ri mii, zaɗka i yḭ̀i í ɓaa ɓay ɓáy riŋ Zezu na rɔɓay ha̰ nzoɓri ɓa kḭ lɛ, ɓuru ɗáa ziŋ ri sɛ sɛ.»
44004018	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɗi ri í haa ri ɓay haŋa ri ɓaa ɓay, mase i fére nzoɓri fe ɓáy riŋ Zezu na mbǎa.
44004019	Zaɗka Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a laa ɓayke na ku báyḭi lɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì kḭ ì kér sùo-rì í kɔ, hḭ́ɛ bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓáy hḭ́ɛ bol kusol-rì laa na wa̰a, ha̰a ze ndaɗ mba ha̰w ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ?
44004020	Ɓuru na, ɓuru maa ɓay mgbaka sùo ɓuru ɓay ɓáa ɓay fe ká ɓuru kɔ ɓáy nun ɓuru, ɓáy fe ká ɓuru laa ɓáy suku ɓuru na ya.»
44004021	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luye Ziɓri haa ri ɓa kḭ nda̰w rɔɔ, í pɔŋ ri ha ri zɔl ɓáy. I kɔ faa ká ɓay ɗáa fe ziŋ ri ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul fe saŋ ká kal na.
44004022	Nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni key na, mbiimbam mboŋa ɓe kal síŋ niŋ.
44004023	Zaɗka i pɔŋ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ha ri zɔl na báyḭi lɛ, i se luo nzoɓ ɓariri, í ɓaa ɓay feri ká ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛri ɓaa ziŋ ri na.
44004024	Zaɗka i laa ɓayke báyḭi lɛ, i mbṵ nzaa-ri mbḭw hɔy riw bele, í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Mbay tul feri riw bele, ɓo kḭ ze mù ɗaa tumbam, mú ɗaa tusiri ɓáy mbiiri ɓáy feri riw bele ká ɗo ɗi.
44004025	Ɓa ɓo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ ze, mù ɓaa ɓay ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie ɓo ha̰ bulu ɓuru Daviɗ piɛɗ lew, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓo na mii: “Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, sa̰w puo nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ law-ri sɛ ri bǔɓuɓu bǔɓuɓu, ha ri uru ɓáy siika sùo-ri mini lɛ? Ɓay ḭi rɔɔ, nzoɓri leke sùo-ri í uru buɗuru buɗuru gɔr hɔy lɛ?
44004026	Mbayri ká tusiri key i mbṵ kḭ, a ŋgɛrɛdɔma̰yri kara i uru ɓay rúu ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy Krisi, ɓe káʼa naa ni ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓe.”
44004027	«Ɓa tusuɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓuru, ká ɓil puo ni key na, Eroɗ ɓáy Po̰s Pilaɗ i mbṵ kḭ ziŋ sa̰w nzoɓri ká i kɔ mù ya ɓáy leɗ Izarayɛlri na, í leke ɓay ká sakra kḭ ɓay ɗáa fe ziŋ Zezu, nzoɓ ká taŋ kaɗaŋ ká mù naa ni ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓo na.
44004028	Ɓe ze, fe ká mù leke pola ɓáy faa hṵrusuo-ɔ ɓáy law hiiya ɓo na, i ɗaa ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ.
44004029	Timbɛɗɛ key na, fe sɛkɛ ká i hii ɓay ɗáa ziŋ ɓuru na, mu kɔ. Mu ha̰ ɓuru nzoɓ peɗ ɓori na hṵrusuo ha̰ ɓuru káake káa ɓay ɓo na ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ.
44004030	Mu ɗaa nduo-ɔ ka ɓo tul ɓuru ha̰ ɓuru vǎake nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri, ɓúru ɗáake fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ɓáy riŋ Zezu, nzoɓ ká taŋ kaɗaŋ ká mù naa ni ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓo na.»
44004031	Zaɗka i ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɔ na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗ ká i mbṵ kḭ ká ɗi na laŋ yik yik, Tem Law Pie ví mbaa ɓil law-ri riw bele, a í ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ.
44004032	Ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele ká i mbi law-ri na, i ɗaa law-ri ɓáy kér ɓay ɓari maa kḭ, í ɗo ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw hɔy. Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ker mii, fe ɓeri na ɓa taa ɓeri huo ɓeri hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ɓari riw bele na i kɔ fe ɓari ɓa fe kḭ riw bele.
44004033	Nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na ɓaa nasi ɓay tḭ́i Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu saa luɔ huɗ na ɓáy bawda hṵrusuo, lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru sa̰m fe zuɔ tul nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele.
44004034	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ká fe puo nduo-ɛ puo na, tiya. Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓari ká i ɗo ɓáy wáari, mase hulri na, i hie í pɔŋ larike í fa̰a,
44004035	í víke ha̰ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri, rɔɔ í leke ká sakra ɓari nzoɓ mbika lawri na, maa ɓáy tul fe ká nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, se síeke na.
44004036	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Zezeɓ, ká nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɗi ni ɓa Barnabas (sa̰w riŋke lɛ, ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law nzoɓ), sa̰w ka̰ni ɓe ɓa Levi, ká i mboŋ ni ká Sipir na,
44004037	ka hie wáa ɓe mbḭw a pɔŋ larike a fa̰a a vieke ha̰ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri.
44005001	Nzoɓ mbḭw riŋ-ɛ ɓa Ananiyas ɓáy má̰y ɓe Safira, i hie wáa ɓari mbḭw.
44005002	Báyḭi lɛ, Ananiyas wal nzaa larike ndḭi. Má̰y ɓe kara zuɔ ziŋ ni ká ɗi nda̰w. Ro, a séke ɓáy ɓie larike na a ha̰ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri a ɓaa mii: «Bele zey.»
44005003	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr vbi ni mii: «Ananiyas, sa̰wke mina rɔɔ, mù ha̰ Satan mbaa ɓil law-a ha̰ mù ɓaa ɓay baylu ha̰ Tem Law Pie, a mú kɔrɔ lari wáa ɓo na, mú víke mini key hɔy lɛ?
44005004	Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa mù hie wáa ɓo na wa̰a, ɓa taa ɓo ya lɛ? Ze, mù hie hɔy kara, ɓa ɓay ɓo zu, mù ɗáake fe munu ká law-a hii na ya lɛ? Wa̰a, ɗaa mina rɔɔ, mù mbi nzaa-a sùo-ɔ, rɔɔ mú ɗaa fe mini key lɛ? Ɓa nzoɓ ze mù ɓaa ɓay baylu ha̰ ni ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!»
44005005	Zaɗka ɓayke tɔɗɔ ɓo suku Ananiyas na báyḭi lɛ, ka lie gbǎ̰y ɓa huɗ. Nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓayke na, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki.
44005006	Ro, leɗ kubanri uru í mbi ni í kaa ni ɓáy gari í vǎa voro ni.
44005007	Bole ɗi ya waka ká ɗaa sa̰w síe say na báyḭi lɛ, má̰y ɓe ví rìi hul ká Piyɛr ɗo ɗi na taŋ kɔ́kɔ fe ká kal na.
44005008	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr vbi ni mii: «Ɓaa ha̰ mi laa! Lari wáa ká ì hie na wa̰a, bele hɔy zey lɛ?» Lɛɛ, má̰y na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Bele larike kḭ zu.»
44005009	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Sa̰wke mina rɔɔ, ì ha̰ law-rì maa kḭ ɓay líe Tem Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ? Mu kɔ, nzoɓri ká i voro waa-ka na, i ɗo faa hul ku. I mbika mù munu na nda̰w.»
44005010	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, ka lie gbǎ̰y ɓa huɗ ká pol Piyɛr. Ro ze, leɗ kubanri na i yḭ̀i í vǎa ɗaa tul-ri tuŋ huɗ Safira na, í mbi ni í vǎa voro ni ɗo lakun wa̰ra.
44005011	Nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ká i mbṵ tul kḭ, ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰wri ká i laa ɓayke na, hḭɛ ɗaa ri zikiki.
44005012	Nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na ɗaa fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ká sakra nzoɓri. Nzoɓ mbika lawri mbṵ kḭ riw bele ɓaŋguɔ ká ɓil boro Mbay Salomo̰n.
44005013	Ze nzoɓri ɓaa ɓay ɓari ɓáy kere í písike ri ɓamba hɔy kara, nzoɓ mbḭw káʼa ndeke tul-ri nde na, tiya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa ri.
44005014	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba, má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari i mbi law-ri ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay a í nde tul kḭ ɓa pola pola.
44005015	Feke ku na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri fa̰a nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri saa hula ɓáy fe nam ɓari, í ɗaa ri zuɔ bufaa buo lɛɗɛɗɛ ɓay haŋa ɓo, zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo kál faa na báyḭi lɛ, tem ɓe ka guɓa tul nzoɓ ha̰nɛri.
44005016	Ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri, i uru ɓáy puo ɓáy puo ká ɗo lakun Zuruzalɛm nda̰w í víke ɓáy nzoɓ suosɛrɛmri ɓáy nzoɓ ha̰yri ká temndayari ɗo tul-ri, lɛ, i vaa riw bele.
44005017	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye ɓáy ɓari riw bele ká i kaw ziŋ ri ká i ɓa Sadusiri na, i ɗaa sere ziŋ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri.
44005018	Ro, í fa̰a ri í ɗaa ri zuɔ hul sal ká puoke na.
44005019	Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay uru saa nulue ɓa suŋ, a ví mgbuɗa faa hul sal na ha ri tḭi kɛlɛ a ɓaa ha ri mii:
44005020	«Ì se í káw hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, í ka-káa ɓay feri riw bele ká se tul káw ɓáy kumnun key na ha̰ nzoɓri laa.»
44005021	Zaɗka nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri laa ɓay key na báyḭi lɛ, i zɔl í se hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓa tiɓie piɛɗ hɔy, a í tii sa̰w fére nzoɓri fe. Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye ɓáy nzoɓri ká i kaw ziŋ ni na, i ɗi ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri riw bele ká i ɓa nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri ha ri vi ɓay fɔ́ŋ ɓay, rɔɔ í pie nzaapeɗ ha̰ nzoɓri ká i kɔrɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru vǎa ɗi nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ká ɓil hul sal.
44005022	Zaɗka i se hul sal na báyḭi lɛ, i ziŋ ri ya. Lɛɛ, i yḭ̀i ɓáy fal-ri nzɛk í ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na mii:
44005023	«Zaɗka ɓuru tḭi nzaa hul sal na, faa hul mgba ɗo ɗi gbukru, a nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul salri na kara i ɗo ɗi kɛk. Roo lɛ, zaɗka i mgbuɗa faa hul ha̰ ɓuru se hula na lɛ, ɓuru kɔ sùo nzoɓ mbḭw ya.»
44005024	Zaɗka mbay nzoɓri ká i kɔrɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, i ker ɓay ká ɗi kpṵy. Fe ká tḭi tul nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy fe káʼa kali na i kɔ ya kḭ wṵ̌m.
44005025	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu tḭi tul-ri a ɓaa ha ri mii, «Ì laa key! Nzoɓri ká ì fa̰a ri zuɔ hul sal na, i ɗo ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a í ɗo fére nzoɓri fe.»
44005026	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká i kɔrɔ hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy mbay ɓari na, i se í ziŋ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na, í fa̰a ri í víke ha ri. I mgba ri ɓáy hṵrusuo ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i ɗaa hḭɛ sùo-ri ɓay nzoɓri ká ì vbuku ri ɓáy tisawri.
44005027	Falɛ ká i fa̰a ri í víke ri ɗo pol nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye na tii sa̰w vbika ri ɓay mii:
44005028	«Pola na wa̰a, ɓuru haa rì ɓay haŋa rì fere nzoɓri fe ɓáy riŋ nzoɓ na key ya lɛ woo! A ze ì kɔ fe fére ɓaarì na ɓayke ya̰a Zuruzalɛm kpol kpol riw bele, í hii ɓay haŋa ɓay huɗ nzoɓ key na ka ɓo tul ɓuru zu!»
44005029	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ha̰wri na, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha ri mii: «Ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ndaɗ mba ɗáa ɓo tul nzoɓ!
44005030	Ɓaarì na, ì ɓer Zezu ɗo tul puu say huɗ í i ni, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká bulu naari koɗ ni na ze tina ni saa luɔ huɗ.
44005031	Ɓa ɓe na kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi ni ha̰ ni kaw tunduo hoɗo ɓe ká ɓa zaɗ káw luye, a ɗaa ni kaw ɓa mbay tul nzoɓri, a ɓa Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri, ɓay mgbúɗa faa ha̰ Izarayɛlri suo kér ɓay ɓari ká tul feya̰a ɓari ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka nda buma ziŋ ri.
44005032	Ɓuru nda̰w, Tem Law Pie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni mbaa ɓil law nzoɓri ká i ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul-e nda̰w na, ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ ɓay nasike.»
44005033	Zaɗka nzoɓ kuŋ sal ɓay luyeri laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, law-ri fa̰a ri puu-u, í hii ɓay ika nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na.
44005034	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku ɓa Farizi, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Gamaliyɛl, a ɓa nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusol ká nzoɓri riw bele hii ɓay ɓe ɓamba na ɗo ɗi. Ka uru siya ká sakra nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na, a vbi ri ɓay haŋa ri tina nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na tḭi kɛlɛ ndḭi nda̰w rɔ!
44005035	Fal tḭ́i ɓari na, ka ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na mii: «Ɓaarì Izarayɛlri! Ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay tul feri ká i hii ɓay ɗáa ziŋ nzoɓri key na!
44005036	Ì kér í kɔ! Bole ɗi ɓamba ya rɔɓay ze Tedas tḭi a ɓaa mii, ɓeri ɓa nzoɓ luye laa ro! Ze a fa̰a nzoɓri maa isɔɗ niŋ zuɔ falɛ. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri i ni a ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ká i se fal-ɛ na, i ɓɛrɛ kḭ kaɗ kaɗ ha̰ fe káʼa hii ɓay ɗáa na ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy.
44005037	Ká fal ɓe Tedas ká ɓil sewke ká i ɗáake riŋ nzoɓri ɗo ɓil mbeɗe na báyḭi lɛ, Zudas, nzoɓ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele tḭi. Ɓe hɔy kara ka fa̰a nzoɓri ŋgḭi maa fe zuɔ fal-ɛ a séke. Lɛɛ, nzoɓri i ni na nda̰w, a ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ká i se fal-ɛ na, i ɓɛrɛ kḭ kaɗ kaɗ.
44005038	Munu zu lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na mì ɓaa ha rì: ì yɔklɔ sùo-rì ká tul nzoɓri key na mbǎa! Ála ri ha ri zɔ́l! Zaɗka fe ɗáa ɓari na uru saa luo nzoɓ hɔy lɛ, a ɓíɛ ɓáy,
44005039	a ze ɓo, zaɗka uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, ì ti máa ɓíɛ ya. Kɔkɔ ká ì ru-ruy ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!» Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri na, i ya̰a kér ɓay Gamaliyɛl
44005040	í ɗi nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ha ri nda ri ɓáy ndoy, a í haa ri ɓáa ɓay ɓáy riŋ Zezu. Falɛ ku rɔɔ i ala ri ha ri zɔl ɓáy.
44005041	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri zɔl ká zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay na ku ɓáy suoriya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kɔ ri ɓa nzoɓri ká i maa kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓay tul riŋ Zezu.
44005042	Nam ɓáy nam ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ɓil hul nzoɓri na, í fere ri fe ɓaŋguɔ í ka-káa Ɓay Kere mii, Zezu ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na.
44006001	Ɓil sewkeri ku na, munu ká ruɔ nzoɓ mbika lawri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola na, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i uru saa puo kḭ ká i ɓaa nzaa gɛrɛk na, i ŋgṵri sùo-ri ɓay tul Ziɓri ká i ɓaa nzaa eboro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ɓáy nam na, zaɗka i ɗo wál fe sṵm na lɛ, i ker se tul má̰y síeri ká i ɓaa nzaa gɛrɛk na ya.
44006002	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na, i ɗi nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ha ri mbṵ kḭ í ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓay haŋa ɓuru pɔŋ ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, rɔɔ ɓúru yḭ̀i ɓúru ɓa nzoɓ léke fe sṵmri na, ɓa fe ká ɗo ɓáy faake ya.
44006003	Sa̰wke mini ze, yṵ ɓururi, ì nán wa̰rari ɓa tɔnɔ say ká sakra ɓaarì ká nzoɓri kɔ simseɗ ɓari ɗo ɓáy kere, ká Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ri, a í ɗo ɓáy nun nzɛm nda̰w na, ɓo ha̰ ɓuru pɔ́ŋ peɗkeri key na ka zuɔ nduo-ri ha ri ɗaa.
44006004	A ɓuru na lɛ, peɗ ɗáa ɓuru a ɓá ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ɓáy ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ nzoɓri laa.»
44006005	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓay ká i ɓaa na, nzoɓ mbika lawri hii ɗo ɗi riw bele. Ze í naa Etḭɛn ká mbika law ɓe ŋgḭi ɓamba, ká Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ na. I naa Filiɓ nda̰w, Prokɔr nda̰w, Nikanɔr nda̰w, Timo̰n nda̰w, Parmenas nda̰w, rɔɔ Nikola ká uru saa puo ká Antiyos, ɓe káʼa fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ a vi ɓa nzoɓ kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na.
44006006	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, i fa̰a ri í kiɛ ri ha̰ nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ha ri ɗaa nduo ɓo tul-ri, í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɓay tul-ri.
44006007	Ɓe nu ku laa lɛ, Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya̰a zaɗ ɓa pola pola. Ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm na, ruɔ nzoɓ mbika lawri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola, a nzoɓ fe poyri kara ŋgḭi ɓamba i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu.
44006008	Etḭɛn na fe sa̰mi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo tul-e ha̰ ni ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ɗáa feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ, ɓáy fe saŋri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká sakra nzoɓri.
44006009	Roo lɛ, Ziɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɗi hul mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari ɓa «koyri ká i pɔŋ,» ká í uru saa puo ká Sirɛ̰n ɓáy Alezandere, rɔɔ ɓáy kuɗu zaɗ ká Silisi ɓáy Azi nda̰w na, i tii sa̰w má̰y ɓay ziŋ Etḭɛn.
44006010	Roo lɛ, i maa ɓay mgbaka ni ɓáy ɓay ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ze ha̰ ni nun nzɛm ɓáa ɓay.
44006011	Báyḭi lɛ, i puo nzoɓ ha̰nɛri puo nda̰w rɔɔ, ha ri kuɗ ɓay zuɔ nzi-ɛ mii: «Ɓay ka̰aya káʼa ɓaa a ɗáake ɓay ɓo tul Moyze ɓáy Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ɓuru laa ká nzi-ɛ.»
44006012	Ɓe ze, i suru tigba̰a nzoɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛ Ziɓri, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri bol kusolri nda̰w na, ha̰ law-ri fa̰a ri ha ri ɗaa so tul Etḭɛn í mgba ni í séke ni luo nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri.
44006013	I vi ɓáy nzoɓri ká i kuɗ ɓay zuɔ nzi-ɛ mii: «Leɗban key na ɓaa ɓay ka̰aya ɓaŋguɔ se tul hul ka̰ni key ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, se tul bol kusol Moyze nda̰w pi.
44006014	Ɓuru laa ɓay ká nzi-ɛ mii, Zezu ni ká Nazarɛɗ na, a ɓíɛ zaɗ ni key wukluk wukluk nda̰w, a fɛrɛ fe nduo puo ká Moyze ha̰ naari na ha̰ ni ɗo ɓoɗ nda̰w pi.»
44006015	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ká i kaw zaɗ kúŋ sal ɓay luye na, i mbṵ kɔ́m yim ɓa tul Etḭɛn, lɛ, i kɔ nun-ɛ rìi nun leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue.
44007001	Báyḭi lɛ, ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye vbi Etḭɛn mii, «Ɓay ni ká i ɗaa ɓo tul-a key na wa̰a, ɓa tusuɛ kḭ lɛ?»
44007002	Lɛɛ, Etḭɛn yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii: «Ɓaarì yṵ-iri ɓáy bǎari, ì laa ɓay ɓi key na ɓáy kere! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Riŋ Ɗika na tḭi tul bǎa naari Abaraham, ɓáy sewke káʼa ɗǒke tusiri ká Mesopotami kɔɓ káʼa zɔl a vǎa ɗaa puo ká Saran ya ɓáy na,
44007003	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mu zɔ́l ká tusiri ɓo, mú pɔ́ŋ nzoɓ ini ɓori mú se tusiri ká mì kíɛ mù.”
44007004	Báyḭi lɛ, Abaraham na zɔl a pɔŋ nzoɓ Kalderi a vǎa ɗaa puo ká Saran na. Zaɗka bi-ɛ hu ká Saran na báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni se tusiri ni ká ì kaw ɗi timbɛɗɛ key.
44007005	Ka kaw tusiri nzoɓri, lɛ, zaɗ ruka fe ɓe tiya. Zaɗ taa ndḭike mini kara tiya, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ ni mii, ɓeri haŋa ni tusirike na ɓa taa ɓe, ɓáy vu bul-eri. Ze Abaraham ti ɓáy leɗ ká ɓil sewke ku na ya hɔy kara,
44007006	ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ha̰ ni na ze ɗo key: “Sa̰w ɓori káw tusiri nzoɓri. I ɗáa ha ri vi ɓa koy í ɗaa nun-ri tuɔ síe mbiimbam isɔɗ niŋ.
44007007	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ puokeri ká i ha ri kaw ɓa koy na, ɓi kḭ ze mì ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-ri. Falɛ lɛ, i tḭ́i í ví kaw tusiri ni key na, a í ruo mì ká ɗi.”
44007008	Ɓe nu ku na báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru siŋ tul ɓay káʼa waa ziŋ Abaraham na, a ha̰ ni kuŋ ŋgori ɓay kíɛke sáka kuni káʼa saa ziŋ ni na. Ɓe ze, zaɗka Abaraham mboŋ Izak ɗaa nam tɔnɔ siɗi na, ka kuŋ ŋgori ɓe. Izak mboŋ Zakoɓ a kuŋ ŋgori ɓe. Zakoɓ hɔy kara, zaɗkaʼa mboŋ leɗri duɔ falɛ siɗi na, ka kuŋ ŋgori ɓari nda̰w. Ɓa ɓari na ku ze, i ɓa sa̰w bulu naari.
44007009	«Vu Zakoɓri ká i ɓa sa̰w bulu naari na, i ɗaa sere ziŋ tɔnɔ fal-ri ká ɓa Zezeɓ, í mgba ni í hie ni ha̰ ni ɓa koy ká tusiri Eziɓte. Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru saɗ ziŋ ni,
44007010	a tina ni saa ɓil kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓeri riw bele. Ka ha̰ ni nun nzɛm ha̰ fe ɗáa ɓe kara rii law Farawo̰n ká ɓa mbay ká Eziɓte na. Ɓe ze, ka há̰ke Zezeɓ kaw ɓa nzoɓ réke ɓil puo ɓe, ɓáy tusiri Eziɓte riw bele.
44007011	«Báyḭi lɛ, kɔn luye lie ɓo tusiri Eziɓte na riw bele ɓáy tusiri bulu naari ká Kanaa nda̰w. Kɔnke na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri kɔ sɛkɛ fe ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri, ha̰ bulu naari ziŋ fe sṵm ndḭi mini ká ɓay sɔ́kɔke sùo-ri ya.
44007012	Zaɗka Zakoɓ laa ɓay soro fe pay ká ɗo tusiri Eziɓte na báyḭi lɛ, ka pie vi-eri ká ɓa bulu naari na se ɗi faa ɓal ba mbḭw.
44007013	Ndeke ɗi faa ɓal ba siɗike ká i se na báyḭi lɛ, Zezeɓ kiɛ sùo-ɛ ha̰ yṵ-ɛri kɔ ni. Ɓe nu ku nda̰w rɔɔ, Farawo̰n kɔ́ke sa̰w nzoɓ ini Zezeɓri na ɓáy.
44007014	Báyḭi lɛ, Zezeɓ pie nzaa peɗ ɓay haŋa ri vǎa ɗi bi-ɛ Zakoɓ ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓe ha̰wri ká tul-ri síŋ tɔnɔ say pa̰rɛ ndeɓe na ha ri ví kaw tusiri Eziɓte.
44007015	Ɓe ze, Zakoɓ na ví kaw Eziɓte kpṵru nda̰w rɔɔ, a hu ká ɗi ɓáy. Bulu naari taa ha̰wri kara, i hu ká ɗi ká fal huɗ ɓe na nda̰w.
44007016	Huɗ ɓari na nzoɓri i séke Sikam ká Kanaa, i vǎa voro ɗo luɔ huɗ ká Abaraham hie pola lew ziŋ vu Emori na.
44007017	«Ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ Abaraham pola lew na, zaɗka namke tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ ɓay ví báyḭi lɛ, sa̰w naari mboŋ kḭ í síe ɓa pola pola ká tusiri Eziɓte.
44007018	Falɛ ku lɛ, mbay kḭ ká ɓa fie ká laa soro ɓay Zezeɓ ya na tii sa̰w réke puo ká ɗi.
44007019	Mbayke ku na kɔ bulu naari ɓáy nun sḭ́ɛ, a ula ri a ɗaa nun-ri tuɔ síe a haa ri ɓay haŋa ri pɔŋ vu ɓari ká ɓa leɗ tupɛŋri ha ri hu.
44007020	Sewke ku na, i mboŋ Moyze ká ndaɗ leɗ ɓamba ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. I hɔl ni ká ɓil hul bi-ɛ few say.
44007021	Zaɗka i ziŋ faa kɔrɔ ni mbǎa í pɔŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, vu Farawo̰n ká ɓa leɗ má̰y tikɗi na vǎa ziŋ ni a mbi ni, a hɔl ni ɓa vu ɓil-e.
44007022	Ze Moyze na, i fere ni nun nzɛm nzoɓ Eziɓteri riw bele ha̰ ni kɔ. Ka ŋgɔŋ ɓáy ɓay nda̰w, ɓáy fe ɗáa ɓeri nda̰w pi.
44007023	«Zaɗka Moyze ɗaa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ na báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay séke ɓay vǎa kɔ́kɔ yṵ-ɛri ká i ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri na.
44007024	Zaɗkaʼa se na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ leɗ Eziɓte mbḭw munu ká ɗo ɗáa ɓay ziŋ leɗ Izarayɛl na. Ze a ya̰a tul leɗ Izarayɛl ká kṵ-ɛ nda ni na, a nda ni a i ni a vbíɗake gbaa ndaake.
44007025	Ka ker ká ɓil law-ɛ mii, yṵ ɓeriri i kɔ́kɔ ɓeri ɓa nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a tínake ri saa ɓil koy. Roo lɛ, i kɔ munu ya.
44007026	Nzaaruoke na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a se luo-ri na rɔɓay, lɛ, ka ziŋ leɗ Izarayɛlri siɗi ká i ɗo ndáka kḭ. Ka ví ɗo mgbaka ri hɛrɛ ɓáy kusol ɓay huoke ɓay húoke law-ri a ɓaa mii: “Yṵ-iri, ɓaarì ká ì ɓa nzoɓ ini na, ɗaa mina ì nda kḭ munu lɛ?”
44007027	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰y ká nda yṵ-ɛ ŋgḭi ɓamba na tuŋ Moyze ŋgereŋ a ɓaa mii: “Nzoɓ ve ze náa mù ɓa mbay, mase nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay tul ɓuru lɛ?
44007028	Wa̰a, mù hii ɓay ika mì munu ká mù ike nzoɓ ká Eziɓte ká liɛ na nda̰w lɛ woo!”
44007029	Zaɗka Moyze laa ɓayke na báyḭi lɛ, ka naa sùo-ɛ a tḭi ɗul a vǎa kaw tusiri Madian. Ka kaw ɗi kpṵru, a mboŋ leɗ wa̰rari ɓa siɗi ká ɗi.
44007030	«Zaɗka mbiimbam kal síŋ niŋ na báyḭi lɛ, Moyze ɗo ɓil law kɔr ká lakun kuo ká Sinay. Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue mbḭw tḭi tul-e ká ɓil rḭm huu ká ɗo puu ká gbúɗa.
44007031	Zaɗka Moyze mbi nun-ɛ a kɔ fe ká tḭi na, tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer, ze a soro ɓa pola ɓay kɔ́kɔ feke na. Báyḭi lɛ, ka laa kusol Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɓaa ha̰ ni mii:
44007032	“Mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru bul-ari. Mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Abaraham, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Izak, a mí ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Zakoɓ nda̰w.” Báyḭi lɛ, hḭɛ ɗaa Moyze ha̰ ni tɔ kpak kpak, a hii ɓay kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa huu na mbǎa.
44007033	Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: “Mu nán dikɔn ká ɓal-a, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗ ká mù ɗo ɗi key na ɓa zaɗ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓi.
44007034	Nzoɓ ɓiri ká i kaw tusiri Eziɓte na, mì kɔ sɛkɛ fe ɓari kɔ. Rɛ́kɛ sùo ɓari na, mì la-laa, ze mí ɗi mí vi ɓay ya̰aŋa ri. Timbɛɗɛ key na, mu vi ha̰ mi píe mù se Eziɓte.”
44007035	«Moyze taa mbḭwke ká leɗ Izarayɛlri tuŋ ni ŋgereŋ í ɓaa mii, nzoɓ ve ze naa ni ɓa mbay, mase nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay tul ɓari lɛ na, ɓa ɓe na kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie ni ɓa mbay nda̰w, nzoɓ tína ri saa ɓil koy nda̰w, ɓáy faa leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ká tḭi tul-e ká ɓil rḭm huu ká ɗo puu ká gbúɗa káʼa sɔ ni na.
44007036	Ɓa ɓe Moyze na ze, ka tina leɗ Izarayɛlri saa ɓil koy ká tusiri Eziɓte ɓáy faa fe saŋri, ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ká tusiri Eziɓte nda̰w, ká lakun Maambii Sḭ́ɛ nda̰w, ká ɓil law kɔr mbiimbam síŋ niŋ nda̰w pi.
44007037	Ɓa ɓe na key rɔɓay ze ka ɓaa ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri mii: “Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a píe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛ mbḭw munu ká ɓi, ká sakra ɓaarì na ha rì.”
44007038	Zaɗka leɗ Izarayɛlri mbṵ kḭ ká ɓil law kɔr na, ɓe Moyze key na rɔɓay ze ka ɗo ziŋ ri. Ka ɗo sikɗa bulu naari ɓáy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓaa ɓay ziŋ ni ká tul kuo Sinay. Ɓe Moyze na ze ya̰a ɓay ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa ɓay káw ɓáy kumnun na ha̰ bulu naari, lɛ, i suo í ɓaa ha̰ naari.
44007039	Roo lɛ, bulu naari hii ɓay ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓay ɓe na ya, í tuŋ ni ŋgereŋ í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul yḭ́i ɓa tusiri Eziɓte,
44007040	í ɓaa ha̰ Aro̰n mii: “Ɗaa wṵruri ha̰ ɓuru ha ri nda faa pol naari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Moyzeke ká tina naari saa tusiri Eziɓte na, náa kɔ́ri zaɗ kaʼa se ɓa ɓaɗi ya.”
44007041	Ká ɓil namke ku na, i zuu lari í ɗaa ni rìi vu nday ɗo í puo ɓa wṵru ɓari, a í ɗaa suoriya ɓay tul fe ká i ɗaa ɓáy nduo-ri ɗo na.
44007042	Báyḭi lɛ, fe ɗáa ɓari na ɗaa ha̰ law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru fɛrɛ bǐr ká tul-ri, a pɔŋ ri ha ri ruo mbaymawri ká tumbam, munu káʼa ɓaa ɓayke ká ɓil mbeɗe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ mii: “Ɓaarì Izarayɛlri, wa̰a, ɓa ɓi ze ì vbie fe hɔl í púoke fe ha̰ mì ɓáy mbiimbam ká náa ɗáari síŋ niŋ ká ɓil law kɔr na lɛ? Ṵ́-uu, ɓa ɓi ya.
44007043	Zaɗri riw bele ká ì se ɗi na, ì soɓ fe ká i puɗ ɓa hul wṵru ɓaarì ká ɓa Molok, ɓáy wṵru mbaymaw Refan ká ì ɗaa ɓáy nduo-rì na. Wṵrukeri key na ì ɗaa í puo fe ha ri. Sa̰wke mini ze, mì vbúku rì mí ha̰ nzoɓri ví fá̰a rì í zɔ̌lke ɗi ɗi mak mak ɓáy Babilo̰n.”
44007044	«Zaɗka bulu naari ɗo ɓil law kɔr ɓáy na, hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗaa ɓáy huɔ na ɗo sakra ɓari a kiɛ ri mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ziŋ ri. Hulke ku na, i ɗaa munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ a kiɛ Moyze faa ɗáake ha̰ ni ɗaa munu káʼa kɔ ɓáy nun-ɛ.
44007045	Hulke ku na, vu bulu naari pɔŋ ha̰ vu ɓari. A ɓari na laa lɛ, i soɓ í séke fal Zozuye ká nda faa pol-ri kpṵru í tḭ́ike tusiri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nii sa̰w nzoɓri ká i kaw ɗi na pol-ri. Hulke ku na ɗo kpṵru tḭi sewke ká Daviɗ réke mbay.
44007046	Ɓe Daviɗ na ka rii nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a vbi ni faa ɓay ɗáa hul ha̰ ɓe káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Zakoɓ na, ka ɗaa puo ká ɗi.
44007047	Roo lɛ, ɓa vi-e Salomo̰n ze ɗaa hul ha̰ ni.
44007048	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nulue siya káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛ Tul Feri Riw Bele na, kaw ɓil hul ká nzoɓ ɗaa ɓáy nduo-ɛ na ya, munu ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzi-ɛ mii:
44007049	“Nulue siya ɓa zaɗ réke mbay ɓi, a tusiri key ɓa zaɗ tɔkɔ ɓal-i. Wa̰a, kḭri hul ḭi rɔɓay, ì ɗáa ɓay haŋa mì lɛ? Wa̰a, zaɗ ha̰a ze ì ɗaa ɓa zaɗ mgbaka ta̰ram ɓi lɛ?
44007050	Fe niri key na wa̰a, ɓa ɓi ze, mì ɗaa riw bele ya lɛ?”
44007051	«Ɓaarì nzoɓ tul ŋgɔŋɔri ká law-rì mbii diɓ diɓ, ká suku-rì tḭi sṵy í laa ɓay ya nda̰w na! Ì tuŋ Tem Law Pie ŋgereŋ ɓaŋguɔ! Ɓaarì na ì ɗo munu ká bulu ɓaarì na ǔɔ!
44007052	Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, nzoɓ taa ha̰a ze bulu ɓaarì na laɗ ɗáa nun-ɛ tuɔ síe lɛ? Ɓari na, i i nzoɓri ká i vi pola í ka-káa ɓay se tul vika Nzoɓ Fe Ɗáa Ɓáy Zaɗɛ na. Ɓa ɓe na ze, timbɛɗɛ ì mbi tul-e í i ni.
44007053	Ɓaarì ká ì ya̰a bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy faa leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue na, ì ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol key na ya!»
44007054	Zaɗka nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay luyeri laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, law-ri fa̰a ri puu-u, í sṵ sere-ri ŋgɛ̌r ŋgɛ̌r ká tul Etḭɛn.
44007055	Roo lɛ, Etḭɛn ká Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ na kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa nulue, lɛ, ka kɔ riŋ ɗika Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Zezu ká ɗo siya ká tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru
44007056	a ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Mì kɔ nulue mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy, mí kɔ Vu Nzoɓ ɗo siya ká tunduo hoɗo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru!»
44007057	Zaɗka i laa ɓayke munu báyḭi lɛ, i guu ni gɔ̌m í ɗaa nduo-ri mbii basuku-ri í takra í ɗuu vbuɓuɓu ɓa tul-e,
44007058	í mgba ni í tḭ́ike ni saa ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ŋgereŋ ɓa nzaa zaɗ nda̰w rɔɔ, í tii sa̰w vbúku ni ɓáy tisaw ɓay ika ni ɓáy. Nzoɓ nasi ɓay huɗ ɓeri na, i nan gari ɓari í ha̰ leɗ kuban mbḭw munu ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sol ha̰ ni kɔrɔ.
44007059	Zaɗka i ɗo vbúku ni kɔɓ rɔɓay na, Etḭɛn ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere a ɓaa mii: «Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu! Mu ya̰a ɔ̰mi ɓi ɓa luo-ɔ!»
44007060	Falɛ ku báyḭi lɛ, ka huku siri mgbṵu a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere rɔɓay ɓáy bawda kusol-e mii: «Mbay, mu ɗaa ɓay feya̰a key na ka ɓo tul-ri ya!» Fal ɓay na ku báyḭi lɛ, ɔ̰mi ɓe tḭi ha̰ ni haw saɗak.
44008001	Ɓay ká se tul huɗ ɓe na, Sol na hii ziŋ ri nda̰w. Namke ku na, bawda fe ɗáa nun tuɔ síe tḭi tul nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zuruzalɛm ha ri ɗuu í zekre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ, í se ɓil puori ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude ɓáy Samari, lɛ, bele ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri huo-ri hɔy ze i tɔ̀ŋ ká ɗi.
44008002	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ hḭ́ɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na i mbi huɗ Etḭɛn na í vǎa voro, í rɛ huɗ ɓe na ɓamba ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo.
44008003	Sol laa lɛ, nzaa faa ɓáy hṵrusuo ɓay ɓíɛ nzoɓ mbika lawri, a se ɓáy hula ŋgeɓre ŋgeɓre a fa̰a má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri na ŋgiɗ bele, a ɗaa ri zuɔ hul sal.
44008004	Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i zekre kḭ na i se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ, í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
44008005	Filiɓ na se ŋgɛrɛpuo mbḭw munu ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari, a ka-káa ɓay Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na ha̰ nzoɓri laa.
44008006	Zaɗka ruɔ nzoɓri riw bele laa ɓay Filiɓ, a í kɔ fe saŋri káʼa ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, i te suku-ri kie ɓa luo-ɛ.
44008007	Ka ha̰ temndayari tḭi saa tul nzoɓ ɓala ha̰nɛri ŋgḭi ɓamba. Tḭ́i ɓari na, i guu fe ɓeleŋ ɓeleŋ. Ka ha̰ nzoɓri ká sùo-ri hu wǔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ kpɛɗɛri ŋgḭi ɓamba vaa kɛɓrɛ kɛɓrɛ,
44008008	ha̰ nzoɓri zay sùo-ri ɓamba tasiri ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na ku.
44008009	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Simo̰n kaw ɓil puoke ku, a ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi, ha̰ nzoɓri ká Samari na i kaw yer. Ka kɔ sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ luye
44008010	ha̰ ɓari riw bele, tii saa tul leɗri kpṵru tḭi tul ŋgɛrɛri na, i te suku-ri kie ɓay láa ɓay ɓe na í ɓaa mii: «Ɓe ni key na ɓa hṵrusuo taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗi ni ɓa “Hṵrusuo Ŋgḭ́ike”.»
44008011	I te suku-ri riw bele ɓay láa ɓay ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa piɛɗ lew hɔy, ka ɗaa fe ha ri kaw yer ɓay tul fe ɗáa mgbḭi ɓeri na.
44008012	Roo lɛ, zaɗka i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ɓay Kere ká Filiɓ ka-káake se tul Zezu Krisi, ɓáy réke mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓri na báyḭi lɛ, má̰yri ɓáy wa̰rari na ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.
44008013	Ɓe Simo̰n kḭ sùo-ɛ kara ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul ɓay na ku, a ha ri ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii na. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka zɔl mbǎa a rḭi tul Filiɓ ɓaŋguɔ. Fe saŋri ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ ká Filiɓ ɗaa káʼa kɔ na tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer.
44008014	Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ká i kaw Zuruzalɛm na i laa mii, nzoɓri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari na, i ya̰a Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ro, í pie Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ha ri se luo-ri.
44008015	Zaɗka i tḭi Samari na báyḭi lɛ, i vǎa mbṵ nzoɓ mbika law fieri na, í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ká tul-ri ɓay haŋa Tem Law Pie ka ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri,
44008016	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku na ya rɔɓay; i ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu hɔy.
44008017	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ɗaa nduo-ri ɓo tul-ri ha̰ Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri.
44008018	Zaɗka Simo̰n kɔ mii, Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓ ɓáy faa ɗáa nduo ɓo tul nzoɓ ká nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɗaa na báyḭi lɛ, ka wal lari a ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a
44008019	a ɓaa ha ri mii, «Ha̰ mì hṵrusuo na key nda̰w ɓo, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká mì ɗaa nduo-i ɓo tul-e lɛ, Tem Law Pie ka ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ munu na nda̰w.»
44008020	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɓíɛ ɓáy lari ɓo na kpukɗu kpukɗu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mù ker ká ɓil law-a mii, fe ini Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, mù maa híe ɓáy lari.
44008021	Peɗ ká ɓuru ɗaa na, ɓay ɓo ti ɓil-e ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓo na, mù ɗo sikɗa ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.
44008022	Mu suo kér ɓay ɓo ká tul fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓo, mú koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɓo, faa ɗo ku lɛ, ka nda buma ziŋ mù ká tul kḭri kér ɓay ɓo ká mini key na,
44008023	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì kɔ mù lɛ, law-a zoŋ bak bak ɓamba, a feya̰a kara síŋ mù kɔɗɔk nda̰w.»
44008024	Zaɗka Simo̰n laa ɓayke na munu báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a mii: «Ɓaarì kara, ì ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓay tul-i, ɓay haŋa ɓay ká ì ɓaa ziŋ mì key na, ka tḭi tul-i munu na ya.»
44008025	Falɛ ká Piyɛr ɓáy Za̰a ɓaa nasi ɓay Zezu Krisi í ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha ri ká zaɗɛ ku na báyḭi lɛ, i mbi faa ɓay yḭ́i ɓa Zuruzalɛm. Seɗ ɓari ká faa na, i ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri ká ɓil puo ha̰wri ŋgḭi ɓamba ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Samari.
44008026	Leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbḭw munu tḭi tul Filiɓ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya mú se nun-a mak ɓa fi hoɗo, mú mbi faa ká nzoɓri se ɗi ɓamba ya ká uru saa Zuruzalɛm a se ɓa Gaza na mú kɔ».
44008027	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy Filiɓ uru a se faa na, lɛ, ka kɔ leɗban mbḭw munu ká tusiri Etiyopi. Ɓa nzoɓ ká i lo gum-ɛ lo a ɓa leɗ káw mbay ká ɓa má̰y nzoɓ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kandas, a ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ feziŋa mbay na riw bele. Leɗbanke ku na, ka se Zuruzalɛm ɓay kóɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗi.
44008028	Yḭ́i ɓe ɓa puɔ na ka kaw ɓil puupusu ɓe, a ɗo kḭiŋa mbeɗe ká Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa.
44008029	Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ Filiɓ mii: «Mu se nun-a ɓa pola ɓa lakun puupusu ku.»
44008030	Báyḭi lɛ, Filiɓ ɗuu nun-ɛ ɓa pola a tḭi zaɗ na, lɛ, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ká Etiyopi ká ɗo kḭiŋa mbeɗe Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na. Ro, a vbi ni mii: «Fe ká mù kḭi key na wa̰a, mù kɔ sa̰wke kɔ kḭ lɛ?»
44008031	Lɛɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka nzoɓ kiɛ mì ya na wa̰a, mì ɗáa mina mí kɔ sa̰wke lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ Filiɓ hil a kaw ziŋ ni.
44008032	Ɓay káʼa kḭi ká ɓil mbeɗe na ze ɗo key: «I mgba ni í kuɔ ni, munu ká i mgba baɗu í kuɔ ni í séke ɓa zaɗ ika ni. Munu ɓa vu baɗu ká i mgba ni ɓay mún sṵyke káʼa aa nzi-ɛ a rɛ-rɛw ya na; ɓe na kara, ka mgbuɗa nzi-ɛ a ɓaa ɓay mbḭw ya.
44008033	I ɗaa sahoy ɓo tul-e, a í ɗaa ɓay ɓe ɓáy zaɗɛ ya. Ku waa, vu bul-eri ɗo ha̰a ɓáy rɔɔ, nzoɓ a ɓáa ɓay se tul-ri lɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kuŋ nam ɓe gak ká tusiri key!»
44008034	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na vbi Filiɓ mii: «Mì koɗ mù, mu ɓaa ha̰ mì laa. Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ni key na ɓaa ɓay se tul ve lɛ? Se tul ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ mase, se tul nzoɓ kḭ lɛ?»
44008035	Báyḭi lɛ, Filiɓ mbi ɓay káʼa kḭi ká ɓil mbeɗe na, a tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu na ha̰ ni.
44008036	Munu ká i se nun-ri ɓa pola ɓáy na, i tḭi zaɗ mbḭw ká mbii ɗo ɗi. Báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na vbi Filiɓ mii: «Mu kɔ, mbii ze ɗo key! Wa̰a, fe ḭi ze haa faa ɓay haŋa mù ɗaa tul-i nduo mbii na lɛ?»
44008037	[Lɛɛ, Filiɓ yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Zaɗka mù ɗaa law-a ɓo tul Zezu kḭ lɛ, náa ɗáa.» Nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɗaa law-i ɓo tul-e ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Mì kɔ Zezu Krisi na ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.»]
44008038	Nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na ta̰a ɓáy puupusu na. Falɛ ku lɛ, ɓe ɓáy Filiɓ na i ɗì saa ɗi siɗi bele í vǎa ɗo ɓil mbii ha̰ Filiɓ ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii.
44008039	Zaɗka i tḭi saa mbii na ku báyḭi lɛ, Tem Ŋgɛrɛmbay mbi Filiɓ na a zéeke serere ha̰ nzoɓ ká Etiyopi na kɔ sùo-ɛ mbǎa. Ze munu hɔy kara, ka mbi bufaa ɓe ɓáy bawda suoriya ká ɓil law-ɛ.
44008040	A Filiɓ na lɛ, tḭi ká Azot lew kpeɗere. Falɛ lɛ, ka se puo ɓáy puo a ka-káa Ɓay Kere ha̰ nzoɓri kpṵru a tḭ́ike ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Sezare.
44009001	Sewke ku na Sol ɗaa nun nzoɓri ká i se fal Ŋgɛrɛmbay na tuɔ síe ɓaŋguɔ, law-ɛ nzɛ mgbuk mgbuk a hii ɓay ika ri. Ka se luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poy luye
44009002	a vbi ni mbeɗe ɓay séke hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ká ɗo ŋgɛrɛpuo Damas ɓay haŋa ri kɔ́ke ni. Mbeɗeke ku na ɓaa mii, zaɗka ɓeri ziŋ wa̰ra nzoɓ, mase má̰y nzoɓ ká mbi Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ, ɓeri mgba ri ɓeri séke ri Zuruzalɛm.
44009003	Zaɗkaʼa zɔl a se ɗi ya deɓ ɓay tḭ́i Damas na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy zaɗ hie gbɛrɛrɛ saa nulue a kiri ni gbuk.
44009004	Lɛɛ, ka lie raɗ ɓo siri, a laa kusol nzoɓ ká ɗi ni mii: «Sol! Sol woo! Sa̰wke mina rɔɔ, mù ɗaa nun-i tuɔ síe munu lɛ?»
44009005	Báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, wa̰a, mù ɓa ve lɛ?» Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mì ɓa Zezu ká mù ɗaa nun-i tuɔ síe na.
44009006	Úru siya mú se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na ku, lɛ, i kíɛ mù fe ká ɗo nun haŋa mù ɗaa na.»
44009007	Lɛɛ, wa̰rari ká i se ziŋ Sol na, i ta̰a í ɗo tul kḭ silili í laa kusol nzoɓ ká mgba na, roo lɛ, i kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw ya.
44009008	Sol na uru saa siri, lɛ, ka kɔ zaɗ mbḭw ya ha ri mgba nduo-ɛ mgba í kuɔ ni í séke Damas.
44009009	Nam ká say na, ka kɔ zaɗ ya, a sṵ fe ya nda̰w, a nzɔ mbii ya nda̰w pi.
44009010	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw munu ká mbi fal Ŋgɛrɛmbay, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Ananiyas kaw Damas. Báyḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay tina nun ha̰ ni a ɗi ni mii: «Ananiyas!» Lɛɛ, ka hii nzi-ɛ mii: «Mbay, mì ɗo key ɓay láa ɓay ɓo.»
44009011	Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya mú se faa ká ɓo ɓil puɔ ká i ɗi ɓa Faa Ká Ɗo Kparak, mú nzaa nzoɓ mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Sol ká uru saa Tars, a kaw ɓil puo ká Zudas ku, a ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere.
44009012	Zaɗkaʼa ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na, fe tina nun ha̰ ni. Ɓa ɓo Ananiyas ze mù rìi tul-e ɓay ɗáa nduo-ɔ ɓo tul-e, ɓo ha̰ ni kɔ zaɗ ɓa kḭ rɔɓay.»
44009013	Báyḭi lɛ, Ananiyas yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mì laa ɓayri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ká nzoɓri ɓaa se tul leɗban na ká ɗaa ndaya ziŋ nzoɓ taa ɓori ká Zuruzalɛm na.
44009014	Ka vi zaɗ ni key ɓáy mbeɗe ká uru saa luo ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri ɓay mgbakake nzoɓri ká i ɗi riŋ-a.»
44009015	Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu se, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi kḭ ze mì naa leɗban na key ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa riŋ-i nda zaɗ ká sa̰w nzoɓri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ nda̰w, pol mbayri nda̰w, rɔɔ sakra leɗ Izarayɛlri nda̰w pi.
44009016	Ɓi kḭ ze, mì kíɛ ni kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ feri riw bele káʼa kɔ́kɔ ɓay tul-i na ɓáy.»
44009017	Zaɗka Ananiyas zɔl a tḭi puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, ka rìi a se tul Sol ká hula a ɗaa nduo-ɛ ɓo tul-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Yṵ-i Sol, Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ká tḭi tul-a ká faa ɓáy ví ɓo ká Damas na, ɓe kḭ ze ka pie mì ɓay haŋa mù kɔ zaɗ ɓa kḭ nda̰w, ɓay haŋa Tem Law Pie ka mbaa ɓil law-a nda̰w pi.»
44009018	Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy, feri ga̰y kpeɓre kpeɓre saa nun Sol munu ká hoy feri a zuɔ siri ha̰ ni kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa kḭ rɔɓay. Lɛɛ, ka uru siya a ha ri ɗaa tul-e nduo mbii.
44009019	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka sṵ-sṵm ha̰ hṵrusuo-ɛ yḭ̀i a vi ɗi ɓa kḭ. Sol na ɗaa nam ha̰nɛri ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Damas.
44009020	Ɓa vaa hɔy lɛ, ka tii sa̰w ka-káa ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri mii, Zezu na ɓa Vu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
44009021	Nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓayke na, tuku ri ha ri kaw yer í vbi kḭ ɓay mii, «Wa̰a, ɓa leɗban ni key ká ɗaa nun nzoɓri ká i ɗi riŋ Zezu na tuɔ síe ká Zuruzalɛm ya lɛ? Ɓa ɓe káʼa vi ɓay mgbaka nzoɓri ɓay séke ri ha̰ ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ fe poyri na ya lɛ woo?»
44009022	Báyḭi lɛ, Sol ziŋ hṵrusuo ɓa pola pola a káake káa ɓay a kiɛ nzoɓri fe mii, Zezu ɓa Krisi, nzoɓ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa a pie ni ví ya̰a nzoɓri na. Lɛɛ, Ziɓri ká i kaw Damas na, i kɔ faa ká ɓay yḭ́iŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mbǎa.
44009023	Falɛ káʼa ɗaa nam ha̰nɛri na báyḭi lɛ, Ziɓri mbṵ kḭ í mbi nzaa-ri ɓay ika ni.
44009024	Roo lɛ, ɓayke tɔɗɔ ɓo suku Sol. Nzoɓri ká Damas kɔrɔ faari ká tḭi saa ŋgɛrɛpuo na riw bele, suŋ ɓáy ɓisie ɓay ika ni.
44009025	Báyḭi lɛ, nam mbḭw munu ɓa suŋ, nzoɓri ká i mbi lawri ɓáy faa Sol na, i mbi ni í ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil buɗu í hǐlke kɔ̀kɔ dudu, í ɗǐrake ni ɓo fal kɔ̀kɔ na ha̰ ni zɔl.
44009026	Sol na yḭ̀i a se Zuruzalɛm a nzaa faa ɓay zúɔ ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ɗi. Roo lɛ, ɓari riw bele na i ɗaa hḭɛ ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, i kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ mbika law taa tusuɛke ya.
44009027	Báyḭi lɛ, Barnabas sùu ni a séke luo nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri, a kḭi ɓay fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ziŋ Sol ká faa ɓáy faa ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓǎake ɓay ziŋ ni na. Ka ɓaa ha ri na rɔɓay mii, Sol ka-káa ɓay ká se tul Zezu ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ká Damas.
44009028	Úru saa síeke ku na, Sol na zuɔ ziŋ ri mbḭw a ha̰ari ziŋ ri, a ka-káa ɓáy riŋ Zezu ɓáy nun wa̰ra nzoɓ ká Zuruzalɛm.
44009029	Ka ɓaa ɓay a ma̰y ɓay ziŋ Ziɓri ká i ɓaa nzaa gɛrɛk nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ku na i nzaa faa ɓay ika ni.
44009030	Zaɗka ɓayke tɔɗɔ ɓo suku nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kɔ Sol ɓa yṵ ɓari na báyḭi lɛ, i sùu ni í séke Sezare í ha̰ ni kal kpṵru a se Tars.
44009031	Ɓe nu ku laa lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude, Galele nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy Samari nda̰w na, i ya̰a ɔ̰mi fṵɔ a í kaw ɗɛkɛkɛ. Ɓari na i ha̰ hṵrusuo ha̰ kḭ í hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaŋguɔ, a í ŋgḭ̌ike ɓa pola pola ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie ká sɔ ri na.
44009032	Ɓil sewke ku na Piyɛr se ɓáy puori riw bele ɓay kɔ-kɔ́m. Lɛɛ, nam mbḭw munu na ka se ɓay kɔ́kɔ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kaw Lida,
44009033	lɛ, ka ziŋ leɗban mbḭw ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Ene naa híi suosɛrɛm mbiimbam tɔnɔ siɗi ro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓal-ɛ hu wǔɔ.
44009034	Ro, a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ene, Zezu Krisi vaa mù ro. Úru siya mú léke fe nam ɓo.» Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, leɗban na uru siya.
44009035	Zaɗka nzoɓri ká Lida ɓáy nzoɓri ká Saro̰n riw bele kɔ nzoɓ ká sùo-ɛ vaa ni na báyḭi lɛ, i suo kér ɓay ɓari í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
44009036	Lɛɛ, má̰y mbḭw munu kaw sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zope, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Tabita. (Ɓáy nzaa gɛrɛk lɛ, ɓa Dorkas, sa̰wke lɛ, ɓa kidaŋa.) Ɓe na, ka ɗaa peɗ kereri ŋgḭi ɓamba a mgba ini ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri.
44009037	Sewke ku na sùo-ɛ sɛ ni ha̰ ni hu. Falɛ ká i sùo ni mbii huɗ ɔ riw bele báyḭi lɛ, i mbi ni i vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil hul ká̰y tul kḭ ká ɗo siya.
44009038	Munu ká Lida ɗo ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy Zope na, zaɗka nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zope laa mii, Piyɛr ɗo Lida na báyḭi lɛ, i pie wa̰rari ɓa siɗi ɓay haŋa ri vǎa kóɗ Piyɛr ha̰ ni ka vi koɗ hɔy ziŋ ri ɓo, ka mgba roy ya.
44009039	Piyɛr na uru ɓa vaa hɔy a se ziŋ ri. Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i sùu ni í séke ɓil hul ká̰y tul kḭ ká ɗo siya. Má̰y síeri riw bele i ví kiri ni ɓáy rɛw í kiɛ ni ŋgamasiri ɓáy gari ha̰wri káʼa sa̰a ha ri ɓáy káw ɓe ɓáy kumnun rɔɓay na.
44009040	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tina nzoɓri riw bele ká i kaw hula na tḭi kɛlɛ, a huku siri a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka uru a kɔ-kɔ́m ɓa huɗ na a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Tabita, úru siya!» Lɛɛ, ka mgbuɗa nun-ɛ a kɔ Piyɛr a uru a kaw.
44009041	Ro, Piyɛr na mgba nduo-ɛ a sɔ ni ha̰ ni uru siya. Falɛ lɛ, ka ɗi nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓáy má̰y síeri na, a kiɛ ri Tabita ká yḭ̀i a kaw ɓáy kumnun na.
44009042	Ɓayke ku na, nzoɓ Zoperi riw bele laa ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
44009043	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na kaw Zope a ɗaa nam maa fe ká ɓil puo Simo̰n ká ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ.
44010001	Nzoɓ mbḭw munu riŋ-ɛ ɓa Kɔrney kaw Sezare. Ka ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm ká puoruo Rɔm káʼa re tul nzoɓ yṵmri ɓa isɔɗ. Kuɗu nzoɓ yṵmkeri ku na i ɗi ri ɓa «nzoɓ yṵmri ká Itali.»
44010002	Leɗbanke ku na ɓa nzoɓ ká hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a koɗ ni ɓáy nzoɓ ini ɓeri riw bele. Ka mgba ini ŋgḭi ɓamba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri ká i ɓa Ziɓri, a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara.
44010003	Nam mbḭw munu ká síe fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ na báyḭi lɛ, fe tina nun ha̰ ni kɔ leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbḭw munu ta-taŋ rìi tul-e ká hula a ɗi ni mii: «Kɔrney!»
44010004	Lɛɛ, Kɔrney kɔ leɗ nzaapeɗ na ɓáy hḭɛ a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mbay, mina lɛ?» Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Nzaa ɓay kere ɓo ká mù ɗaa na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru la-laa, a ini ká mù mgba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri kara ka kɔ nda̰w, ze a kěrke se tul-a.
44010005	Munu zu lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, mu pie wa̰rari ha ri se Zope í vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi.
44010006	Ka naa hul Simo̰n, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ na. Hul ɓe ɗo nzaa maambii lɛr.»
44010007	Falɛ ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ ni a zɔl na báyḭi lɛ, Kɔrney ɗi leɗ káw ɓeri ɓa siɗi, a ɗi nzoɓ yṵm mbḭw ká hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká sakra ɓari ku káʼa kaw tul-ri na,
44010008	a kḭi fal feri ká kal na riw bele ha ri laa. Fal ɓayri káʼa kḭi na báyḭi lɛ, ka pie ri se Zope na.
44010009	Nzaaruoke ká i se faa rɔɓay ká í tɔ̀ŋ ɗi ya deɓ ɓáy Zope na báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr hil a ɗo tul hul siya ɓay ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ɓáy síe ká ɗo law tul.
44010010	Lɛɛ, kɔn sɛ ni ha̰ ni hii ɓay sṵŋa fe. Zaɗka i ɗo ɗáa fe sṵm ɓay haŋa ni sṵ na báyḭi lɛ, ka kɔ fe tina nun ha̰ ni.
44010011	Lɛɛ, ka kɔ nulue mgbuɗa ɗo hɔy gbɛrɛrɛ, ha̰ ni kɔ fe rìi gari a aa gboroŋ ká i siŋ sal ɗo tḭwke niŋ bele uru saa ɗi a ɓo siri.
44010012	Ká ɓil feke ku na, kḭri nayri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele ɗo ɓil-e, nayri ká ɓal-ri niŋ niŋ nda̰w, feri ká i koro siri ɓáy ɓil-ri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy kḭri nduyri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ nda̰w pi.
44010013	Lɛɛ, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Piyɛr, úru siya ɓo mú i mú sṵ!»
44010014	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Úwaa! Mbay, fe ká Ziɓri haa sṵ́ŋake í kɔ ɓa fe ká ndaya, mase ɓa fe ḭ̌m ká mini key na, mì mbi ɓo nzaa-i ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ.»
44010015	Ndeke ɗi ba siɗike na, ka laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ mii, ɓa fe kere na, kɔkɔ ká mu kɔ ɓa fe ḭ̌m.»
44010016	Feke ku na vi mini faa ɓal ba say, lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy i kuɔ feke na i yḭ̌ike ɓa nulue ɓa kḭ.
44010017	Zaɗka Piyɛr kaw a ker se tul sa̰w fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni na kpṵy báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká Kɔrney pie ri na, i vbi faa ká se ɓa hul Simo̰n na kpṵru, i vǎa tḭi ɗi í ɗo faa hul,
44010018	í ɗi ɗiw í vbi ɓay mii: «Zaɗ ni key ze Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na naa ɗi lɛ?»
44010019	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na ɗo kér ɓay sa̰w fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni na ɓaŋguɔ. Báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Á̰y, mu kɔ, nzoɓri ɓa say i ɗo key í vbi ɓay ɓo.
44010020	Mu úru siya mú ɗì mú vǎa ziŋ ri ɓo, mú se zíŋ ri taŋ má̰y ɓay, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa ɓi kḭ ze mì pie ri.»
44010021	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ɗì a ziŋ ri a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Nzoɓ ká ì nzaa ni na, ɓa ɓi zu. Wa̰a, sa̰wke mina rɔɔ ì vi key lɛ?»
44010022	Lɛɛ, i yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Kɔrney ká ɓa ŋgɛrɛnzoɓ yṵm na ze pie ɓuru vi luo-ɔ key. Ɓe na, ka ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ káʼa ruo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ká Ziɓri riw bele ɓaa ɓay ɓe ɓáy kere na. Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe mbḭw saa nulue se luo-ɛ a ɓaa ɓay ziŋ ni. Ze a pie ɓuru ɓay haŋa mù se luo-ɛ ɓo, ɓay ká mù ɗǒke na, mu ɓaa ha̰ ni laa.»
44010023	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr ha ri ví naa ziŋ ni. Nzaaruoke na, ka uru a se ziŋ ri. Yṵ-ɛ ha̰nɛri ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika law ká i kaw Zope na, i su ni í se ziŋ ni nda̰w.
44010024	Ndeke ɗi nam siɗike na, i tḭi Sezare. Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri tḭi Sezare na, Kɔrney ɗi nzoɓ ini ɓeri ɓáy nzoɓ buɔ-ɛ ha̰yri ká i ɓa bǎw soro ɓe na ha ri kaw í giyaŋ ri.
44010025	Zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo ríi ɓa hula na báyḭi lɛ, Kɔrney suɔ nun-ɛ a huku siri mgbṵu a ɗiŋ tul-e ká pol-e.
44010026	Roo lɛ, Piyɛr ura ni ɗo siya a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu ɗo ɓáy zaɗ gaŋa ɓo, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi kara mì ɓa nzoɓ munu ká ɓo na nda̰w.»
44010027	Lɛɛ, seɗ ɓari ɓa hula na, ka lo soro ziŋ ni, rɔɔ í tḭ́ike tul nzoɓ ruɔri ká i mbṵ kḭ na.
44010028	Báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì na ì kɔ nda̰w, Ziɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara, i haa ni ɓay haŋa ni se luo nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, mase ɓay ríi ɓil hul ɓari ya nda̰w. Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kiɛ mì ha̰ mì kɔ mii, ɗo nun haŋa mì kɔ nzoɓ mbḭw mini ɓa nzoɓ ká ndaya, mase ɓa nzoɓ ḭ̌m ya.
44010029	Sa̰wke mini ze, zaɗka ì pie ha̰ mì na, mì vi taŋ má̰y ɓay. Timbɛɗɛ key na, mì hii ɓay kɔ́kɔ, wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì pie ha̰ mì vi lɛ?»
44010030	Lɛɛ, Kɔrney yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Nam niŋ ro vuri, ká síe fɛrɛ sùo-ɛ a ɗo mini ká timbɛɗɛ key ká mì ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɓil hul ɓi na, nzoɓ mbḭw munu nduo gari ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri tḭi tul-i mbuɗa a ɓaa ha̰ mì mii:
44010031	“Kɔrney, nzaa ɓay kere ɓo ká mù ɗaa na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru la-laa, a ini ká mù mgba ziŋ nzoɓ kṵkuri kara, ka kɔ nda̰w, ze a kěrke se tul-a.
44010032	Mu pie nzoɓri ha ri se Zope í vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi. Ka naa hul Simo̰n, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ gbáa huɔ ká hul ɓe ɗo nzaa maambii lɛr na.”
44010033	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy mì pie nzoɓri vǎa nzáa mù, lɛ, mù ɗaa ɓáy kere mú vi na kḭ. Timbɛɗɛ key na, ɓuru riw bele ɓuru ɗo pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay láa ɓayri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay hii ɓay haŋa mù ɓaa ha̰ ɓuru laa na.»
44010034	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na mì kɔ lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa nun nzoɓ ya,
44010035	roo lɛ, sa̰w nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká hḭɛ ni a ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ na, ka ya̰a ni ɓáy kere.
44010036	Ɓe na, ka ha̰ nzoɓri vǎa ka-káa ɓay ɓe ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri. Ɓa Ɓay Kere ká se tul ɗɛkɛkɛ ká ɗo sakra ɓe ɓáy nzoɓri ɓáy faa Zezu Krisi ká ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay tul nzoɓri riw bele.
44010037	Fal namri ká Za̰a ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii na, fe ká tḭi ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele ɓáy Zude riw bele na, ɓa fe ká ɓaarì hɔy kara ì kɔ nda̰w.
44010038	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa Zezu ká Nazarɛɗ ɗo ɓoɗ a ha̰ Tem Law Pie mbaa ɓil law-ɛ a ha̰ ni hṵrusuo. Ka se ɓáy zaɗ zaɗ a ɗaa fe kereri nda̰w, a vaa nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɗo ɓil koy ŋgɛrɛtemndaya riw bele nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ziŋ ni.
44010039	Ɓuru na, ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay feri riw bele káʼa ɗaa ká puo Ziɓri ɓáy ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Zuruzalɛm. Ɓe na, i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ í i ni.
44010040	Roo lɛ, ndeke ɗi nam sayke na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun. Ka kiɛ sùo-ɛ
44010041	ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ya, roo lɛ, ka tḭi tul ɓuru ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ɓuru pola ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay fekeri na. Falɛ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun na, ɓuru sṵ fe ziŋ ni nda̰w, a ɓúru nzɔ ziŋ ni nda̰w pi.
44010042	Ɓe kḭ ze, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ ɓuru ɓay haŋa ɓuru ka-káa ɓay ha̰ nzoɓri mii, ɓa ɓeri kḭ ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naa ɓeri a ɗaa ɓeri kaw ɓa nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓay ká tul nzoɓ káw kumnunri ɓáy nzoɓ huɗeri.
44010043	Nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru riw bele i ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓe mii, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul-e lɛ, ɓáy faa riŋ-ɛ na nda̰w rɔɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ndákake buma ká tul feya̰a ɓe ziŋ ni ɓáy.»
44010044	Zaɗka Piyɛr ɗo ɓáa ɓay munu kɔɓ hɔy lɛ, Tem Law Pie ví ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓri riw bele ká i laa ɓay ɓe na.
44010045	Feke ku na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i ɓa sa̰w Ziɓ ká í se ziŋ Piyɛr na, tuku ri ɓay tul Tem Law Pie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni ya̰a ɓil law nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na,
44010046	ɓay ḭi lɛ, i laa ɓayri ká i ɓaa ɓáy nzaa ɓayri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ í písike Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr mbi ɓay a ɓaa ha ri mii:
44010047	«Ɓaarì ká i ziŋ Tem Law Pie munu ká ɓuru Ziɓri key na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve ze a háa rì faa ká ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa tul-rì nduo mbii na ɓáy lɛ?»
44010048	Báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ Zezu Krisi. Falɛ lɛ, i koɗ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka káw zíŋ ri nam maa fe ndḭi rɔ.
44011001	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ɓáy nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na i laa mii, nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i ya̰a Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w.
44011002	Zaɗka Piyɛr yḭ̀i a vi Zuruzalɛm na báyḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i ɓa sa̰w Ziɓri na, i mbi ɓay í ɓaa ziŋ ni mii:
44011003	«Ɓo na, mù se luo nzoɓri ká ɓa Ziɓ ya mú sṵ fe ziŋ ri!»
44011004	Lɛɛ, Piyɛr tii sa̰w kḭiŋa fal feri ká kal na ɓáy nzi-ɛ lɛm lɛm a ɓaa ha ri mii:
44011005	«Ɓi na, mì ɗo puo ká Zope. A zaɗka mì ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere na báyḭi lɛ, fe tina nun ha̰ mì kɔ fe rìi gari a aa gboroŋ ká i siŋ sal ɗo tḭwke niŋ bele, uru saa nulue a ví ɓo siri ká pol-i.
44011006	Lɛɛ, nun-i hu ɗi sḭi sḭi a mí ɗo bɛ́klɛ, lɛ, mì kɔ fe hɔlri ká ɓal-ri niŋ niŋ ká tusiri key, nay ɓisuyri nda̰w, feri ká i koro siri ɓáy ɓil-ri nda̰w, rɔɔ nduyri ká i se siya nda̰w pi.
44011007	Rɔɓay, mì laa kusol nzoɓ ɓaa ha̰ mì mii, “Piyɛr, úru siya ɓo mú i mú sṵ!”
44011008	Lɛɛ, mì yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay mii, “Úwaa! Mbay! Fe ká Ziɓri haa sṵ́ŋake í kɔ ɓa fe ká ndaya, mase ɓa fe ḭ̌m ká mini key na, mì mbi ɓo nzaa-i ba mbḭw ya mgbaŋ!”
44011009	Ndeke ɗi ba siɗike na, mì laa kusol nzoɓ ká uru saa nulue mii, “Fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ta-taŋ mii, ɓa fe kere na, kɔkɔ ká mu kɔ ɓa fe ḭ̌m.”
44011010	Feke ku na vi mini faa ɓal ba say, lɛ, i yḭ̌iŋrake riw bele ɓa nulue.
44011011	Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, wa̰rari ká say ká i pie ri saa Sezare na i ví ɗo faa hul ká mì naa ɗi na.
44011012	Lɛɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha̰ mì ɓay haŋa mì se ziŋ ri taŋ má̰y ɓay. Báyḭi lɛ, yṵ-iri ká tul-ri yie ká ì kɔ ri key na, i sú mì í se ziŋ mì mbḭw hɔy se Sezare na, a ɓúru kḭri ɓúru se ɓil hul Kɔrney ká pie ha̰ mì na.
44011013	Leɗban key na tina sa̰w ɓay feri káʼa kɔ ká ɓil hul ɓe ha̰ ɓuru laa. Leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na tḭi tul-e a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii, “Mu pie nzoɓ ha̰ ni se Zope, a vǎa nzaa Simo̰n ká i ɗi ni ɓa Piyɛr na ha̰ ni vi.
44011014	Ɓe na, a kíɛ mù ɓayri ká ɓay haŋa mù zǐŋke pam, ɓo ɓáy nzoɓ ɓori riw bele.”
44011015	Zaɗka mì tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay ha ri munu na báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɗì a ví ya̰a ɓil law-ri riw bele, munu káʼa ɗì a ví ya̰a ɓil law naari ká titire na.
44011016	Lɛɛ, mì ker se tul ɓay ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓaa pola mii, “Za̰a na ɗaa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii, roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, mì ɗáa rì nduo ɓil Tem Law Pie.”
44011017	Munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri fe ini ɓe ká ɓa Tem Law Pie munu káʼa ha̰ naari ká náa ɗáari law naari ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu Krisi na wa̰a, mì ɓa ve nda̰w rɔɔ, mì túŋ fe ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ŋgereŋ lɛ?»
44011018	Fal ɓay ká Piyɛr ɓaa ha ri na báyḭi lɛ, law-ri nda siri fṵɔ a í pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɓari ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri faa ha ri suo kér ɓay ká tul feya̰a ɓari, ɓo í ɗo ɓáy kumnun taa tusuɛke na.»
44011019	Sewke ká i ike Etḭɛn a í tii sa̰w ɗáa nun nzoɓ mbika lawri tuɔ síe ha ri ɗuu saa Zuruzalɛm na, nzoɓ mbika lawri na zekre kḭ kpɛrkɛ kpɛrkɛ í ɗuu kpṵru i tḭi Fenisi nda̰w, tukuɗu mbii Sipir nda̰w, Antiyos nda̰w, í ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu ha̰ Ziɓri huo-ri kḭ hɔy.
44011020	Roo lɛ, ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri na, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká puo ɓari ɗo Sipir ɓáy Sirɛ̰n na, i vi Antiyos í tii sa̰w ɓáa ɓay Ɓay Kere ká se tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na nda̰w.
44011021	Ŋgɛrɛmbay sa̰m fe zuɔ ɗi ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba suo kér ɓay ɓari í ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e.
44011022	Lɛɛ, soro ɓay fe ká kal na, tɔɗɔ ɓo suku nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká Zuruzalɛm ha ri naa Barnabas, í pie ni kpṵru se Antiyos.
44011023	Zaɗkaʼa tḭi ɗi a kɔ law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ziŋ ri na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa suoriya a ɓo ri riw bele ɓay haŋa ri kaw tul mbika law ɓari ká tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ.
44011024	Barnabas na ɓa nzoɓ law kere ká Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ kpol kpol, a ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗaa law-ɛ nzokɗo te tul Zezu. Ɓe ze ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ŋgḭi ɓamba zuɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay í nde tul nzoɓ ha̰wri ká pola.
44011025	Falɛ ku lɛ, Barnabas na zɔl a se Tars ɓay nzáa Sol ká ɗi.
44011026	Zaɗkaʼa ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i ziŋ ni se Antiyos a í kaw ɗi. Maa mbiimbam mbḭw na, ɓari siɗi bele i mbṵ kḭ ziŋ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ɓari. I fere nzoɓri fe ŋgḭi ɓamba ká ɗi. Ká ɓil puo ká Antiyos na ze i tii sa̰w túu riŋ ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓa «nzoɓ Krisiri.»
44011027	Sewke ku na nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰nɛri uru saa Zuruzalɛm í vi Antiyos.
44011028	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓari ku ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Agabus uru siya a ɓaa ɓay ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie ha ri mii, kɔn luye a líe ɓo zaɗri riw bele. [Tusuɛke lɛ, kɔnke ku na, lie ɓo zaɗ ɓáy sew ká Kolod réke mbay.]
44011029	Zaɗka nzoɓ mbika lawri laa ɓayke ku báyḭi lɛ, i siŋ tul ɓay mbḭw hɔy ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ha̰ fe ká maa tul hṵrusuo-ɛ ɓay píeke ɓo í sɔ́ke yṵ ɓari ká i kaw kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude na.
44011030	Ɓe ze ɓa fe ká i mbṵ, í ɗaa zuɔ nduo Barnabas ɓáy Sol ha ri vǎa ɗaa zuɔ nduo ŋgɛrɛ tul peɗri ká Zuruzalɛm.
44012001	Ká ɓil sewke ku na, mbay Eroɗ tii sa̰w ɗáa nun nzoɓ mbika law ha̰nɛri tuɔ síe.
44012002	Ka ha ri i Zak yṵ Za̰a ɓáy maamii.
44012003	Zaɗkaʼa kɔ fe ɗáa ɓe na rii law Ziɓri ɓamba báyḭi lɛ, ka ha ri mgba Piyɛr nda̰w. (Ɓa nam suoriya maapa ká i ɗaa taŋ fe hew fe na.)
44012004	Falɛ káʼa mgba Piyɛr na báyḭi lɛ, ka vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo hul sal, a ha̰ nzoɓ yṵmri ɓa niŋ niŋ kɔrɔ ni í suo kḭ ɓáy namri riw bele. Ka ker ɓay tína ni ká nun nzoɓri ká fal nam suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy ɓay kúŋ ɓay ɓo tul-e.
44012005	Ɓe ze í kɔrɔ Piyɛr na ká ɓil hul sal, roo lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ na i ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ ɓay tul-e.
44012006	Nam ká Eroɗ ker ɓay tína ni ká nun nzoɓri na, ká ɓil suŋke ku na Piyɛr ká i siŋ ni ɓáy sal lari na, na-nam ká sakra nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ niri ká siɗi na. Nzoɓ yṵmri ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ í kɔrɔ ni nda̰w.
44012007	Báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nulue tḭi kpeɗere a ha̰ zaɗ hie kaɗ kaɗ ká ɓil hul sal na. Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na laŋ ni a tuma ni a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Úru siya ɓa vaa!» Báyḭi lɛ, sal lariri ká i síŋke nduo-ɛri na nzuma yoroŋ zuɔ siri.
44012008	Lɛɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Mu siŋ sal huɔ ɓil-a, a mú nda dikɔn ɓo ɗo ɓal-a.» Lɛɛ, Piyɛr na ɗaa munu. Leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɓaa ha̰ ni na rɔɓay mii: «Mu nduo maagari ɓo ká yururu na a mú vi fal-i.»
44012009	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr tḭi saa hul sal a se fal-ɛ. Fe ká leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue ɗaa ziŋ ni na, nun-ɛ mgbuɗa ká ɗi ya ɓáy, a kɔ ɓa fe ká tina nun ha̰ ni hɔy.
44012010	I kal nzoɓ yṵm ká ɗo titire ɗɛkrɛ, rɔɓay i kal nzoɓ ndeke ɗi siɗike í tḭi faa kɔ̀kɔ dudu ká i ɗaa ɓáy lari na, lɛ, faa na mgbuɗa sùo-ɛ hɔy ɓoloŋ ká pol-ri ha ri tḭi. Zaɗka i tḭi í se faa ká se ɓa ɓil puɔ na báyḭi lɛ, zaɗɛ ku hɔy, leɗ nzaapeɗ ká nulue na pɔŋ ni ká ɗi a zɔl.
44012011	Zaɗka nun Piyɛr taŋ ká tul fe ká kal na, ka ɓaa mii: «Timbɛɗɛ key na mì kɔ ro: ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay kḭ ze pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe ha̰ ni ví tina mì saa nduo Eroɗ, ɓáy fe ka̰ayari riw bele ká Ziɓri giyaŋ ɓay ɗáa ziŋ mì na.»
44012012	Zaɗka nun Piyɛr taŋ ká tul sùo-ɛ na, ka zɔl a se ɓa puo Mari máa Za̰a ká i ɗi ni ɓa Marki. Ɓa zaɗ ká nzoɓri mbṵ kḭ ruɔ ɓamba í ɗo ɗáa nzaa ɓay kere ká ɗi.
44012013	Ka nda faa hul ká kɛlɛ, lɛ, leɗ káw mbḭw ká ɓa má̰y nzoɓ ká riŋ-ɛ ɓa Rod soro a se ɓay kɔ́kɔ.
44012014	Lɛɛ, ka laa kusol Piyɛr ha̰ sùo-ɛ rii ni ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri, a pɔŋ mgbúɗa faa na, a ɗuu a vǎa ɓaa ha nzoɓri mii: «Piyɛr ɗo faa hul ká kɛlɛ ɗi ku!»
44012015	Báyḭi lɛ, i ɓaa ha̰ ni mii: «Ɓala ze ɗáa mù lɛ woo?» Lɛɛ, ka geɗe a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓa sùo ɓe kḭ.» I yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay ha̰ ni mii: «Munu lɛ, ɓa wṵru ɓe zu.»
44012016	Báyḭi lɛ, Piyɛr nda faa hul na ɓaŋguɔ. Zaɗka i ví mgbuɗa faa hul í kɔ ɓa ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, tuku ri riw bele.
44012017	Ro, Piyɛr ura nduo-ɛ a laŋ ɓay haŋa ri pɔŋ rɔɗ nzaa, rɔɔ a kḭi fal fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa a tínake ni saa hul sal na ha ri laa. A yḭ̀i a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì vǎa ɓaa ɓayke ha̰ Zak ɓáy yṵ naari ha ri laa.» Falɛ ku lɛ, ka tḭi a se zaɗ kḭ.
44012018	Nzaaruo sil na báyḭi lɛ, nzoɓ yṵmri se tul kḭ hali hali ɓay kɔ́kɔ zaɗ ká Piyɛr na tḭi ɓa ɓaɗi.
44012019	Eroɗ hɔy kara ha ri nzaara ni kpṵy í ziŋ ni ya. Falɛ káʼa vbi nzoɓ yṵmri ká i kɔrɔ Piyɛr na báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi nzi-ɛ ha̰ nzoɓ yṵm ɓeri i ɓari nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ faa hul sal na. Ro, a zɔl saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Zude a se ŋgɛrɛpuo Sezare ɓay káw ɗi ndḭi.
44012020	Báyḭi lɛ, law Eroɗ na zoŋ ká tul nzoɓri ká Tir ɓáy Sido̰n. Lɛɛ, i tuɗ tul kḭ í mbṵ nzaa-ri mbḭw hɔy ɓay zíŋ ni. Falɛ ká i vǎa ziŋ Balatus ká ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ ɓil puo Mbay Eroɗ í leke ɓay ziŋ ni na báyḭi lɛ, í vǎa vbi Eroɗ ɓay haŋa ɗɛkɛkɛ ka ɗo sakra ɓari, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓáy faa puoruo ɓe rɔɔ, i zíŋke fe sṵm í sṵ ɓáy.
44012021	Nam ká Eroɗ tuu ha ri na vi báyḭi lɛ, ka nduo gari mbay ɓe a kaw tul kariŋgaw mbay a baka ri ɓay.
44012022	Lɛɛ, ruɔ nzoɓri sìi gay ɓe ɓáy nzaa-ri gɔ̌m í ɓaa mii: «Ɓa nzoɓ ze ɓaa ɓay ku ya, roo lɛ, ɓa wṵru!»
44012023	Ká zaɗɛ ku hɔy leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká nulue nda ni riɓ ɓo siri, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbay ká ɗo ɓay ɗáa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka ɗaa ɓo tul-e ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ. Ze kayri sṵ ɓil-e ha̰ ni hu.
44012024	Ɓe nu ku ro, Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya̰a zaɗ ɓa pola pola, ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola.
44012025	A Barnabas ɓáy Sol na lɛ, zaɗka peɗ ɓari ká i pie ri ɓay haŋa ri vǎa ɗaa ká Zuruzalɛm na ɔ báyḭi lɛ, i yḭ̀i í se Antiyos, a í ɗaa Za̰a ká i ɗi ni ɓa Marki na ɓo fal-ri ha̰ ni se ziŋ ri mbḭw hɔy.
44013001	Ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká Antiyos na, nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy nzoɓ fére nzoɓri fe i kaw ɗi. Riŋ nzoɓkeri na ze ɗo key: Barnabas nda̰w, Simeo̰n, ɓe ká i ɗi ni ɓa Nizɛr nda̰w, Lusiyus, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ ká Sirɛ̰n nda̰w, Manahen, ɓe ká i hɔl ni ɓáy Mbay Eroɗ mbḭw hɔy nda̰w, rɔɔ Sol nda̰w pi.
44013002	Nam mbḭw munu ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓay rúo Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a í saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya na báyḭi lɛ, Tem Law Pie ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ì naa Barnabas ɓáy Sol í ɗaa ri ɗo ɓoɗ ha̰ mì ɓay tul peɗ ká mì ɗi ri ɓayke.»
44013003	Falɛ ká i saŋ sùo-ri í sṵ fe ya, a í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere na báyḭi lɛ, i ɗaa nduo-ri ɓo tul Barnabas ɓáy Sol na rɔɔ, í pɔŋ ri zɔl ɓáy.
44013004	Barnabas ɓáy Sol ká Tem Law Pie pie ri mini na, i mbi faa i se ɓa Selusi ká ɗo nzaa maambii. Ká zaɗɛ ku ze, i hila ri ká ɗi ha ri se tukuɗu mbii ká Sipir.
44013005	Zaɗka i tḭi tukuɗu mbii ká Sipir na, i ɗì í se puo ká Salamin í tii sa̰w ka-káa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri. Za̰a-Marki ɗo ziŋ ri mbḭw a sɔ ri.
44013006	I ha̰ari tukuɗu mbii na riw bele, kpṵru í tḭ́ike puo ká Pafos. Báyḭi lɛ, ká zaɗɛ ku na i ziŋ nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi mbḭw munu, riŋ-ɛ ɓa Bar-Zezu. Ka ɓa Ziɓ, a ɗaa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
44013007	Ka kaw lakun Sɛrziyus Polus, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ réke tul puo ká tukuɗu mbii, a ɓa nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔ nda̰w. Báyḭi lɛ, ɓe Sɛrziyus Polus na, ka ɗi Barnabas ɓáy Sol, ɓay ḭi lɛ, kɔn láa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru sɛ ni ŋgḭi ɓamba.
44013008	Lɛɛ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭi ká ɓa Bar-Zezu (ká riŋ-ɛ ɓáy nzaa gɛrɛk ɓa Elimas) na, ka geɗe ɓay ziŋ ri kpaŋ ɓay háa faa ha̰ nzoɓ réke tul puo na, ka mbi law-ɛ ya.
44013009	Báyḭi lɛ, Sol (ká i ɗi ni ɓa Pol) ká Tem Law Pie ya̰a ɓil law-ɛ kpol kpol na kɔ ni ɓa siya ɓa tiya a ɓaa ha̰ ni mii:
44013010	«Ɓo vu ŋgɛrɛtemndaya! Ɓo nzoɓ law ndaya ká mù ɓa nzoɓ úla nzoɓ, ká mú ɓa nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni fe kereri riw bele. Faa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɗo sikɗa ká mù mgba mú ra̰a ɗo fi mbḭw na wa̰a, síe ha̰a rɔɔ mù pɔ́ŋ nzaa nduo fe ɗáa ɓo na lɛ?
44013011	Timbɛɗɛ key na, mu laa key! Nduo Ŋgɛrɛmbay a mgbaka mù ha̰ mù ra̰a, lɛ, mù ti kɔ́kɔ zaɗ mbǎa bole a ɗí maa fe.» Zaɗɛ ku hɔy lɛ, nun Elimas sii nduŋ ha̰ ni kɔ zaɗ ya. Ka far zaɗ far rɔɔ, a nzaara nzoɓ ɓay haŋa ni kuɔ ni ɓáy.
44013012	Zaɗka nzoɓ réke tul puo na kɔ fe ká tḭi tul Elimas na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa law-ɛ ɓo tul Zezu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, fe ká Pol ɓáy Barnabas fere ni se tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, tuku ni ha̰ ni kaw yer.
44013013	Báyḭi lɛ, Pol ɓáy bǎw seɗ ɓeri i se í vǎa kaw ɓil bawda tuo ká Pafos, í se ɓa Pɛrze ká tusiri Pamfili. Lɛɛ, Za̰a-Marki pɔŋ ri ká zaɗɛ na ku a yḭ̀i ɓa Zuruzalɛm.
44013014	Pol ɓáy Barnabas na laa lɛ, i uru ká Pɛrze na í se nun-ri ɓa Antiyos ká tusiri Pisidi. Zaɗka i tḭi ɗi na báyḭi lɛ, i se ɓil hul mbṵ́ kḭ Ziɓri ká ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ram í kaw ɗi.
44013015	Falɛ ká i kḭi ɓay ha̰nɛri ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe bol kusol ɓáy taa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɔ riw bele na, mbay hul mbṵ́ kḭri ɓaa ha ri mii: «Ɓaarì yṵ ɓururi, timbɛɗɛ key na, zaɗka ì ɗo ɓáy ɓay ká ɓay ɓókoke nzoɓri lɛ, ì ɓaa.»
44013016	Báyḭi lɛ, Pol uru siya a ura nduo-ɛ ha̰ zaɗ ɗo ndiŋ rɔɔ a ɓaa mii: «Ɓaarì leɗ Izarayɛlri, ɓáy ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í hḭɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì laa ɓay ɓi key na ɓáy kere!
44013017	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leɗ Izarayɛlri key na nan bulu naari ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓeri. Ɓáy ɗol ɓari ká i ɗǒke tusiri Eziɓte na, ka ɗaa ha ri ŋgḭi ɓa pola pola, rɔɓay, ɓáy nduo hoɗo ɓe na, ka tǐnake ri ɓáy hṵrusuo-ɛ saa ɗi.
44013018	Maa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ na, ka iki law-ɛ ká tul-ri a kɔ̌rɔke ri ká ɓil law kɔr.
44013019	Falɛ ku rɔɔ, a ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri i sa̰w nzoɓri ká ɓa tɔnɔ say ká i kaw tusiri Kanaa na, a pɔŋ zaɗɛ ku na ha ri ɓa tusiri ɓari.
44013020	Fekeri riw bele ku na, bole ɗi maa mbiimbam isɔɗ niŋ ɓáy síŋ ndeɓe munu. Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ha̰ nzoɓ ɗáa ɓayri kaw tul-ri kpṵru tḭi ɓil sewke ká Samiyɛl ɓáke nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
44013021	«Báyḭi lɛ, leɗ Izarayɛlri na i vbi mbay ɓay haŋa ni ka káw tul-ri. Lɛɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri Sawul ká ɓa vu Kis ká sa̰w ka̰ni ɓe ɓa Bezamɛ ha̰ ni re tul-ri maa mbiimbam síŋ niŋ.
44013022	Rɔɓay, falɛ káʼa tuŋ Sawul ŋgereŋ na báyḭi lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a naa Daviɗ ɓa mbay a ɓaa nasi ɓay ɓe mii: “Mì kɔ Daviɗ, vu Zese ɓa wa̰ra law-i. Ɓe ze, a ɗáa feri riw bele ká mì hii na ha̰ ni ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ.”
44013023	Nzoɓ mbḭw ká sa̰w Daviɗ na ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ni kaw ɓa Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓ ɓay tul leɗ Izarayɛlri munu káʼa waa na. Ɓe ze ɓa Zezu.
44013024	Pola rɔɔ ɓay haŋa Zezu vi na, Za̰a Batis ka-káa ɓay haŋa leɗ Izarayɛlri riw bele i suo kér ɓay ɓari ɓo, í ha ri ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.
44013025	Zaɗka Za̰a ɗo ɗi ya ɓáy ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam ɓe na báyḭi lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: “Ɓaarì na wa̰a ì ɓaa mii, mì ɓa ve lɛ? Mì ɓa nzoɓ ká ì giyaŋ ni na ya. Roo lɛ, ì láa mì key: nzoɓ káʼa ví fal-i vuku na, sal dikɔn ká ɓal-ɛ hɔy kara mì maa ɓay hína ya.”
44013026	«Yṵ-iri, ɓaarì ká ì ɓa vu bulu Abaraham, ɓáy ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya ká í koɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ɓa naari kḭ ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pie ɓáy ɓay pam key na ha̰ naari.
44013027	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓri ká Zuruzalɛm ɓáy mbay ɓari na, Zezu ɓa ve lɛ na i kɔ ya. Ɓay ká i kḭi se tul-e ká ɓil mbeɗe nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy ɓil nam mgbaka ta̰ramri riw bele na kara, i laa sa̰w ɓayke taŋ ya. Roo lɛ, ɓáy faa ɓay huɗ ká i ɗaa ɓo tul Zezu na ha̰ ɓay ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa se tul-e na, ɗo munu ɓáy zaɗɛ.
44013028	Ze i ziŋ ka̰aya mbḭw ká ɓay ɗáake ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-e ya na hɔy kara, i vbi Pilaɗ ɓay haŋa ni pɔŋ faa ha ri i ni.
44013029	Falɛ ká Zezu ɗaa feri riw bele ɔ, munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru se tul-e na, i ɗira ni saa tul puu say huɗ í vǎa ɗaa ni ɓo ɓil luɔ huɗ.
44013030	Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina ni saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun.
44013031	Lɛɛ, ɓil namri ká ŋgḭi maa fe ká fal tḭ́i ɓe saa luɔ huɗ na, Zezu tḭi tul ɓari ká i su ni saa kuɗu zaɗ ká Galele kpṵru tḭi Zuruzalɛm na. Ɓari na, i ɓa nzoɓ nasi ɓay ɓe ɓay ɓáa ɓay ká se tul-e na ha̰ leɗ Izarayɛlri.
44013032	«Ɓuru kara, ɓuru vi ka-káa Ɓay Kere key na ha rì kɔ mii: fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ bulu naari pola lew hɔy ɓay ɗáa na,
44013033	ka ɗaa timbɛɗɛ ɓay tul naari ká náa ɓári vu ɓari, a tǐnake Zezu saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓay kumnun munu káʼa ɓaa ɗo ɓil sim ndeke ɗi siɗike ká ɓil Mbeɗe Simri na mii: “Ɓo na mù ɓa Vu-i; úru saa vuri key na mì ɓa Bǎa-ka.”
