45011010	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nun-ri ka fṵmra gbiɓli ha ri kɔ zaɗ mbǎa; a mú ɗaa ha̰ soɓake ka hii ri ha̰ mbol-ri ka te zúruru ɓaŋguɔ.»
45011011	Ze mì vbi ɓay na rɔɓay mii: lɛ, leɗ Izarayɛlri ká i hii ɗáa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu ya, ká í te ɓal-ri í lie na wa̰a, i li-lie kḭ wṵ̌m kḭ ro zu lɛ woo? Ṵ́-uu, munu ya! Roo lɛ, ɓay tul fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓari na ku ze, nzoɓ ha̰yri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na i zǐŋke pam. Feke ɗo munu ɓay haŋa leɗ Izarayɛlri kɔ lɛ, i ɗáake sere ziŋ ri.
45011012	Zaɗka fe ɗáa ka̰aya ɓari vi ɓa fe sa̰mi ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰wri ká tusiri key, a leɗi ɓari vi ɓa fe sa̰mi ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya ku na wa̰a, zaɗka ɓari Ziɓri kḭ ŋgiɗ bele i yḭ̀i í ziŋ pam na wa̰a, a ví ɓa bawda fe sa̰mi ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ya mina lɛ woo!
45011013	Timbɛɗɛ key na, mì ɓáa ɓay ziŋ ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya na ro. Ɓi na, mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ɓay tul nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya. Munu ká ɓa peɗ ɓi na, mì zay sùo-i ká ɗi,
45011014	a mí hii ɓay ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa sa̰w ɓiri na i kɔ lɛ, i ɗáake sere ziŋ ri ɓo ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰nɛri zíŋke pam.
45011015	Ì kér í kɔ: zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pɔŋ fal Ziɓri a ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i ziŋ faa í zuɔ ziŋ ni na wa̰a, ɓoɗ ɓáy rɔɔ, zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ya̰aŋa ri na, a ɓá bawda fe kere ká ɓa káw ɓáy kumnun nzoɓri ká i hu na ya lɛ woo?
45011016	Zaɗka nzoɓ mbi tul fe sṵm a ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, kiɛ mii, ɓieri riw bele ku na ɓa taa ɓe. A ze zaɗka puu ɗo rɔɔ sa̰wke ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, nzaa tɔykeri hɔy kara ɓa taa ɓe nda̰w.
45011017	Leɗ Izarayɛlri na i ɗo munu ɓa puu oliviye taa puɔ ká i kuɗ nzaa tɔyke ha̰nɛri ɓa fal. A ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya na, ì ɗo munu ɓa nzaa tɔy puu oliviye taa ɓisuy ká i ɗaa rì rḭi puu oliviye taa puɔ ha rì nzɔ mbiike a í so ɗo ɗi.
45011018	A munu ká ì nzɔ mbii puu oliviye taa puɔ na, ì ti siika sùo-rì ká tul nzaa tɔykeri ká i kuɗ ɓa fal na ku ya. Ɓaarì na, ì ɓa nzaa tɔy puu hɔy ɓo, ì ɓa sa̰wke ya.
45011019	Kɔ ya lɛ ì ɓáa ha̰ mì mii: «I kuɗ nzaa tɔy puuri ku na ɓay haŋa ɓuru rḭi ɗo bol-ri zu.»
45011020	Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kuɗ Ziɓri na ɓa fal ɓay tul mbika law ɓari ká tiya. A ɓaarì laa lɛ, ì so ɗo puu oliviyeke a í ɗo ɗi, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì ɗaa law-rì ɓo Zezu Krisi. Munu zu lɛ, ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì í sìi sùo-rì ya,
45011021	ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗkaʼa kuɗ nzaa tɔy puu oliviye taa puɔ ká ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri ku na wa̰a, maa ɓay ɓaarì ká ì ɓa nzaa tɔy puu oliviye taa ɓisuy ká í so ɗo ɗi na, ka ti kúɗ rì ya lɛ?
45011022	Ì kɔ faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáke nzoɓ law kere nda̰w, a yḭŋ ká tul nzoɓ nda̰w na. Ka ɗaa yḭŋ ziŋ Ziɓri ká i hii ɗáa law-ri ɓo tul Zezu ya í lie, a ɓaarì laa lɛ, ka ɗaa kere ziŋ rì. Roo lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay káw ɓil law kere ɓe na nda̰w rɔ! Munu ya lɛ, a kúɗ rì munu ká nzaa tɔy puu na nda̰w.
45011023	A ɓari leɗ Izarayɛlri na, zaɗka i pɔŋ law ŋgɔŋɔ ɓari í yḭ̀i í vi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗáa ri rḭi zaɗɛ ká pola na, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ká ɓay ɗáa ri rḭi zaɗɛ ɓa kḭ.
45011024	Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓaarì ká ì ɓa leɗ Izarayɛlri ya na, ì ɓa nzaa tɔy puu oliviye taa ɓisuy ká i ɗaa rḭi puu oliviye taa puɔ na. Ɓa fe ká ɗáake ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri ká nzoɓ maa ɗáa ya. Munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa peɗ ká ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ká nzoɓ maa ɗáa ya na wa̰a, maa ɓay ɓari leɗ Izarayɛlri ká i ɓa nzaa tɔy puu oliviye taa puɔ na, ka ti ɗáa ri rḭi zaɗɛ ɓa kḭ ya lɛ!
45011025	Yṵ-iri, mì hii ɓay tína sa̰w fe ká ɗo zaɗ muni pola na, ɓay haŋa ɓo ì kɔ lɛ, ì ɗíke sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ya. Feke na ze ɗo key: Leɗ Izarayɛl ha̰nɛri na i vi ɓa nzoɓ law ŋgɔŋɔri. Law ŋgɔŋɔ ɓari na a ɗoko munu kpṵru maa ɓáy nam ká nzoɓri riw bele ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ri ɓa taa ɓe na, i ví zǐŋke pam.
45011026	Ɓe ze, leɗ Izarayɛlri riw bele i zíŋke pam munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: «Nzoɓ Ya̰aŋa Nzoɓri na a úru saa Sio̰n, a naa fe ka̰aya vu bulu Zakoɓri.
45011027	Zaɗka mì náa feya̰a ɓari na, a ɓá tusuɛ kuni ká mì saa ziŋ ri.»
45011028	Zaɗka náa kérri se tul káa Ɓay Kere ká Ziɓri tuŋ ŋgereŋ na lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɓo, ɓaarì ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya na ì ziŋ kereke ká ɗi. Roo lɛ, zaɗka náa kérri se tul faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nǎnke ri na laa lɛ, i ɓa nzoɓ nun-ɛ ɓay tul bulu ɓari,
45011029	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ha̰ fe lɛ, ka yḭ̀i a vbiɗa ya, a nzoɓri káʼa ɗi ri na kara, ka suo kér ɓayke ya nda̰w.
45011030	Ɓaarì na, pola na ì mba nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kɔ nun síe ɓaarì, a ɗaa law kere ziŋ rì ɓay tul Ziɓri ká i mba nzi-ɛ.
45011031	Zaɗka mbaka nzaa ɓari ɗo ɓa faa ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kɔ́ke nun síe ɓaarì na lɛ, a kɔ́kɔ nun síe ɓari faa mbḭw munu ká ɓaarì na nda̰w,
45011032	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓe na ka mgba nzoɓri riw bele ɗo ɓil mbaka nzaa ɓay kíɛke law kere ɓe ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele.
45011033	Kuu-wuy! Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓa bawda nzoɓ! Nun nzɛm ɓe ɓáy fe kɔ́kɔ ɓe na, gbṵke tiya! Feri káʼa mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi na, nzoɓ káʼa máa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke kɔ na, mbḭw tiya! Feri káʼa leke ká ɓil law-ɛ ɓay ɗáa na kara, nzoɓ káʼa máa kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke kɔ na, mbḭw tiya nda̰w!
45011034	I ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Nzoɓ ve ze kɔ kér ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay na lɛ? Nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ, maa ɓay haŋa ni nzaa ɓoko lɛ?»
45011035	«Wa̰a, nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ, ha̰ ni fe rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ni yḭ̀i a puo ni mbɔlke lɛ?»
45011036	Tusuɛke lɛ, feri riw bele uru saa luo-ɛ; feri riw bele ɗo ɓáy faa hṵrusuo-ɛ nda̰w, a feri riw bele ɗo ɓay tul-e nda̰w pi! Riŋ ɗika ɓa taa ɓe ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara. Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ!
45012001	Yṵ-iri, munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa law kere ziŋ naari na, mì ɓo rì ɓay haŋa rì mbi sùo-rì ɓáy yɔrɛ ɗɛɗ ha̰ ni ɓa fe poy ká ɗo ɓáy kumnun ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe a rii law-ɛ. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, a ɓá tusuɛ rúo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká uru saa ɓil law-rì ká ɗo nun haŋa rì ɗaa na.
45012002	Ì mbóro nduo peɗ nzoɓ tukɛlɛri ká tusiri key na ya, roo lɛ, ì ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ka fɛ́rɛ kér ɓay ɓaarì ɓa fie, a ha rì nun nzɛm fie ká ɓay haŋa ɓo, ì maa kɛ́lɛke fe ká law-ɛ hii: fe ká ɓa kere nda̰w, a rii law-ɛ nda̰w, rɔɔ a ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ nzɛɗɛm nda̰w pi.
45012003	Ɓáy faa law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ mì na, mì ɓaa ha rì riw bele: nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka kɔ sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ ká ɓamba ya. Roo lɛ, ka kɔ sùo-ɛ maa ɓáy faa mbika law ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni na.
45012004	Ì kɔ, sùo náa nzoɓ ká mbḭw key na, nzaa váwkeri ŋgḭi ɓamba, a peɗ ɗáa nzaa vawkeri ká mbḭw mbḭw na kara ɗo ɓoɗ ɓoɗ.
45012005	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, ze náa ruɔri na ɓamba hɔy kara, náa ɗori ɓa sùo ká mbḭw hɔy ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Zezu Krisi. Naari riw bele na, náa zuɔri ziŋ kḭ munu ɓa nzaa váw sùo-ri ká mbḭw.
45012006	Náa ɗori ɓáy fe iniri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ naari hɔy hɔy maa ɓáy zaɗ peɗ káʼa hii ɓay haŋa náa ɗáari. Ɓe ze, zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra naari key, ɗo ɓáy fe ini ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓaa ha̰ nzoɓri lɛ, ɗo nun haŋa ni ka ɗaa maa ɓáy mbika law káʼa ɗǒke na.
45012007	Zaɗka nzoɓ kḭ ɗo ɓáy fe ini ká ɓay ɗáake peɗ ha̰ nzoɓri lɛ, ɗo nun haŋa ni ka ɗaa peɗke na ɓáy zaɗɛ nda̰w rɔ! A nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy fe ini fére nzoɓri fe laa lɛ, ka fére ri fe na.
45012008	Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy fe ini ɗáa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law nzoɓri lɛ, ka ɗaa munu na kḭ. Nzoɓ ká ɓa nzoɓ haŋa nzoɓri fe lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓáy law kere ká puluk. Ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ ndáka faa pol nzoɓri lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓáy faake. A nzoɓ ká ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ nun síe nzoɓri laa lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓáy suoriya.
45012009	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law ini taa tusuɛke ze ka ɗo sakra ɓaarì. Ì tuŋ fe ka̰ayari na ŋgereŋ ɓa fal, a í mgba sa̰w fe kere ze í ɗaa.
45012010	Ì kɔ kḭ ɓa nzoɓ nun kḭ munu ɓa yṵ kḭri ká i hii kḭ, a í ɗaa mbay ɓo tul kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew.
45012011	Ì nduɔ kiyaw kiyaw a í ɗáake peɗ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy ɓil law-rì riw bele ɓo, í ɓa lay ya.
45012012	Ì ɗaa suoriya ɓay tul fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ rì ká ì ɗaa law-rì te ɗi nzokɗo na. Ì íki law-rì ká ɓil fe sɛkɛri ká tḭi tul-rì, a í ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɓaŋguɔ kpaɗara.
45012013	Yṵ ɓaarì ká ɓil Krisi ká i se síe fe na ì sɔ ri ká ɗi, a í mgba nzoɓri ká i vi luo-rì na ɓáy kere.
45012014	Ì sá̰m fe zuɔ tul nzoɓri ká i ɗaa nun-rì tuɔ síe. Ì sá̰m fe ze ka zuɔ tul-ri ɓo, ì fáɗ ri ya.
45012015	Ì ɗaa suoriya ziŋ nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɓil suoriya, a í rɛ-rɛw ziŋ nzoɓri ká i kaw ɓáy rɛw.
45012016	Ì zúɔ ziŋ kḭ ɓáy kere ɓa lie ɓa lew. Ì sìi sùo-rì ya, roo lɛ, ì kɔ nzoɓri riw bele ɓa nzoɓ, a í naa nun nzoɓ mbḭw ya. Ì ɗi sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ya.
45012017	Zaɗka nzoɓ ɗaa fe sɛkɛ ziŋ rì lɛ, ì yḭ̀i í ɗaa fe sɛkɛke na ziŋ ni ká fal-ɛ ya, roo lɛ, fe kere ze ì ɗaa ká nun nzoɓri riw bele.
45012018	Zaɗka ɓay ɗo, rɔɔ faa ɓayke ɗo fi luo-rì lɛ, ì ɗaa kpṵru í leke ɓayke, a í káw ɗɛkɛkɛ ka ziŋ nzoɓri riw bele.
45012019	Ɓaarì nzoɓri ká mì kɔ rì ɓa nzoɓ nun-i na, fe sɛkɛ ká nzoɓri ɗaa ziŋ rì na, ì puo mbɔlke sùo-rì ya, roo lɛ, ì ála faa ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ka ɗaa hɛrɛ ɓe ka ziŋ ri munu káʼa ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: «Mbɔl fe sɛkɛri ká nzoɓri ɗaa ziŋ rì na, ì ála ha̰ mì ɓi kḭ, mi vbíɗa gbaa ndaake. Ɓi kḭ ze mì púo mbɔlke káʼa máa tul nzoɓke na ɓáy.»
45012020	Rɔɓay, ka yḭ̀i a ɓaa mii: «Zaɗka kɔn sɛ nzoɓ tul ŋga̰ni ɓo lɛ, mu ha̰ ni fe sṵm ha̰ ni ka sṵ; a zaɗka kɔn mbii ze sɛ ni lɛ, mu ha̰ ni mbii ka nzɔ. Zaɗka mù ɗaa munu lɛ, ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ bawda sahoy a mgbaka ni ɓáy.»
45012021	Mu ha̰ fe ka̰aya na ka mba tul-a ya, roo lɛ, mu háw yṵm ká tul fe ka̰aya ɓáy faa fe ɗáa kere.
45013001	Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul nzoɓ rewpuori, ɓay ḭi lɛ, rewpuo ha̰a ha̰a kara uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ɓari ká i kaw tul puori na, ɓa ɓe kḭ ze ka ɗaa ri kaw tul kariŋgaw mbay.
45013002	Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓ ká tuŋ ri ŋgereŋ lɛ, ka nda puu ɓay feri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi na zu. A nzoɓri ká i nda puu ɓayke na, ɓa ɓari kḭ sùo-ri ze i a̰n ɓay ɓo tul-ri.
45013003	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓri ká i ɗaa fe kere na, i ti ɗáa hḭɛ nzoɓ rewpuori ya, roo lɛ, ɓari ká i ɗaa fe ka̰aya ze i hḭ́ɛ ri. Wa̰a, mù hii ɓay haŋa hḭɛ nzoɓ rewpuori mgba mù ya lɛ? Munu zu lɛ, mu ɗaa fe kere, ɓo ha ri písi mù ká ɗi,
45013004	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa peɗke zuɔ nduo-ri ɓay haŋa ri sɔ́ke mù ha̰ mù ɗaa fe kere. Ze ɓo, zaɗka mù ɗaa fe ka̰aya laa lɛ, mu ha̰ hḭɛ ka mgba mù, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hṵrusuo ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha ri na ɗo ɓay haŋa ri ɗáake fe sɛkɛ ziŋ nzoɓ fe ɗáa ka̰aya. I ɗaa peɗke na munu ɓay kíɛke hɛrɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká tul nzoɓ fe ɗáa ka̰ayari.
45013005	Sa̰wke mini ze, ndaɗ ɓay ɗáa vu mbom ɓo tul nzoɓ rewpuori. Mu ɗaa munu ɓay ɗúuke hɛrɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hɔy ya, roo lɛ, mu ɗaa ɓáy faa kér ɓay ɓo ká ɓil law-a kḭ nda̰w rɔ!
45013006	Sa̰wke mini nda̰w ze, i púoke larimbuo, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i ɓa nzoɓ rewpuori ká i ha rì puo larimbuo na, ɓa peɗ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa ɓáy faake.
45013007	Feri riw bele ká ɗo ɓay haŋa rì puo nzoɓri na, ì puo ri: ì puo larimbuo ha̰ nzoɓ mbṵ́ larimbuori, a í puo tul feri ká i tuu ha rì na kara nda̰w pi. Nzoɓ ká ɗo nun hḭ́ɛ ni lɛ, ì hḭ́ɛ ni; a nzoɓ ká ɗo nun ɗáa mbay ɓo tul-e laa lɛ, ì ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-e.
45013008	Ì ha̰ mbɔl nzoɓ mbḭw kara ka ɗo tul-rì ya. Roo lɛ, mbɔl mgbaka ini ziŋ kḭ ze ka ɗo tul-rì ɓaŋguɔ. Nzoɓ ká hii yṵ-ɛri lɛ, ka ɗaa feri riw bele ká bol kusol hii ɓayke na ɓáy zaɗɛ.
45013009	Tusuɛke lɛ, bol kusolri ká mii: mù ti ɗáa nun pie ya, mù ti ika nzoɓ ya, mù ti ri-riiɓa ya, mù ti kɔ́kɔ nun fe ya, rɔɔ ɓáy bol kusol ha̰wri riw bele na, mbṵ tul-e mbḭw hɔy ká ɓil bol kusol ká ɓaa mii: «Mu híi kṵ-ɔ munu ká sùo-ɔ ɓo kḭ.»
45013010	Nzoɓ ká hii kṵ-ɛ na, ka ti ɗáa fe sɛkɛ ziŋ ni ya. Ɓe ze, híi kṵ-ɔ na ɓa ɗáa feri riw bele ká bol kusol hii ɓayke ɓáy zaɗɛ nzɛɗɛm.
45013011	Ɓil namri ká náa kawri ɗi timbɛɗɛ key na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa náa kɔ́ri ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Ɓa nam túma saa tul nam ro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a yá̰aŋake naari ŋgiɗ bele na, tɔ̀ŋ ɗi munu ɓa nam ká náa mbíkeri law naari na ku mbǎa ro.
45013012	Suŋ tilo na ɗo ɗi ya ɓay zékre, a ha̰ zaɗ taŋa laa ro ze ɗo táŋ. Munu zu lɛ, náa pɔ́ŋri fe ɗáa ka̰aya ká ɓil suŋ tilo na riw bele ɓa fal, a náa fá̰ari fe remri ka zúɔ sùo naari, a náa rúkeri ruy ká ɓil zaɗ taŋa.
45013013	Náa ɗáari fe ká ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ munu ká nzoɓri ɗáake fe ká ɓisie. Náa nzɛ́ri ɓáy sùo naari ká tul ɗáa kɔn fe ka̰aya ɓáy koy him, ɗáa fe ḭ̌mri ɓáy fe ɗáa sahoy nda̰w, rɔɔ rɔɗ kḭ ɓáy ɗáa sere nda̰w pi.
45013014	Ì ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu Krisi ze ka re mbay ká tul-rì, a í pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ kɔn naysuo kúɔ rì ha rì ɗaa fe ká law-ɛ hii na mbǎa.
45014001	Nzoɓ ká mbika law ɓe ŋgɔŋ ya na, ì mgba ni ɓáy kere taŋ má̰y ɓay ziŋ ni ká tul kér ɓay ɓeri.
45014002	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛ lɛ kɔ a ɓaa mii, ɓáy faa mbika law ɓeri na, ɓeri maa ɓay sṵŋa feri riw bele; a nzoɓ kḭ ká ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ya laa lɛ, ka saŋ náy saŋ a láa ɓa vaynay kḭ hɔy.
45014003	Nzoɓ ká sṵ feri riw bele na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ḭ́m nzoɓ sáŋ náy na ku ya, a nzoɓ ká saŋ náy saŋ laa lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ ká sṵ feri riw bele na ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓe na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya̰a ni ɓáy kere.
45014004	A ku na wa̰a, mù ɓa ve nda̰w rɔɔ ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ ká ɓa nzoɓ peɗ ɓo ya na lɛ? Ze, fe ɗáa ɓe ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ, mase ɓáy zaɗɛ ya hɔy kara, ɓa ɓay gaŋ tul-e zu. A lɛ, fe ɗáa ɓe na a ɗoko ɓáy zaɗɛ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɓa gaŋ tul-e na, ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo ká ɓay sɔ́kɔ ni ká ɗi.
45014005	Rɔɓay, nzoɓ ha̰nɛ lɛ ker a ɓaa mii, nam ha̰nɛri ku na ɗo ɓoɗ ká nun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kal nam ha̰wri; a nzoɓ kḭ laa lɛ ker a ɓaa mii, namri riw bele na maa ɓa kḭ mbḭw hɔy. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka kɔ kér ɓay ɓe ká ɓil law-ɛ na ka ta-taŋ.
45014006	Nzoɓ ká kɔ nam ha̰nɛ ɗo ɓoɗ kal nam ha̰wri na, ka ɗaa munu a ɗáake mbay ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay. A nzoɓ ká sṵ feri riw bele na, ka ɗaa munu a ɗáake mbay ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay nda̰w, a ɗáake taambɔl ha̰ ni ɓay tul fe sṵmri na. A nzoɓ ká sṵ feri riw bele ya na kara, ka ɗaa munu ɓay ɗáake mbay ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a ɗáake taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w pi.
45014007	Tusuɛke lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra naari key ká kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ na, tiya, a nam huɗ naari hɔy kara, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká ɗi nda̰w.
45014008	Ì kɔ, zaɗka náa káwri ɓáy kumnun ɓáy na, náa káwri ɓay ɗáa peɗ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay. A zaɗka náa húri laa lɛ, náa sékeri ɓay vǎa káw ziŋ ni. Ze náa húri na hu, mase náa káwri ɓáy kumnun hɔy kara, náa ɓári taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay,
45014009	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Krisi na hu a yḭ̀i a kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓay ɓá Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká tul nzoɓ huɗeri nda̰w, nzoɓ káw ɓáy kumnunri nda̰w pi.
45014010	A ɓo na wa̰a, ɓay ḭike rɔɔ mù ɗáake ɓay ɓo tul yṵ-ɔ na lɛ? Ɓay ḭi kḭ nda̰w rɔɔ mù ḭ̌mke yṵ-ɔ na lɛ? Ì kɔ, naari riw bele na, náa ɗokori pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ni ka kuŋ sal ɓay ɓo tul naari.
45014011	Ka ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: «Ɓi Ŋgɛrɛmbay Nzoɓ Káw Ɓáy Kumnun na, mì ɓaa ta-taŋ ha rì mii: nzoɓri riw bele ì húku pol-i, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara a ɓáa ta-taŋ ɓáy nzi-ɛ mii, ɓi na, mì ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.»
45014012	Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká sakra naari key na, a kḭiŋa fal fe ɗáa ɓeri sùo-ɛ kḭ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
45014013	Munu zu lɛ, náa pɔ́ŋri nzaa nduo ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul kḭ na ka gbṵ. A roo lɛ, fe ká ɗo nun haŋa rì mbi nzaa-rì ká ɗi na ze ɗo key: ì ɗaa fe mbḭw káʼa ɗáa ha̰ yṵ ɓaarì te ɓal-ri ká ɗi, ha ri ɗaa feya̰a ya.
45014014	Ɓi lɛ, zúɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu na ɗaa ha̰ mì kɔ ɓa tusuɛ mii, fe sṵm ká ɓa ḭ̌m ká ɓay sa-saŋ ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ na mbḭw tiya. A ze ɓo, zaɗka nzoɓ kḭ ker a ɓaa mii, fe sṵm key na ɓa fe sáŋke lɛ, feke na vi ɓa fe sáŋke ɓay tul-e ɓe kḭ zu.
45014015	Ɓo na, zaɗka mù ɓiɛ ɓil law yṵ-ɔ ɓáy faa fe sṵm ɓo ká mù sṵ na lɛ, mù ɗaa fe ɓáy faa law ini mbǎa ro zu. Yṵ-ɔ ká Krisi hu ɓay tul-e na, mu ɗaa ha̰ ni ka zíŋ ɓíɛ ɓay tul fe sṵm ɓo hɔy ya!
45014016	Fe ká ì kɔ ɓa fe kere na, ì ɗaa ha̰ ni ka ɓa faa haŋa nzoɓri ɓǎake ɓay ndaya se tul-rì ya,
45014017	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na, fe ká Tem Law Pie ha̰ ni mgba law-ri na ɓa ɗáa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ nda̰w, káw ɗɛkɛkɛ nda̰w, rɔɔ ɗáa suoriya nda̰w, ɓo ɓa fe sṵm ɓáy fe nzɔkɔ ya.
45014018	A nzoɓ ká ɗaa peɗ ha̰ Krisi ɓáy nduo peɗ ká mini key na, ka rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, a nzoɓri hɔy kara, hii ɓayke ziŋ ni nda̰w pi.
45014019	Munu zu lɛ, náa nzáari faa fe káʼa ɗáa ha̰ ɗɛkɛkɛ ɗǒke sakra naari nda̰w, fe káʼa sɔ́kɔ naari ha̰ náa ŋgɔ́ŋkeri ká ɓil mbika law ɓa pola pola nda̰w pi.
45014020	Mu ɓíɛ peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy faa fe ká mù sṵ hɔy ya. Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, fe sṵmri riw bele na maa sṵŋa, roo lɛ, sṵŋa fe ha̰nɛ káʼa ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰wri ɗáake feya̰a na ɗo ɓa fe ká ndaya.
45014021	Pɔ́ŋ sṵŋa náy nda̰w, nzɔkɔ him nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy feri riw bele na, ndaɗ mba ɗáa ha̰ yṵ-ɔ lǐeke ɓo ɓil feya̰a na.
45014022	Fe ká mù kɔ ká ɓil wa̰ra law-a ɓa fe kere ɓáy faa mbika law na, mu kɔ́rɔ ɗo ɓil law-a ká sakra ɓo ɓáy Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa fe ká law-ɛ ruu ni ká ɗi ya na, suoriya ɓa taa ɓe.
45014023	A roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká law-ɛ ruu ni ɓay tul fe sṵm, rɔɔ a mbi feke a sṵ lɛ, ɓay ɗo tul-e, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓáy faa kér ɓay kere ká uru saa ɓil wa̰ra law-ɛ na ya. Feri riw bele ká nzoɓ ɗaa ɓáy kér ɓay ká uru saa ɓil wa̰ra law-ɛ ká ruu ni ká ɗi na, ɓa feya̰a.
45015001	Naari ká náa ŋgɔ́ŋri ká ɓil mbika law ro na, ɓa peɗ naari ká ɓay sɔ́kɔ nzoɓri ká i ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ɓari ya ɓáy na, ɓo náa nzáari fe ká rii law naari hɔy ya.
45015002	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká sakra naari key na, ka nzaa fe káʼa ndáɗ yṵ-ɛ, a sɔ ni ká ɗi ha̰ ni ŋgɔ́ŋke ká ɓil mbika law ɓe ɓa pola pola.
45015003	Ì kɔ, Krisi kḭ sùo-ɛ kara nzaa faa fe ká rii law-ɛ hɔy ya, roo lɛ, sɛkɛ fe tḭi tul-e munu ká nzoɓ mbḭw ɓaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Tḭ́iri ká nzoɓri tḭiri mù ɓo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, yḭ̀i a zuɔ tul-i.»
45015004	Ze feri riw bele ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru pola na, i ɗaa ɗo ɓay féreke naari fe, ɓay haŋa ɓo, ɓáy faa íki law nda̰w, ɗáa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law nda̰w ká náa ya̰ari ɓayke na, náa ɗáakeri law naari nzokɗo ka te tul fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ɓayke ɓay tul naari na.
45015005	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa wa̰ra ɓo ɓil law nzoɓ nda̰w, a ha̰ sṵ́u law ha̰ nzoɓ nda̰w na, ka ɗaa ha̰ kér ɓay ɓaarì ka maa kḭ, ha rì kǎwke ɓáy kere ziŋ kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew munu ká Zezu Krisi hii ɓayke na.
45015006	Ɓe mini ze, ɓaarì riw bele na, ì pisi ɓe káʼa ɓa Bǎa Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi ɓáy law máa kḭ nda̰w, kusol máa kḭ nda̰w pi.
45015007	Munu zu lɛ, ì mgba kḭ ɓáy kere munu ká Krisi mgba rì ɓáy kere ha̰ ni ɓa fe riŋ ɗika Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
45015008	Mì ɓaa ha rì ɓa tusuɛ: Krisi na vi ɓa nzoɓ peɗ Ziɓri ɓay ɗáake fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru waa ziŋ bulu ɓari na ha̰ ni ka ɔ ɓáy zaɗɛ ɓay kíɛke mii, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɗo tul ɓay ɓe.
45015009	Rɔɓay, ka vi ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i pisi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul law kere ɓe, munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Ɓi na, mì písi mù ká sa̰w nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya, mì ɗika sim mí gɔ́lke riŋ mbay ɓo!»
45015010	Rɔɓay, i ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: «Ɓaarì sa̰w nzoɓri ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya na, ì ɗaa suoriya ziŋ nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ri ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe.»
45015011	I ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe na rɔɓay mii: «Ɓaarì sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele ká ì ɓa Ziɓ ya na, ì pisi Ŋgɛrɛmbay! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele, ɗi sim í ɗáake riŋ ɗika ɓo tul-e!»
45015012	Ezay nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓay saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa nda̰w mii: «Vu bulu Daviɗ mbḭw munu a vika. Ɓe na, a réke mbay ká tul sa̰w nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya; lɛ i ɗáa law-ri te tul-e nzokɗo.»
45015013	Ɓe ze, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa nzoɓ haŋa law nzoɓ te tul-e nzokɗo na, ka ha̰ suoriya ka mbaa ɓil law-rì gba̰y gba̰y, a ha̰ ɗɛkɛkɛ ɓe ka sáɗ ziŋ rì nda̰w ɓáy faa mbika law ɓaarì, ɓay haŋa rì ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa law te tul-e nzokɗo ɓáy faa hṵrusuo Tem Law Pie.
45015014	Yṵ-iri, ɓi kḭ sùo-i kara mì kɔ mii: ɓaarì na law kere mbaa ɓil law-rì gba̰y gba̰y, í kɔ sa̰w feri riw bele nda̰w, a í maa ɓay haŋa kḭ nzaa ɓoko nda̰w pi.
45015015	Ze munu hɔy kara, zaɗ ha̰nɛ ká ɓil mbeɗe ni ká mì ɗaa ha rì key na, mì sṵu law-i mí tokro tem law-rì ká tul feri ká ì kɔ pola na. Mì ɗaa munu ɓay tul law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ziŋ mì,
45015016	a náa mì ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa koy peɗ Zezu Krisi ɓay tul sa̰w nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya. A ɓi lɛ, mì mbi sùo-i mí ɗáake peɗ, a mí káake káa Ɓay Kere Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay haŋa ɓo, nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i víke ɓa nzoɓri ká i rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, munu ɓa fe poy ká rii law-ɛ, í ɓa nzoɓ ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie.
45015017	Ɓe mini ze, ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Zezu Krisi na, mì maa ndáka giri sùo-i ká tul peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká mì ɗaa na.
45015018	Tusuɛke lɛ, zaɗka mì uru mí ɓaa ɓay feri ku na, ɓa ɓi ze mì ɗaa ɓáy hṵrusuo-i ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Krisi ze ɗaa fekeri ɓáy faa ɓi, ɓay haŋa nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, i ɗáake vu mbom ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ka ɗaa ɓáy faa ɓay ɓiri nda̰w, peɗ ɗáa ɓiri nda̰w,
45015019	ɓáy hṵrusuo Tem Law Pie ká tina sùo-ɛ ɓáy faa fe ɗáa saŋri nda̰w, ɓáy feri ká mba kɔ́kɔ nda̰w pi. Ɓe mini ze, mì ka-káa Ɓay Kere ká se tul Krisi na mí séke ɓáy zaɗri riw bele, tii sa̰wke saa Zuruzalɛm kpṵru tḭi kuɗu zaɗ ká Iliri.
45015020	Roo lɛ, mì mbi sùo-i mí ka-káa Ɓay Kere Krisi ká zaɗri ká nzoɓri laa ká ɗi ya ɓáy kḭ hɔy. Mì ɗaa munu ɓay ká̰y fal peɗ ká nzoɓ kḭ ɗaa ro na ya.
45015021	Mì hii ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu ká i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Ɓari ká nzoɓ ka-káa ɓay ɓe ha ri ya ɓáy na, i kɔ́kɔ ni; a ɓari ká i laa soro ɓay ɓe ya ɓáy na, ì láa káa ɓay ɓe.»
45015022	Ɓe ze, ɓa fe ká hiyɛŋ faa ɓaŋguɔ ha̰ mì séke luo-rì ya.
45015023	Roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na, mì ɔrɔ ɓie peɗ ɓi ká ɓil kuɗu zaɗri key na ro. Munu ká ɓa ɗḭ̌ɛ lew hɔy mì ɗaa kɔn séke ɓay vǎa kɔ́kɔ rì na,
45015024	mì hii ɓay séke tḭi tul-rì ɓáy nam ká mì kálke ɓa Espa̰y. Tusuɛke lɛ, kál ɓi ɓa lew na, mì ker ɓay vǎa kɔ́kɔ rì ha rì sɔ mì ɓáy faa varu ɓi na. Mì naaŋa tul-rì nam maa fe ha̰ sá̰y kɔ́kɔ rì na, ka nda siri ndḭi nda̰w rɔɔ mí kál ɓáy.
45015025	Timbɛɗɛ key lɛ, mì se ɓa Zuruzalɛm ɓay tul peɗ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i kaw ɗi na,
45015026	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Maseduwa̰n ɓáy Akayi na, i mbi nzaa-ri ɓay mbṵ́ fe ɓay sɔ́kɔke nzoɓ kṵkuri ká i ɗo sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zuruzalɛm na.
45015027	Ɓari na, i uru ɓáy law hiiya ɓari kḭ ɓay mbṵ́ fe; a ze munu hɔy kara, ɓa peɗ ká ɗo tul-ri ɓay haŋa ri ɗaa, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓari ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na, Ziɓri ká i ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri ká Zuruzalɛm na, i sɔ ri ɓáy faa káa Ɓay Kere ha ri zǐŋke fe sa̰mi Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ziŋ ri mbḭw hɔy. Munu zu lɛ, ɓari ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya na hɔy kara, i sɔ́kɔ Ziɓri na ɓáy feziŋa ɓari.
45015028	Ɓe ze, zaɗka mì ɔ́rɔ ɓie peɗ key, a mí vǎa ɗaa fe mbṵ́ na zuɔ nduo nzoɓkeri lɛ, mì kál ɓáy faa tul-rì nda̰w rɔɔ mí se Espa̰y na ɓáy.
45015029	Ze, mì kɔ nda̰w, zaɗka mì tḭi tul-rì lɛ, mì tḭ́i ɓáy bawda fe sa̰mi Krisi.
45015030	Ze yṵ-iri, fe ká mì ɓo rì ká ɗi ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi nda̰w, ɓáy law ini ká Tem Law Pie ha̰ naari nda̰w na ze ɗo key: ì ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɓay tul-i ká pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, í rúke ruy ziŋ mì.
45015031	Ì ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere ɓay haŋa mì tḭi ká ɓil nduo nzoɓ law ŋgɔŋɔri ká Zude na, ɓay haŋa ɓo, fe mbṵ́ri ká mì séke ɓa Zuruzalɛm na, nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ɗi i ya̰a ɓáy suoriya.
45015032	Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii lɛ, mì tḭ́i tul-rì ɓáy bawda suoriya, a mí ya̰a ɔ̰mi ká sakra ɓaarì.
45015033	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nzoɓ haŋa ɗɛkɛkɛ ha̰ nzoɓ na, ka sáɗ ziŋ rì riw bele. Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ.
45016001	Yṵ-iri, tinam naari Febe ká ɓa nzoɓ peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká Sankere na, ka se ɓa luo-rì vǎw.
45016002	Zaɗkaʼa se lɛ, mì koɗ rì ɓay haŋa rì mgba ni ɓáy kere ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi faa mbḭw munu ká ɓaarì nzoɓ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri i ɗáake ziŋ kḭ na. Ì sɔ ni ká tul feri riw bele káʼa se síeke ká luo-rì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ na, ka sɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi nda̰w, a ɓi hɔy kara ka sɔ mì nda̰w pi.
45016003	Ì hii soko ha̰ Prisil ɓáy waa ɓe Akilas ká i ɓa bǎw peɗ ɓi ká ɓil peɗ Zezu Krisi.
45016004	Ɓari na, i nzṵu sím ɓari ɗo guma nda̰w rɔɔ í yǎ̰ake mì. Ɓa ɓi huo-i hɔy ze mì yḭ̀i ɓáy taambɔl ha ri ya, roo lɛ, ɓa nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ɓáy zaɗri ɓoɗ ɓoɗ riw bele ká i ɓa sa̰w Ziɓ ya na kara, i ɗaa munu nda̰w.
45016005	Ì hii soko ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká luo-ri na. Ì hii soko ha̰ Epaynɛɗ ká mì hii ni ɓamba na nda̰w. Ɓe na, ka ɓa titire nzoɓ káʼa mbi law-ɛ ha̰ Krisi ká kuɗu zaɗ ká Azi.
45016006	Ì hii soko ha̰ Mari ká ɗaa peɗ ɓamba ɓay tul-rì na.
45016007	Andoronikus ɓáy Zuniyas ká i ɓa nzoɓ ini ɓi ká ɓúru kḭri ɓuru naa hul sal mbḭw na, ì hii soko ha ri. Ɓari na, i ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri ká nzoɓri ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-ri, a í mbi law-ri ha̰ Krisi pola ha̰ mì.
45016008	Ì hii soko ha̰ Ampiliyatus, ɓe ká mì kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ nun-i ɓáy faa law ini Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
45016009	Ì hii soko ha̰ Urbɛ̰, ɓe káʼa ɓa bǎw peɗ naari ká ɓil peɗ Krisi, rɔɔ Estakis ká mì hii ni ɓamba na.
45016010	Ì hii soko ha̰ Apelɛs; ká ɓil kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe hɔy kara ka mgba mbika law-ɛ ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ká tul Krisi na. Ì hii soko ha̰ nzoɓ ɓil hul Arisitobulri nda̰w.
45016011	Ì hii soko ha̰ nzoɓ ini ɓi Eroɗio̰n. Ì hii soko ha̰ nzoɓ ɓil hul Narsiseri ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari.
45016012	Ì hii soko ha̰ Tirifɛn ɓáy Tirifoz, ɓari ká i ɗaa sùo-ri taa tom ká ɓil peɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay, rɔɔ tinǎa Pɛrsiɗ, ɓe káʼa ɗaa peɗ ɓamba ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay nda̰w na.
45016013	Ì hii soko ha̰ Rufusi ká ɗaa peɗ ndaɗ ɓamba ha̰ Krisi, rɔɔ í hii soko ha̰ mi-ɛ ká ɗo munu ɓa máa nda̰w na.
45016014	Ì hii soko ha̰ Asinkriɗ nda̰w, Felego̰n nda̰w, Ɛrmɛs nda̰w, Patorobas nda̰w, Ɛrmɛs nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy yṵ-iri riw bele ká i ɗo ziŋ ri na nda̰w pi.
45016015	Ì hii soko ha̰ Filolok ɓáy Zuli, Nere ɓáy tini-ɛ nda̰w, rɔɔ í hii soko ha̰ Olimpas ɓáy nzoɓ taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri riw bele ká i ɗo ziŋ ri na.
45016016	Ì mgba kḭ gírik girik í úl suku kḭ, í hǐike soko lik lik ha̰ kḭ ɓa lie ɓa lew. Nzoɓ mbika lawri riw bele ká i mbṵ tul kḭ í kaw zaɗ ni key na, i hii soko ha rì.
45016017	Yṵ-iri, mì ɓo rì ɓay haŋa rì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay tul nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ha̰ téke ɓil kḭ ɗo na. Nzoɓkeri ku na i ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri wṵru faa kere ɓáy faa fe fere ɓari ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓáy Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ì ya̰a pola na. Ɓari na, ì mgbá̰ŋra ri ya,
45016018	ɓay ḭi lɛ, kḭri nzoɓri ká mini key na, i nzaa ɓil-ri kḭ hɔy ɓo, i ɗaa peɗ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Krisi ya. Ɓáy faa nzaa ráa ɓay ɓari nda̰w, ɓáy ɓay ká tḭi rɛ̰m rɛ̰m ká nzaa-ri nda̰w na, i ǔlake nzoɓri ká nun-ri nzɛ ya.
45016019	Ɓaarì laa lɛ, vu mbom ká ì ɗaa ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, nzoɓri riw bele kɔ-kɔ. Ɓe ze, mì ɗáake suoriya ɓay tul-rì, a mí hii ɓay haŋa rì ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ká se tul fe ɗáa kere, a í ɗo ɓa nzoɓri ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ se tul fe ka̰aya.
45016020	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɓa nzoɓ haŋa ɗɛkɛkɛ ha̰ nzoɓ na, waka ya hɔy lɛ, kaʼa ɓíɛ hṵrusuo Satan ha rì rɛ̰ŋ ni ɓáy ɓal-rì. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law huoke Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi ka sáɗ ziŋ rì!
45016021	Timote ká ɓa bǎw peɗ ɓi na, ka hii soko ha rì, rɔɔ nzoɓ ini ɓiri ká ɓa Lusiyus ɓáy Zaso̰n rɔɔ Sosipatɛr hɔy kara, i hii soko ha rì nda̰w pi.
45016022	A ɓi Tɛrtus ká Pol ha̰ mì vbie mbeɗe key kara, mì hii soko ha rì ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká mbṵ naari mbḭw hɔy na.
45016023	Gayus ká ya̰a mì naa hul ɓe na, ka hii soko ha rì nda̰w. Ká puo ɓe ze nzoɓ mbika lawri mbṵ kḭ ká ɗi. Erasi, ɓe káʼa ɓa nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ lari ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo key na, ka hii soko ha rì nda̰w, yṵ naari Kartus kara hii soko ha rì nda̰w pi.
45016024	[Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law kere Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi ka sáɗ ziŋ rì riw bele. Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ.]
45016025	Náa ɗáari riŋ ɗika ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru! Ɓe na, ka maa ɓay haŋa hṵrusuo ha rì ɗǒke tul mbika law ɓaarì, munu ká ɓayke ɗo ɓil káa Ɓay Kere ká mì kaa na. Ɓa káa Ɓay Kere ká se tul Zezu Krisi, a kiɛ naari fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɗo zaɗ muni ɓa ɗḭ̌ɛ lew hɔy.
45016026	A roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ ka tina feke ɗo zaɗ hie gbay gbay ɓáy faa ɓay ká nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe na, maa ɓáy bol nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Káw Ɓaŋguɔ, ɓay haŋa sa̰w nzoɓri riw bele tǔuke ni ɓo, í ɗáake law-ri ɓo tul-e a í ɗáake vu mbom ɓo tul-e nda̰w.
45016027	Ŋgɛrɛwṵru huo-ɛ ká ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛm na, riŋ ɗika ɓa taa ɓe mbiimbam ɓáy mbiimbam ɓaŋguɔ ɓáy faa Zezu Krisi. Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ.
46001001	Ɓi Pol ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗí mì ɓáy faa law hiiya ɓe ha̰ mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ Zezu Krisi na, ɓúru yṵ ɓuru Sostɛn ɓuru ɗaa mbeɗe key na, ɓúru hǐike soko ha rì
46001002	ɓaarì nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ì mbṵ tul kḭ ká ŋgɛrɛpuo ká Kɔrɛ̰te. Mì ɗaa mbeɗe key na ha rì ɓaarì ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru náa rì ɗo ɓoɗ ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Zezu Krisi, a ɗi rì ɓay haŋa rì kaw ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓeri. Mì ɗaa mbeɗe na ha̰ ɓari riw bele ká i kaw zaɗ kḭri riw bele ká i ruo Zezu Krisi Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari, ɓe káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓari nda̰w, rɔɔ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓuru nda̰w pi na.
46001003	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law huoke ɓáy ɗɛkɛkɛ taa Bǎa naari Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu Krisi ka sáɗ ziŋ rì.
46001004	Mì ɗaa taambɔl ɓaŋguɔ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul law kere káʼa ɗaa ziŋ rì ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Zezu Krisi.
46001005	Ì kɔ, ɓáy faa ɓe na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha rì fe iniri riw bele: ha̰yri ká ɓa gosi ɓáa ɓayri riw bele nda̰w, rɔɔ fe kɔ́kɔri kara riw bele nda̰w pi na.
46001006	Sa̰w ɓay Krisi ká ɓuru tina ha rì na ɓar sa̰w ŋgɔŋ kpay kpay ká sakra ɓaarì
46001007	ká ì kaw í giyaŋ nam Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi káʼa yḭ́i a vi na, ha̰ fe ini mbḭw kara ka puo rì ya.
46001008	Ɓa ɓe na kḭ ze, a haŋa rì ɓar sa̰w ŋgɔŋ kpay kpay kpṵru tḭi ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na, ɓay haŋa ɓo, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara maa ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-rì ɓáy nam ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi a yḭ́i a vi na ya.
46001009	Tusuɛke lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗi rì ɓay haŋa rì zuɔ ziŋ Vi-e Zezu Krisi Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari na, ka ɗo tul ɓay ɓe káʼa waa na.
46001010	Yṵ-iri, mì koɗ rì ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari Zezu Krisi: ì ha̰ law-rì ka maa kḭ mbḭw ha̰ téke ɓil kḭ ka ti sakra ɓaarì ya, í zúɔ ziŋ kḭ ɓáy faa kér ɓay ká mbḭw, í ha̰ nzaa-rì ka maa kḭ.
46001011	Yṵ-iri, mì ɓaa munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ini Koloweri ví ɓaa ha̰ mì mii, rɔɗ kḭ ɗo sakra ɓaarì.
46001012	Ɓay ká mì hii ɓay ɓáa key na, nzoɓ ha̰nɛ ɓaa mii: «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Pol,» nzoɓ kḭ ɓaa mii: «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Apolos,» nzoɓ kḭ ɓoɗ rɔɓay ɓaa mii: «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Piyɛr,» a nzoɓ kḭ rɔɓay ɓaa mii: «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Krisi.»
46001013	Wa̰a, lɛ Krisi na wal sùo-ɛ ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ro lɛ? Ì ɓaa ha̰ mì laa, wa̰a, ɓa ɓi Pol ze i ɓer mì ɗo tul puu say huɗ ɓay tul-rì lɛ? Mase, i ɗáa tul-rì nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ ɓi Pol na lɛ?
46001014	Mì ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì ɗaa tul nzoɓ mbḭw kara nduo mbii ká sakra ɓaarì ku ya, ɓa Krispus ɓáy Gayus huo-ri hɔy ze mì ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii.
46001015	Ɓe ze, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ka ɓaa mii, ɓeri ɗaa tul ɓeri nduo mbii ɓáy riŋ-i na ya.
46001016	Áa, ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, nzoɓ ini Estefanasri kara, mì ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii, ɓieri lɛ, mì ɗaa tul nzoɓ kḭ nduo mbii kara, mì kɔ mbǎa.
46001017	Ɓay ɗáa tul nzoɓri nduo mbii ze Krisi píe mì vi ɓayke ya. Roo lɛ, ka píe mì ha̰ mì ka-káa Ɓay Kere ɓe. A káa ɓayke ku na, mì kaa ɓáy nzaa ráa ɓay, mase ɓáy nun nzɛm nzoɓ ya, ɓay haŋa ɓo hṵrusuo huɗ Krisi ká tul puu say huɗ na, ka ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy ya.
46001018	Tusuɛke lɛ, káa ɓay huɗ Krisi ká tul puu say huɗ na, ɗo ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ ká nun nzoɓri ká i se ɓa faa zaɗ ɓíɛ. Roo lɛ, naari ká náa ɗori faa pam ro na, ɓayke na ɗo ɓa hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46001019	Ì kɔ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓe mii: «Nzoɓri ká i ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛm na, mì ɓíɛ nun nzɛm ɓari na kpukɗu kpukɗu, a nzoɓri ká i ɓa nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔri kara, mì haŋa fe kɔ́kɔ ɓari na ɗo ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy.»
46001020	Zaɗka ɗo munu ku wa̰a, nzoɓ nun nzɛm na a ɓáa mina rɔɓay lɛ woo? A wa̰a, nzoɓ ká kɔ bol kusol ta-taŋ na, a ɓáa mina rɔɓay lɛ woo? Wa̰a, nzoɓ má̰y ɓayri ká tusiri key na, i ɓáa mina rɔɓay lɛ woo? Nun nzɛm nzoɓ tukɛlɛri key na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni ɗo ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ.
46001021	Ì kɔ, ɓáy faa nun nzɛm Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, nzoɓ tukɛlɛri key i maa ɓay tuuka ni ɓáy faa nun nzɛm ɓari na ya. Sa̰wke mini ze, rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay ya̰aŋa nzoɓri ká i ɗaa law-ri ɓo tul-e ɓáy faa káa ɓay ká nzoɓri kɔ ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ hɔy na.
46001022	Ziɓri na, i vbi fe saŋ ze ɓay kɔ́kɔ, a Gɛrɛkri laa lɛ, i nzaa nun nzɛm.
46001023	A naari laa lɛ, náa káari káa Krisi ká i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ. Ɓa fe ká ɗo ɓa ŋguɗ puu téke ɓal Ziɓri, a nzoɓri ká i ɓa Ziɓ ya laa lɛ, i kɔ ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ ká nun-ri.
46001024	Roo lɛ, ɓari ká ɗiw Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗi ri na, i ɓa na Ziɓ, mase i ɓa na Ziɓ ya kara, Krisi na kiɛ hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, a kiɛ nun nzɛm ɓe nda̰w pi.
46001025	Fe ɗáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká nzoɓri kɔ ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ na, nzɛ mba nun nzɛm nzoɓri ká tusiri key, a hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i kɔ ɗo ɗɛk ɗɛk na kara kal tul hṵrusuo nzoɓri ká tusiri key nda̰w.
46001026	Yṵ-iri, ì kér se tul ɗol ɓaarì ká pola ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗíke rì na í kɔ. Ká sakra ɓaarì na, nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ŋgḭi ya, nzoɓ hṵrusuori ŋgḭi ya nda̰w, a nzoɓ luyeri hɔy kara, i ŋgḭi ya nda̰w pi.
46001027	Roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nan ɓari ká nzoɓ tusiriri key kɔ ri ɓa kɔ̀kɔ na ɓay ɗáake sahoy ɓo nun nzoɓ nun nzɛmri; a nan ɓari ká nzoɓ tusiriri key kɔ ri ɓa nzoɓri ká hṵrusuo-ri tiya ɗɛk ɗɛk na, ɓay ɗáake sahoy ɓo tul nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɓáy hṵrusuo;
46001028	a nan ɓari ká nzoɓ tusiriri kɔ ri ɓa fe vbuka ɓo ɓisuy, a í kɔ ri ɓa fe ḭ̌m, rɔɔ í kɔ ri ɓa fe ya na, ɓay haŋa ɓari ká nzoɓri kɔ ri ɓa nzoɓ luye na, i vi ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗo gɔr hɔy.
46001029	Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara maa ɓay ndáka giri sùo-ɛ ká pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya.
46001030	Ɓa ɓe kḭ ze, ka ha rì zuɔ ziŋ Zezu Krisi, a ha̰ náa víri ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri. Ɓáy faa ɓe na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru náake ɓay ká tul naari ha̰ náa ɗori nzɛɗɛm ká nun-ɛ, a tina naari saa ɓil koy feya̰a a ha̰ náa ɗori ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe.
46001031	Ɓe ze, munu ká i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Nzoɓ ká hii ɓay ndáka giri sùo-ɛ lɛ, ka nda giri ɓay tul fe ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa.»
46002001	Yṵ-iri, zaɗka mì se luo-rì ɓay ka-káa tusuɛ Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo zaɗ muni ha rì na, mì ɓaa ɓay ɓáy nzaa ráa ɓay, mase ɓáy nun fe kɔ́kɔ ɓi ya,
46002002	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mì mbi nzaa-i ká ɗi pola hɔy ɓáy ɗol ɓi ká sakra ɓaarì, ɓay ɓáa ɓay se tul nzoɓ mbḭw hɔy ká ɓa Zezu Krisi, ɓe ká i ɓer ni ɗo tul puu say huɗ.
46002003	Ɓi na, zaɗka mì se luo-rì na, hṵrusuo-i tiya ɗɛk ɗɛk, hḭɛ ɗáa mì mí tɔ gbala gbala.
46002004	Fe ká mì fere nzoɓri ɓáy ɓay ká mì ka-káake na, mì ɓaa ɓáy faa gosi ɓayri ɓáy nun nzɛm ɓay kúɔke nzoɓri ya, roo lɛ, ɓa hṵrusuo Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ɗaa ha̰ ɓayke mgba law-rì.
46002005	Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, mbika law ɓaarì na, a ɗoko tul nun nzɛm nzoɓ hɔy ya, roo lɛ, a ɗoko tul hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46002006	A ɓuru na hɔy kara, ɓuru ka-káa ɓay nun nzɛm na ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law. Roo lɛ, ɓa nun nzɛm ká tusiri key ya nda̰w, nun nzɛm nzoɓ hṵrusuori ká i re mbay ká tusiri key, ká í ɗo séke ɓa zaɗ ɓíɛ ya nda̰w pi.
46002007	Nun nzɛm ká ɓuru ka-káake na, ɓa nun nzɛm Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo zaɗ muni kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key ɓáy. Ɓa nun nzɛm ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɗi pola nda̰w rɔɔ tusiri ɗo ɓáy na, ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo ɓa fe riŋ ɗika naari.
46002008	Nun nzɛmke ku na, mbay ká tusiri key káʼa kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke kɔ na, tiya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa fe ká i kɔ sa̰wke kɔ zu lɛ, i ti ɓér Ŋgɛrɛmbay Nzoɓ Riŋ Ɗika Luye na ɗo tul puu say huɗ ya.
46002009	Lɛɛ, feke ɗo munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: Fe ká nun nzoɓ kɔ ya nda̰w, fe ká suku nzoɓ laa ya nda̰w, fe ká nzoɓ ker ɓayke ndḭi mini kara ya nda̰w na, feke na ku ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru leke ɗo ɓay tul nzoɓri ká i hii ni.
46002010	A lɛ, ɓa naari ze Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ nun naari taŋ ká ɗi ɓáy faa Tem ɓe, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Tem na ar sa̰w feri vbaɗ vbaɗ riw bele, ze kér ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo zaɗ muni na hɔy kara, ka kɔ sa̰wke nda̰w.
46002011	A ku na wa̰a, nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ a kɔ́kɔ kér ɓay nzoɓ na lɛ? Nzoɓ mbḭw ti kɔ́kɔ ya; ɓa tem ká ɗo ɓil law nzoɓke na kḭ hɔy ze a kɔ́kɔ. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, kér ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara maa kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke ya; ɓa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ huo-ɛ hɔy ze kɔ.
46002012	Naari na, Tem ká náa ɗǒkeri na ɓa tem nzoɓ tukɛlɛri key ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Tem ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ɓay haŋa ɓo náa kɔ́keri sa̰w feri riw bele ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ naari ɓáy law kere ɓe.
46002013	Ɓe ze, zaɗka ɓuru ɓaa ɓay fe niri key ha̰ nzoɓri na, ɓuru ɓaa ɓáy nun nzɛm nzoɓ ya, roo lɛ, ɓuru ɓaa ɓáy faa feri ká Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru fere ɓuru. Ɓe mini ze, ɓuru tina sa̰w fe tusuɛ taa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ nzoɓri ká i ɗo ɓáy Temke na.
46002014	Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya na, ka maa ɓay ya̰aŋa tusuɛ ɓay ká uru ká luo Temke na ya. Fekeri ku na, nzoɓke kɔ ɓa fe kɔ̀kɔ hɔy ká nun-ɛ, a maa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w rɔɔ, maa ɓay kɔ́kɔ sa̰wke ɓáy.
46002015	Nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ka maa ɓay bɛ́klɛ sa̰w feri riw bele, lɛ, nzoɓ maa ɓay ɓál ni ya.
46002016	I ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Nzoɓ ve ze kɔ kér ɓay Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ? Nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ maa ɓay haŋa ni nzaa ɓoko lɛ?» Roo lɛ, naari na, Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ náa kɔ́ri kér ɓay Krisi.
46003001	Yṵ-iri, tusuɛke lɛ, mì maa ɓay ɓáa ɓay ziŋ rì munu ká nzoɓri ká Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda faa pol-ri na ya, roo lɛ, mì ɓaa ɓay ziŋ rì munu ɓa nzoɓri ká i sṵ ɓáy tul-ri, a í ɓa leɗ tupɛŋri ɓáy faa ɗáa law ɓo tul Krisi.
46003002	Sa̰wke mini ze, fe ká mì fere rì na ɗo faa mbḭw munu ɓa wa̰n ká i ha̰ leɗri a̰w, ɓo ɗo munu ɓa ŋgaw ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hṵrusuo-rì maa ɓay réke ŋgaw ya ɓáy. Ze timbɛɗɛ key kara ì maa ya ɓáy,
46003003	ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓaarì na ì ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓri ká i sṵ ɓáy tul-ri. Ì kɔ, zaɗka ɗáa sere ɓáy rɔɗ kḭ ɗo sakra ɓaarì na wa̰a, ì kiɛ sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓri ká i sṵ ɓáy tul-ri na ya zu lɛ? A ku wa̰a, simseɗ ɓaarì na ɗo munu ɓa simseɗ nzoɓ kɛlɛri na ya lɛ?
46003004	Zaɗka nzoɓ ɓaa mii: «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Pol» mase «Ɓi mì ɓa taa Apolos» na wa̰a, ì ɗaa fe munu ká fe ɗáa nzoɓ kɛlɛri na nda̰w ya lɛ woo?
46003005	Wa̰a, Apolos ɓa ve lɛ? Mase Pol ɓa ve lɛ? Ɓuru na ɓuru ɓa nzoɓ peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ hɔy ká ɗaa ha rì ɗáake law-rì ɓo tul Zezu. Ká sakra ɓuru key na, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ɗaa peɗ ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa zuɔ nduo-ɛ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗaa na.
46003006	Ɓuru na ɓuru ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ payri. Ze ɓi na, mì ru fe zuɔ siri; Apolos laa lɛ, ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa mbii zuɔ ɗi, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ɗaa feke na ha̰ ni tḭi suku.
46003007	Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓ ká ru fe, ɓáy nzoɓ ká ɗaa mbii zuɔ ɗi na ɗaa fe ya, roo lɛ, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kḭ huo-ɛ ze, ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa feke na ha̰ ni tḭi a ŋgɔŋ.
46003008	Nzoɓ ká ru fe ɓáy nzoɓ ká ɗaa mbii zuɔ tul fe ruka na, i maa kḭ mbḭw hɔy. Nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa ni fe tunduo ɓe maa ɓáy peɗ ɓe káʼa ɗaa.
46003009	Ì kɔ, ɓuru na ɓuru ɓa bǎw peɗ ká ɓil peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, a ɓaarì laa lɛ, ì ɗo munu ɓa wáa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ɓaarì na ì ɗo munu ɓa hul ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mbuo.
46003010	Ɓáy faa law kere ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ziŋ mì na, mì ɗáake peɗ munu ɓa nzoɓ mbúo hul ká kɔ gosike ɓáy kere, a mí ɗáake tigba̰a hul na ɓáy zaɗɛ. A timbɛɗɛ key lɛ, nzoɓ kḭ ro ura hul na ɗo tul-e. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara, ka nzɛ ɓáy sùo-ɛ ɓay tul gosi úra hul na ku nda̰w rɔ!
46003011	A ɓay ká se tul tigba̰a hul na, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti ɗáa tigba̰a hul kḭ nde tul-e taa pola na mbǎa, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ Zezu Krisi ɗo ɓa tigba̰a hulke na ɗɔɗ ro.
46003012	Ì kɔ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛri mbuo hul ɗo tul tigba̰a hulke na ku ɓáy lari pie, mase lari sḭ́ɛ, mase ɓáy tisaw ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba. A nzoɓ ha̰nɛri laa lɛ, i mbuo hul na ɓáy puu, mase ɓáy bum suy, mase suy.
46003013	Roo lɛ, nam kúŋ sal ɓay na, kḭri peɗ nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara, a tína sùo-ɛ ɗo zaɗ hie gbay gbay, ɓay ḭi lɛ, síeke ku na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a líe peɗke na ɓáy huu.
46003014	Zaɗka nzoɓ mbuo hul ɗo tigba̰a hul ká huu sṵ tul-e ya na lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa fe tunduo ha̰ nzoɓke na ku.
46003015	A zaɗka hulke ku na huu sṵ tul-e laa lɛ, nzoɓke ti zíŋ fe tunduo ɓe na ya. Ɓe na, a ya̰aŋa sùo-ɛ, roo lɛ, a ɗoko faa mbḭw munu ɓa nzoɓ ká tḭi saa ɓil huu soli.
46003016	Ɓaarì na ì kɔ ta-taŋ mii, ì ɓa hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, ze Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɓil law-rì na wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ?
46003017	A ze ɓo, zaɗka nzoɓ ɓiɛ hul ka̰nike na lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓíɛ nzoɓke, ɓay ḭi lɛ, hul ka̰nike na ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe. Ɓa ɓaarì na kḭ ze ì ɓa hul ka̰ni ɓe.
46003018	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ka úla sùo-ɛ ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ ya! Zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì kɔ sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛm ká tusiri key lɛ, ka ɗaa sùo-ɛ ka ɓa kɔ̀kɔ nzoɓ nda̰w rɔɔ, a vi ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛm taa tusuɛke na ɓáy,
46003019	ɓay ḭi lɛ, nun nzɛm nzoɓ tusiriri key na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kɔ ɓa kɔ̀kɔ ká nun-ɛ. Ì kɔ, i ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ká tusiri key na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru fɛrɛ ɗáa law ɓari na ɓa ndaw taka ri.»
46003020	I ɓaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe na rɔɓay mii: «Ŋgɛrɛmbay na kɔ kér ɓay nzoɓ nun nzɛmri na kɔ; ka kɔ ɓa fe ká gɔr hɔy.»
46003021	Ɓe mini ze, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara, ka nda giri sùo-ɛ ɓay tul nzoɓ hɔy ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, feri riw bele na ɓa taa ɓaarì.
46003022	Ze ɓa na ɓi Pol, mase Apolos, mase Piyɛr, mase tusiri key, mase káw ɓáy kumnun, mase huɗ, mase feri ká timbɛɗɛ key, mase feri káʼa ví vuku hɔy kara, riw bele na ɓa taa ɓaarì;
46003023	a roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì ɓa taa Krisi, a Krisi na laa lɛ, ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46004001	Ɓe mini ze, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa rì kɔ ɓúru Apolos ɓa nzoɓ peɗ Krisi. Ɓuru na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa tusuɛ ɓay ɓe ká ɗo zaɗ muni na zuɔ nduo ɓuru, ɓay haŋa ɓuru fére ri.
46004002	Fe ká ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri ɓay haŋa nzoɓ peɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ka ɗaa na, ɓa ɗáa peɗ ɓáy zaɗɛ nzɛɗɛm.
46004003	A ɓi na lɛ, ze ɓa na ɓaarì, mase nzoɓri ká tusiri key hɔy ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-i kara, mì kɔ ɓa fe mbḭw ya. Ɓi kḭ sùo-i kara mì ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-i ya nda̰w.
46004004	Ká ɓil wa̰ra law-i na, mì kɔ fe mbḭw ká ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-i ya, ɓe nu ku hɔy kiɛ a ɓaa mii, ɓay ti tul-i ya na munu ya. Nzoɓ káʼa ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-i na, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
46004005	Ɓe mini ze, pola nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓay haŋa nam kúŋ sal ɓay ka vi na, ì ɗaa ɓay mbḭw ka ɓo tul nzoɓ ká tul peɗ ɓe ya. A roo lɛ, ì giyaŋ ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ka vi nda̰w rɔ! Ɓe na, feri ká mṵu sùo-ri ká ɓil suŋ tilo na, a tína ri ɗo zaɗ hie gbay gbay, rɔɔ kér ɓay ká nzoɓri mṵu ɗo ɓil law-ri na kara, a tína vbaɗ vbaɗ ɗo zaɗ hie nda̰w pi. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a kara Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a písi ni ɓay tul fe ɗáa ɓe na ɓáy.
46004006	Yṵ-iri, mì mbi fe líe kḭri mí ɓǎake ɓay se tul ɓúru Apolos ɓay haŋa rì kɔ́ke má̰ra sim ɓay ɓáa nzoɓri na ta-taŋ: «Ì ha̰ fe ɗáa ɓaarì ka maa ɓáy zaɗ ɓay ká i vbie ɗo mbeɗe na ɓo, i ha̰ ni ka kál zaɗɛ ya.» Ɓe ze, nzoɓ mbḭw mini ká sakra ɓaarì ka nda giri sùo-ɛ, a ɗǒke fal ŋgaŋ nzoɓ a sḭ̌irike nzoɓ ha̰w ya.
46004007	A ɓo na wa̰a, a ve nda̰w rɔɔ ha̰ mù kɔ sùo-ɔ ɓa nzoɓ ká ɓamba mba nzoɓ ha̰wri lɛ woo? Feri ká mù ɗǒke na wa̰a, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze ha̰ mù riw bele ku ya lɛ? Zaɗka ɗo munu na wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, mù nda giri sùo-ɔ ɓay tul fe ká mù ɗǒke na, rìi fe ká ɓa fe ini ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya lɛ?
46004008	Ɓaarì na kara ì ɓaa mii, feri ká ì se síeke ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, ì ziŋ maa rì siɓ siɓ ro! Ɓaarì na, ì ɗi sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ feziŋari ká ɓil Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ro! Ɓaarì na, ì kɔ sùo-rì ɓa mbayri ro! A ɓuru mǎa ɓuru ti ɓil-e mbǎa ro ya lo! Ɓi na lɛ, mì rɛ sùo-i ɓay haŋa rì ɓa mbayri na kḭ ɓay haŋa ɓuru hɔy kara, ɓuru re mbay na ka ziŋ rì nda̰w!
46004009	A roo lɛ, ɓi na, mì kɔ lɛ, rìi fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓuru nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗri na ɗo ɔ́rɔ fal. Ɓuru na ɓuru ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ɓay huɗ ɓo tul-ri ká nun ruɔ nzoɓri; ɓuru ɗo ɓa fe kɔ́m nzoɓri riw bele: leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓri ká tusiri key kara nda̰w pi.
46004010	Ɓuru na i kɔ ɓuru ɓa mbúo ɓay tul Krisi, roo lɛ, ɓaarì na ì kɔ sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri ká ɓil Krisi. Ɓuru na i kɔ ɓuru ɓa nzoɓri ká hṵrusuo ɓuru tiya ɗɛk ɗɛk, a ɓaarì laa lɛ, ì kɔ sùo-rì ɓa nzoɓ hṵrusuori. Ɓuru na i ḭ̌m ɓuru, a ɓaarì mǎa, i ɗaa mbay ɓo tul-rì!
46004011	Ze kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key hɔy kara, ɓuru kɔ sɛkɛ fe kɔn nda̰w, kɔn mbii nda̰w, rɔɔ gari kara puo ɓuru nda̰w pi. I ndaka ɓuru nda̰w, a ɓúru reke ɓa puolu puolu nda̰w pi.
46004012	Ɓuru na ɓuru ɗaa peɗ ɓúru ta̰a ká ɗi pɔɗɔ pɔɗɔ nda̰w rɔɔ, ɓúru zǐŋke fe ká ɓay hɔ́lke sùo ɓuru ɓáy. Zaɗka nzoɓri raɗ ɓuru lɛ, ɓuru sa̰m fe ze zuɔ tul-ri; zaɗka i ɗaa nun ɓuru tuɔ síe lɛ, ɓuru sṵu law ɓuru ká ɗi.
46004013	Zaɗka i ra̰a ɓuru lɛ, ɓuru yḭiŋra ɓáy ɓay huoke ze ha ri. Kpṵru tḭi timbɛɗɛ key na kara, i kɔ ɓuru ɗo munu ɓa tumḭiri kiɗa nda̰w, a í kɔ ɓuru ɓa mḭ́iri hɔy nda̰w pi.
46004014	Mì ɗaa mbeɗe key na ha rì ɓay ɗáake sahoy ɓo nun-rì ya, roo lɛ, ɓay ɓókoke ɓaarì ká ì ɗo munu ɓa vu-iri ká mì kɔ rì ɓa nzoɓ nun-i.
46004015	Ì kɔ, ze nzoɓri ká i fere rì fe se tul Krisi na, i ruɔ na ɓamba tasiri hɔy kara, bǎa ɓaarì na mbḭw hɔy. Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓa ɓi ze mì ɓa bǎa ɓaarì ɓáy faa káa Ɓay Kere ká mì kaa ha rì ɗáake law-rì ɓo tul Krisi.
46004016	Munu zu lɛ, mì koɗ rì ɓay haŋa rì mbóro fe ɗáa ɓi.
46004017	Sa̰wke mini ze, mì píeke vu-i Timote ká mì kɔ ni ɓa nzoɓ nun-i, ká fe ɗáa ɓe ɗo ɓáy zaɗɛ ká ɓil peɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay na. Ɓe na, a vǎa túma law-rì ká tul simseɗ ɓi ká ɓil Krisi, munu ká mì fere nzoɓ mbika lawri ɓáy zaɗri riw bele.
46004018	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓaarì ku na, i sìi sùo-ri í ker í ɓaa mii, mì ti séke luo-rì ɓay vǎa kɔ́kɔ rì mbǎa.
46004019	Roo lɛ, zaɗka law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru hii lɛ, ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì séke luo-rì vǎw. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, mì kɔ́kɔ ɓari nzoɓ siika sùori na ku ɓáy. Mì kɔ́kɔ ri ɓáy faa ɓay ɓáa ɓari na ku hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ɓáy faa fe ɗáa ɓari káʼa kíɛ hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká i ɗǒke na nda̰w rɔ!
46004020	Ì kɔ, nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri na, ɓa nzoɓri ká simseɗ ɓari kiɛ hṵrusuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo, ɓa nzoɓri ká i ɓaa ɓa ɓay hɔy ya.
46004021	A wa̰a, fe ḭi ze law-rì mgba ɗi lɛ? Ì hii ɓay haŋa mì se luo-rì ɓáy ndoy, mase law ini ɓáy law huoke lɛ?
46005001	Mì te suk-i lɛ, mì laa ɓayri ká nzoɓri ɓaa ya̰a ya̰a se tul-rì mii, fe ɗáa sahoy ɗo sakra ɓaarì. Mì laa mii, nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì ku naa ziŋ má̰y bi-ɛ a ɗo ɗi ɗíki. Ɓa fe ɗáa ká nzoɓri ká i tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya hɔy kara, i maa ɓay ɗáa ya!
46005002	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ì nda giri sùo-rì ká ɗi kɛlɛ! Ɓa fe ká ì ɗáa síe ká ɗi, a í naa nzoɓ fe ɗáa sahoy ká munu ku na ká sakra ɓaarì ɓa fal. Wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya wṵ̌m lɛ woo?
46005003	-
46005004	A ɓi lɛ, ze mì ɗo sakra ɓaarì ya hɔy kara, ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie na, mì ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓke na ɗɔɗ ro ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu, rìi fe ká mì ɗo ziŋ rì mbḭw hɔy. Ì mbṵ kḭ ɓáy riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari ha̰ hṵrusuo-ɛ ka ɗo ziŋ rì. Ɓi hɔy kara mì zúɔ ziŋ rì ɓáy faa Tem Law Pie,
46005005	a ɓo, í naa nzoɓke ku na ká sakra nzoɓ mbika lawri, a í pɔ́ŋ ni ɓo nduo Satan ɓay haŋa fe kɔn naysuo ká ɗo sùo-ɛ na ka ɓíɛ, a ha̰ tem sùo-ɛ ka zíŋ pam ɓáy nam ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay a yḭ́i a vi.
46005006	A ku wa̰a, fe ndáka giri sùo ɓa ḭi ɓáy lɛ woo? Ì kɔ, sim ɓay ɓáa nzoɓri ká mii: «Fe hew fe ká ndḭi munu hɔy i zukrike sṵm fe lɛ, ɗaa ha̰ sṵm na hew riw bele a ɗo hoɗoro» na wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ woo?
46005007	Munu zu lɛ, ì naa fe hew fe ká ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ya̰a na ká sakra ɓaarì ɓa fal, ɓay haŋa ɓo ì vi ɓa nzoɓri ká ì taŋ kaɗ kaɗ. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, ì ɗoko ɓa sṵm fe fie ká fe hew fe ti ɗi mbǎa na ɓáy. Ká ɓa tusuɛ lɛ, ì taŋ kaɗ kaɗ kḭ ro, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Krisi na i i ni ɓa vuy fe poy ká tina naari saa ɓil koy feya̰a.
46005008	Ɓe mini ze, náa ɗáari suoriya tḭ́i saa ɓil koy feya̰a na ɓáy ŋgaw ká fe hew fe ká ɓa ɗáa law, ɓáy law mgbɔrɔ ti ɗi ya na. Roo lɛ, náa ɗáari suoriya ɓáy law ká taŋ kaɗ kaɗ ɓáy tusuɛ ɓay.
46005009	Ká ɓil mbeɗe ká mì ɗaa ha rì pola na, mì ɓaa ha rì mii, ì mgba bǎw ka zíŋ nzoɓ ɗáa nun pieri ya.
46005010	Roo lɛ, mì hii ɓay ɓáa ɓay se tul nzoɓri riw bele ká i ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa nun pieri, mase nzoɓ riiɓari, mase nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ nun feri, mase nzoɓ púo wṵruri ká tusiri key ya. Munu zu lɛ, ká ɓay yá̰m ri na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa rì káw tusiri key mbǎa.
46005011	Tusuɛke lɛ, mì hii ɓay ɓáa ha rì mii: nzoɓ ká ɗi sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ mbika law, rɔɔ a ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa nun pie nda̰w, mase nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ nun fe nda̰w, mase nzoɓ púo wṵruri nda̰w, mase nzoɓ tḭ́iri nzoɓri nda̰w, mase nzoɓ buo him nda̰w, mase koŋ riiɓa na, ì mgba bǎw ka ziŋ ni ya. Nzoɓ ká munu ku na, fe sṵm hɔy kara ì sáŋ sṵ́ŋake ziŋ ni.
46005012	Ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓri ká i kɔ Zezu ya na wa̰a, ɓa peɗ ɓi lɛ woo? Ṵ́-uu, ɓa peɗ ɓi ya. Wa̰a, ɓa peɗ ɓaarì nzoɓ mbika lawri ká ɓay ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ taa ɓaarì ká i mbṵ tul kḭ na ya lɛ woo?
46005013	Ɓaarì na kḭ ze, ì naa nzoɓ law mgbɔrɔ na ká sakra ɓaarì ɓa fal munu ká mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa na. A ɓari nzoɓri ká i kɔ Zezu ya na, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze a ɗáa ɓay ɓo tul-ri.
46006001	Zaɗka nzoɓ mbḭw ká sakra ɓaarì ɗo ɓáy ɓay ziŋ yṵ-ɛ na wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ì pɔŋ ɗáa ɓayke ká pol nzoɓ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri, a í séke ni pol nzoɓ kúŋ sal ɓayri ká i kɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya hɔy ha ri ɗaa ɓayke na lɛ woo?
46006002	Ì kɔ ku na wa̰a, nzoɓ Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri ti kúŋ sal ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓri ká tusiri key ya lɛ woo? A zaɗka ì kúŋ sal ɓay ɓo tul nzoɓ tusiriri na wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ì maa ɓay kúŋ sal ɓay ká tul vu feri ká ndḭ-ndḭi mini ya lɛ?
46006003	Ì kɔ ku na wa̰a, náa kúŋri sal ɓay ɓo tul leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue nda̰w ya lɛ woo? A munu ku wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ náa maari ɓay kúŋ sal ɓay ɓo tul fe niri key ya lɛ?
46006004	Zaɗka ì ɗo ɓáy ɓayri ká munu ziŋ kḭ na wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ ì se ɓáy ɓay ɓaarì na ká pol nzoɓ kɛlɛri ká nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ kɔ ri ɓa fe ya na, ha ri kuŋ sal ɓay ɓaarì na lɛ?
46006005	Mì ɓaa munu ɓay haŋa sahoy ka sɛ rì. Wa̰a, ká sakra ɓaarì ku na, nzoɓ mbḭw mini ká ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛm ká maa ɓay léke ɓay ɓaarì key na tiya kḭ wṵ̌m lɛ?
46006006	Wa̰a, ɓa fe kere kḭ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ mbi tul yṵ-ɛ, rɔɔ a séke ni zaɗ fɔ́ŋ ɓay ká pol nzoɓri ká i kɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya na ha ri ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-e lɛ woo?
46006007	Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, ɓay ká ɗo sakra ɓaarì ká ɗaa ha ri séke kpṵru se zaɗ fɔŋ ɓay na, kiɛ leɗi ɓaarì ro. Ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ, ì iki law-rì ká tul fe ka̰aya ká i ɗaa ziŋ rì na ya lɛ? Wa̰a, ɓay ḭi nda̰w rɔɔ ì iki law-rì ká tul nzoɓ fe ɗáa rɔɗ rɔɗri na ya lɛ?
46006008	Ɓa ɓaarì kḭ hɔy ro ze, ì yḭ̀i í ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa ka̰ayari, í ɓa nzoɓ fe ɗáa rɔɗ rɔɗri na, a í ɗaa fekeri ku na ziŋ yṵ ɓaarì!
46006009	Ì kɔ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa munuri ku na, ɓa nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri ya. Wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ woo? Ì úla sùo-rì ya! Nzoɓ ɗáa nun pieri nda̰w, nzoɓ púo wṵruri nda̰w, nzoɓ nzaa má̰y kḭri nda̰w, nzoɓ fɛ́rɛ sùo ɓa má̰yri nda̰w, wa̰rari ká i fɛrɛ í naa ziŋ kḭ nda̰w,
46006010	nzoɓ riiɓari nda̰w, nzoɓ kɔ́kɔ nun feri nda̰w, nzoɓ buo himri nda̰w, nzoɓ tḭ́iri nzoɓri nda̰w, rɔɔ ɓáy nzoɓ ya̰aŋa fe ɓáy hṵrusuori nda̰w na, ɓa nzoɓri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru re mbay ká tul-ri ya.
46006011	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓaarì hɔy kara, pola na i ɗo munu nda̰w. Roo lɛ, timbɛɗɛ key na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru wàa feya̰a ɓaarì kaɗ kaɗ, a náa rì ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe, a naa ɓay ká tul-rì ɓáy faa riŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu Krisi, ɓáy faa Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru naari na nda̰w.
46006012	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓaarì ɓaa mii: «Feri riw bele na faake ɗo hɔy ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa.» Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, roo lɛ, feri riw bele na ɓa fe sɔ́kɔ nzoɓ ya. Ɓi hɔy kara, mì maa ɓay ɓáa mii: «Feri riw bele na faake ɗo hɔy ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa.» Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, roo lɛ, mì ti ɗáa sùo-i ɓa koy ɓay tul fe mbḭw ya.
46006013	I ɓaa nda̰w mii: «Fe sṵm ɗo ɓay tul ɓil, ze ɓil kara ɗo ɓay tul fe sṵm.» Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓíɛ ri siɗi bele. Sùo nzoɓ na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa ɓay tul nun pie ya. Sùo nzoɓ na ɗo ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay, a Ŋgɛrɛmbay laa lɛ, ɗo ɓay tul sùo nzoɓ.
46006014	Munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru tina Ŋgɛrɛmbay saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ ni kaw ɓáy kumnun na, a tína naari kara nda̰w saa luɔ huɗ ha̰ náa káwri ɓáy kumnun ɓáy faa hṵrusuo-ɛ.
46006015	Ì kɔ nda̰w, sùo-rì na ɗo ɓa nzaa váw sùo Krisi. A munu ku wa̰a, mì mbika nzaa váw sùo Krisi na ɓay vǎa zúɔke ziŋ má̰y ɗáa nun pie na lɛ woo? Ṵ́-uu, munu ya mgbaŋ!
46006016	Mase, nzoɓ ká zuɔ ziŋ má̰y ɗáa nun pie na, ɓáy kḭ í vi ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw hɔy na wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ? I ɗaa ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w mii: «Ɓari ká siɗi bele reɓ na, i ví ɓa nzoɓ ká mbḭw.»
46006017	Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓ ká zuɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, tem ɓari zuɔ kḭ mbḭw hɔy.
46006018	Fe ká ɓa nun pie na ì ɗúu ɗi ɗi. Fe ɗáa ya̰a ha̰wri riw bele ká nzoɓ ɗaa na, ɗo sùo-ɛ kɛlɛ key hɔy. Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká pɔŋ sùo-ɛ a ɓa nzoɓ ɗáa nun pie na, ka ɗaa feya̰a a ɓǐɛke naysuo-ɛ ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ.
46006019	Sùo-rì na ɓa hul káw Tem Law Pie. Temke ku na Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni ɗaa puo ká ɓil law-rì. Wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ? Ɓaarì na ì ɗo ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓo, ì ɗo ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-rì ya,
46006020	ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru puo bawda mbɔl ká ɓa hḭɛ zikiki ká tul-rì. Munu zu lɛ, ì mbi sùo-rì í ɗáake riŋ ɗika ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46007001	Timbɛɗɛ key na, mì ɓáa ɓay se tul vbiw ɓaarì ká ì ɗáake mbeɗe ha̰ mì na. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay ya̰aŋa kḭ ya.
46007002	Zaɗɛ kḭ zu, roo lɛ, ɓay haŋa nun pie ka ya̰a zaɗ ya lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa wa̰ra nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka ɗo ɓáy má̰y ɓe, ze má̰y nzoɓ hɔy kara ka ɗo ɓáy wa̰ra ká ɗo ɓay tul-e nda̰w.
46007003	Wa̰ra nzoɓ na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ sùo-ɛ ha̰ má̰y ɓe, ze má̰y nzoɓ hɔy kara, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ sùo-ɛ ha̰ wa̰ra munu na nda̰w pi.
46007004	Má̰y nzoɓ na ti ɗáa fe ká law-ɛ hii ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ ya: sùo má̰y nzoɓ na ɗo ɓay tul wa̰ra, ze wa̰ra nzoɓ hɔy kara ti ɗáa fe ká law-ɛ hii ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ ya nda̰w pi. Sùo wa̰ra nzoɓ na ɗo ɓa taa má̰y ɓe.
46007005	Ì ɓéɗ kḭ sùo-rì ya. Zaɗka ì hii ɓay ɗáa munu ɓay sáŋke sùo-rì ɓay ɗáake nzaa ɓay kere lɛ, ì ha̰ law-rì ka maa kḭ ká ɗi pola nda̰w rɔ! Falɛ roo lɛ, ì yḭ̀i, í naa ziŋ kḭ na ɓáy, ɓo munu ya lɛ, kɔn naaŋa ziŋ kḭ ká ɗáa rì ká ì mgba sùo-rì ká ɗi ya na, a ɗáa ha rì líeke ɓo ɓil ndaw Satan.
46007006	Ɓay ni ká mì ɓaa ha rì key na, ɓa nzaa-i ze mì mbi ha rì ya, roo lɛ, ɓa nzaa ɓoko ze mì ha rì.
46007007	Tusuɛke lɛ, mì hii ɓay haŋa nzoɓri riw bele i káw huo-ri munu ká ɓi key, roo lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ɗo ɓáy fe ini ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni. Nzoɓ ni ɗo ɓáy fe ini ɗáa fe key, a nzoɓ nu laa lɛ, ɗo ɓáy fe ini ɗáa fe kew laa.
46007008	A ɓari ká má̰y ɓari tiya, ɓáy má̰y pileri na, mì ɓaa ha ri mii, kereke lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri kaw munu huo-ri ɓaŋguɔ munu ká ɓi key nda̰w.
46007009	Roo lɛ, zaɗka i maa ɓay mgbaka sùo-ri ya lɛ, i nzaa nzoɓ í ya̰a. Ì kɔ, kereke lɛ, ya̰aŋa kḭ na ndaɗ mba haŋa mgbá̰y ka sɛ rì a kál tul-rì.
46007010	A ɓari nzoɓ ya̰aŋa kḭri na laa lɛ, mì mbi nzaa-i mini key ha ri. Ɓa ɓi huo-i hɔy ze mì mbi nzaa-i na ya, roo lɛ, uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛmbay: má̰y nzoɓ na ɗo nun haŋa ni ka tḭi ká hul wa̰ra ya.
46007011	A ze ɓo, ka tḭi ká hul wa̰ra na laa lɛ, ka ya̰a wa̰ra kḭ ya, mase ka yḭ̀i a zúɔ ziŋ waa ɓe na. A wa̰ra nzoɓ laa lɛ, ka ti nii má̰y ɓe ya nda̰w.
46007012	Ɓari ɓieri laa lɛ, ɓay ká mì ɓáa key na, ɓa ɓi ze mì ɓáa ɓo, ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ya. Zaɗka wa̰ra nzoɓ ɓa nzoɓ mbika law, a ɗo ɓáy má̰y ká mbi law-ɛ ya, rɔɔ má̰y na hii ɓay káw ziŋ ni ɓaŋguɔ lɛ, wa̰ra na ti nii ni ya.
46007013	Ze ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, zaɗka má̰y nzoɓ ɓa nzoɓ mbika law, a ɗo ɓáy wa̰ra ká mbi law-ɛ ya, rɔɔ wa̰ra na hii ɓay káw ziŋ ni ɓaŋguɔ lɛ, má̰y na ti pɔ́ŋ waa ɓe na ya.
46007014	Tusuɛke lɛ, wa̰ra nzoɓ ká mbi law-ɛ ya na, taambɔl má̰y ɓe ká mbi law-ɛ na ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗáake ni ɗo ɓoɗ. A ze, má̰y nzoɓ ká mbi law-ɛ ya hɔy kara, taambɔl waa ɓe ká mbi law-ɛ na ze, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗáake ni ɗo ɓoɗ. Ze vu ɓari hɔy kara, i ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, i ɗo munu ɓa vu nzoɓri ka i mbi law-ri ya na ya.
46007015	A ze ɓo, zaɗka nzoɓ ɓa nzoɓ mbika law ya, rɔɔ a hii ɓay pɔ́ŋ má̰y ɓe mase waa ɓe lɛ, pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ ni ka ɗaa munu. Ha̰y ká munu ku na, nzoɓ mbika law ká ɓa má̰y nzoɓ, mase wa̰ra nzoɓ hɔy ɗaa munu kara, ɓay ti tul-e ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗí rì ɓay haŋa rì kaw ɗɛkɛkɛ ziŋ kḭ.
46007016	A ze, ɓo má̰y nzoɓ ká mù ɓa nzoɓ mbika law na, kɔ ya lɛ mù ɗáa ha̰ waa ɓo suo kér ɓay ɓe ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya̰a ni lɛ, mù kɔ-kɔ lɛ woo? Mase, ɓo wa̰ra nzoɓ ká mù ɓa nzoɓ mbika law na wa̰a, kɔ ya lɛ, mù ɗáa ha̰ má̰y ɓo suo kér ɓay ɓe ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya̰a ni lɛ, mù kɔ-kɔ lɛ woo?
46007017	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a hɔy kara, ka se simseɗ munu ɓaŋguɔ ɓáy hṵrusuo ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ha̰ ni maa ɓáy zaɗ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗíke ni na. Ɓe ze, ɓa bol kusol ká mì ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká zaɗri riw bele.
46007018	Zaɗka nzoɓ kuŋ ŋgori ɗɔɗ, rɔɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗi ni lɛ, ka ti bumra bol kol nṵɔ ŋgori na ya. A zaɗka nzoɓ kuŋ ŋgori ya, rɔɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗi ni lɛ, ka ti kúŋ ŋgori na ya.
46007019	Kúŋ ŋgori, mase kúŋ ŋgori ya hɔy kara, ɗaa fe mbḭw ya. Fe ká ndaɗ ɓamba lɛ, ɓa hḭ́ɛ bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46007020	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka káw zaɗ káʼa ɗo ɗi pola rɔɔ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗi ni ɓáy na.
46007021	Zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗí mù na wa̰a, mù ɓa koy lɛ? Mu kér ɓay ka se ɗi ya, roo lɛ, zaɗka faa ɗo ɗi ɓay haŋa mù kaw ɓáy tul-a lɛ, nda-ndaɗ, mu ɗaa.
46007022	Mì ɓaa munu, ɓay ḭi lɛ, koy ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗi ni na, ka kaw ɓáy tul-e ɓay ɗáa fe ká rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, nzoɓ ká kaw ɓáy tul-e ká Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗi ni na, ka vi ɓa koy taa Krisi.
46007023	Ɓaarì na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru puo mbɔl ká ŋgɔŋ ɓamba tasiri ká tul-rì ha rì vi ɓa nzoɓ taa ɓe. Munu zu lɛ, ì ti ɗáa koy tá̰w feri ká ì ɗaa ká pola na mbǎa.
46007024	Yṵ-iri, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka káw pol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy zaɗ káʼa ɗo ɗi pola nda̰w rɔɔ, ka ɗíke ni na.
46007025	Ɓay ká se tul leɗ kubanri ɓáy leɗ má̰y tikɗiri na, ɓa bol nzaa Ŋgɛrɛmbay ze mì ha rì ya, roo lɛ, fe ká mì ker kḭ hɔy ze mì ɓaa ha rì. A munu ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa law kere ziŋ mì na, mì ɓa nzoɓ ká maa ɓay haŋa rì ɗaa law-rì ɓo tul-i.
46007026	Ɓay kɔ́kɔ síe ká náa ɗori ɓil-e timbɛɗɛ key na, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ka káw zaɗ káʼa ɗo ɗi na.
46007027	Wa̰a, mù ya̰a má̰y ro lɛ? Munu zu lɛ, mu naa sùo-ɔ ká ɗi ya. Wa̰a, mù mbi sùo-ɔ ɓay ya̰aŋa má̰y ya ɓáy lɛ? Munu zu lɛ, mu nzaa faa ya̰aŋa má̰y na ya,
46007028	roo lɛ, zaɗka mù ya̰a má̰y na, mù ɗaa feya̰a ya. Ze, leɗ má̰y tikɗi hɔy ya̰a wa̰ra kara, ka ɗaa feya̰a ya nda̰w. A roo lɛ, ɓari nzoɓ ya̰aŋa kḭri na, i kɔ́kɔ sɛkɛ fe ká tusiri key. Ɓa fe ká mì hii ɓay haŋa ni ka tḭi tul-rì ya.
46007029	Yṵ-iri, ì kɔ, fe ká mì hii ɓay ɓáa ha rì na ze ɗo key: nam tɔ̀ŋ deɓ hɔy ro. Munu zu lɛ, tii sa̰wke vuri key na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa wa̰rari ká i ɗo ɓáy má̰y na, i ha̰ kér ɓay ɓari ka ɗo tul má̰y ɓari na ɓaŋguɔ hɔy ya nda̰w,
46007030	a ɓari nzoɓri ká i rɛ ɓáy mbii nun-ri mgboɓo mgboɓo na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri rɛ ɓa rɛw hɔy ɓaŋguɔ ya nda̰w, ɓari nzoɓri ká i kaw ɓáy siɛm na, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ri ha̰ kér ɓay ɓari ka ɗo tul káw ɓil suoriya hɔy ɓaŋguɔ ya nda̰w, a ɓari nzoɓri ká i ɓa nzoɓ híe feri na, i kér se tul feri ká i hie, a í ɗǒke hɔy ya nda̰w,
46007031	nzoɓri ká i dam fe kereri ká tusiri key na, i ha̰ kér ɓay ɓari ka ɗo tul fekeri na ku hɔy ɓaŋguɔ ya nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, tusiri ká ɗo key na, a kál hɔ̰́n ɓáy fekeri.
46007032	Mì hii ɓay haŋa rì kaw ɓáy kér ɓay ya. Nzoɓ ká ya̰a má̰y ya na, peɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ze mgba law-ɛ, a mbi sùo-ɛ a nzaa faa ɓay ndáɗ ká nun-ɛ.
46007033	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓáy má̰y na, mbi sùo-ɛ ɓo ɓil fe tusiri a nzaa faa ɓay ndáɗ ká nun má̰y ɓe,
46007034	ze law-ɛ waa siɗi. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, má̰y fal kpaŋ, mase leɗ má̰y tikɗi na mbi sùo-ɛ ɓo ɓil peɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay. Ɓe na, ka nzaa faa a mbi sùo-ɛ ɓáy zaɗɛ ŋgiɗ bele ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay na. Má̰y ká ɗo ɓáy wa̰ra na ka mbi sùo-ɛ ɓo ɓil fe tusiri, a nzaa faa ndáɗ ka nun wa̰ra.
46007035	Ɓay ni ká mì ɓaa key na, mì ɓaa ɓa ndaɗi ɓaarì ɓo, mì hula ɓa ndaw ze ha rì ya. Ze i ya̰a kḭ, mase i kaw buɔ hɔy kara, mì hii ɓay haŋa ri se simseɗ ká ɓáy faake, a í mbi sùo-ri ɓáy zaɗɛ riw bele ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
46007036	Náa ɓaarì ɓay se tul leɗ kuban ɓáy leɗ má̰y tikɗi ká i mgba mbana ziŋ kḭ, rɔɔ í yḭ̀i í mbi nzaa-ri ɓay pɔ́ŋ kḭ na. Zaɗka leɗ kuban ker mii, ɓeri ɗaa fe ɓáy zaɗɛ ya ziŋ má̰y mbana ɓeri, rɔɔ kɔn ya̰aŋa ni ɗaa ni ɓaŋguɔ lɛ, i ya̰a kḭ munu ká i ker na; ɓe leɗ kubanke na, ka ɗaa feya̰a ya.
46007037	Roo lɛ, zaɗka ɓa leɗ kubanke na ze, mbi nzi-ɛ ká ɓil law-ɛ ɓay káw taŋ má̰y, rɔɔ nzoɓ suru ni ká ɗi ɓáy hṵrusuo ɓay haŋa ni ka ya̰a má̰y ya na ya lɛ, ka ɗaa ɓáy kere zu.
46007038	Munu zu lɛ, leɗ kuban ká ya̰a má̰y mbana ɓe na, ka ɗaa nda-ndaɗ, a roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká kaw taŋ má̰y na, ka ɗaa fe ndaɗ ɓamba tasiri.
46007039	Má̰y ká ya̰a wa̰ra ká wa̰ra kaw ɓáy kumnun ɓáy na, ka káw ziŋ ni ɓaŋguɔ, a zaɗka wa̰ra na hu ro lɛ, faa ɓe ɗo hɔy ɓay haŋa ni ka ya̰a wa̰ra ká law-ɛ hii. Roo lɛ, wa̰rake ku na ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɓa nzoɓ mbika law.
46007040	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, zaɗkaʼa kaw taŋ wa̰ra lɛ, a káw ɓáy suoriya mba káw ɓáy wa̰ra. Ɓe ze ɓa kér ɓay ɓi, a mí kɔ lɛ, Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ziŋ mì.
46008001	Timbɛɗɛ key na, náa kɔkɔri fal vbiw ɓaarì ká ì vbi se tul náyri ká i púoke fe ha̰ wṵruri na. Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, naari na, náa ɓári nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔri riw bele munu ká ì ɓaa na. Roo lɛ, fe kɔ́kɔke ku na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ sǐike sùo-ɛ, a law ini na lɛ, ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ ŋgɔ́ŋke ká ɓil mbika law ɓe ɓa pola pola.
46008002	Nzoɓ ká ɗaa sùo-ɛ ɓa nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔ na, fe ká ɗo ɓay haŋa ni ka kɔ na, ka kɔ ya ɓáy.
46008003	Roo lɛ, nzoɓ ká hii Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru kara tuu nzoɓke nda̰w.
46008004	Munu zu lɛ, náa kɔ́ri ɓayri ká se tul vbiw ɓaarì ká ì vbi na. Wa̰a, náyri ká i púoke fe ha̰ wṵruri na, maa ɓay sṵŋa lɛ? Náa kɔ́ri ta-taŋ nda̰w, wṵru na ɓa fe ya ká tusiri key, a Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, mbḭw hɔy keklek.
46008005	Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, feri ká nzoɓri ɗi ɓa wṵru ká i ɗo tumbam, mase tusiri key na i ɗo ɗi ku. Wṵruri nda̰w, mbayri nda̰w na, i ŋgḭi ɓamba tasiri.
46008006	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, naari na, náa kɔ́ri Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na mbḭw hɔy keklek, ɓe káʼa ɓa Bǎa nzoɓ ɗáa feri riw bele a náa ɗori ɓay tul-e. Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, Ŋgɛrɛmbay na mbḭw hɔy, ɓe káʼa ɓa Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu Krisi ká feri riw bele ɗo ɓáy faa ɓe, a náa káwri ɓáy kumnun ɓáy faa ɓe na.
46008007	Roo lɛ, nzoɓri riw bele ze tuu tusuɛ ɓay na ku ya. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká púo wṵru ze tii ri pola na, ɗaa ha̰ timbɛɗɛ key kara, zaɗka i sṵ náy ká i púoke fe na lɛ, rìi fe ká ɓa taa wṵruri na ɓáy, a ha̰ kér ɓay ɓari ká ŋgḭi ya na ɗaa ha̰ law-ri yɔklɔ ri ha ri ɗáake ɓay ɓo tul-ri ɓáy faa fe sṵm na.
46008008	Ɓa fe sṵm ze a ɗáa ha̰ nzoɓ soro ɓa lakun Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya. Ze, zaɗka náa sṵ́ri fe hɔy kara náa ti zíŋri fe ká ɗi ya nda̰w, mase náa sṵ́ri fe ya hɔy kara, náa ti zíŋri fe ká ɗi ya nda̰w pi.
46008009	Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, ì nzɛ ɓáy sùo-rì ɓay haŋa káw ɓáy tul-rì ká se tul fe sṵm ɓáy fe nzɔkɔ na, ka ɓa ŋguɗ puu téke ɓal nzoɓri ká i ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ɓari ya na ya.
46008010	Tusuɛke lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ ká mbika law-ɛ ŋgɔŋ ya, ká kɔ mù ɓo ká mù ɓa nzoɓ fe kɔ́kɔ ká mù kaw ɓay sṵŋa fe ká ɓil hul wṵru ɓari na wa̰a, suru ni ɓay haŋa ni ka sṵ náy ká i púoke fe na nda̰w ya lɛ woo?
46008011	Ze, ɓay tul fe kɔ́kɔ ɓo na, yṵ-ɔ ká Krisi hu ɓay tul-e na wṵ̌ruke faa ɓay tul-a.
46008012	Zaɗka mù ɗaa feya̰a munu ziŋ yṵ-ɔ ká mbika law ɓe ŋgɔŋ ya na, ha̰ kér ɓay ɓe yɔklɔ ni na lɛ, mù ɗaa feya̰a mú túŋke Krisi kḭ sùo-ɛ.
46008013	Ɓe mini ze, ɓay tul sṵŋa náy ɓi ze, a haŋa yṵ-i lǐeke ɓo ɓil feya̰a lɛ, mì ti sṵŋa náy na mbǎa ɓay haŋa yṵ-i ka wṵ́ruke faa ya.
46009001	Ɓi na, ì kɔ, mì ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay káw ɓáy tul-i. Ɓi na mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ, a mí kɔ Zezu Ŋgɛrɛmbay naari. Ɓaarì na ì ɓa lere peɗ ɓi ká ɓil peɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay.
46009002	Ze, nzoɓ ha̰wri kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ya kara, ɓaarì na ɗo nun haŋa rì kɔ mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ɓa tusuɛ kḭ. Tusuɛke lɛ, ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, ɓaarì na kḭ ze ì ɓa nzoɓri ká kiɛ mii, mì ɓa nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ.
46009003	Ɓay ká mì ɓaa ɓay ya̰aŋake tul-i se tul nzoɓri ká i ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul-i na ze ɗo key.
46009004	Ɓaarì na, ì kɔ nda̰w, ɓuru na ɓuru ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay ya̰aŋa fe sṵm ɓáy fe nzɔkɔ ɓa fe tunduo peɗ ɓuru.
46009005	Ɓuru ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay ɗoko ɓáy má̰y ká ɓa nzoɓ mbika law na ha̰ ni su ɓuru munu ká Piyɛr ɓáy nzoɓ ndáy nzaapeɗ ha̰wri, rɔɔ yṵ Ŋgɛrɛmbayri nda̰w i ɗaa na ya lɛ?
46009006	Mase ɓa ɓúru Barnabas huo ɓuru hɔy ze ɓuru ɗáa peɗ ɓay zíŋ fe ká ɗi ɓay hɔ́lke sùo ɓuru lɛ?
46009007	Wa̰a, ì laa ba mbḭw mii, nzoɓ rúu yṵm hɔl sùo-ɛ sùo-ɛ nda̰w lɛ? Mase, nzoɓ ve nda̰w rɔɔ paa wáa lɛ, ka ti sṵŋa fe ká ɓil wáake na ya lɛ? Mase, nzoɓ kɔ́rɔ fe hɔl ha̰a rɔɔ, ti nzɔkɔ wa̰nke ya lɛ woo?
46009008	Ì ker í ɓaa mii, ɓay ká mì ɓaa key na, ɓa mbii ɓay ɓáa nzoɓri hɔy ya, roo lɛ, bol kusol Moyze hɔy kara ɓaa ɓayke faa mbḭw munu nda̰w.
46009009	Mbeɗe bol kusolke na ɓaa mii: «Nday ká ɗo tɔɗ naŋ ɓay haŋa pa̰rɛ ka tḭi na, mu siŋ nzi-ɛ ya.» Ɓay key na wa̰a, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa se tul ndayri kḭ huo-ri hɔy lɛ woo?
46009010	Wa̰a, ka ɓaa ɓay ni key na ɓay tul naari kḭ nda̰w ya lɛ? Tusuɛke lɛ, i ɗaa ɓay key na ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ɓay tul naari na kḭ. Nzoɓ ká pa-pay na, a ɗáa law-ɛ nzokɗo te tul zíŋ fe payke, a nzoɓ ká nda naŋ na, ka ker nzokɗo se tul zíŋ pa̰rɛ na.
46009011	Munu ká ɓuru ru mḭiri kere ká ɓa Ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗo ɓil law-rì na, zaɗka ɓuru ziŋ fe ha̰nɛ ndḭi ká nduo-rì ɓay hɔ́lke sùo ɓuru ká tusiri key na wa̰a, ɓa fe ká ndaya zu lɛ woo?
46009012	Zaɗka nzoɓ ha̰wri ɗo ɓáy faa ká ɓay zíŋ fe hɔ́l sùo-ri ká luo-rì na wa̰a, ɓuru na ɓuru ɗo ɓáy faa mba tul nzoɓkeri na ku ya lɛ woo? Roo lɛ, ɓuru na, fe ká i ha̰ ɓuru ɓa fe tunduo na, ɓuru ya̰a saa nduo-ri ya; ɓuru iki law ɓuru ká ɗi ɓay ɗáa puu ɓo faa káa Ɓay Kere ká se tul Krisi na ya.
46009013	Ì kɔ ta-taŋ nda̰w, nzoɓri ká i ɗaa peɗ ká ɓil hul ka̰ni Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na, i ziŋ fe tunduo ɓari ká ɗi í sṵ, a ɓari nzoɓ fe poyri ká i ɗaa peɗ í puo fe ká tutakra fe poy laa lɛ, i zíŋ fe tunduo ɓari ká ɗi í sṵ nda̰w.
46009014	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, Ŋgɛrɛmbay na mbi nzi-ɛ ɓay haŋa nzoɓ káa Ɓay Kereri na, i ziŋ fe í hɔ́lke sùo-ri ɓay tul peɗ káa Ɓay Kere ká i ɗaa na.
46009015	Roo lɛ, ɓi na, ɓáy faa ká mì ɗǒke na, mì yǎ̰ake fe mbḭw ya nda̰w, a mí ɗaa mbeɗe key na, ɓay yá̰aŋake fe ya nda̰w pi. Haŋa mì ya̰a fe saa nduo-rì na, ɗo ndaɗ ɓamba ɓay haŋa mì hu! Ndáka giri ká ɓay ya̰aŋa fe saa nduo-rì ya na, nzoɓ mbḭw mini kara ti náa ya.
46009016	Ɓi na, kaa Ɓay Kere ká mì kaa na, mì nda giri sùo-i ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, káa Ɓay Kereke ku na, ɓa peɗ ká ɗo tul-i ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa. Ze zaɗka mì ɗaa munu ya lɛ, ɓíɛ ka ɓa taa ɓi!
46009017	Ɓa fe ká ɓi kḭ sùo-i ze, mì naa sùo-i ɓay ɗáa peɗ na key lɛ, mì gíyaŋ ɓay zíŋ fe tunduo peɗke na. Roo lɛ, munu ká ɓa peɗ ɓi kḭ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɗaa zuɔ nduo-i ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa na, mì pɔŋ sùo-i ɓo ɗi ɓay ɗáa.
46009018	A wa̰a, fe tunduo ḭike ze, mì ziŋ ká ɓil peɗke na lɛ? Ɓi ká mì ɓa nzoɓ káa Ɓay Kere na, fe ká rii law-i ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi na ɓa ka-káa Ɓay Kere hɔy hɔy ha̰ nzoɓri taŋ vbika fe ká ɗo ɓay tul-i ɓay haŋa mì vbi.
46009019	Ɓi na mì kaw ɓáy tul-i, a mí ɓa koy nzoɓ mbḭw ya. Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, mì ɗaa sùo-i ɓa koy nzoɓri riw bele ɓay ya̰aŋake ruɔ nzoɓri ŋgḭ-ŋgḭi ha̰ Krisi.
46009020	Zaɗka mì ɗo ziŋ Ziɓri lɛ, mì ɗo munu ɓa Ziɓri na nda̰w ɓay ya̰aŋake ri ha̰ Krisi. Ze mì ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol Moyze ya hɔy kara, zaɗka mì ɗo ziŋ Ziɓri na lɛ, mì ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo ɗi ɓay ya̰aŋake ri ha̰ Krisi na.
46009021	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, zaɗka mì ɗo ziŋ nzoɓri ká i kɔ bol kusol Moyze ya na lɛ, mì ɗo munu ká ɓari na nda̰w, taŋ kér se tul bol kusolke na, ɓay ya̰aŋake ri ha̰ Krisi. Ɓe nu ku na kiɛ a ɓaa mii, mì ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul bol kusol Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya na ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓi na, mì hḭɛ bol kusol Krisi na.
46009022	A nzoɓri ká i ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law ɓari ya na, mì ɗo ziŋ ri rìi fe ká mì ŋgɔŋ ká ɓil mbika law-i ya nda̰w, ɓay yá̰aŋake ri ha̰ Krisi. Ɓe mini ze, mì nzaa faa mí pɔŋ sùo-i ha̰ nzoɓri riw bele ɓay yá̰aŋake nzoɓ ha̰nɛri.
46009023	Mì ɗaa fe niri key na riw bele munu ɓay haŋa káa Ɓay Kere na ka se ɓa pola pola ɓay haŋa ɓo, fe sa̰mi káʼa ɗoko na, mi ɗo ɓil-e nda̰w.
46009024	Ì kɔ, nzoɓri ká i faa kḭ ɗul na, i zuɔ ɗul na riw bele, í ɗuu ɓay zíŋ fe tunduo ká ɗi, a lɛ, nzoɓ mbḭw hɔy mba kṵ-ɛri a ziŋ fe tunduoke na. Wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ? Munu zu lɛ, ɓaarì na ì mgba sùo-rì ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ, í ɗúu munu na nda̰w ɓay zíŋ fe tunduoke na nda̰w rɔ!
46009025	Nzoɓ faa kḭ ɗulri riw bele na, i mgba sùo-ri ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓaŋguɔ. I ɗaa munu ɓay zíŋke fe tunduo ká waka ya hɔy lɛ, a ndáka siri. A roo lɛ, naari na, náa ɗáari law naari nzokɗo te tul fe tunduo káʼa ɗoko ɓaŋguɔ.
46009026	Sa̰wke mini ze, mì ɗuu ndoy mí ɗaa nun-i ndekɗe ɓo tul day na ku ɓay tḭ́i ɗi na kḭ. Ɓi na, mì ɗo munu ɓa nzoɓ ká hṵm nduo-ɛ a sìi fe lɛ sìi úo ya.
46009027	Ɓi na, mì ɗaa sùo-i ɓa koy mí mgba sùo-i ŋgɔ-ŋgɔŋ ɓay haŋa ɓo, fal káa Ɓay Kere ká mì kaa ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰wri na, ɓi kḭ sùo-i mi rɔ́kɔ fe tunduoke ya.
46010001	Yṵ-iri, mì hii ɓay túma law-rì se tul fe ká tḭi tul bulu naari ká i se ziŋ Moyze na. Ɓari riw bele na i se ɓil sìi mbam, a í tuo maambii ɓáy zaɗ ɓari riw bele.
46010002	Ká ɓil sìi mbam ɓáy ɓil maambii na, ɓari riw bele na i ɗaa tul-ri nduo mbii ɓáy faa zúɔ ziŋ Moyze.
46010003	Ɓari riw bele na i sṵ fe sṵm taa mbḭɛ ká uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru,
46010004	a ɓari riw bele na, i nzɔ mbii taa mbḭɛ ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni tḭi saa sa̰w tisaw nzir nzir. Tisawke ku na, su ri ká faa seɗ ɓari, a lɛ, tisawke na ze ɓa Krisi.
46010005	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara, ruɔ nzoɓri ká sakra ɓari ku na, i rii law Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya, ɓe ze ha̰ huɗ ɓari zǔɔke mgbirik mgbirik ká ɓil law kɔr.
46010006	Fe niri ká tḭi key na, ɗo ɓa fe kíɛ kḭ ha̰ naari ɓay haŋa náa ɗori ɓáy kɔn fe ɗáa ka̰ayari munu ká ɓari ká pola lew na ku ya.
46010007	Kɔkɔ ká ì púo wṵruri munu ká nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ɗaa ku ya, munu ká i ɗaa ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mii: «Ruɔ nzoɓri kaw siri ɓay sṵŋa sṵm nda̰w, ɓay nzɔkɔ fe nda̰w; falɛ ku na nda̰w rɔɔ i uru gbaw í zuɔ nday í nda ká pol wṵru ɓari na ɓay.»
46010008	Náa ti pɔ́ŋri sùo naari ɓay ɗáake nun pie munu ká nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓri ɓa isɔɗ sɔɗ duɔ zaɗ síŋ siɗi pa̰rɛ say (23.000), i zǐŋke huɗ ká ɓil nam mbḭw hɔy na ya.
46010009	Náa ti líeri law Ŋgɛrɛmbay munu ká nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ɗaa ha̰ sɔy teɗ ri ha ri zǐŋke huɗ ku ya.
46010010	Ɓaarì na, ì ti ŋgṵ́ri sùo-rì munu ká nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓari ɗaa ha̰ leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ví duku ri na ya.
46010011	Fe niri ká tḭi tul-ri ku na, ɗo ɓa fe kíɛ kḭ ha̰ naari. I ɗaa ɓayke ku na ɗo ɓil mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay bákake naari ká náa ɗori ɗi ya ɓáy ɔ́rɔ ɓie nam na.
46010012	Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓ ká ker a ɓaa mii, ɓeri mba fe na, ka kɔ tul-e ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ!
46010013	Fe líe law ḭi ḭi ká tḭi tul-rì na, ɓa fe ká lie nzoɓri riw bele munu nda̰w, roo lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kaw tul ɓay ɓeri káʼa waa na, ka ti pɔ́ŋ faa ha̰ fe líe law na ka kál tul hṵrusuo-rì ya. Zaɗka fe líe law na tḭi tul-rì lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa rì hṵrusuo ha rì sṵ̌uke law-rì, a lěkeke faa ha rì tḭ́ike saa ɓil-e ɓáy.
46010014	Ɓe mini ze, ɓaarì ká mì kɔ rì ɓa nzoɓ nun-i na, ì naa sùo-rì ká ɓil púo wṵruri.
46010015	Mì ɓaa ɓay key na ziŋ rì munu ɓa nzoɓ nun nzɛmri. Ɓay ká mì ɓaa key na ì kér sùo-rì kḭ í kɔ.
46010016	Zaɗka náa káwri nzaa fe sṵm Ŋgɛrɛmbay ziŋ kḭ mbḭw, ká náa nzɔ́ri mbii lere puu sṵ́uke ɓay ɗáake taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na wa̰a, kiɛ a ɓaa mii, náa ɗori ɓil feke na mbḭw hɔy ɓáy faa sím Krisi ká uo ká tul puu say huɗ ɓay tul naari na ya lɛ? A maapa ká náa sṵri na kiɛ a ɓaa mii, náa ɗori ɓil feke ká mbṵ naari mbḭw ɓáy naysuo Krisi na ya lɛ?
46010017	Munu ká maapa mbḭw hɔy na, ɓáy ruɔ naari bele hɔy kara, náa víri ɓa sùo ká mbḭw, ɓay ḭi lɛ, naari riw bele na náa sṵri maapa ká mbḭw na.
46010018	Ì kér se tul leɗ Izarayɛlri na í kɔ. Nzoɓri ká i sṵ fe ká i i í púoke fe poy ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na wa̰a, i zuɔ ziŋ ni ya zu lɛ?
46010019	A wa̰a, mì ɓáa mina ro lɛ? Nay ká i i í púoke wṵruri, mase wṵruri kḭ sùo-ri na wa̰a, ɓa fe tusuɛ kḭ zu lɛ?
46010020	Ṵ́-uu, munu ya. Roo lɛ, fe ká nzoɓri ká i tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya i puo na, i puo ha̰ ŋgɛrɛtemndayari ɓo, i puo ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya. Ze, mì hii ɓay haŋa rì zuɔ ziŋ temndayari ya.
46010021	Ɓaarì na, ì ɗáa mina ɓay nzɔkɔ fe taa temndayari nda̰w, a í nzɔ taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay nda̰w siɗi bele bɔrɔk lɛ woo? Ì ɗáa mina í kaw nzaa fe sṵm Ŋgɛrɛmbay í sṵ nda̰w, a í kaw nzaa fe sṵm temndayari í sṵ nda̰w siɗi bele bɔrɔk lɛ woo?
46010022	A wa̰a, náa ŋgaklari hɛrɛ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru, mase hṵrusuo naari mba tul-e lɛ?
46010023	Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ká sakra ɓaarì ɓaa mii: «Feri riw bele na faake ɗo hɔy ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa.» Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, roo lɛ, feri riw bele na ɓa fe sɔ́kɔ nzoɓ ya. Nzoɓ ha̰nɛri ɓaa mii: «Feri riw bele na faake ɗo hɔy ɓay haŋa mì ɗaa,» roo lɛ, feri riw bele na ɗaa ha̰ nzoɓ ŋgɔ́ŋke ká ɓil mbika law ya.
46010024	Ndaɗ ɓay nzáa faa fe kere ká ɓay tul-a hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ì nzaa fe ká ɓay tul nzoɓ ha̰wri hɔy kara nda̰w rɔ!
46010025	Náyri riw bele ká ì hie ká zaɗ fe híe na, ì sṵ-sṵ kḭ hɔy taŋ vbika vbiw se tul-e ha̰ kér ɓay ka yɔklɔ rì ká ɗi ya,
46010026	ɓay ḭi lɛ, mbeɗe Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓaa mii: «Tusiri ɓáy feri riw bele ká ɗo ɓil-e na ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay.»
46010027	Nzoɓ ká mbi law-ɛ ya na, zaɗkaʼa ɗí rì rɔɔ ì hii ɗo ɗi í se lɛ, feri riw bele káʼa ha rì na ì sṵ taŋ vbika vbiw se tul-e ha̰ kér ɓay ka yɔklɔ rì ká ɗi ya.
46010028	A roo lɛ, zaɗka nzoɓ ɓaa ha rì mii, náy key na uru saa zaɗ fe poy zu, lɛ, ì sṵ ya, ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ká baka mù na ha̰ kér ɓay ɓe ka yɔklɔ ni ya.
46010029	Mì ɓaa ɓay key na ɓay tul kér ɓay ká yɔklɔ rì ya, roo lɛ, ɓay tul kér ɓay ɓe ká yɔklɔ ni na. Kɔ ya lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰nɛ vbi mì mii, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, fe ká faake ɗo hɔy ká mì ɗaa na, nzoɓ kḭ a yɔklɔ kér ɓay ɓi ká ɗi lɛ?
46010030	Zaɗka mì ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓay tul fe ká mì sṵ na wa̰a, ɗaa mina nda̰w rɔɔ, nzoɓ a ɓáa ziŋ mì se tul fe ká mì ɗaa taambɔl nda̰w rɔɔ mí sṵ na lɛ?
46010031	Ɓe ze, ɓa na fe sṵm ze ì sṵ, mase ɓa fe nzɔkɔ ze ì nzɔ, mase fe ḭi ḭi hɔy ì ɗaa na kara, ì ɗaa feri riw bele ɓay ɗáake riŋ ɗika ɓo tul Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46010032	Ì se simseɗ ká ɓay ɗáake puu ɓo faa ha̰ Ziɓri ya nda̰w, nzoɓri ká i ɓa Gɛrɛk ya nda̰w, rɔɔ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ya nda̰w pi.
46010033	Ì ɗaa munu ká ɓi. Ɓi na mì ɗaa hṵrusuo-i tuŋ kḭ ɓay ríi law nzoɓri riw ká ɓil feri riw bele; mì nzaa fe kere ká ɓay tul-i kḭ hɔy ya, roo lɛ, ɓay ɗáa fe ká ɗo ɓay tul nzoɓri riw bele ɓay haŋa ri zǐŋke pam.
46011001	Ì mbóro fe ɗáa ɓi munu ká ɓi hɔy kara, mì mboro fe ɗáa Krisi.
46011002	Mì písi rì, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ì ker se tul-i ɓáy namri riw bele, a í tɔŋ fal fe sa̰w nzoɓ mbika lawri ká mì fere rì na ɓaŋguɔ.
46011003	Roo lɛ, mì hii ɓay haŋa rì laa ɓay key na ɓáy kere nda̰w rɔ! Krisi na ɓa mbay ká tul wa̰rari riw bele, wa̰ra nzoɓ na ɓa mbay ká tul má̰y nzoɓ, a Ŋgɛrɛwṵru laa lɛ, ɓa mbay ká tul Krisi.
46011004	Wa̰ra nzoɓ ká ɗaa fe guɓa tul-e rɔɔ a ɗáake nzaa ɓay kere, mase a tǐnake sa̰w ɓay káʼa ya̰a ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na lɛ, ka ɗaa mbay ɓo tul Krisi ká ɓa mbay ɓe na ya zu.
46011005	A lɛ, má̰y nzoɓ ká ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere, mase ka tina sa̰w ɓay káʼa ya̰a ká luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru taŋ kuo tul-e lɛ, ka ɗaa mbay ɓo tul wa̰ra ká ɓa mbay tul-e na ya. Ɓe na, ka ɗo munu ɓa má̰y ká sṵu tul-e taŋ kpori kpori.
46011006	Zaɗka má̰y nzoɓ kuo tul-e ya lɛ, ka kúɗ sṵy tul-e na kuɗ! A roo lɛ, munu ká kúɗ sṵy tul, mase sṵu tul ɓa sahoy má̰y nzoɓ na lɛ, ka kuo tul-e kuo!
46011007	Wa̰ra nzoɓ na ti kuo tul-e ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓe na ka mbi sùo ziŋ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɓa fe riŋ ɗika ɓe. A roo lɛ, má̰y nzoɓ na ɓa fe riŋ ɗika wa̰ra nzoɓ.
46011008	Tusuɛke lɛ, wa̰ra nzoɓ na i ɗaa ni ɓáy faa má̰y nzoɓ ya, roo lɛ, má̰y nzoɓ ze i ɗaa ni ɓáy faa wa̰ra nzoɓ.
46011009	A wa̰ra nzoɓ na, i ɗaa ni ɓay tul má̰y nzoɓ ya, roo lɛ, má̰y nzoɓ ze i ɗaa ni ɓay tul wa̰ra nzoɓ.
46011010	Sa̰wke mini ze, má̰y nzoɓ na ka kuo tul-e ɓay kíɛke hṵrusuo mbay ká ɓo tul-e, ɓay haŋa leɗ nzaapeɗri ká nulue i kɔ́ke ni.
46011011	Ɓe nu ku hɔy kara ká pol Ŋgɛrɛmbay na, má̰y nzoɓ na ɗo ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ taŋ wa̰ra nzoɓ ya nda̰w, a wa̰ra nzoɓ hɔy kara ɗo ɓáy tul gaŋ sùo-ɛ taŋ má̰y nzoɓ ya nda̰w pi.
46011012	Ze, i ɗaa má̰y nzoɓ ɓáy faa wa̰ra nzoɓ hɔy kara, wa̰ra nzoɓ na má̰y nzoɓ ze mboŋ ni. A feri riw bele na, sa̰wke uru saa luo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru.
46011013	Ì kér sùo-rì kḭ í kɔ, má̰y nzoɓ ká kuo tul-e ya hɔy a ɗaa nzaa ɓay kere na wa̰a, ɓáy kere kḭ zu lɛ?
46011014	Ká tusiri key na, ì kɔ nda̰w, ɓay haŋa wa̰ra nzoɓ pɔŋ sṵy tul-e pìe bululu na ɓa fe sahoy;
46011015	a má̰y nzoɓ ká pɔŋ sṵy tul-e pì-pie laa lɛ, ɓa fe písi ni, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ɓa fe ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ha̰ ni ɓay haŋa ni ka pɔ́ŋ munu a púɗke tul-e na wa̰a, ì kɔ munu ya lɛ?
46011016	Zaɗka nzoɓ hii ɓay má̰y ɓay key na lɛ, ka laa ɓay key na ta-taŋ: ɓuru na, ɓuru ɗo ɓáy fe sa̰w kḭ ya nda̰w, a mbṵ́ kḭ nzoɓ mbika lawri hɔy kara, i ɗǒke ya nda̰w pi.
46011017	Ɓay ká mì ɓáa ha rì key na, ɓay písi rì ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ɓaarì na, fe ka̰ayari ze ì ɗaa mba tul fe kereri.
46011018	Titire lɛ, nzoɓri ɓaa ha̰ mì mii, zaɗka ì mbṵ kḭ í kaw lɛ, téke ɓil kḭ ɗo sakra ɓaarì, a lɛ, mì ya̰a ɓayke ha̰nɛri ká ɗi.
46011019	Ɓa tusuɛ kḭ, téke ɓil kḭ na a ɗoko sakra ɓaarì na kḭ, ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ i kɔ́kɔke nzoɓri ká i ɗo tul ɓal-ri ɓáy zaɗɛ ká sakra ɓaarì na ɓáy.
46011020	Roo lɛ, ɓaarì na, zaɗka ì mbṵ kḭ í kaw na, ɓa fe sṵm Ŋgɛrɛmbay ze ì sṵ ya,
46011021	ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗka ì kaw nzaa fe sṵm na, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a hɔy kara takra ɓay sṵŋa taa ɓe taa ɓe, a ha̰ nzoɓ ha̰nɛri i kaw ɓáy kɔn, a nzoɓ ha̰nɛri laa lɛ, fe nzɔkɔ ɗaa ri tuɗ.
46011022	Wa̰a, ì ɗo ɓáy hul ká ɓay sṵŋa fe ká ɗi, a í nzɔ fe ká ɗi ya lɛ? Mase, ì hii ḭ́m nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ha̰ sahoy ka sɛ nzoɓri ká fe ɓari tiya na lɛ woo? Ɓay ḭike kḭ ɓáy ze, ì giyaŋ ɓay haŋa mì ɓaa ha rì lɛ? Wa̰a, mi písi rì ká ɗi lɛ woo? Munu ya!
46011023	Ì kɔ, fe fére ká mì ziŋ ká luo Ŋgɛrɛmbay a mí suo mí fere rì na ze ɗo key: Ká ɓil suŋke ká i mbika tul Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ɓay ika ni na, ka mbi maapa,
46011024	a falɛ káʼa ɗaa taambɔl ha̰ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na báyḭi lɛ, ka haw a ɓaa ha̰ leɗ nduoɓal-ɛri mii: «Ɓe ni key na ɓa naysuo-i ká ɗo ɓay tul-rì. Ì ɗaa mini key ɓaŋguɔ ɓo í kérke ɓay se tul-i.»
46011025	Ɗo faa mbḭw munu nda̰w, fal fe sṵm na ku báyḭi lɛ, ka mbi koɓo a ɓaa ha ri mii: «Koɓo key na ɓa sáka kuni fie ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru siŋ ziŋ rì ɓáy faa sím ɓi. Nam ha̰a ha̰a ká ì nzɔ fe key lɛ, ì ɗaa munu í kérke ɓay se tul-i.»
46011026	Nam ha̰a ha̰a ká ì sṵ maapa key, a í nzɔ fe key na lɛ, kiɛ a ɓaa mii, ì ɗo ka-káa ɓay huɗ Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɓay tul naari na kpṵru maa ɓáy nam káʼa yḭ́i a vi.
46011027	Ɓe mini ze, nzoɓ ká sṵ maapa, mase ka nzɔ fe taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay na ɓáy faake ya lɛ, ɓay mgba tul nzoɓke na ku, ɓay ḭi lɛ, ka ḭ̌m naysuo Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɓáy sím ɓe.
46011028	Munu zu lɛ, nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká hii ɓay sṵŋa maapa a nzɔ fe key na lɛ, ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka bɛ́klɛ ɓil law-ɛ kḭ sùo-ɛ a kɔ nda̰w rɔ! Ze ɓo, zaɗka fe mbḭw tiya ro lɛ, ka sṵ a nzɔ ɓáy.
46011029	A nzoɓ ká sṵ a nzɔ, rɔɔ a kɔ sùo Ŋgɛrɛmbay ká ɗi ya lɛ, ka sṵ a nzɔ a ɗáake fe ka̰aya, a ɗáake ɓay ɓo tul-e ɓe kḭ sùo-ɛ.
46011030	Sa̰wke mini ze, ruɔ nzoɓri ká sakra ɓaarì, i ɓáke nzoɓ sɛmri nda̰w, í tǎ̰ake ɗɛk ɗɛk nda̰w, a ruɔke ha̰nɛri laa lɛ, i zǐŋke huɗ nda̰w pi.
46011031	A roo lɛ, zaɗka náa bɛklɛri ɓil law naari kḭ sùo naari lɛ, ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ti mgbaka tul naari ya.
46011032	Ze, zaɗka Ŋgɛrɛmbay ɗaa ɓay ɓo tul naari, a ha̰ náa kɔ́ri sɛkɛ fe ká ɗi kara, ka ɗaa ɓay kǐɛke naari fe ɓo, ɓay haŋa nam káʼa kúŋke ɓay zuɔ tul nzoɓri na, ka ɗaa ɓay ka zúɔ tul naari munu káʼa ɗáake zuɔ tul nzoɓ tukɛlɛri ya.
46011033	Yṵ-iri, ɓe ze, zaɗka ì mbṵ kḭ ɓay sṵŋa fe sṵm Ŋgɛrɛmbay lɛ, ì giyaŋ kḭ nda̰w rɔ!
46011034	Ze, zaɗka kɔn i nzoɓ lɛ, ka sṵ fe ká puo ɓe rɔɔ a vi ɓáy. Ɓe nda̰w rɔɔ, ì há̰ke ɓay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru mgba tul-rì ká zaɗ mbṵ́ kḭ ɓaarì na ya ɓáy. A ɓay ká se tul fe ha̰wri na lɛ, nam ká mì séke luo-rì nda̰w rɔɔ, mì leke ɓáy.
46012001	Yṵ-iri, timbɛɗɛ key na náa kɔ́kɔri fal vbiw ɓaarì ká ì vbi se tul fe ini Tem Law Pie na. Mì hii ɓay haŋa rì kɔ tusuɛ ɓay ká se tul fe inikeri na ta-taŋ.
46012002	Ɓaarì na ì kɔ nda̰w, zaɗka ì tuu Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ya rɔɓay na, ì pɔŋ sùo-rì ha̰ temndayari kuɔ rì ha rì se fal wṵruri ká ɓaa ɓay ya mgbuɗu hɔy.
