66021021	Faa hulri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi na ɓa pa̰ra zaw kereri ká duɔ falɛ siɗi ká larike ŋgɔŋ ɓamba ká i ɗi ɓa perle. Faa hulri mbḭw mbḭw riw bele na i ɗaa ɓáy pa̰ra zaw kereke mbḭw kḭ hɔy. Faa ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na, i ɗaa ɓáy lari ká ndṵy zḭriri zḭriri a taŋ kaɗ kaɗ a ɗo ka̰rara.
66021022	Roo lɛ, ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na, mì kɔ hul ka̰ni ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru Nzoɓ Hṵrusuo Luye ɓáy Vu Baɗu na ze i ɓa hul ka̰nike.
66021023	Ŋgɛrɛpuo na se síe síe, mase few rɔɔ ɓay haŋa ri taŋ zaɗ ká ɗi ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, zaɗ taŋa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kiɛ ni na, taŋ zaɗ kaɗ kaɗ ká ɗi, a Vu Baɗu laa lɛ, ɓa huu ndele ká puoke.
66021024	Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká tusiri key na, i ɗoko ɓil zaɗ taŋa ɓe, a mbayri ká tusiri key kara, i séke ɓáy feziŋa ɓari ká ɗi.
66021025	Faa hulkeri na a ɗoko hɔy ká ɓisie; nzoɓ ti dár ɗo ɗi ya mgbaŋ, ɓay ḭi lɛ, suŋ ti ɗoko ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na ku ya.
66021026	Nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ ká tusiri key na, i úru ɓáy fe riŋ ɗika ɓari ɓáy feziŋa ɓari í séke ɗi.
66021027	Ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke ku na, fe ḭ̌m mbḭw mini kara ti ríi ɗi ya, nzoɓ fe ɗáa lɔrɔri ya nda̰w, nzoɓ kúɗ ɓayri ya nda̰w. Ɓa ɓari huo-ri kḭ hɔy ká riŋ-ri ɗo ɓil mbeɗe pam ká ɓa taa Vu Baɗu na ze i ríi ɗi.
66022001	Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na kiɛ mì nduo mbii káw ɓáy kumnun ká ndṵy a taŋ ka̰rara tḭi saa kariŋgaw mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Vu Baɗu,
66022002	a uo ká law sikɗa faa ká ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuoke na. Ká sikɗa nduo mbiiri ká siɗi na, puu káw ɓáy kumnun ɗo ɗi, ká lie lereke faa ɓal ba duɔ falɛ siɗi ká ɓil mbiimbam mbḭw. Few mbḭw lɛ, lie ba mbḭw mbḭw, a vaykeri kara ɓa sa̰wpuu vaa nzoɓri ká sa̰w puo ɓari ɓoɗ ɓoɗ.
66022003	Feri ká Ŋgɛrɛwṵru faɗ na ti ɗoko mbǎa. Kariŋgaw mbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy Vu Baɗu ze a ɗoko ɗi. Lɛɛ, nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri na, i ruo ni.
66022004	I kɔ́kɔ nun-ɛ, lɛ, riŋ-ɛ ɗo nzaa pol-ri.
66022005	Suŋ ti tiika ɗi mbǎa nda̰w, nzoɓ ti séke síe zaɗ taŋa huu ndele ya nda̰w, zaɗ taŋa síe ya nda̰w, ɓay ḭi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a haŋa zaɗ taŋa ɓe taŋ ká tul-ri, a í re mbay mbiimbam ɓáy mbiimbam ɓaŋguɔ.
66022006	Falɛ ku lɛ, leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: «Ɓaykeri ku na ɓa sùo ɓay a maa ɓay ɗáa law ɓo ɗi. Ŋgɛrɛmbay Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ha̰ Tem ɓe ha̰ nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzi-ɛ na, pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓe ɓay kíɛ nzoɓ peɗ ɓeri fe káʼa vika vuku.»
66022007	Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika. Nzoɓ ká ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓayri ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key lɛ, suoriya ɓa taa ɓe.»
66022008	Ɓi Za̰a na, fekeri ku riw bele na, mì laa ɓáy suk-i nda̰w, a mí kɔ ɓáy nun-i gbak gbak nda̰w pi. A zaɗka mì laa ɓay fekeri, a mí kɔ ɓáy nun-i nda̰w na báyḭi lɛ, mì huku pol leɗ nzaapeɗ Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká kiɛ mì fekeri na ɓay rúo ni.
66022009	Roo lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ mì mii: «Hay, mu ɗaa munu ya. Ɓi na, mì ɓa nzoɓ peɗ munu ká ɓo nda̰w, munu ká yṵ-ɔri ká i ɓa nzoɓ ya̰aŋa ɓayri saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru nda̰w, rɔɔ munu ká ɓari riw bele ká i ɗaa vu mbom ɓo tul ɓayri ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key nda̰w na. Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ze mu ruo ni.»
66022010	Falɛ ku lɛ, ka ɓaa ha̰ mì ɓáy mii: «Ɓayri ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, mu mṵu ya, ɓay ḭi lɛ, nam ká fekeri a tḭ́i na tɔ̀ŋ ɗi mbǎa ro.
66022011	Nzoɓ ka̰aya na, ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola, a nzoɓ fe ɗáa ḭ̌m na, ka ɗo ɓil fe ɗáa ḭ̌m na, a ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola. A roo lɛ, nzoɓ fe ɗáa ɓáy zaɗɛ na, ka ɗaa nun-ɛ ɓa pola, a nzoɓ ká ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru lɛ, ka ɗo ɓoɗ ɓa taa ɓe, a séke nun-ɛ ɓa pola.»
66022012	Zezu ɓaa mii: «Ì laa key! Ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika. Mì mgbaka fe tunduori na ɗo nduo-i ɓay haŋa nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a lɛ, ka maa ɓáy peɗ ɗáa ɓe.
66022013	Ɓi na, mì ɓa Alfa ɓáy Omega, mì ɓa Titire Nzoɓ ɓáy Ɔ́rɔ Ɓie Nzoɓ, Nzoɓ Tiika Sa̰w Fe ɓáy Nzoɓ Ɔ́rɔ Ɓie Fe mgbaɗa.
66022014	Suoriya ɓa taa nzoɓri ká i wàa maagari ɓari taŋ kaɗ kaɗ, ɓay haŋa ɓo i ɗo ɓáy faa ríi ɓáy faa kɔ̀kɔ dudu í se ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo na, í sṵ lere puu káw ɓáy kumnun ɓaŋguɔ ká ɗi.
66022015	Roo lɛ, váy nzoɓri, ɓari nzoɓ fe ɗáa mgbḭiri ɓáy nzoɓ ɗáa nun pieri nda̰w, nzoɓ ika nzoɓri nda̰w, nzoɓ kóɗ fe kḭri ká i kɔ ɓa ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓari nda̰w, mase nzoɓ ha̰a ha̰a ká hii kúɗ ɓay a ɗaa ɓaŋguɔ nda̰w na, i ɗoko fal ŋgɛrɛpuoke na.
66022016	«Ɓi Zezu na, mì pie leɗ nzaapeɗ ɓi ɓay haŋa ni ka ɓaa nasi ɓay feri key na riw bele ha̰ nzoɓ mbika lawri ká i mbṵ tul kḭ ká zaɗ ɓoɗ ɓoɗ na. Ɓi na, mì ɓa vu bulu Mbay Daviɗ, a mí ɓa rùo tiɓie ká taŋ gbalak nda̰w pi.»
66022017	Tem Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ɓáy má̰y mbana Vu Baɗu na, i ɓaa mii: «Mu vi!» Nzoɓ ká laa ɓay key na lɛ, ka ɓaa mii: «Mu vi!» Nzoɓ ká kɔn mbii sɛ ni lɛ, ka vi; a nzoɓ ká hii ɓay nzɔkɔ mbii káw ɓáy kumnun lɛ, ka ví ya̰a hɔy hɔy.
66022018	Ɓaarì riw bele ká ì laa ɓay ká uru saa nzaa Ŋgɛrɛwṵru ká ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, ɓi Za̰a na mì baka rì mii: nzoɓ ká ɗaa ɓay kḭ nde tul ɓayke na lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a ɗáa ɓíɛri ká mbi ɓáy zaɗ, ká ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key na, nde tul sɛkɛ fe ká ɗo ɓay tul-e.
66022019	A nzoɓ ká naa ɓay ha̰nɛ ká ɗi lɛ, Ŋgɛrɛwṵru a náa fe ha̰nɛ ká ɗo ɓay tul-e, ká ɓayke ɗo ɓil mbeɗe ni key nda̰w. Nzoɓke ti sṵŋa lere puu káw ɓáy kumnun ya nda̰w, ka ti ríi ɓil ŋgɛrɛpuo Ŋgɛrɛwṵru na ya nda̰w pi.
66022020	Nzoɓ ɓáa nasi ɓay fe niri key riw bele na ɓaa mii: «Ɓa tusuɛ, ndḭi hɔy lɛ, mì vika.» Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ! Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu, mu vi!
66022021	Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa law huoke taa Ŋgɛrɛmbay Zezu ka sáɗ ziŋ nzoɓ taa Ŋgɛrɛwṵruri riw bele! Amɛm! Ndaɗ ɓay haŋa ni ka ɗo munu na kḭ!
